Natalya looked up in horror as AJ grinned maliciously , drawing the weapon to face her once more. "Maybe this size doesn't suit you, you obviously still have a chance to get away. You don't deserve to be a doll. You need to be something less" The bright light flooded Natalya's world one more time. The only thing she could hear was the laughter of AJ getting deeper, and deeper.

When Natalya awoke, she felt the ground around her. It wasn't as hard as the tile floor, but still had a certain firmness to it. behind her was a pink awning matching the shape of the curved hill that she was seated on. The whole hill was scented like cocoa and was covered in strange ridges that swirled throughout the entire length. Natalya then heard a deafening sound from behind her, that made her spin around and stare up in awe and horror. AJ's face, the size of an entire town was staring down at her, with a booming laughter that made Natalya cover her ears. It was then that she reallized that the plain she had been standing on this whole time was AJ's index finger, right where the nail met the skin.

"YOU HAD TO RUN, DIDN'T YOU? WELL LOOK AT YOU NOW. THE ONCE MIGHTY NATALYA NEIDHART REDUCED TO THE SIZE OF AN ANT. NO, WAIT... LESS THAN AN ANT. LIKE A FLEA OR... AHAHAHAH A GNAT! GET IT? NATTIE THE GNAT!!

Natalya had no recourse. Even if she had shouted at her, she was way too small to be heard by the massive girl that literally held her life in her hands. All she could do was stare up at the massive lips that could swallow her at any minute like a Tic Tac, and wonder what she can possibly do. Hell, if she had been made any smaller, she may even fit into the fillings in AJ's teeth!

"YOU DIDN'T RESPECT ME AS A CHAMPION, SO NOW YOU'LL HAVE TO WORSHIP ME AS YOUR GODDESS. I CONTROL YOUR LIFE NOW, LITTLE NAT. JUST THINK OF ALL THE THINGS I COULD DO TO YOU WHILE YOU'RE THAT INSIGNIFICANT. I COULD LICK MY FINGER RIGHT NOW, AND DROWN YOU IN MY SALIVA. I CAN STICK YOU IN MY HAIR AND LET YOU FEND FOR YOURSELF ON MY SCALP!" AJ then moved the finger all the way up to her massive eye, really hammering in how much of a speck Nattie had become. "I COULD CRUSH YOU WITH AN EYELASH. THAT'S HOW PATHETIC YOU ARE RIGHT NOW."

AJ then took the forefinger and thumb of her other hand, reaching down for the miserably small Diva. Natalya screamed as the two massive digits surrounded her, squeezing her on all sides and lifting her off of the other hand. She felt sick as AJ took no care in whisking her up to her massive lips, her hot breath covering her with every exhale, until finally she spoke with a booming voice,

"NOW... WHAT TO DO WITH YOU, NAT?"
15522222222222222222221122.title: On AJ's Finger

choices: A.J. does through with her plan and shrinks the rest of Total Diva's
Outside she goes, and shrinks the entire Arena in one go.
155222222222222222222211221.content:
"Oh! I know!" The incredibly booming voice of A.J.'s would call out, the index finger from thankfully, her free hand, currently tapping her chin in though. For a moment her eyes had adverted off of her prize on her other finger, clinging and hoping for this nightmare to end, though it was only just beginning. Natayla's world was A.J.'s finger, a terrifying thought for this woman who was not short on words when it came to insulting this young woman. Even if she did deserve it most the time, and true to the craziness that people attested to her being. Still, when you literally sat on the fingertip of that person, a mere ant, no a mere speck. Well safe to say it was within Nattie's best interests to be worried as to what this lunatic had planned for her.

A sense of vertigo overtook the miniscule woman, the outside world from this fingertip zooming by. Becoming nothing more than a blur as A.J. moved it about, making it impossible for Nattie to see what was going on. That would be if she didn't lose what lunch she had eaten earlier from this motion which put even the best heart stopping amusement park rides to shame. It wouldn't be long, there after that Nattie's view of the outside world would return. She able to see the distant plain that was the lockeroom, although from a new angle. If it wasn't enough that this place was distorted beyond belief, even the smallest of things looking like mountains to her, it didn't help that her angle on the room was far lower than she would have suspected, having just been at eye height with her captor.

"You smell that?" A.J. would tease in her tremendous voice, a hint of a condescending tone shining through the deepness that rumbled Nattie to her core. Indeed, Natayla did smell something. Something beyond the cocoa smell of A.J.'s hand, although this too had the smell of lotion to it, there was something else, the smell of sweat, an unpleasant stench which began to overpower her senses. A slight giggle reverberated above her, allowing Natayla to remain aware of this Goddess of a woman above her. This Goddess who would make sure to tilt her finger ever so lightly to give her captive a full view of what this stench belonged too. The discarded sneaker, freshly pulled from her foot. A warm air, full of this foul stench emitted from it, a smell which would have been unnoticeable to anyone of normal size, but to Nattie, it was very much so there.

The second thing she would notice would be A.J.'s sock covered foot, resting on the ground beside the sneaker. Nattie's world rumbling as A.J. would make a move, bending her body over more and reaching her free hand down. It was as if the planet itself was shaking for her as A.J. simply pulled the sock from her foot, exposing the tan flesh of her foot to this woman. "It smells like.....home doesn't it?" A.J. would laugh at this last comment before she deposited Nattie to her new "home". As gently as she could, though it was far more violent than she could ever know, placing Nattie down. Allowing her to touch down on the skin between her big and second toe. They twitching involuntarily at the sensation, the knowledge of having a life there between them. It was all that she needed for an empowered grin to form on her lips as she looked down at her foot, barely seeing yet knowing that one of the Total Diva's was at her feet, literally. It is where they belonged after all, wasn't it? She the Diva's Champion, and they nothing more than eye candy for some reality show. Nattie was only the tip of the iceberg for this crazed Diva.

"Welcome to the new Location of Total Diva's, under my foot where you vermin belong. Although, where are your costars I wonder? Oh well, I suppose the hunt is all part of the fun right?" She would grin, knowing full well that her enemy had to be crying at her predicament. Still she would ignore her for now, after all there was plenty of time to play later when she had her other toys. Putting her sock back on, as well as her sneaker. This leaving Nattie in a dark damp and hot hell that was A.J.'s shoe. This young woman would make her way out of the locker room, Nattie's world becoming extremely jostled around with each step she took. The endless and desolate plain that was A.J.'s foot her home. Still, it wouldn't be long before this woman passed a few stage hand's in the back area and the word "Crazy' was said under their breath once they saw this woman. They had tried to keep it quiet, but it was all too clear for her. Tilting her head to the side, the very definition of that word began to show. A.J.'s eye's looked dead ahead, long after these men had passed. Leaving her to stand there for a moment, giving Nattie a break. That distant look in her eyes, as a hand began to make it's way to her hair, grabbing a handful as she tugged at it. "Crazy? I'll show them crazy!" A maniacal laugh following these rather ominous words, what could they mean?
155222222222222222222211221.title: Stick her between her toes

1552222222222222222222112211.content:
A.J. Lee huffs and storms away as she talks aloud to herself. With the Gnat sized Nattie in tow she heads for the locker room. She opens the door and is greeted by the site of Brie Bella working out. "Oh hey Cray-J," A.J fumes at the remark and points the gun at Brie as Brie turns back around. SHe's suddenly enveloped in a white light and passes out.. A.J skips over to the inch sized Bella and picks her up between thumb and forefinger. "Is this crazy enough for you Brie!?" she screams as she drops the tiny Diva onto a surface and walks away...

Brie awakens on a strange dark surface and notices a slight smell coming from the area. "Ugh where am I? Where is A.J?" As she looks around Brie notices a roof like thing over part of the area but the rest is covered by the arena's ceiling. But when she looks down she notices a large number "7"... "Oh my God!" Brie screams and realizes she on a sandal!

Just then a series of "Booms"! are heard and a dark shadow appears over Brie and the sandal. Standing right over her is none other than an unaware....
1552222222222222222222112211.title: The Hunt Begins

15522222222222222222221122111.content:
BOOM!

Brie began to lose her balance on the Adidas sandal as her sister’s tremendous bare foot landed right next to it (http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/31...). The tremors from Nikki’s footfall knocked Brie into the rubber columns that lined the floor of the sandal. The tremendous white “7” outlined in the floor of the red sandals made Brie shiver as she realized how tiny she must be. Her sister didn’t exactly have massive feet, yet this sandal was nothing short of colossal as it appeared that she was now in a red forest of nearly ancient trees. While the matter of her new perspective alone was alarming, Brie was forced to face another threat… the foot of her sister. After just completing a match, the two were not exactly the picture of perfect hygiene at the moment; and while it was never a concern before, Brie did not feel comfortable being in the same place her colossal sister was about to place her foot!

“Where the hell is Brie?” Nikki said as she slowly lowered herself onto the bench. Down below between her feet, Brie covered her ears as she heard the bench creak as it adjusted to Nikki’s sudden weight.

Looking up, Brie watched in disbelief as Nikki slowly began to lift her foot into the air. Slowly, Brie was eclipsed by the shadow of her sister’s sole as Nikki began to slide her foot into the sandal (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...). Diving into the rubber floor, Brie curled up in a ball as the tremendous shadowy form above her began to cover her. With eyes wide in fear, Brie watched as the red forest was slowly swallowed up by Nikki’s titanic sole. Brie held her breath as she waited for the foot to make contact with the canopy above…

BOOM!

Brie was launched forward as Nikki’s bare sole came to rest on the sandal. Looking up, the tiny wrestler could see that she was beneath her sister’s heel, the powerful curving arch stretching out ahead of her as the darkness settled like a blanket through the rubber woods. Pulling herself up, Brie leaned against a rubber stud only to notice her shoulder was wet from the touch. Confused, she looked up slowly to see a shiny film of liquid running down the rubber spire like a dozen tiny streams… all emanating from Nikki’s foot above. Her sister’s foot was like the ceiling of a cavern Brie realized as she saw the trickling streams coming down all the spires around her. Wandering around under Nikki’s resting heel, Brie noticed that water was already gathering at her feet. Her own shoes sloshed a bit as she realized that the match today had left both her and her sister sweaty…she just had the bad fortune to be under Nikki’s foot. While this would have been nothing to Nikki, at Brie’s size even this mild sweating was like a slowly building tide as single droplets now seemed to be bucket-full blasts.

“Ah, shit, this was dumb,” Nikki’s voice boomed from above as the ground began to shake violently. Brie was tossed on her ass into the growing pool of sweat as the tremendous structure above her began to shift. The world began to tilt as Brie found herself falling down the slick surface!

WHAM!

Brie was coughing as she found herself close-lined by a red spire, the sweat flowing past her as it followed the ever-shifting incline of Nikki’s moving sandal. Groaning, Brie looked up and almost swallowed her tongue as she realized just how far she had slid in the tiny flood from before. She was now under the arch of the sandal’s strap!

BOOM!

Her head snapping to the side, Brie spotted what had bothered Nikki. Her socks weren’t on yet. The long pink socks were now pulled tight over her sister’s leg as the massive foot was once again headed for the sandal (http://media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/1...)! Looking up, Brie saw what she had been dreading, her sister’s massive toes now hovering above her as the slowly dipped low to lodge under the arch…

BOOM!.... GRNNNNNNNNNN!

Brie was tossed to the side as Nikki’s foot settled down on the sandal once more.

“Much better!” Nikki chirped as she began to stand. Down under her foot, it sounded like a bridge was about to collapse as each spire groaned, bending under Nikki’s weight. Breathlessly, Brie looked up and cringed as she saw the threaded ceiling begin to dip lower and lower! Closing her eyes, Brie braced herself as Nikki….
15522222222222222222221122111.title: Sibling Cruelty

choices: Nikki's finger was coming for her
155222222222222222222211221111.content:
“Shit, where did I put that?” Nikki said as Brie could hear her shuffle above, the sock-clad ceiling shifting as the giantess moved around. Falling onto her ass, Brie watched as her sister’s massive foot pressed against the plastic pillars of the sandal, leaning in threateningly close as the giantess bent down to check the lower half of her locker. Brie looked up in fear as the sock surface was soon close enough for her to touch. The falling ceiling was starting to fall closer and closer as Nikki bent lower and lower, leveling more of her weight onto her feet. Brie began screaming as she felt Nikki’s sock press into her face lightly, the musty fibers starting to cover her as the tiny Diva tried to fight off the imposing sock. The pillars were useless now, while they kept most of Nikki’s actual foot off of her, the sock was free to fall to the floor and cover Brie like a blanket of off-white snow. Nikki meanwhile began looking through the bottom of her locker for some odds and ends she had left here yesterday and almost forgot to get again today!

“Mmmmmhph!” Brie muttered, her mouth being smothered by the thick sock of her sister. The thing had only been pressed against Nikki’s foot for a second, but what it had picked up was incredible to the tiny girl. There was already a soggy wet blanket of fabric on her that smelled strongly of Nikki’s must.

“Damn it,” Nikki groaned as she pushed herself up and sat down on the bench again, crossing her legs and letting them dangle as she started digging through her bag, hoping that she had already packed it beforehand (http://i1165.photobucket.com/albums/q588...). As she dug through her bag, Nikki began letting her sandals slip off her socks, not paying attention while she began pulling out everything from her bag like it was a birthday present. On her foot though, Brie was screaming as the sock had removed itself from her just in time to let her start sliding down the slick plastic floor of the sandal! Sliding down the slope of Nikki’s sandal, Brie braced herself as she found herself slamming into plastic pillars every few seconds before limply sliding around it just to hit into another one a few seconds later. Sliding down her sister’s sandal like a pinball, Brie found herself looking up at the writhing mass of foot above her as every once in a while Nikki’s wiggling toes would loosen the sandal’s hold onto her foot even more! The sock ceiling that had once been smothering her was now what seemed like 20 feet away and growing with each motion of Nikki’s lithe toes.

WHAM!

Brie groaned as she slammed into another plastic pillar of Nikki’s sandal. This time, she was arched over it, but at least she had stopped falling down the sandal. The sandal on the other hand, was now about to make moves of its own…

“AAAAAAAAAAAAAH!” Brie screamed as Nikki’s massive toes finally flicked the last hold it had on the sandal away, letting the footwear slam into the tile-floor of the locker room while her giant sister remained unaware of her tribulations. Growing frustrated, Nikki scratched her foot as she continued going through the bag. Her powerful fingers pulled the fibers that Brie had found so unyielding so easily! Quickly, the fabric began wrapped and pulled uncomfortably around Nikki’s toes, leading the giantess to rip her long socks off angrily as she then dug into her bare sole with her fingers, wiping away some grime and lint that had been irritating her foot this whole time. Down under the massive foot, Brie was now dodging those “small” irritants as they rained down mercilessly. Covering her head, Brie felt as small bits of dirt from her sister’s foot fell down onto her like a small rocks after an explosion. She curled up as Nikki continued scratching her tough sole, continuing to rain down more dirt onto her with each second. Brie groaned as she felt like she suddenly had a large pillow dumped on her. Looking ahead, she saw that it was actually a bit of lint that had been lodged between Nikki’s toes presumably.

“Fuck, where is it?!” Nikki roared from above. Brie’s ears were ringing like crazy as her sister’s voice almost burst her ear drums. Feeling queasy as the voice of her sibling rocked through her body, the little woman huddled on the ground and closed her eyes, hoping to get control over her slowly unravelling nerves.

GRNNNN!

Opening her eyes once again, Brie felt like she was going to cry as she saw she was once again in a very familiar shadow. Looking up, she could see that this time she was underneath her sister’s bare foot as it bore down on her menacingly (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...). Now, as Brie began to hyperventilate under Nikki’s foot, she began to notice another problem posed by being under this tremendous foot. The smell under Nikki’s bare foot was powerful enough to bring back another wave of nausea as she leaned against a pillar and hurled her lunch on the plastic floor. Dizzy, Brie was thrown aloft as Nikki suddenly shifted her foot, getting up to go back to her locker for one last look. With every step Nikki took, Brie was now being tossed all over, now no longer being held down by the sock.

THWACK!

Brie groaned as she felt heat on her back after surviving the whirlwind walk of her sister. Looking around, she began to become terrified as she saw her body was now pressed into Nikki’s bare skin, her arms and legs stuck in the grooves that made up the “foot print” of her sister. Trying to tug her arms free, Brie found that not only was she fully stuck, but that she was now overheating as her sister’s sole was pouring out heat like a furnace (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...). As Nikki bent down once again, Brie now found herself looking at the locker-room (though she was upside down) as the massive sole was now exposed. The powerful grooves narrowed as they were stretched out over the length of Nikki’s sole, making Brie scream as the pressure increased on her limbs. Struggling against them with all her might, Brie was shocked as…
155222222222222222222211221111.title: Locked Up in the Locker Room

choices: Nikki leaves poor Brie alive in her spit to fend for herself
Nikki suddenly shrinks and falls into her own wad of spit along with her sis
1552222222222222222222112211111.content:
“They need to clean this fucking place better, I swear to God!” Nikki groaned as she reached around behind herself and started scratching the bottom of her foot vigorously as she continued looking into the locker. Giving up, Nikki turned around and checked behind her to see what the hell was bugging her foot so much. The Bella moaned as she finally hit the spot she needed to, her nails digging in deeply as she felt relief begin to spread through her body from her sole. As she itched though, something very concerning suddenly happened… a small chunk seemed to come off her foot. Nikki froze for a second, afraid she just hurt herself as she waited for something painful to happen, but when it didn’t Nikki slowly began to lift her hand to her face…curious about what the hell she had just taken off her foot. Examining the underside of her nails, Nikki recoiled a little as she saw dirt and lint now crammed under her fingernails, but then she saw something totally different crammed under her middle finger. Nikki felt a little grossed out as she noticed it was moving. Afraid it was a bug, she started poking at it with her other finger. Slowly, the little insect unfurled itself…and Nikki gasped when she saw that it looked a hell of a lot like her sister.

“Ugh,” Brie groaned grabbing her head as she felt like hell. She had been knocked out for a moment when Nikki’s nail hit her head-on, and was now staring right into her sister’s face…her massive, smiling face (http://scontent-b.cdninstagram.com/hphot...).

“Hmmm, looks like you learned where you belong after all! I was starting to get worried I’d have to embarrass you more before I broke you in,” Nikki said smiling at her tiny sister who was currently stuck under her finger like dirt to be picked out.

“Wait, Nikki stop! Help me here, I’m your sister!” Brie yelled, only to shrivel up in fear as Nikki smiled at her more. Suddenly, Brie felt herself lowering down as Nikki started laughing from above.

THOOM!

Brie shook violently as Nikki dropped her ass onto the bench and crossed her legs as she looked at her finger and winked at her sister, sending a shiver down Brie’s spine.

“I’m sorry I took you off my foot. Looks like you really like it down there!” Nikki smiled as she suddenly pressed her finger into the ball of her foot, giggling as she was now keenly aware of her ‘little sister’s’ struggles against her skin (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...). Slowly, Nikki began dragging her sister down from the ball of her foot to the center of her sole. Snickering, Nikki began grinding her finger in small circles against her sole, biting her lip as she felt Brie’s body dragging against her skin. Down under Nikki’s finger, Brie was already rubbed raw, her clothes ripped to tatters as her body was dragged along her rough skin. Looking up, she could see Nikki smiling down at her under the very tip of the fingernail that held her down as she suddenly was being dragged once more. This time, Nikki brought her all the way down to her heel and started pressing her directly into the hard bone of her heel.

“Agh!” Brie shouted as she felt her rib cage start to bend under the pressure her sister was applying to her.

“Lick it Brie, I know you want to,” Nikki said giggling as she removed her finger slightly so she could see her sister’s humiliated speck of a body.

“Fuck off!” Brie shouted.

“Don’t be shy, lick!” Nikki said, not hearing her sister’s protests, but knowing well enough what it probably was. Quickly, Brie was pressed down forcefully into the near-iron callus of her sister’s heel. Brie tried her hardest to push herself away, but it was useless as Nikki’s finger smothered her and pressed her flat into her heel.

“Mmmmmmph!” Brie shouted as her face was suddenly pressed hard against her heel.

“Lick it now,” Nikki commanded from above, her voice echoing in the air, and shaking Brie’s body as it reverberated even through the massive finger-tip holding her down. Brie could feel hot tears running down her face as she stuck out her tongue and began dragging it across her sister’s heel. Brie didn’t know if the salty taste was form her tears or her sister’s sweat, but the bitterness was as intense as the humiliation she felt inside. Her cheeks burned red as she continued licking her sister’s foot like a dog.

Pressing Brie into her foot as hard as she could, Nikki grabbed her sandal with her free hand and quickly slid her bare foot into it. Without a moment’s hesitation, Nikki pulled her hand away and began flexing her toes, slamming her sandal into Brie’s face over and over again. Giggling, she looked down at the speck of her sister and pinched her nose, waving her other hand under it as she stuck out her tongue and mimicked a gag. Nikki could keep this up all day as she stuck her legs out and continued flexing her powerful toes, letting her sandal beat the crap out of sister with each scruntch of her toes. Planting her foot directly on the ground, Nikki stood up and ground her heel into the floor, moaning a little as she felt Brie’s body squirm under her heel, making sure she was stuck to it like pre-chewed gum.

“Anyone in here?” another voice echoed from across the locker room. The Bella’s both froze, the voice clearly belonged to Paige. Nikki smiled as she pulled her sister up off her heel and winked at her one more time (http://www.roomeetimes.com/wp-content/up...).

“Time to say bye sis,” Nikki said as she pressed Brie to her lips, leaving her covered in saliva. It gave Nikki a devious idea as she wiped her off on the bench and leaned over her. Brie looked up and screamed as a pool-sized droplet of spit fell onto her…Nikki was going to drown her in a wad of spit and leave her to die in the locker room. Brie struggled to swim up through the viscous liquid as she saw another shadow swallow you. Breaking the surface, Brie looked up just in time to see Nikki’s bare sole coming down on her…
1552222222222222222222112211111.title: Bella Brutality

choices: Paige learns she gets to play with another "toy-sized" opponent
15522222222222222222221122111111.content:
SPLAT!

Nikki smiled as she ground her foot back and forth, wiping it off to reveal a wet streak of spit with tired, grimy Brie coated in her saliva. Winking at her, Nikki grabbed her stuff and left… now Paige entered the row of lockers, heading for hers…which was right in front of where Brie had been left. Strolling up to an empty locker, Paige dropped her bag on the bench and started stripping out of her street clothes as Brie looked up at her from behind, terrified. As Paige pulled on her tight black shorts and began looking for her boots, she slowly began to lower her ass to the bench (https://pbs.twimg.com/media/ByzMh7-IAAEE...).

“STOP! PAIGE DON’T!” Brie shouted as she saw the pale cheeks of Paige’s behind looming overhead ominously, like two evil moons.

“Eeew, wait, what the fuck?!” Paige said as her hand hit the bench and she felt something wet on it. Standing up straight, Paige leaned down and saw the bench was coated in someone’s spit! Disgusted, she was about to grab her stuff and move when she noticed something moving in the sea of saliva left on the bench. Paige thought it was a bug and was about to put it out of its misery with her thumb when she leaned in close and recognized the shape. Smiling widely, Paige no longer thought of putting Brie out of her misery, but of making her humiliation much worse instead.

CRACK!

Brie screamed as Paige grabbed her a little too roughly, breaking her arms without the ant-Diva even noticing. Crying and biting back the tears, Brie stared into Paige’s mischievous eyes as the new giantess addressed her.

“It’s a big match for me tonight, and I need to look my best. You can help me with that. Don’t you think my boots need a good shine? I heard even a little spit can really make them sparkle,” Paige said snickering as she slowly sat down and slid her right foot into a boot, planting it against the locker-walls as she slowly began to bring the spit-soaked Brie towards it (http://cattieswomenswrestling.files.word...).

It was like another round of being against Nikki’s foot as Brie was suddenly getting dragged roughly against the tattered surface of Paige’s well-worn boots. Paige smiled as she pressed her thumb into the tiny, wet woman and started rubbing her in small circles. Tiny wet streaks could be seen everywhere she dragged Brie as she imagined the tiny woman bumping along every stitch and imperfection on her boot, getting beaten to hell by her playful fingering. The real image was pretty close to what Paige had in mind. Rubbed raw already from her sister’s foot, welts and bruises were already forming on Brie’s body as she was slammed mercilessly into the thick walls of the boot’s stitching and sometimes dragged over it. Her broken arm stung and twisted painfully as Paige’s enormous thumb tugged her in every direction with a painful jerk. It wasn’t a smooth path she followed either, after being spun in a dizzying circle for a few seconds, Brie would find herself turning hard in another direction and being dragged across a boot so rough she could have sworn she’d been run through thistles. Paige smiled high above as she saw a small spot was a little less dirty than the other parts of her boot, but this game was already getting boring and she didn’t have much time to play before the match.

“Thanks for the shine, but you know, you have to ring out the rags otherwise they get dirty,” Paige said smiling as she stood up and held Brie aloft in one hand, smiling as her fingers began to curl around her (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/photo_large/...). Paige wanted this to be slow as she bit her lip, ready for the show. Gradually she began to squeeze on Brie more, leaving her head exposed above her fist so she could see the look on her face right before she popped like a little balloon. As Paige gripped her about as hard as one would hold a pen, Brie was already bright red. She could have kept slowly increasing pressure, but things were already too fun as Paige suddenly squeezed harder.

CRACK!

Paige stuck her tongue out and winced away as she felt Brie’s spine snap in her hand. Uncurling her hand, Paige laughed aloud as she saw Brie’s only working arm struggle to move her as her legs laid limp and her other arm bent at an unnatural angle. The pathetic thing dragged itself across her palm, possibly looking to escape. As empowering as watching tiny, broken Brie struggle in her hand as it was, Paige did have a match to get to. Slowly, she tipped over her hand and watched as the little speck of a woman fell off of it…and all the way down to the floor.

SMACK!...BOOM!

“Eeeeeew! What the fuck, how are you still alive?!” Paige said, laughing as Brie looked up at her towering form. Her body was already in shock as everything seemed to be flashing in front of her eyes. The damage to her body had already compromised Brie’s eyesight, making the towering figure of Paige looking down on her appear to be in strobe-lights as her neurons fired fearsomely (http://media.giphy.com/media/13CnJZmreT0...). Brie tried to drag herself away with her one good arm, but it was no use, she could summon no more strength to it as Paige lifted her one bare foot over her. Expecting a stomp, Brie was not prepared for the toe to slowly lower on her and begin pressing down on her slowly, dragging her crippled body along the tile floor. Paige was still fucking around with her even in this state. Brie tried to protest, but only a gurgling noise came from her lips as her lungs began to fill up. Now limp against her toe, Paige found Brie to be a bore. Removing her toe from Brie’s stomach, Paige let it hang in the air for a second as she waved good-bye at the tiny bug of a woman….

CRUNCH!

Paige shivered as she felt Brie explode under her bare foot. Looking at the bottom, the British bombshell laughed at the red splatter mark on her foot. Smiling, she grabbed her other boot and slid it on, letting the gory mess stay. No matter what happened in the ring tonight, Paige already had the satisfaction of a Diva becoming nothing at her feet. As she headed for the ring….
15522222222222222222221122111111.title: Quick! Paige a Doctor!

choices: let Brie rub her tired feet...from inside her boot.
find out how Brie got so tiny...some more toys would be better.
155222222222222222222211221112.content:
“Why don’t you get out of there already? Stalling in here won’t save you from me kicking your ass in the ring,” Paige said as she leaned against the doorway.

“Talking big in the doorway won’t save you when I have kick your ass next week,” Nikki responded as she swiveled on her foot, nearly crushing Brie under her foot as she moved.

“Why wait till next week? Ring’s open,” Paige said motioning towards the door.

“I’ll see you out there then,” Nikki said as she flipped Paige off.

“Hmph, don’t go running scared back to your sister when I beat your ass,” Paige said as she turned and left towards the ring.

“Fucking bitch, I’ll show her who goes running scared,” Nikki said under her breath as she began heading for her stuff. Underfoot, Brie was in terrible pain as she continued to get beaten to a near pulp by Nikki’s powerful foot. Her giant sister’s steps were coming closer and closer to ending her as Brie found that she was moving slowly forward towards the ball of Nikki’s foot. As she grew nearer, the pressure from each step increased. The tiny wrestler panicked, struggling with all her might to not end up as a simple stain on her sister’s sock.

BOOM!

Nikki was still fuming as she kicked off her sandals and began pulling on her outfit. She slipped into her shorts and tight top; she figured she might as well give the look a test run when she beat Paige the first time (http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/...). Looking in a mirror, Nikki posed a few times; practicing some victory poses for when this match was finally over. After a few moments of self-reflection, Nikki collapsed on the bench. Her head was spinning. She talked a lot of smack, but Paige was really good. It might be harder to fight her alone than she thought…and that was the other thing. They were totally alone, if something went wrong, no one was going to come to save her, not even her sister. Nikki shook the thought from her head as she slipped off her sandals. Grabbing her sneakers, she let them drop to the floor next to her foot as she re-adjusted her socks.

Brie screamed as Nikki’s fingers began kneading her into the thinly concealed wall of flesh that was her sister’s foot! Panicked, as a massive finger pressed into her, Brie sunk her teeth into it!

“OUCH! What the fuck was that?” Nikki said as she turned her foot over and slowly leaned down to look at her sock-clad sole (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...). The bigger Bella could hardly believe it as she found herself suddenly re-united with her sister…her very little sister.

Brie held her breath as she was gently plucked from the bottom of her sister’s foot by two colossal fingers. As she was gently cradled in them for a moment, she thought things were going to be ok; that her sister was going to actually help her out! A sharp pain in her ribs dashed those hopes as it quickly became apparent that the smile spreading over Nikki’s face wasn’t one of sisterly love. Brie tried to struggle, but only found herself dropped back to the floor before her sister’s tremendous feet and sneakers (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Nicole-Garcia-F...).

“I didn’t know my ‘little’ sister was going to come watch the match! We need to make sure you get a special seat,” Nikki sneered as she shoved her tremendous feet into her sneakers and tied the laces tightly.

Before she could even see Brie begin to protest, Nikki scooped her up and dropped her right into the entrance of her sneaker. She giggled as she saw her helpless sister hold onto her ankle like an insect. Winking at her, Nikki got up and did some final stretches, she was ready to go kick Paige’s ass…and then have fun with her tiny sister when all was said and done.

“Took you long enough, I thought you ran away,” Paige said as she leaned on the ropes of the ring, bored.

“And miss seeing your beaten ass groveling at my feet? Not on your life,” Nikki retorted as she began climbing in on the other side.

“Big talk for someone struggling to breathe,” Paige chirped.

“I’m not strugg-” Nikki began to say, only to be cut off as Paige’s boot sank deep into her stomach (http://i.ytimg.com/vi/i1Ay_Q_k_io/maxres...). As Nikki hit the mat, Brie was launched from her shoe. The sister’s both collapsed on the floor as Paige smirked down from above, reached to grab Nikki’s hair and drag the gasping giantess back to her already shaky feet. While the two titans tussled, Brie was already on the run from their tremendous feet. Scuttling along the ring floor, the tiny woman moved with all her might as far away from Paige and her sister as possible! Her lungs were already feeling like they were on fire when she looked back to see what kind of progress she had made…which was not remarkable. Given that she was the size of a bug, she should have expected as much, but it wasn’t a good sign when she looked around to see that she was already engulfed in another shadow. Bracing herself, she expected to be stepped on once more….

BOOM!

Paige’s boot ground her into the mat as it pivoted. The giantess above threw Nikki across the ring as Brie screamed at the moving mountains of flesh above her. The springy matt took most of the blow from the initial stomp, and the turn only didn’t reduce Brie to paste thanks to…how tiny she was. Brie fit snugly into Paige’s treads and was harmlessly spun around when the giantess ground her foot into the floor. As it lifted off of her, Brie found that she had soiled herself. Ashamed, the tiny wrestler continued to try to escape as the two giantesses continued to brawl just a few feet away.

THOOM!

Brie was tossed to the mat again as Paige once more knocked over her tremendous sister. Nikki tried to strike back, but Paige already grabbed her arm and began to put her into a headlock. Just as Nikki was about to tap-out, Paige released the hold, excited to keep torturing her prey a little bit more.
“Where’s all that fight in you go?” Paige teased as she grabbed Nikki by the hair once more and pulled her up off the mat.

“Please, I give up. You win!” Nikki chocked as she struggled to her feet. Reaching down, Nikki tried too find Brie, hoping that by offering her, she could get out of this grudge match.

“You’re right I win, but I’m not done having fun yet!” Paige sneered as she gripped Nikki by the throat with a choke hold and began shifting her weight…

Down below, Brie continued trying to escape the dueling colossi, only to find that she was once again engulfed in yet another shadow. She cowered, thinking that Paige’s boot was going to land on her again. She was mistaken….

BOOM!

Paige laughed as she landed ass-first on the mat, having successfully thrown Nikki to the floor (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/photo_large/...). Paige formed an elbow and flung herself backwards, landing it sharply into Nikki’s stomach as she then rolled over onto her own belly and pushed herself up. As she got up and brushed her ass off, Paige grabbed Nikki by the feet and began dragging her towards the center of the ring.

FOOM!

Brie passed out for a second as she crashed into the floor of the ring once more, having been flagrantly swatted off of Paige’s rear end (http://www.wwe.com/f/wysiwyg/image/2013/...).

BOOM!

Brie screamed as Nikki’s hand nearly crushed her, the giantess suddenly trying to claw herself away from Paige with all her might. Nikki was in pain and fear as she realized how badly she was outmatched. The fight was over the second she had accepted to fight privately with Paige. Now, she just wanted to get away from the crazed Diva as she tried to resist the pull on her legs. Looking down, Nikki spotted her sister and quickly snatched her up in her hand.

“I-I give!” Nikki roared as Paige began to bend her legs painfully.

“You give what?” Paige inquired comically as she continued to put the leg lock on Nikki.

“I’ll give you this!” Nikki cried as she extended the hand with her sister on it towards Paige. The pain stopped as Paige suddenly released the hold.

“Brie?” she asked, not believing her own eyes.

“Yeah! It’s her, just take her!” Nikki pleaded dropping her tiny sister to the mat and struggling to get away.

Paige let her go, a much more interesting toy had just presented itself to her. Crawling on all fours like a big-cat stalking prey, Paige slowly began to close in on the tiny bug-sized human scuttling away from her. The frantic, futile chase made her smile in joy as she rose up and looked down on her, feeling a rush of power unlike any she’d felt before surge through her chest (http://cdn29.elitedaily.com/wp-content/u...).

THOOM!

Brie fell to her knees as Paige’s hand wrapped around her. Soon, the tiny girl was looking into Paige’s massive eyes as the giantess mulled over what she wanted to do first. A smile spread across her lips as Paige made up her mind to…
155222222222222222222211221112.title: A New Paige in Brie's Life

choices: find out how to shrink more people
make her come up with some "games" to play with her sister
1552222222222222222222112211121.content:
“Damn, I knew there was some shit going on between you two, but you just got sold out to me!” Paige said as she dangled Brie in front of her face, smiling as she saw the tiny woman squirm under the raven-haired heroine’s powerful gaze. Brie just looked up at Paige slack-jawed, shivering as Paige’s eyes flicked in the slightest. The giantess smiled down at the tiny girl, thinking that she’d be best saved for later…but first there was one last thing she wanted out of this match as she looked down at the badly beaten body of her new pet’s sister (http://media-cache-ec0.pinimg.com/736x/c...). After all the big talk in the locker room, seeing Nikki writhe at her feet was almost delicious. The beaten beauty was trying her best to get away from Paige, hoping her sister could distract her long enough, but she wasn’t out of Paige’s mind just yet. Smiling, Paige held onto Brie in her fist as she strolled over to her sister slowly. She watched as Nikki seemed to almost cringe with each step Paige took trying her best to make it to the side of the ring. Paige stomped down before her and watched as Nikki’s eyes glued themselves to her boot. Slowly, Paige raised her leg and pulled it back…

THWACK!

“Gah!” Nikki screamed as Paige kicked her in the stomach before getting her boot placed down on top of her chest.

“I mean, Brie is a good start, but you were rude before. I think you owe me an apology,” Paige said as she began tossing tiny Brie up and down in the air, catching her like a toy.

“Ok, ok I’m sorry!” Nikki cried out, just wanting this to be over. The woman shuddered as she saw Paige look down at her and smile (http://i.ytimg.com/vi/HlOMu0WGO68/maxres...). Suddenly Nikki groaned as she found Paige’s boot slowly moving its way up towards her face! The tired Diva began struggling to push the leg back, but Paige had a ton of strength on her as she slowly dug her foot into Nikki’s chest till the woman let go. Soon, Nikki found Paige’s boot pressing down on her lips.

“Lick it,” Paige said as she looked down at Brie now and smiled. Plucking her up out of her palm, Paige dangled her down. Once she was even with the bottom of Paige’s boot, Brie saw an incredible sight, her gigantic sister pathetically licking the sole of Paige’s boot. Brie watched as her sister’s tongue, bigger than she was, dragged itself across the grimy bottom of Paige’s massive boot sole. Slowly, Paige pushed her foot down more and more until at any moment, Brie thought her sister’s nose was going to cave in. As Nikki began to whimper and cry under Paige’s foot, the giantess removed it from her face and turned around, sitting on the woman as a bench instead.

BOOM!

Paige stomped her boots down hard, Brie hovering between her massive knees as the English giantess smiled at her.

“Please, I just want to-” Brie began, only to stop as Paige glared at her coldly.

“You’re new to this, so let me just tell you how this is going to work. I own you now. Your sister just sold you to me so I didn’t kick her ass any worse. You’re now mine and have to listen to whatever I say. What you want doesn’t matter anymore. All that matters to you now is what I want, and I want to feel you squirm as well as your ‘big sister’ just did,” Paige retorted as she dropped Brie to the mat and began working on untying one of her massive boots (http://www.ringsidenews.com/file/pic/art...). As Paige began struggling with her laces, Brie began running away from the giantess and her toppled sister as quickly as her little legs could carry her. Paige smiled as she saw her run; it was cute seeing her try to get away from her fate. Paige finally managed to rip her boot off, smiling as her sock hit the cold air of the wrestling mat. Standing up, Paige dropped her boot to her side before lifting her sock-clad foot into the air over the tiny girl…and letting it fall.

BAM!

Brie screamed as she was suddenly being assaulted by a nearly unbearable amount of pressure! The soft fibers of Paige’s sock felt like a wet blanket was being run over her by a bulldozer as Paige began twisting her foot back and forth. Underneath Paige’s foot, Brie was crying as she felt like she was going to break at any moment. Incredible torque was applied to her as Paige began slowing down, biting her lip as she could literally feel Brie under her foot like a small pebble trapped beneath her. Looking back over her shoulder at the other broken Bella, Paige winked as she pointed down to her foot and flashed a thumbs up, showing the both sisters were really giving her a good show today. The power she was feeling from this was intoxicating; Paige thought for a moment she was going to bite through her own lip as she felt her sole smothering Brie, whose tiny fists and legs could be felt banging into her foot. Stopping, Paige pressed her foot down fully, letting out a small moan as she felt Brie shudder in pain underneath the thick sock. Brie on the other hand was feeling the opposite end of the spectrum as she thought she was about to pass out. Just as the shrunken woman could hold on no longer, the weight lifted off of her…but at the same time, she was lifting into the air. Brie screamed as she saw herself flying through the air, hovering now over her sister’s face.

“Wave bye-bye girls,” Paige said as she then whipped her foot away and pointed it down to its resting place…inside her black boot.

Brie screamed her head off as she slowly began to sink in…her voice getting muffle as Paige’s foot filled the confines of the boot, sealing her inside. Stomping her boot a few times, Paige looked down at her foot and smiled, still feeling Brie struggle under her foot wonderfully (http://www.allwrestlingnews.com/wp-conte...).

“So… now as for you Nikki,” Paige said turning back to the remaining Bella and smiling as she leaned down over her.
1552222222222222222222112211121.title: Bullying Brie

15522222222222222222221122112.content:
Brie's mouth couldn't help but be left to hang open as she looked on at none other than one of her co-stars and one of the newer diva's to the roster, Eva Marie. The woman whom dyed her hair red as a response to looking similar to the twins. More importantly however, Eva Marie was gigantic, or rather perhaps just normal sized as everything seemed gigantic to the inch tall Brie Bella. She would also notice as the woman, without even looking down would simply shift her feet in front of her sandals, barefoot and each toe looking to be the size of a car to the shrunken diva.

Having been petrified with fear, ti would be now that the inch tall diva would realize the dire nature of her predicament. If this woman's big toe was the size of a car to her, then the rest of her foot would be far more than enough to simply crush her flat, even at just the size that she had read on the sole of the sandal. Jumping to her feet and waving her arms back and forth. She would shout at the top of her lungs, hoping and praying to get any sort of reaction from the oblivious red head. Well, perhaps not any reaction she would find out, as what she got was Eva Marie lifting a single foot over the sandal that Brie was in.

In a fit of fright, she would back up, shaking her head and pleading with Eva to not do this, not wanting to die a blood stain on the bottom of another persons foot. A few tears would even stream down her face as she would soon come to the conclusion that this fate would be her own. Her back would soon hit something. Jumping at the new sensation, Brie's hands would practically implant themselves into the squishy surface. Very slowly she would turn her head to find what it was and her face would drain of it's color. It was the thong of the sandal, and she would only get a brief look at it before she witnessed Eva's toes coming to greet her. Her big and second toe wrapping themselves around the thong, and of course the small Brie Bella.

The diva who now found herself squeezed by the tan flesh which surrounded her. Not crushing her per say, but certainly driving the wind out of her as Eva would wiggle her toes about to get conformable in her footwear. In a fit, Brie would begin to beat, claw and even bite at the flesh before her, anything to get her attention and survive...
15522222222222222222221122112.title: Towering Rookie

choices: Eva Marie's first steps in toying with Brie
155222222222222222222211221122.content:
Even given her miniscule stature, at an inch high, it was hard for Eva Marie to not notice a sensation between her toes. She having only taken a good step or two, situating her foot time and time again, just to try and ignore it, but no matter what it remained. With a sigh, she would turn back around to the bench she had just stepped away from and simply lift her foot which was annoying her. Planting it sole down upon the edge of the hard wood seat of the bench and in an annoyed huff begins to observe what was bothering her. Bored eyes would survey her toes for a second before locking onto something between her big and second toe.

Immediately her mind would simply register it was a bug ang nothing more. A feeling of disgust creeping up her spine followed by a light shiver. However as she would observe it, she would notice that this "bug" looked vaguely different. This causing her to squint as she looked on, starting to take in some of the finer details.... "Oh my god!" She would shout aloud, as her eyes went wide as she finally realized what she was looking at.

For Brie, the entire situation had left the woman beaten, bruised and exhausted. Even for the small amount of time wedged between these toes which squeezed the life out of her. She wailing on them to get noticed only to get more and more air driven from her. To finally have herself seemingly noticed by the woman this foot belonged too. Her eyes hovering high above her, mouth agape in obvious shock. Brie couldn't help but feel like she had won in some small way, having survived A.J.'s little game. Knowing full well she would make that little runt pay when she got back to full size.

Though, these slight fantasies of caving that woman's head in was cut short as an ominous giggle erupted from Eva Marie's lips and a knowing grin formed across her lips. "Not so high and mighty now are you, Brie?" The woman would speak, causing a ghostly white coloration to fall over Brie who couldn't believe what she was hearing. She couldn't help but shake her head, pleading with the red head, but it only amused her more. "You two bitches thought you were hot shit, the main attraction of the show, but look at you now." Head reeled back, she let a howl of laughter out. Stopping Brie's heart as she looked on destroyed by the lack of help she would get and now being held between the toes of a woman who looked to torture her perhaps worse than even A.J. would have. The question is, what did she have in store for her?
155222222222222222222211221122.title: Eva Marie looks down

choices: Bad News for Eva Marie, Brie's not shrinking with her.
1552222222222222222222112211222.content:
A smug grin was painted across Eva Marie's face as she eyed the inch tall Brie Bella between her toes. The simple picture of watching the once mighty diva struggling against the lowest of her body, her toes monstrosities which over powered her. She couldn't help but chuckle and shiver lightly as that chill ran up her spine, the power she held over one of her biggest rivals in Total Diva's. Her eye's would dart away from Brie for the moment to begin desperately scanning the ground, hoping that Nikki would also be around, but alas, she was not. Eva felt a tinge of disappointment to this fact, but all she had to do was return her eyes back to Brie and her teeth would be revealed once more in a predatory grin.

Unfortunately, all things good will come to an end and for Eva, this lesson would be a harsh one. So caught up in what she held over the diminutive Diva, she never did question the how of it. Why was Brie Bella a mere insect between her toes? An unfortunate oversight as it were, because she would in fact find this out, though perhaps not in a way she expected or would have wished for. "Whaaaaaaaaaat'cha got there, Red?" A familiar voice would call out from behind Eva Marie, causing the aptly named "Red" to turn her head, looking over her shoulder too look upon A.J. Lee. Standing there, hands behind her back as she innocently swiveled about, giving off a smile as she looked as one might call "adorable".

Even the rookie didn't see things this way however as she would only roll her eyes with a groan as she turned her head back in dismissal of seeing her. "Go away freakshow, I'm busy." Eva would call out in an annoyed tone, looking to drive her away, but it only got an ominous giggle out of A.J. It only managed to ruffle her feathers further, realizing that her attempts were not going to work on A.J.

Meanwhile, between Eva's toes, Brie was a bit torn on the matter. On one hand, seeing A.J. return was somewhat of a godsend, if only that she might actually be free of what Eva had in store for her. At the same time however, she had to wonder just how much better off she would be with her original tormenter yet again. What's worse is if she still ahd the Shrinking device and what if she turned it onto Eva, what would happen to her then?

Licking her lips, A.J. would only tilt her head, a serious look crossing her face as she looked on at Eva's back, the rookie not even showing her the respect to face her. Her fingers lightly tapping the device behind her back, itching to do as she wanted. She pondering over the same question Brie held, what would happen. Though, she was called crazy, it wasn't hard for her to figure out what Eva was hiding, after all, she had left Brie in here, and simply doubled back once someone entered the room. She could clearly see that this woman was also wearing the same sandals she had dropped Brie onto.

"You know, you should really be nicer to me." A.J. would only warn, an ominous tone to her voice, and one that this woman did not seem to pick up as she would only be greeted with another groan from Eva. "You know, you should also watch out too shrimp. You're so small I might step on your skinny ass." Eva simply met A.J. with more hostility, her words actually taking A.J. back a bit as her eyes widened in slight disbelief. The smugness would only return to Eva as she could see this out of the corner of her eye, but she wouldn't see the grin coming back to A.J.'s lips. "Funny you should say that..." A.J. would laugh as she pulled the device from behind her back, unleashing it upon Eva and simply watching her dwindle, curious to see the results of her's and Brie's question. What would happen to Brie, would she be reduced further, or would she be unaffected by Eva shrinking?
1552222222222222222222112211222.title: Short lived

15522222222222222222221122112222.content:
Heartbeat quickening, Eva Marie couldn't help but look around frantically, that glow of the machine surrounding her and her surroundings warping. It wouldn't be until she herself was reduced to a mere inch in height that she would finally get her bearings back. It sinking in as her eyes darted back and forth just how big everything was. She was at a loss for words, even finding it hard to breath as this shock overtook her. Of course this would only get more difficult when she was reminded to a lack of a being between her toes. Some may even contribute this "hunch" to the fact that said being had not long ago tackled the dazed Eva to the ground and was throttling her throat. "I'm going to kill you!" Brie would shout, clearly driven by the anger and humiliation she had been handed by this woman. Of course, their show did little else but amuse the "giant" in the room.

A.J. Lee simply watched off to the side, watching as the diminutive rookie and a thorn in her side went at it on the locker room floor. Her smile only widening as she couldn't help but ponder what would happen if she simply planted her shoe down upon them. Two of her enemies crushed in a single step, it was enough to entice a purr from her lips and a shiver through her body. As wonderful as that would be for her however, it wasn't the most entertaining of options in the long run, and it would only cause her to frown a bit. That in mind,s he couldn't let this go on much longer either, even from her vantage point, she could have sworn Eva was starting to turn blue....

Lifting her right foot behind her, she would slip her shoe off, following suit with the left as well as her socks. Leaving her barefoot once again and looking down upon the small Bella, along with an equally small Eva Marie. Stifling a giggle, she approached the two, her shadow casting over them, and actually earning a bit of hesitation out of Brie, enough to cause her grip to loosen upon Eva, and her to stare up dumbfounded at the towering behemoth. Not one to miss her opportunity, Eva would use the distraction to push against Brie. Taking her balance away and forcing her to wobble from the mounted position. Getitng a leg up and kicking her away was all she needed before she was scrambling to her feet and attempting to run away.

An act which only got an earth rumbling laugh from A.J. who watched this pathetic attempt. "Just where do you think you're going?" She couldn't help but chuckle as she spoke these words. Simply moving her fight foot forward, spreading her big and second toe apart and scooping Eva up between them. An act which would get an uneasy smile from Brie at the poetic justice she witnessed. She would watch as Eva was brought back to where she started, now wedged between the tan appendages. "Not so fun, is it!" Brie would even shout just to taunt the woman.

Above however, A.J. was fighting a ton of feelings, much like Eva had felt. The power of having a human being between her toes, the power she held, more so than the former, as she possessed the gun which could alter size. SHE held the power to do this to others.....of herself. She could picture it now, why stop at just the divas. Why not the entire arena between them, why not a city, a state, country or hell the world. A soft grunt of satisfaction would escape her, though it was for another time as she would look down at these two, knowing full well Natayla was somewhere down there too. Possibly stuck to her toes in a pool of sweat, like a total Nattie.

Still, she had these two, Brie who now was wanting to get some well deserved justice on Eva and it was enough to cause an idea to form in her mind. Sure she didn't want them to die, but that didn't mean she didn't want them to fight. They were after all, Diva's and being in the ring was something they did. "So you two want to fight huh? Fine you can fight." Taking a seat on the ground, A.J.'s face would be all smiles as she put her legs out in front of her, placing the soles of her feet together. She would then place the two diva's in the gap, taking both her shoes and socks, and forming a square with them, a sort of makeshift ring which held a certain aroma to the air due to their frequent use. For them, all around them, their sense, it was nothing but A.J. The smell of her footwear, the sound of her laughing, and the vision of her encompassing legs surrounding them, her face hanging overhead watching. "I don't want any of your total diva shit either, winner of this match gets to keep their size, the loser.....well...." A.J.'s voice would trail off as she brought her fingers up, showing what she guessed to be an inch apart, and slowly bringing them together with a sci-fi sound effect done with her mouth. It was clear,t he loser was getting smaller.
15522222222222222222221122112222.title: I'm afraid I've got some Bad News

155222222222222222222211221122222.content:
“DING!” AJ shouted as she waved her hand to motion the start of the tiny tumble between her legs. Leaning in, she cast a massive shadow on the two combatants as she awaited the fight of the century. A truly desperate battle between these little rivals was about to play itself out in the arena of AJ’s supple legs.

Her thunderous giggle shook the ground of the two tiny women below as they slowly circled around each other, neither wanting to make the first mistake with the stakes so high. Brie and Eva stared each other down as they each looked for an opening; hundreds of possibilities played through their heads as they were each consumed in their own personal libraries of combat scenarios. Unfortunately for them, their games of mental chess were not enough action for their capricious captor above.

BOOM!

The two tiny fighters fell flat on their asses as AJ slammed her hands down on either side of them and leaned in closer so that her breath could be felt washing over their bodies.

“Stop being boring or else both of you will…” AJ ended the sentence by making another sci-fi sound like before. A shiver went down Eva’s and Brie’s spines as they knew she was serious. Quickly, they got back to their feet and charged each other. It was a messy collision as they brought each other to the floor, much to the amusement of the giantess looking down on them. The deafening boom of AJ’s laughter stunned the unprepared Brie for a moment, which was all Eva needed to get a good lock on her. Eva pulled back hard on Brie’s arm, bringing screams of pain from the tiny twin. Smiling, Eva thought that the win would be easily hers…until she was suddenly struck by AJ’s finger! Tumbling backwards, Eva groaned as she glared up at a delighted AJ.

“What was that for?!” Eva shouted as she struggled to get up.

“Round is up silly, I can’t let you get an unfair advantage can I?” AJ said as she stuck her tongue out at her. Quickly, her fingers descended on the tiny fighters, plucking them up carefully and placing them in the nooks of her knees.

The shrunken women looked up at AJ in fear; maybe she wouldn’t let them finish the match after all. Maybe this was just a way to humiliate them before she made a totally irrelevant decision.

“Haaaaaa!” AJ said in a hushed whisper as she put her hands up to her mouth. She was trying to imitate the sound of a packed arena cheering as she moved her legs in again, pushing the two women back at each other. She shivered as she watched them fighting once more, just like she wanted them too. The power she had over them was intoxicating as she became enveloped with her private pay-per-view fight.

BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!

Eva and Brie ignored the thundering tremors that kept threatening to throw them asunder, figuring it was just another trick of AJ’s. But the sudden gust of wind from above them finally pulled their attention off of each other. They looked up, dumbstruck at what they saw. AJ, who had been tormenting them like a sadistic goddess, was now gasping for breath as a pale arm was twisting around her windpipe….

“Finally lost it, huh Cray J?” Paige grunted as she got a solid choke hold on AJ and began to squeeze the air out of her (http://dailywrestlingnews.com/wp-content...).

“What the fuck?” Eva said as she watched her short-term goddess getting the crap kicked out of her by a tremendous Paige.

THWACK!

Eva went down as Brie sunk a fist into her unsuspecting stomach (http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/co...).

“Fight isn’t over yet, cunt!” Brie said as she mounted her and began beating away on Eva. The tiny fighters were still locked in combat as Paige was screaming in pain. AJ was nearly yanking her raven hair out by the root. It was a dirty move, but this match wasn’t exactly regulation. A powerful yank brought Paige forward a step, her sandal-clad foot slamming into the make-shift ring between AJ’s legs…

BOOM!

The tiny fighters were left sprawled out just barely inches away from the instep of Paige’s foot (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Britani-Knight-...). Looking up in terror, they saw AJ look down at them and wink as she balled up a fist and swung it up into Paige’s face, knocking her on her ass.

THOOM!

A true earthquake rumbled under them as Paige’s body shook the ground worse than a magnitude 9 seismic event. The stunned giantess groaned as AJ winked at her two tinies and flipped around, kicking her discarded shoes at them as she climbed on top of Paige, her bare feet nearly crushing them as well as she pushed herself forward (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/ep_trending/...).

“No one likes a kill-joy, Paige,” AJ said as she went for an arm-bar on Paige, hoping to end this quickly and go back to her makeshift coliseum.

THWACK!

AJ wasn’t ready for the knee she took to the chin as Paige got her bearings back far quicker than expected. Dazed, AJ fell limply to the ground for a second as Paige got up and grabbed AJ by the hair. As she started dragging her, AJ snapped back into it and began screaming and flailing, hoping to get some traction as Paige pulled her down the locker-room isle, licking her lips in satisfaction (http://www.gotceleb.com/wp-content/uploa...).

“Time for pay-back,” Paige said as she slammed AJ into the lockers and got back on top of her, grappling as they began getting dangerously close to AJ’s bag…and the discarded ray….

Meanwhile back on the floor, Brie and Eva were fighting on the ridge of AJ’s discarded converse. The overturned shoe provided cover from the titans fighting outside as the two nearly got crushed by their feet more times than they probably realized. Brie now had Eva pinned under her, as the two grunted and grappled in the shadow of AJ’s sock their fight seemed to be drawing to a close. The smell of AJ’s sweaty feet burned their lungs as they groaned. Both were spent, but neither was willing to give up. Brie was pouring sweat as she feared that Eva would slip from her slick grasp and turn the tables. Indeed, Eva did get free, but had no more energy to retaliate. She just lay out prone, heaving in the moist air as she tried to urge her body to keep going. Brie was similarly spent as she collapsed on top of Eva, rolling slowly off of her as her chest felt like it was getting crushed in the horrific conditions of their captor’s converse.

BOOM!

The thundering fight outside the shoe concerned neither of them at this point. If AJ won, they were fucked. Both of them would most likely be shrunk again anyway. Paige winning still meant they were fucked, the giantess having no clue they were there in the first place. The two struggled to think of a way things could get worse in this situation… and would deeply regret not running away sooner when the scenario would play out in a few seconds.
Just a few feet away from them, Paige and AJ continued grappling, this time their bodies crashed into AJ’s belongings, sending them scattering across the tile floor. It was AJ’s foot which kicked the ray against the wall the first time, shooting off a quick blast in the direction of her shoes…striking an overturned one. It quickly dwindled nearly out of sight as the unaware Diva’s continued to wrestle. The ray was sent spiraling by Paige’s sandal next, striking a wall and flipping a switch on the top of the device… it was now set to grow.

“Go fuck yourself!” Paige roared as she threw AJ off of her body, knocking her into the wall of lockers. As she fell against the wall, AJ slammed her head against the steel wall and lost consciousness for a second. Her body fell like a puppet with its strings cut as she landed on the ray. Paige saw this time as the gun glowed for a second with light. There was a blinding flash as the device went off and….
155222222222222222222211221122222.title: Growing Stakes

choices: A.J. attempts to fix her mistake.
A Rumble overtakes the Arena (Paige's growth)
1552222222222222222222112211222221.content:
The smirk that was upon Paige's face as she looked upon the momentarily stunned A.J. would be wiped clean as the flash from the gun went off. She only getting a moment to look in it's direction after her foot had kicked it back against the wall and the light hum filled the air. She would be blinded, bringing an arm up to shield her eyes as many obscenities would be screamed at the top of her lungs. Unknown to her, each one becoming louder and loud with each passing second. A.J. whom could be considered amongst the lucky, outside of the inhabitants of her now micro sized shoe who were anything but. She wouldn't have the same problem, though she would no doubt wish she didn't see what was playing out before her.

Paige was growing, fortunately at a steady and slower pace than the others she had shrank. The gun smacking the wall a few times could be responsible for that. Still, Paige swung her arms around wildly, her reach becoming longer and longer. All the emotions of fear, anger and desire rushed to A.J.'s mind as she looked on, upset that Paige would be the one to grow and not herself. Though as calculated as she could be at times, had the situation not bee what it was, a wily grin would cross her lips. She could very well have a say in the matter, all she needed was the gun. Using her time wisely, before Paige would get her vision back, or perhaps her head would hit the ceiling and alert her of things not being quite right.

The smaller Diva's head would whip around,d eye's darting in a frenzied state of concern to find what she needed. It would be but a few moments before they would widen in both elation and dread upon what she saw. It up against the wall.....behind Paige. A certain Paige whom was nearing the fifteen foot mark with no signs of stopping and who was beginning to get her bearings. In a dash, she would make it behind Paige, ducking under the wild swing of the larger woman's arm at the sudden noise around her. Grabbing the device and bolting for the door. Passing through it's frame just in time to hear a certain. "Ow, fuck!" bellowed from behind her. With a snicker, she would turn to see Paige grasping the top of her head, her eyes adjusting to the light. That realization which would hit her, and she suddenly seeing A.J. looking to leave.

A look of confusion and panic on Paige's face, suddenly being huge, so big in fact that the man dubbed The Big Show would be so miniscule in comparison to her. It would seem to click in her mind, reading on her face with the realization of what she saw before the whole ordeal went down, the gun. Her eyes would lock onto it within A.J. grasp and without even a split second thought, she would leap forward to try and get it. Falling just short of the door as A.J. would take more than a few steps back to safety. Paige who was too big to even hope to fit through the door, she only able to get a single arm out to desperately look for A.J. would be stuck for the moment. Get back here you crazy little bitch! She would demand, but to no avail.

All she could do was watch as A.J. would in a immature manner bring her free hand up to her forehead and make an L with her hand, fully taunting the gigantic woman as she snickered uncontrollably. "Later Loser" would be all that A.J. would say before she turned on her heels and run away from the locker room. Looking to exit the building and take her first steps in how to right this wrong, and the most important step? Planning....
1552222222222222222222112211222221.title: A.J.'s growing concerns

choices: AJ aims the device at Paige
15522222222222222222221122112222211.content:
Once AJ exited the building, it began to moan and shake.

Paige, who was now around 15 feet tall, broke through the roof and stepped out onto the pavement. Paige looked down and spotted the tiny AJ, an evil smirk formed on her face. "Hi, Shorty", the English Diva said with her now booming voice.

AJ knew she needed to act fast, she aimed the gun at herself and fired. For a moment the feeling overtook her, she let out a moan as she grew to about a foot taller than Paige (roughly 16 feet).

She looked down at the English Diva, "Who's the shorty now?", AJ said with the grin.
15522222222222222222221122112222211.title: A.J. attempts to fix her mistake.

choices: Toy with the Arena (and other divas)
15522222222222222222221122112222212.content:
After failing to catch up with AJ, Paige suddenly felt a weird sensation inside of her. She couldn't exactly put a finger on what it was but it felt strangely similar to the sensation she had just experienced... Then, she would undergo a change that would alter the world as we know it forever.

Paige suddenly starting to expand once again, and very quickly at that. She burst through the ceiling of the arena and the growth seemed to have no intentions of stopping. Paige couldn't believe what was happening before her own eyes and she seemed to be growing forever. Finally, as Paige's growth started to slow down, she started to become more aware of her situation. Paige didn't really know what to feel... she wanted to KILL AJ for doing this to her and making her a giant mutant, but she also was overtaken by this feeling of power... A feeling of power like no other she had ever felt before.

"I'm gonna kill that little runt AJ for doing this to me!!!!!!!!!!!" screamed Paige (a scream that could now be heard for miles). Paige was close to tears when she started to realize what she was capable of. She glanced down at the arena and saw how small it was in comparison to herself. She then glanced into the distance and saw the city of New York and how small IT was in comparison to herself. She was torn, she didn't know if she wanted to be angry at AJ or THANK AJ for making her into not a mutant, but a goddess... Paige started to laugh hysterically once she realized her true power and what she could now do to anyone she wants.

Paige now had a decision to make, toy with the tiny arena at her feet and get back at AJ and the other divas, or just head towards the city and New York what she is truly made of and stake her claim as Goddess of the Earth...
15522222222222222222221122112222212.title: Paige's Goddessification

choices: The city is now a speck between two monolithic Converse Sneakers. AJ's solution!
155222222222222222222211221122222122.content:
For Paige the decision was a simple one, sure she could stick around and mess with the people in the arena and the other Diva's who never stacked up to her, or at least in her mind. Though as she began to relish in her new found power, looking down at the arena, she felt a new rush like no other, one which would put the Diva's out of her mind. Mere insects which she used to care about, but a being, a Goddess such as herself felt no obligation to belittle herself into their world anymore. They like anyone else would soon be worshiping her for the deity she was. Waving the Arena off, Paige turned her attention to the city in the distance, New York, the city which never sleeps. That title would certainly be no less true as she stomped off toward it. As is, many T.V's were lit up with the breaking news cast of the colossal woman. Many cameramen on the ground getting a few shots of her walking by, Sandal clad feet simply passing by like a behemoth before settling down onto the pavement, a foot which took up the entire street and then some. Many cries and screamed silenced as anything caught beneath the sole of that sandal simply vanished. Broken bodies and steel as people and car alike were compressed into nothing, the street itself spider webbing just from her sheer weight from a modest step.

Inside the city, Paige took in her surroundings, many of the tallest buildings around her barely reached her waist. Several lights were on her as helicopters circled her, cop cars and any sort of emergency vehicle began to gather on every street nearest her. What did this do, nothing else but earn the biggest grin anyone had even seen on the face of this Diva at normal size. "You got to be kidding me right? Like you insects are going to stop me?" Her voice boomed as she belittled the tines at her feet. It wouldn't stop them from trying though, many of the officers which had gathered at the toe end of her sandals opened fire open her shins, some further off aiming higher, but none could draw a bead much higher than her bust which spoke volumes as to how big she was.

Their efforts, these bullets not even registering as anything more than a minor annoyance. It would still agitate Paige whom didn't care for her first appearance as the Goddess of Earth to be attacked. With a sneer, she reached a hand off to her side, allowing her fingers to wrap around the side of a building which she used her impressive strength to break off a large section, nearly half of it from the top floor and practically hurl it with one hand at the Police. A small action for her, was quite the monumental event for the people below. The sheer rubble, sections of the building breaking loose, furniture flung from the buildings and even some people, all would come crashing down on the forces a block away. Crushing vehicles and a percentage of the force with a sickening crunch. Those at her toes would meet a likewise fate as she simply lifted her sandal up and unceremoniously brought it down upon he Police who still fired their weapons in vein. This bullets only sinking into the foam surface of her footwear and leaving no noticeable damage.

They would however notice what it did to them, the once soft material to a normal person, now an unrelenting wall which could crush steel. Their bodies stood little chance as they would pop like grapes and yet, even that wouldn't register to her, their bodies just seeming to disappear into a red paste once she lifted her foot back up. An event that only amused her, reeling her head back as she laughed manically. "Oh you tinies are sooooo worthless. Don't worry though, there is going to be some changes here. For example, I am now your new ruler, your Goddess, so get to bowing before me!" Her decree was made, incredibly cheesy as it came off to her, it still was so funny to her and only fueled her laughter. Her mind would drift back to the Arena for a moment, back to how this all started with A.J., and she now knew she indeed wanted to thank the little runt....although.... Paige's attention would be brought back as the city beneath her only screamed louder and louder. Slightly confused, Paige began to wonder why.
155222222222222222222211221122222122.title: Go and Destroy NYC

choices: Shrink herself back to normal and the city along with her.
1552222222222222222222112211222221222.content:
The screams below hit a feverish pitch, enough so that even Paige herself, as big as she was, and with how much she had heard already. The sudden spike in noise was more than a bit troublesome.
