Then of course came the quakes, a soft rumbling which would grow more and more intense by the second until even Paige herself was stumbling around and eventually being tossed to the ground each time she attempted to stand back up. Much of the city would fall prey to her unable to get her footing, her colossal body colliding with and breaking through many buildings and crushing the rest of the Police force who were doing far worse than her with these quakes. Whilst she was being tossed, they were being launched several feet into the air. Some of which met an untimely demise from their patrol cars landing atop them or fragments of buildings coming loose and flattening them underneath. Just as quickly as they began, Paige at the brink of tears at this point, they ceased with one final quake putting Paige back on the ground once again. Furious beyond recognition, Paige would roll over to her back, bracing herself with her elbows to the streets below, creating a large indent in the pavement from the points digging in. 'What in the Bloody FU-..." The color simply vanished from her face as her eyes much like those below her locked into the sky.

Bottom lip quivering as she did her best to register what she saw, Paige was left with a loss of words and damn near close to a heart attack. Her heart rate accelerating to a near painful pace as she gawked up. Two.....Mountainous, Monolithic, Titanic, words which couldn't even come close to describe the sheer size of these tan legs which stretched into the sky. On each side of the city two Converse Sneakers which seemed to be miles upon miles away from them, and yet did nothing else but completely dominate their view. Not even the largest of mountains could break the rubber sole of them and reach the foot which occupied these shoes. N doubt most of if not all of the State of New York found itself compressed underneath them, and yet further up, beyond all that, Paige could make out through the cloud layer which seemed to disappear around her. Body and face where anything above her knees was simply too far to be seen clearly. The smiling face of A.J. Lee looking back down at the city. No doubt it and Paige so damned minuscule and pathetic next to her, the city about the size of a dime in comparison, making her able to snuff it out entirely under her thumb.

What was perhaps scarier to this woman, was the fact that she was so big that many smaller cities and towns could perhaps easily survive near unscathed in the areas between the treads of her sneakers. Though the shock wave from even the gentlest of steps would still turn them to dust, but it was still a testament to her enormity. A.J., licking her lips as she spied on her prey. She would begin to crouch down to get a better look at her prize, an action which displaced the air around the city and state as her denim short covered lowerbody came closer and closer to the city. The winds picking up and a deafening roar overtook them, even to a point which caused Paige to scream out in fear that A.J.'s body wouldn't stop it's descent. Though it would with her crouching down, the city still at her feet and her arms resting upon her knees, creating something for her chin to rest on as she continued to giggle down at them.

This act again causing quakes and creating in the mind of everyone just how pathetic they were for what used to be a small woman like her, just her giggling was rocking their city to it's core. Finally having enough, Paige got to her feet and attempted to flee. Unlike the city goers who accepted their fate, knowing they had literally no chance to escape anything as huge as her. Paige would see herself as more than them. Of course, even if she were gigantic to them, she wasn't even a speck to A.J. and the exclamation of this point would come. A shadow literally dwarfed the city, overtaking it for miles upon miles, and as Paige mowed through building after building, even she couldn't help but be curious. Looking over her shoulder as she ran, she would trip over her own feet and send herself through another Skyscraper, perhaps doing the merciful thing unintentionally and putting the poor people out of their misery whom occupied it, so as to not witness what this woman had in store for them all.

High above them, a tanned hand, opened with fingers spread wide was coming down for them, drawing closer and closer to the point they it blotted out everything. The ridges and imprints on it big enough that these people could disappear inside of them to never be found again. Paige was left to beg for her to stop, something that fell on deaf ears as these fingers would connect with the count. Immediately sending a shock throughout the city which toppled many of the buildings, and yet as the smoke settled, not even a single one of them hit the city. These digits which could have flattened them in a single poke or prod, instead hit the ground around them and were burrowing themselves into the earth. Confusion and fear overtook the people watching, and soon, much like a claw machine, she ripped her prize from the earth. The ground around the city crumbling away and some of the city itself even wouldn't make it. Though the part with Paige upon it survives, much to their captors wishes and now it rested upon the palm of her right hand as she brought it up to her face to inspect.

This left Paige and the other survivors view to become dominated by her face, and uneasiness in the air as she grinned maliciously at them. It wouldn't be long before her other hand same into the picture, Paige's eyes immediately locking onto the device in her hands. The one she had seemingly forgot about still in this crazy woman's possession when she went off rampaging. Only now it was completely gigantic, fitting into it's possessors hands as easily as it did at normal size. Though it did beg the question, what did A.J. intend to do with her and screaming citizens of the City.
1552222222222222222222112211222221222.title: A.J.'s Solution

15522222222222222222221122112222212221.content:
AJ Lee, once the shortest diva in the WWE was now thousands of feet tall and was without a doubt the tallest thing in the entire world, and now she held a city the size of a coin in her hand. Bringing the city up to her eye, she could barely make out anything other than buildings, or so she thought, her eyes rested on the gigantic (to the city!) Paige. Compared to the city PAige was 200 feet tall, compared to the goddess known as AJ Lee she was nothing more than a speck barely visible to the ernoumous diva.

Seeing Paige gave AJ Lee an idea, "WELL WELL, IF IT IS'NT THE LITTLE CRUMPET HERSELF" Paige was frozen I fear as this gigantic woman spoke to her. "SEEMS YOU'VE BEEN HAVING FUN MY LITTLE ENGLISH MUFFIN, NOW ITS MY TURN" with that last words song her free hand AJ reached shown for the speck that was a former giantess. Paige immediately screamed at the sight of the largest hand in existence reaching for her, not even bothering to run Paige succumbed to the tree trunk size fingers of her new goddess, bringing her up slowly to her billboard sized face AJ smiled at her tiny prisoner.

"NOW NOW DON'T BE SCARED, I WOULD'NT DARE HURT MY FAVOURITE SPECK" at this sentence Paige looked up the colllosal smiling face of her captor and felt a tremendous rush of relief. This would be short lived as AJ stopped smiling and then said, "THESE LITTLE FLEAS ON THE OTHER HAND WILL NOT RECIEVE THE SAME KINDNESS" adjusting Paige in her fingers to ensure she could clearly see the city, AJ slowly clamped her titanic fingers together, crushing the coin like city I between them, Paige could do nothing but look in in horror as the city she once terrorized vanished into dust before her very eyes.

Holding back tears Paige looked back into the eyes of AJ as she smiled and said " NOW THAT WE WONT BE DISTURBED BY THOSE PESTS, I THINK I CAN GO BACK TO A MORE......APPROPRIATE SIZE " laughing at her own joke AJ took out the growth gun that caused so much misery and distraction and pointing it at her chest squeezed the trigger.

AJ gradually returned to her usual height of 5"2. Looking around there was nothing in the far distance except a deep cavern where the city used to reside. Turning to her car AJ drove for roughly 30 minutes before arriving back at the arena who were unaware of what had just occurred. ("Good, the fools haven't noticed a thing, even a 200 foot English diva growing out of a locker room!") walking back to her locker room where the roof had been miraculously fixed ("Good thing I made sure to fix the roof nof fore I left haha") thought AJ lee. Taking the minuscule Paige out of her pocket and to the palm of her hand, the pal was roughly the size of a football pitch to Paige, she took out the size gun and shot Paige, she grew til she as about an inch tall. "THERE WE ARE A MUCH BETTER SIZE FOR MY NEW SLAVE" laughed AJ, "TIME TO MEET YOUR NEW FRIENDS!". AJ took a few thunderous steps over to her bag and took out a jar, inside were the tiny 1 inch bodies of Brie Bella and Eva Marie and the even smaller 1/4 tall body of Natalya.

Taking all 4 divas and placing them on the table AJ sat down and gave her first order as their goddess.

"NOW MY LITTLE SLAVES,YOUR FIRST JOB IS TO RUB THE FEET OF YOUR GODDESS, DO NOT DISSAPOINT ME"

What do the divas do?
15522222222222222222221122112222212221.title: Cruel goddess

choices: Paige is stuck, A.J. wakes up.
1552222222222222222222112211222222.content:
Blinded by the sudden glow of the ray gun, Paige whom was unaware of the severity of the situation she indirectly caused, could be found batting at the air blindly with a single arm as the other was cradled around her eyes. Perhaps she should count herself among the lucky considering what that blinding flash had meant in the past for those who had been blinded by it, though once her vision did begin to clear up, any sense of that word lost meaning, even for those who weren't aware they had any sort of it to begin with.

Paige would be left standing in the center of the room, still her full size, but the look of horror that crossed her face and the slow drop of her jaw was more than enough to show some alarm for what was happening. Her eyes were locked upon the downed body of A.J. Lee who still remained out cold from having her head slammed into the lockers. A sight which normally would have brought a smile upon the face of anyone who saw this, but there was something off about it. The fact that her little body was beginning to take up more and more space in the room at a quickened pace. Not even a second after Paige got her vision back and A.J. was already twice her size, her body taking up more and more room and bulldozing anything in it's path.

The bench in front of the lockers already giving way, cracking and splintering under her growing form. The sound it made seeming to be enough to spur Paige into action, knowing it was time to run away and regroup. After all, the fact that on either side of her, she saw nothing more than tan legs leading into a pair of those denim shorts A.J. is known to wear, her feet long behind the Anti-Diva. slam Turning around on her heels and ready to run for the door, she would be quite stunned to find that Her rivals foot, which alone was bigger than the door frame now, had slammed and pinned the door shut, leaving Paige no answers in how she would leave this room.

This left her to sit in a cool sweat as anxiety took over, a groan from the unconscious A.J. being all it took to get Paige to look behind her and immediately begin to beg. "No....n-no, please not, no!" Backing up with her hands raised up as some sort of defense, soon to be left with no where to go as her back hit the wall. Her eyes staring at the denim clad ass of A.J. as it continued to bulldoze over more and more on route to her, A.J.'s legs having plowed through the locker room wall as she continued to expand. Soon enough, Paige's hands would be touching that denim as it pinned her to that wall, soon leaving her no room as she got pinned to her right cheek, it pressing her roughly into the wall and threatening to crush her then and there.

Fortunately, A.J.'s growth would cease, leaving her just big enough to fill the room, and leaving Paige to do anything she could to create some room between the wall and A.J.'s ass, anything to escape. Another groan from A.J. would soon begin to signal that she was starting to come too, a bad thing for Paige if she remained where she was, a quick way to get splattered across the wall in her predicament. Though, off to the side, through half shut eyes, she could see something, the ray gun, the first time Paige had actually seen it since it created this mess. It having grown in relation to A.J.'s body, leaving it to be quite gigantic in comparison to herself. Perhaps that held the answer for how Paige could get out of this mess.
1552222222222222222222112211222222.title: A.J. "not so little" Lee

choices: A.J.'s eye covering the sky, looking down upon the Arena on her fingertip.
The white wrestling boot of the speck sized Natayla towering above the Arena.
1552222222222222222222112212.content:
"Crazy.....Crazy?" A.J. would mutter to herself somewhat silently as her eye's began to dart around. Move movements even whilst still becoming erratic, as if she were twitching. "I'll show them!" She would scream aloud as she began to storm off, Nattie still in her shoe. Navigating the backstage area, A.J. would soon happen upon the exit of the building. She shoving it open violently as she made her way outside the building. Making her way across the parkinglot a small distance, she would turn around, still muttering to herself about all the crazy talk she has heard. Her right hand would emerge from her side, that ray gun being clasped rather tightly, her eye's locking on it as an ice cold glare formed. Biting her lip, she would smirk as she began to look the gun over, and noticing a very important dial to her next plan.

Inside the Arena, Kaitlyn, the previous owner of the Diva's title and long time rival of A.J. Lee until the nutjob become more involved against the Total Diva's. Was simply walking through the hallways, looking for a certain young woman. "Hey have you guys seen Nattie?" She would stop to ask a stage hand every so often, she needing to find her as the two of them would be teaming up against two of the other diva's tonight, Layla and Alicia Fox. Of course, she had been to her locker room, and found Nattie's bag, but the woman was no where to be found. It would appear that no one else seemed to know anything either, other than A.J. had been seen entering the room not too long ago. The thought made a low growl escape this woman. "A.J...." She would mutter in annoyance, wondering if she had anything to do with Natayla's disappearance.

That would be until the power in the arena seemed to the surge, the lights going out before the generators inside the arena came to life to power the building. Kaitlyn finding herself looking up to the lights as they came on, she giving a shrug of her shoulders as she dismissed this as a rolling blackout. That would be until a loud BOOM was heard. It shaking the arena and nearly throwing Kaitlyn off her feet. "What the?" Was all that she could say as she struggled for balance. BOOM Another would hit, this time taking the woman off her feet as the arena was visibly shaking. BOOM! "What is this?!" Kaitlyn would cry out, scared as she couldn't make out what was happening. It would seem to stop shortly after, leaving this woman winded, hair covering her face as she looked around confused, as if looking for the source.

Shakily, she would get to her feet, and very slowly she would make her way for the exit of the building. She passing by many of her fellow superstars and diva's all as confused as she was. I'm too tiny, she'll kill me!" Nikki looked up at the gigantic champion, who raised an eyebrow at the tiny big before her feet "I'M WAITING, LITTLE ONE! YOU DO NOT WANT TO DISOBEY ME, I GUARANTEE YOUR PUNISHMENT WILL BE WORSE THAN ANYTHING I DO TO YOUR SISTER." Holding back tears, Nicki takes her thumb and forefinger, plucking her insignificant sister out of her hands and raising them just above the incredible toe that stood before them. Brie could not believe her sister's betrayal and began squirming and screaming in her grasp. "You bitch! How could you do this to me! I'm your sister! Don't give me to that fucking crazy bitch!" Nikki couldn't even look at her anymore as she released the two fingers, dropping her miniaturized sister onto a toe that stood just as tall as she did. Brie landed with a thud onto the black landscape of a toenail. Even the thickness of the nail was twice as big as she was tall! And now she was stranded on this giant maniac's toe. She could kill her without even trying. And AJ knew this very well, soaking in the power of having another human being shorter than the width of a dime on her stinky foot.

"THIS SIZE IS GOOD FOR YOU, BRIE. NOW YOU'LL HAVE NOTHING TO WORRY ABOUT FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE EXCEPT PLEASING ME AT MY FEET. I WILL BE WATCHING YOU TO MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE WORSHIPPING ME LIKE THE GODDESS THAT I AM!" Through the magnifying glass the insignificant shape of Brie came through crystal clear. From Brie's Perspective, all she could see was the leg of this monster that stretched up into the heavens, and the sun was one gigantic eye, distorted by the glass she was using to inspect the little flea on her toe. Brie could not handle this situation any more. She was openly weeping, shouting and stomping her feet, and finally flipping AJ off. Any sense of mercy that AJ had previously held was now gone with this motion. She grabbed the shrink ray again, smiling with evil intent. "I NEVER DOUBTED FOR A SECOND YOU WOULD BLOW MY ONLY CHANCE AT FORGIVENESS. YOU COULD HAVE HAD A DECENT LIFE AS MY SLAVE, AND I WOULD HAVE EVEN MADE YOU BIGGER AFTER TIME. BUT NOW ALL YOU WILL SEE FOR THE REST OF YOUR DAYS IS MY TOE! ENJOY YOUR NEW LIFE AS A GERM, BRIE!" AJ shot the gun once again at Brie, causing her to black out.

Brie looked down at the black ground as she woke up, smelling nothing but the feet of AJ all around her. As she looked up, she could not see anything past the shin of AJ. the ground shook around drasically, and Brie could not stand still anywhere. A consistent earthquake was what she lived in, and then she realized: All that had happened was AJ wiggled her toe just a fraction of an inch. She was almost microscopic now, and as such her surroundings were not smooth, but jagged. She was trapped in a groove on the toenail of another human being, who for all intents and purposes, would never change her back. She collapsed onto her behind and looked around her, sobbing uncontrollably. How was she going to survive like this? A germ on the toe of a WWE Diva? She was so small now that even a small drop of toe sweat would probably drown her! Nikki, who was leaning over the toe to see her sister, could no longer see her with her own eyes. She broke down in tears, banging against the side of the toe, knowing that her sister was now lost forever in the paint and nail of this crazy bitch. AJ laughed at her attempts to bring her down, and leaned over extending her thumb and middle fingers, snatching the little Diva. As she thrashed in the clutches of this insane wrestler, AJ brought her to her lips, pressing them against the miniscule girl for a kiss. The two lips completely enveloped Nikki, who honestly thought AJ was going to swallow her whole. "THERE, THAT SHOULD CALM YOU DOWN A BIT", said AJ looking at the defeated girl limply hanging between two fingers. "I KNOW YOU'RE UPSET ABOUT YOUR SISTER, BUT IN TIME YOU WILL LEARN THAT THERE ARE MORE IMPORTANT THINGS THAN FAMILY! LIKE PLEASURING ME! AND IF YOU DON'T REALIZE THAT, WELL THEN MAYBE YOU NEED TO BE A LITTLE SMALLER!" AJ looked up at her own hairline and said "IF I MADE YOU TINIER I COULD JUST DROP YOU ONTO MY HEAD! MY HAIR WOULD LOOK LIKE A FOREST OF REDWOODS! SO WHAT DO YOU SAY, ARE YOU GOING TO BE OBEDIENT, OR DO I HAVE TO GRAB THE SHRINK RAY AGAIN?
155222222222222222222211222212.title: Living on a Toenail

choices: AJ transforms the Bella Twins into a pair of matching toe-rings for either foot
Stuffs one Twin into the right cup of her bra and the other Bella into the left
15522222222222222222221122222.content:
Brie and Nikki were shook violently as the colossal AJ skipped towards the spot where the Bellas had been shrunken. AJ had been overzealous with the shrink ray and had to be careful not to skip her way directly on top of the divas, or else the would become mere stains of blood and gore on the sole of her sneakers.

AJ got down on her hands and kneepads and brushed her long brown hair from her face as she leaned in to investigate. A smile crept across her lips as she observed the tiny twins unconscious only inches away from each other. Both of them were unconscious at the moment, and still clad in their matching wrestling attire.

"Aww! So cute!" AJ said as she looked over the adorable twins sleeping peacefully on the locker room floor. They were both exactly the same size -- about as big as an ant. The twins looked so much alike that AJ couldn't tell which one was Brie and which was Nikki, but it didn't matter. Either way, they both now belonged to her.

AJ already had shrunken Natalya in her collection, but Natalya is a Butterface, and the Bellas were far more beautiful. Even better is the fact that they are identical twins, which means AJ had a matching pair which she could do something fun and creative with...
15522222222222222222221122222.title: Twin Magic

choices: Go play with the Divas she's already shrunk
155222222222222222222211222221.content:
Nikki Bella woke up in a daze, unable to remember exactly why her head was hurting so much. She felt nauseus, like she had been suffering motion sickness, and her body was splayed out in a weird fashion. She snapped back to reality to realize that her arms were stretched out over the ground beneath her, and were tied by what seemed to be a thick rope. The world around her shook and moved, bobbing her tiny body up and down. She heard a faint screaming next to her, and looked to her right. On another peach colored pillar was her sister, strapped down in a similar fashion. "Brie! Are you okay?" Brie was crying through her makeup, screaming at her sister "Does it look like i'm okay?! I don't know where I am, and i'm feeling sick from all this movement!" NIkki looks around more, trying to get a grasp on what's happened to her and her sister, when suddenly her prison shifts again, this time moving what seems like hundreds of feet up into the air, before coming to rest with a sudden halt. Nikki was finally able to look up after the force of the movement ceased, and that's when she saw the most horrifying sight she could have possibly imagined... it was AJ Lee, but she looked unbelievably massive! She looked like a goddess looking down upon them on the earth, only if that was her face than this couldn't be earth. That's when the smell of the land around them finally made sense and Nikki screamed out "No... No, it can't be! She can't have!" AJ's huge visage stared down at the miniscule girls and let out a smirk and a laugh that shook them right to the core. And to make matters worse, her loud, commanding voice was just as demeaning as ever.

"I JUST LOVE MY NEW JEWELRY! THANK GOD I WAS ABLE TO GET THE MATCHING SET..." The Bellas cried out in horror as their fate was revealed. They were stretched out over AJ's second and third toes on her right foot, their hands bound in thin string. This crazy bitch had just turned two of the most beautiful divas in history into a pair of insignificant toe rings! The Divas champion looked on with glee as she wiggled her toes back and forth, only adding to the misery of her shrunken captives. She bit her lips with excitement knowing that the two women would be stretched and tortured with every movement of her pretty feet... especially when she skipped her way down to the ring! "DON'T WORRY, LITTLE BELLA BUGS... I WON'T HURT YOU AT ALL, I PROMISE." AJ rolled her eyes up, laughing as she had a thought "BUT THEN AGAIN, MY SNEAKER ON THE OTHER HAND... YOU MAY GET CRUSHED BY THE INSIDE OF THAT. BUT THAT WON'T BE BECAUSE I WANTED IT TO HAPPEN IT WILL JUST BE BECAUSE... WELL, YOU'RE TOO TINY TO GET OUT OF THE WAY! IT'S NOBODY'S FAULT, REALLY." The girls stared in terror as AJ lowered her foot down to the ground, placing them in the darkness of her smelly converse. But not before blowing them a kiss goodbye and telling them "I GUESS NOW'S A BAD TIME TO TELL YOU THAT I HAVEN'T BEEN WEARING SOCKS IN THE SHOES FOR A WHILE, ISN'T IT? SORRY THAT IT'S GOING TO BE EVEN STINKIER. WELL, ACTUALLY... NO. I'M NOT!" The two twin's shrieks of horror were blocked out by the fitting of AJ's foot into the shoe. AJ revelled in the fact that the girls would be tortured and beaten by the mere motion of her walking, but they would survive. And then when she took her shoe off and brought them out with her smelly toes, they'd be able to play again. "SOON I'LL HAVE THE ENTIRE DIVAS ROSTER UNDER MY FEET... IN MORE WAYS THAN ONE!" She laughed at her own joke, before putting a finger to her chin. "NOW, HMMM" AJ thought to herself. "WHAT SHOULD I DO NEXT?"
155222222222222222222211222221.title: Bella Toe Rings!!

1552222222222222222222112222211.content:
AJ turned to a monitor that was on in the locker room and noticed the match playing on screen was a women's championship match. But it wasn't one of AJ's... it was the NXT match between Emma and Paige. AJ bit her lip as she watched Paige apply a scorpion cross lock to Emma, before sighing out loud. "This... could be a problem. There's actually another Diva out there who could pose a threat to me... that is, if she's able to make it to television." An evil smirk crosses her lips as AJ skips her way into the hallway. She searches through each room before finally making it to an empty room... empty that is, except for a gym bag, a bottle of water, and a shiny NXT Women's championship belt, lying on a chair. "Perfect. She's nearby." Aj thinks to herself as she bends down next to the belt to tie her shoes. Before she does though, she slips her foot out, taking a look at the panting, crying Bela twins strapped to her toe. "Having fun, Brie? Nikki? I'm sure it must be hot in there, i'll be sure to cool you guys off plenty once i get to the hotel room tonight. Back into the shoe with you, little ones. Big Ol' AJ has something to take care of..." She ignores the tiny women's cries for mercy and slips her foot effortlessly back into the chucks, whistling her own theme tune to herself as she ties the laces. She stares at the belt, shining against the ceiling lights as she finishes her knot, saying to herself "That right there is a belt for a champion. Not a stupid butterfly. That's the type of belt that commands respect. And it'll be mine in just a few minutes." She keeps thinking these things to herself as she picks up the belt and sits down, stroking it in her lap.

"Um, Excuse me? What are you doing with my championship?" A stern british voice shouts out at AJ. Paige has just walked in to find the Diva's champion fondling her title. "Oh, nothing, honey. Just finding something that I want. And you know what happens to things that I want? I take them." Paige laughs and says "Oh is that true, little miss jean shorts? Well if I were you I'd see about getting a match with me. Title vs title. Winner takes both belts." AJ laughed at Paige's idea and placed the belt on the ground. "No, no, my little crumpet. If i want the belt, i'm just going to take it right here. And there's nothing you can do to stop me. In fact... Why am i even talking to you on my level anymore?" Paige walked over to AJ to give her a square punch right in the jaw, but before her fist could connect, she came face to face with a bright light and was knocked unconcious. She awoke in a daze, holding her head and trying to figure out just what happened. But before she could think about what that bright light was, she was surrounded by a tall, dark shadow. She looked up in horror to see a humongous hand reaching out above her. Paige screams out in horror and turns to run, but her path is blocked by a colossal index finger. It must be as wide as she is tall now! Paige slowly turns her inch-tall frame to face her giant captor, who is lying on the ground, smiling down at her prey. AJ lays her head on it's side flat against the ground and whispers to the tiny champion "YOU WERE GOING TO HIT ME? WELL, GO AHEAD. TRY IT NOW. WALK UP TO MY LIPS AND SOCK ME AS HARD AS YOU CAN." In a flurry of blind rage, the tiny girl runs fearlessly at AJ's huge face, heading right for her puckered lips. The miniature diva screams out as she hits the fleshy pink lips with her tiny fists. "You bitch! Change me back, you fucking bitch! I'll kill you when i get big again!" After a few seconds of enjoying the tiny little movement on her mouth, AJ takes a deep breath and blows outwards, causing the inch-tall brit to fly off her feet and land into the waiting hand of AJ, propped up behind her. AJ tilts the hand up to make a platform, staring down at the tiny black-haired girl with intrigue. "YOU'VE GOT A LOT OF GUTS, YOU KNOW THAT? ATTACKING YOUR GODDESS LIKE THAT? YOU'RE STUPID BEYOND REASON, BUT STILL VERY BRAVE, I'LL GIVE YOU THAT. I THINK YOUR BRAVERY NEEDS TO BE REWARDED." AJ smirks as she lowers the hand containing the shrunken woman down to the bench in front of her, tilting it so that she tumbles off. Standing to her full height, AJ looks down at the tiny NXT prospect and says "HERE'S WHAT'S GOING TO HAPPEN NOW, LITTLE PAIGE. YOU'VE IMPRESSED ME IN THE RING, AND EVEN THOUGH YOU'RE THE SIZE OF A LITTLE RAISIN, YOU'VE SHOWN COURAGE. I LIKE YOU. SO I'M GOING TO GIVE YOU A CHOICE OF WHAT HAPPENS NEXT. WHATEVER YOU CHOOSE, I PROMISE I'LL DO IT." Paige
1552222222222222222222112222211.title: Turning the Paige...

15522222222222222222221122222112.content:
AJ sighs and says "I WAS AFRAID YOU WERE GOING TO ASK THAT. IT'S A SHAME. YOU WOULD HAVE BEEN OF GOOD SERVICE TO ME. BUT IF IT'S WHAT YOU WANT...." AJ grabs her bag and her Diva's championship and begins to walk out of the room. Paige's face turns red as she screams out "Hey! Hey! You bitch! Change me back! We had a deal!" As if she could hear her tiny voice, AJ lets out a small laugh and says "OH, HOW STUPID OF ME. I KNEW I WAS FORGETTING SOMETHING." The massive girl makes her way back to the bench as Paige lets out a sigh of relief. But that relief is immediately taken away when the huge hand of AJ reaches down to snatch her NXT women's belt. Paige screams and rants for a good few seconds before AJ looks down at the bench again in mock surprise. "OH, PAIGE... I FORGOT YOU WERE DOWN THERE. YOU TINY PEOPLE ARE SO HARD TO KEEP TRACK OF. DID YOU HAVE SOMETHING TO SAY TO ME?" She bends her whole body down, cupping her hand against her ear while giggling a bit to herself. Paige yells up at the huge champion "You promised to let me go, so change me back!" AJ sighs and says "PAIGE, PAIGE, PAIGE. I DON'T THINK YOU REALLY UNDERSTAND YOURSELF. SEE, LETTING YOU GO, AND CHANGING YOU BACK ARE TWO TOTALLY DIFFERENT THINGS." Paige's face goes numb as she realizes what AJ is going to do to her. "IF YOU HAD ASKED ME TO CHANGE YOU BACK, I WOULD HAVE GLADLY DONE IT. BUT SINCE ALL YOU WANTED WAS FOR ME TO GO AWAY FROM YOU, I LET YOU GO. YOU COULD HAVE BEEN SAFE UNDER MY PROTECTION, THE FAVORITE OF MY PETS. BUT INSTEAD YOU HAD TO BE A STUBBORN LITTLE QUEEN, DIDN'T YOU?" AJ stands back up to her full height, hoisting both belts on her shoulders as she waves goodbye to the miniscule diva on the bench. "TAKE CARE, MY LITTLE LIMEY FRIEND! TRY NOT TO GET EATEN BY A BUG, OR SMUSHED BY ANOTHER GIRL... LOTS OF DIVAS MAKE THEIR WAY INTO THE ROOMS HERE, AND SOMETHING TELLS ME THEY'LL JUMP AT THE OPPORTUNITY TO RELAX IN AN EMPTY ONE!" And with that, AJ turned and skipped away out of the room, her footfalls shaking Paige off her feet.

The proud NXT women's champ dropped to her knees, pounding the floor beneath her. "Damn her! How could she do this to me? She'll pay for this once i get back to normal... but how the fuck am I going to do that?!" She realizes her best option would be to go out of the dressing room and try to find somebody to help her. Once she got her size and her title back, she'd get her revenge on AJ's skinny ass. She makes her way to the edge of the bench and without thinking, lowers herself over the edge to climb down one of the legs. She starts off fine, but then looses her footing once she gets past the wooden seat of the bench. She screams as she plummets down to the ground, but to her surprise, she hits the ground and it causes very little pain! She stands to her feet and brushes herself off, realizing she's just survived a fall from that huge height (well, to her), without barely a scratch! "The gun must have made me stronger somehow... I'm a lot more durable when i'm this size. That should help me a lot!" Paige is determined to make AJ suffer for this and runs to the doorway, crossing what seems like miles of huge floor tiles to get only halfway there. "I'm going to make that bitch scream for what she's done to me... give her a taste of her own medicine... turn her into a flea and crush her in my hands... nobody does this to me..." Her revenge fantasies get stronger and more violent, when something stops her in her tracks. To her horror, she hears booming footsteps from beyond the door. She realizes that someone is coming and she's smack dab in the middle of the floor, with nowhere to run in time! She braces herself as the door opens, and a diva comes into the room. Her footsteps are powerful and shake Paige with every fall. Paige stares up terrified as she realizes that the Diva who's just entered the dressing room is...
15522222222222222222221122222112.title: AJ abandons her

choices: Go with Emma and help her in trying to become a goddess!
Take your chances against the much bigger, stronger, and faster Emma!
155222222222222222222211222221121.content:
The powerful and ground-shaking footsteps belonged to none other the Australian Blonde Bombshell that was Emma. Paige was somewhat relieved and somewhat terrified to see Emma as a giantess compared to herself. Paige was good friends with Emma, in and outside of the ring, which to Paige's semi-relief. The Anti-Diva hoped that if Emma were able to spot Paige at her tiny size, that Emma would do whatever she could to get Paige back to her normal size. Well...it turns out that the power had gotten to Emma's head.

"EMMA!!!!!," Paige screamed up to her gigantic friend. "PLEASE HELP ME! I'M DOWN HERE! WATCH YOUR STEP!," Paige yelped. At first, Emma paid no attention to the small Anti-Diva, she just thought she heard a buzzing in her ear. Emma continued to waltz around the Diva's Locker Room and prepared for her match later on in the night. This meant that Emma had to strip out of her of "street clothes" and change into her wrestling gear. Any man would've died to be in Paige's spot. Getting the opportunity to see the stunning Emma strip into her underwear and sports bra and into her wrestling gear doesn't come around every day.

Emma was lacing up her boots when she finally noticed Paige trying to crawl up her leg! "Ew!!!! This arena is disgusting! There are bugs crawling all over me in here!" screamed Emma just as she was about to swat the "bug" on her. Right before her wrecking ball of a right hand (or at least to Paige at her new height) Emma was startled to notice that this was no ordinary "insect" crawling on her leg. "What the hell!? Paige!?!?!?!?" yelled Emma. Emma was amazed and blown away at how Paige got to be so small. "What happened to you Paige!?" asked Emma.

"Emma! Thank god that you finally noticed that I was here! I was afraid that was gonna be the end of me there for a second!" proclaimed Paige, gasping for air. "Emma, you have to help me! AJ is going even more crazy than ever before! She got her hands on a weird gun and it can make people shrink down to teeny tiny sizes! You have to find a way to get me back to normal size before she causes any more havoc!" Paige was yelling with all of her might just so that Emma could somewhat hear her new high-pitched voice. "I'm afraid that the gun she has might even have a GROW feature on it too! And who knows what she could be capable of even she grew to be bigger than everyone else!" Paige screamed.

Emma was overtaken with many different emotions. She had no idea what to think. She wanted to help out her friend in need and wanted to make sure that AJ didn't single-handedly take over the world if she wasn't stopped! Although, she also overtaken by a lust for power and dominance. She always lost to Paige in the ring and she finally had her chance to have her way with her. She was 100x Paige's size and a hell of a lot stronger. Emma already was a bit stronger and buffer than Paige and now being much bigger than here, she had complete control over her. She always wanted to have power over someone. She couldn't decide what to do with herself.

"Hey Paige! You seemed to get a lot smaller since the last time I saw you!" joked Emma, who felt no pressure in the current situation. "I don't know what to say Paige... I want to help, but I also LOVE this feeling of POWER over someone." Emma exclaimed. "I love knowing that I can do whatever I want to someone and there would be little to no consequences. Soooooo..... I don't know if I want to help you out...." Emma explained.

"WHAT!?!?" screamed Paige. "What do you mean you won't help me out!? We have been friends ever since we both came into the WWE! Emma... we have to stop AJ! WIth every person she shrinks and eliminates, she becomes more powerful and it won't be long before she finds out how to just grow herself and take over the world!!!!!" pleaded Paige. "EMMA, YOU HAVE TO HELP ME!"

Emma still had no idea what to do/think. She honestly did want to help her long time friend in Paige, but she also liked this power and wanted more! Emma lust for power was starting to develop and she didn't know how to handle it. She was so overcome by this new feeling that she couldn't think straight. The thoughts of being a GODDESS and being unstoppable were too good for her to turn down. She wanted to rule over not only the WWE Locker Room, but the entire world.

"You know what Paige? I don't think I want to help you out." said Emma. "I think I'm going to find AJ, beat her up, grow to be an unstoppable, dominant goddess and take over the world for myself!" yelled Emma with the feeling of power running through her veins. "So, you have two choices Paige! You can come with me and when I take that gun from AJ, I might think about letting you rule the world with me and we will never be stopped. Or....... you can try to run and fight me and your new size and I'll finish the job that I could of done when I first saw you on my leg!" Emma said with passion.

"So! What is it gonna be Paige? Take your chances at being a goddess that rules the world alongside myself? Or are you gonna be real stupid and try to go against an already POWERFUL woman that is BIGGER, STRONGER, FASTER, and all-around better than you right now!"
155222222222222222222211222221121.title: Aussie! Aussie! Aussie!

choices: Summer goes to find AJ and become UNSTOPPABLE
Summer stays and plays with Paige like the "toy" that she is...
155222222222222222222211222221122.content:
Summer Rae. The Lingerie Football League star turned WWE Diva and movie star (The Marine 4). She has long, toned, tan, muscular, beautiful legs and not too bad of face either. Her legs and backside however, those are the selling points for this blonde chick. Summer is known for her sassy attitude and her aggressive style in the ring. She uses her long, already tree-trunk-like, legs to dominate her opponents. So, you could imagine how massive she looks to someone only a couple inches tall.

Paige and Summer Rae always were feuding with each other. They didn't like each other in the ring, and who knows if their relationship outside the ring is any different. However, Paige needed help from whoever she could get it from.

"Summer! Summer! Its me Paige down here!" yelled Paige. Paige yelled and yelled and tried her hardest to get her attention. "Hey blonde BITCH!!!" screamed Paige. That word seemed to strike something in Summer and her attention was all of a sudden like a laser beam towards Paige.

Summer Rae started laughing hysterically when she noticed that her long time enemy was very tiny and she had no room saying what she just said. Summer could have her way with Paige at this size, and she knew her dominance too. "Who are you calling bitch!?" asked Summer. "You have no right to be calling your GODDESS a bitch! I could squeeze you and crush you like a bug if I really wanted to" explained Summer. Paige started to get frightened and wondered if she should've chose some different words to get Summer's attention.

"Look! I'm sorry!" yelled Paige, begging for forgiveness. "I just needed to get your attention! AJ has gone MAD! She's running around shrinking everyone and I think she's learning how to make things grow as well!"

"GROW!?!?!?!?!?!?!" asked Summer, excited. "She can make things grow as well!? In the wrong hands, that gun could make someone extremely powerful!" Then Summer thought for a moment about what she just said. "Hmmmmmmm, make someone powerful? I should squash that small insect AJ and become a TRUE goddess!" Summer was one of the tallest divas on the roster, if not THE tallest. AJ was one of the shortest and Summer feels she could take that gun straight from AJ without even trying. "Paige.... you're a genius!" yelled Summer. "You just gave me the greatest idea I've ever had!"

Paige gulped knowing that Summer's head was racing with ideas of power and bloodlust. Paige may have just started the beginning of the end of planet Earth as we all know it.

"You know what Paige!? I think I'm going to pay AJ a little 'visit' and make her tell me about that gun of hers" explained Summer. "However, I don't want to just let you go freely without a little torment..."
155222222222222222222211222221122.title: Dancer Turned Giantess

choices: Decide to take down the arena
155222222222222222222212.content: AJ grows to 500 feet tall and outgrows the arena. She decides to not only take over the diva's division but now the world. What does she do next?

1552222222222222222222121.content:
It was all over the news, not a T.V. in the city could find any channel that wasn't already being dominated by this single report, an emergency. It was dark in the city, on a night which was supposed to be one of celebration for the large metropolis. It was the night in which the WWE Superstars and Diva's would be walking amongst them. Sure enough for much of the day that had been the case, many of the big names outside mingling as they did their day to day routines before the night of Monday Night RAW. Though it would simply all go wrong once nightfall had hit....

For the arena, many of it's citizens had been packed inside to enjoy their money well spent on the tickets they had bought for themselves and even family, and yet for anyone outside in the night time air, it was a completely different story. The earth simply rocked underneath each of her steps, causing a slight tremor for those in the arena. Helicopters could be heard buzzing overhead, whizzing in between buildings, each mounted with a spotlight, sirens wailing int he distance as the cities police force raced for the source of panic. Rythmic in nature these tremors continued, followed by a booming sound, each one getting closer and closer, they only causing the heart of those brave protectors of the city, their hearts to beat faster and faster.

Counted amongst the fortunate, a patrol car racing for the main drag of the city would only catch a glimpse of the squad car ahead of them. It reaching it's destination and taking a hard left, allowing itself to ship around the turn and then Boom! It would simply disappear. Slamming on the breaks, the two police officers could only stare on in bewilderment as in the place of the squad car simply resided a...wall? No, a wall couldn't just appear like that, nor was the texture of one in that fashion. The obvious white rubber near the bottom with engraving in it, which flowed up into a large black wall that seemd to be made of a lighter material than any solid concrete, it giving way under a large weight, and were those......laces?

A loud and thunderous giggle could be heard overhead as many in the city looked way...way up to meet the face of their tormentor, the thing the news reported on. The spotlights from the Helicopters which circled the city rested on the face of a young woman, WWE's own A.J. lee. It clear she having felt the cop car simply compress under her foot like an insect, she would appear to not be bothered by that fact, more so elated than anything. Her giggles roaring across the night sky as she simply wiggled in place from the shiver it sent up her spine to have snuffed out something so easily under her shoes.
1552222222222222222222121.title: CrayJ-ZIlla

choices: "Too bad, none of your busiess!" (The torment begins.)
15522222222222222222221211.content:
Nothing, absolutely nothing could oppose the young woman, a WWE Diva and possibly the smallest on the roster. Of course that petite little Diva was now a towering five-hundred foot tall behemoth which for all intents and purposes was enjoying the destruction under her chuck taylor boots. A.J. having been dressed as all would normally see her on the show, she having been dressed for said show before her growth would simply stomp her way through the busy streets. All in her path, cars, light posts, mail boxes anything which littered the street, including people, no scratch that, especially people. All would find themselves simply snuffed out under her might. The screams of those who did not attended the wrestling event followed by the near indistinguishable splat as the rubber tread of her shoe simply left them a unrecognizable red stain on the bottom of it. Their bodies or what was left of them simply being added to the filth already caught in the treads from years of use, and all these deaths would bring was an amused giggle from the Titan.

"Oh wow, don't shoot me Kaitlyn, I'm sooooo scared." She would snidely remark as she scoffed at what the Blonde diva was doing. It only seemed to fuel her anger all the more however as she would pull the trigger at this, as if it were a real gun which it was not. It would prove this as a weird beam of energy would shoot from the barrel and enveloping A.J.'s body, whom seemed to not notice. The very instant that it had happened however, it would disappear, leaving Kaitlyn to stare dumbfounded. She looking straight ahead, but more importantly, the spot where her rival once stood, but seemed to have disappeared from. "A.J.?" She would call out in disbelief.

For A.J. however, things would be far different than just the mere confusion which Kaitlyn felt. Although she wasn't any less puzzled, after all she had went from laughing in the face of her former friend to being in a weird new world. A white plane which stretched on as far as the eye could see, and straight ahead, a black monolithic object which took up most of A.J.'s vision. "W-where am I?" She would call out, a hint of terror in her voice, still trying to remain strong. "A.J.?"Though a rumble from above would stop that facade. The rumble, a voice which shook her very being, but more importantly, a voice which spoke her name. She couldn't help but look up, and when she did, she immediately regretted that decision. The color to her skin practically leaving as she looked up, and up, and up to find that she was literally at the feet of her former friend and now rival Kaitlyn. This Diva still what appeared to be a good mile or so away from her, a mere step or two from Kaitlyn's point of view, and yet she couldn't make her out entirely.

"N-no way!" She couldn't help but scream as she took a step back, stumbling over herself and eventually falling back. She landing, seated on the ground as she looked up in pure terror at Kaitlyn who seemed to be intently looking at something, the gun. Although, from A.J. perspective, it would be impossible to see, but Kaitlyn did now in fact have that gun to her face, studying it's every detail. Her anger having subsided enough, this woman began to put things together. At first what she assumed was a joke, a mere toy. It turned out to be more than what she expected, the dials which simply read "Grow" and "Shrink" as well as a dial for the intensity of the ray. It all seemed like a bad science fiction movie to the Houston girl. Still, as she looked head at where A.J. had been standing on the hard white tiled floor, she certainly wasn't there now. Looking back to the gun, she could see that the dial was on shrink.

For A.J. below, she finally began to get her bearings. Finally have pulled herself back to her feet, this woman would be quick to realize one thing. Although she didn't exactly understand that had happened, she did know one thing. She did not want Kaitlyn to be the one to find her like this, if she was able to be spotted at all by the human eye. She couldn't help but shudder at the thought of being stepped on by her rival as if she were nothing. That in mind, she did what might be the most sensible thing anyone would give her credit for, she ran. Turning on her heels, she did everything she could to distance herself as far as she could from Kaitlyn. Unfortunately, this didn't amount to much, she but a mere speck on the floor, unable to make up much ground. BOOM! A large earth shattering quake would overtake the senses of this tiny woman, the impact shooting her a good few feet off the ground until she landed on her back. Her eyes looking up into the sky and her mouth opening wide to scream, though nothing would come out.

As she looked up, she could see nothing, absolutely nothing by Kaitlyn. She having dropped to her hands and knees to scan the floor for A.J.'s body. Even with the head start which she had gotten, A.J. was looking straight up into Kaitlyn's chest which hung ominously above. Each big enough to end endless neighborhoods from her perspective. Looking past them, she could see Kaitlyn's eye's scanning the floor, her hair hanging low on either side of her face and head. A feeling of dread welling up inside of her as she realized that she was looking for her. Whilst Kaitlyn possibly was the key to getting back to normal, A.J. wanted nothing to do with her after having pissed her off. That clear in mind, she would push herself back to her feet and continue to run away. Running straight ahead, seeing Kaitlyn's hands a good mile ahead of her, planted on each side. It didn't help A.J. in the least to know that she was literally under Kaitlyn's nose, she feeling her glare down upon her.
15522222222222222222222212.title: A.J. Downsized

155222222222222222222222121.content:
Regardless of how fast A.J. seemed to run, wishing to flee from her would be tormenter. She just couldn't seem to cover enough ground due to her small size. On the flip side of this however, her small size would seem to be working in her favor, keeping her hidden. A.J. looking back every so often to see Kaitlyn scouring the ground for her, although she would go to the well one too many times as the announcers would call it. After one too many glances, she would feel her heart drop as she noticed Kaitlyn's eyes locked right on her. Something which seemed only to be impossible, and true to it, it was not easy. Had it not been for A.J.'s movement, Kaitlyn might not have even seen her at all, although that would also leave her more likely to have been crushed later by a misplaced step from this behemoth of a woman.

A grin couldn't help but cross this woman's face as she looked down upon her rival. She practically hearing the screams of her, although she knew full well that her voice was too pathetically weak at her stature to reach her ears. Still, it was fun to pretend as she looked down, salivating at getting a touch of revenge on A.J. for all that she had done. All the humiliation she has caused Kaitlyn over the last few months, all the times she decided to pick fights, much like she had walked in here to do. The mere thought of that bringing a tinge of anger back to Kaitlyn's current content demeanor. Though to see just how pathetic A.J. had become, a speck, unable to make any ground away from her. With the most minute amount of effort, Kaitlyn could send her, and the thought sent a shiver up her spine, the power she held. Although with it, a sense of uneasiness came along. Kaitlyn taking a moment to look ahead, giving A.J. a bit more time to try and get away, though she had no chance of doing that, and the blonde woman knew it. She losing herself in the thought of just smashing A.J. into a bloody pulp right here under her thumb. Though as tempting as may have been, she had to question something.

The gun resting to her side, she would give it a look before looking back to A.J. who still attempted to flee. It was fully possible that the slight sense of power she already felt from what this gun brought her was to blame for that thought. Though Kaitlyn knew that she was a better person than that, and no matter what A.J. has done, it would be wrong to think to do any of those things. However, if the shoe was on the other foot, would A.J. be so merciful? Allowing herself to rest down onto the floor, allowing her body to touch down. This woman's generous chest size impacting on the ground behind A.J. some distance away, even to the speck sized woman, yet still they produced a quake which nearly toppled the miniscule woman. She taking a moment to look back, coming to a stop, her jaw dropping as she was treated to a view, the endless cleavage of Kaitlyn's breasts, dominating her view. "N-no way!" She couldn't help but shout before turning on her heels again. Though this would seem to be enough for Kaitlyn who merely chuckled at her efforts. Lifting her right hand, she would straighten out her fingers and place her hand out in front of her prey. Perhaps placing before her, the biggest roadblock in existence. Just her pinky would have been enough to deny A.J. passage. The width of it enough to cast it's shadow over her like a large building.

Though adding the entire hand, it was more like a mountain being placed in front of her. A.J. would fall to her ass as she let out a scream of terror. Though this would only be the beginning. A giggle from above, deep and bone shaking for A.J. would be all that she heard from her tormenter before she felt her legs swept out from under her and her body carried off into the air. The culprit when she looked down, something which would flush her skin white, causing her stomach to drop as she felt the rush of the world zooming past her, the vertigo setting in. She was seated in the underside of Kaitlyn's fingernail on her right hand's index finger. To make matters worse, when her ride would come to an end, the view that A.J. was treated too when she got her senses back, was an overbearing view of Kaitlyn's eye, she being held up close to it, as this woman simply inspected her miniscule body. Being so close, and knowing just how insignificant she was. A.J. couldn't help but tremble under this woman's gaze. "Well, what do we have here?" Kaitlyn would begin, her voice dominating her captive, a knowing grin forming on her lips.

1552222222222222222222221212.title: Kaitlyn tortures A.J.

choices: Kaitlyn knocks her the rest of the way into her cleavage.
Kaitlyn picks her up, and has other plans.
15522222222222222222222212122.content:
Although the idea of getting others involved was somewhat of a pleasant idea. After all, A.J. perhaps wasn't at all one of the more liked Diva's in the back by the rest of the women in the locker room. Her change of heart not at all settling well with them. Likewise, Kaitlyn knew she could name several others aside from Kelly Kelly who would enjoy to see this woman the way she was. Though, as her eyes looked down upon A.J., barely able to see this dot at the end of her finger, even as it was pulled up close to her face. There was something magical that she just couldn't explain about the whole situation. To have this life, to have the life of her enemy not even in the palm of her hand. She would be far to insignificant for her palm, she had this woman's life at the tip of her finger. This was a thought that couldn't help but get a laugh out of Kaitlyn who smiled wide, teeth showing as she simply shook her head slowly, knowing full well the hell she was going to put her through.

Unbeknownst to Kaitlyn however, this had already begun. A.J.'s time spent already was a living nightmare. So small, so pathetic, her world filled with the vision of this woman she used to call a friend. Her single eye taking up much of A.J.'s field of vision. The subtle motions of this woman blinking creating winds that threatened to topple her over. Just how miniscule was she, how pathetic could she be? She known for being crazy, was beginning to feel that way. A.J. collapsing to her knees would grab her hair, running her fingers through it as she gripped her head. She screaming as loudly as possible, although her voice wouldn't reach beyond Kaitlyn's hand. Of course, the slight laugh which came from the much bigger diva merely echoed over her, shaking this woman to her core and only causing her to scream louder. "Shut your fat mouth!" She would scream in defiance, her voice being overtaken by the much bigger and louder woman's. It was too much, she was shivering, shaking, her eyes piercing forward as her facial expression dropped to that distant look she could be seen when her mind was losing her.

"Y-you think you can get the better of me?" A crazed giggle would escape her as she talked, knowing full well that she was only talking to herself at this point. Her head would twitch lightly as she looked off to the side, yet not focusing on anything. "You think you get to look down on me, like everyone else, just because you've always been bigger?" Continuing this woman would form a string of sentences which at normal size would have merely gotten Kaitlyn to roll her eyes. Yet as it were, as A.J. would look over the edge of her fingernail, she could just simply see Kaitlyn contently grinning away, something which only infuriated her more, giving her that final push. "I won't let you have that!" A.J. would shout, giving her head a few good hits as she backed up from hitting herself. For a moment forgetting the fact that she was walking across someone's fingernail which to her was bigger than any walkway she'd seen. Still, she would come to a stop, a look in her eyes showing that her mind had been made up. A.J. would get a running start and take a leap, looking to deny Kaitlyn and simply end it all, her craziness to be her undoing.

Kaitlyn's mind had been wandering lightly as she thought of all the possibilities of what she could do to this woman. A slight bit of movement out of the corner of her eye would put those thoughts to a temporary pause as she would see a speck flying through the air. Kaitlyn's face showing a bit of confusion at first, one which soon melted to disbelief. "She jumped?" She couldn't help but think. What was worse however was that, as she watched, Kaitlyn saw her destination. A sly grin forming on her lips as she watched A.J. land on her left breath through the opening in her top exposing her cleavage. A slight shiver running up her spine as she realized that she didn't even feel a thing, the thought that she wouldn't have been any the wiser had she not seen her jump. "Oh you don't get off that easy." Kaitlyn would laugh, booming down upon A.J. who found herself in a new landscape, a shadow created by Kaitlyn's monolithic finger covering her from above.

155222222222222222222222121222.content:
A.J. was simply left to look up, the ever growing shadow created by one of Kaitlyn's fingers, her index to be specific. Creating more and more darkness around her, until literally it was literally like being under a tent for her. A.J.'s mind already as unstable as it was, couldn't help but begin to betray her in her current situation. Not only was Kaitlyn so big she was practically a Goddess to her. She having in her possession a device which A.J. would have used to take over the world in some diabolical plot she probably got the idea in a comic book from, but. She had reduced A.J. accidentally to the size of a flea, no, less than even that, and in an attempt to deny her any satisfaction, she took a dive off this woman's finger. Only to land comfortably and quite softly through a combination of her smaller size and where she landed, on the left breast of her rival. She was on a body big enough to almost house a state for her, and it was someone she couldn't stand, who "betrayed" her like all the others.

A.J. almost couldn't help but let out a scream as Kaitlyn gingerly scooped her back up into the nail of her right index finger. Not so much of fear, but that of defeat, a crazed scream which A.J. was known for as she simply collapsed to her knees. The world disappearing around her and once more being replaced by the vertigo, that sick sense returning. Yet it didn't seem to do much else aside infuriate her beyond belief. Causing the Crazed diva to rush across the underside of the upturned fingernail and make a mad dash for this woman's finger. A.J. doing all that she could to try and hurt this behemoth of a digit. Kick, Punch, even biting, she was losing herself in a scream filled flurry that only she could give, and in the end, she would only collapse after wearing herself out, whimpering lightly as her rival, her former best friend felt none of it.

She was worthless, insignificant, just like everyone seemed to make her feel when they left her. She was literally a speck of dust to Kaitlyn who without even trying to end her, and this didn't play well for her mindset. She simply rolling to her side and entering the fetal position and never leaving it. Not even flinching as Kaitlyn's booming footsteps rattled her head, or even as she was gently dumped off the fingernail only a much harder and expansive black surface. Of course at her size, she had no chance of knowing what it was, but to Kaitlyn, it was just simply a coffee table seated in front of the black leather couch of her dressing room. Rocking back and forth, laughing manically, A.J. would greet her next sight with seemingly joy, as opposed to the fear it deserved. Kaitlyn's eye filling the sky above her, squinting and doing it's best to try and make out this speck at her once best friend.

The thought never leaving Kaitlyn's mind as she now had all the chance in the world of making this woman pay. Not only for stealing her Women's title from her, but the embarrassment that she had caused her. The thought causing Kaitlyn's grip on that size gun to tighten and remind her of it's existence. Kaitlyn's attention falling on it for only a moment and a sly grin forming on her lips. Sure, playing with A.J. could be fun, but there were also others who had wronged her in the past she would love to see join the ranks of CrayJ as a flea. Layla was amongst them for her betrayal, the memory a painful one as she had posed as Kaitlyn's best friend for a long time, only to turn her back on her and cost her in regaining her title which she would have won otherwise. Kaitlyn would love to see her at A.J.'s size, or perhaps, even smaller than her....what was a girl to do?

155222222222222222222222122.content:
AJ cautiously began creeping to the side of Kaitlyn. The massive chest of the giantess swung overhead as AJ’s assailant continued searching for her. There was a tremendous thundering as Kaitlyn continued to shift around, checking under the benches of the locker-room. Slowly, AJ began moving towards the massive door that separated her from freedom. AJ froze as she looked back at Kaitlyn, who was thankfully just moving her street-shoes, though the tremor they created still made AJ nervous. The door must have been nearly a marathon’s-worth away, but it was either make a break for it, or wait until Kaitlyn’s knee inevitably crushed her. AJ chose to run. Thankfully, the grout grooves in the tiling provided a relatively smooth highway for AJ to sprint down. Her profession prepared her for this, running every day for training meant that there was at least some chance of her escaping this alive. Her feet smacked the cold grout as each step began bringing her closer to salvation. The swinging shadow’s over her head of Kaitlyn’s massive body kept her on edge as she finally began to pass from under the giantess.

WHOOSH!

AJ was blown forward by a sudden burst of air as Kaitlyn dropped lower to examine behind the bars of the bench. Her tremendous breasts crashed down right where AJ had been a few seconds before. Looking back at them, she shuddered as she imagines herself being just a splatter on Kaitlyn’s shirt.

“Where the hell did you go?” Kaitlyn said under her breath, shaking the air around AJ as the tiny woman began running for the door once again.

Thankfully, the burst of air had pushed her much closer to her goal as AJ found that she was now more than halfway there. It was an unexpected perk of being tiny, but she’d take anything at this point as she began running the last leg of the trip. As she ran, AJ kept looking over her shoulder at the giantess on her hands and knees. The massive woman still hunted for her, and it kept sending shivers down AJ’s spine, but her attention wasn’t where it should have been. It if were, she might have noticed the shadows that were suddenly under the door she was so close to….

BOOM!

“Practicing I see?” Nikki said as she entered the room to see Kaitlyn on her knees. As she continued walking in, Nikki had no way of noticing the tiny woman who was now screaming her head off between the treads of her massive sneaker (http://thumbs3.ebaystatic.com/d/l225/m/m...).

“Fuck you, Kaitlyn said as she got up, her cheeks flushing red.

“You should really work on your pillow-talk if you want that other ‘technique’ you’re working on to go over well,” Brie said as she stood next to her sister, smiling at the woman fumbling to her feet. Kaitlyn was burning with anger, but couldn’t afford to shrink them both. Too many people would ask questions if everyone who entered the locker-room disappeared. Walking past them, she shot a glare at them. Later she would shrink those two down to size, but for not she just felt a tinge of regret about AJ. After all the trouble she went to, there was no way she would get to enjoy her first prize at this rate.

BOOM!

“She’s fucking ridiculous,” Brie said as she walked past her sister into the room, kicking off her sandals as she began sorting out her stuff.

Under Nikki’s foot, AJ was flat on her ass, screaming her head off, as she stared up at the deep, dirt-filled treads above her (http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/3...). She could see that there were bits of dirt, and even a crushed insect trapped in the treads of Nikki’s sneaker. Her heart began pumping faster as her eyes began darting back and forth between all the hanging “ornaments” that adorned the ceiling above her head. In the cramped, dark space under Nikki’s foot, AJ began to feel increasingly nauseous. Turning her head to the side AJ vomited as she imagined her body being up there with the rest of the crap. Nikki swiveled her foot as she began looking through her bag for her outfit tonight.

“You think we’ll have a big crowd tonight?” Nikki said as she finally stepped off of AJ, heading for her other bag.

“Don’t we always?” Brie said as she began heading right for the bag Nikki had just abandoned…much to AJ’s distress.

BOOM!

Brie’s foot landed just a few inches away from AJ as the tiny wrestler began to scramble away backwards (http://pics.wikifeet.com/Brianna-Garcia-...). Looking up, AJ saw that she was consumed in the shadow of her competition’s foot as it was already raised above her once more. Rolling out of the way, AJ once again barely avoided being crushed as Brie’s foot landed right next to her! There was now a tan wall of flesh in front of AJ as she looked up at her in terror. Once again, the foot began to lift as Brie began to move. AJ screamed as she began to run away from the tremendous foot that was starting to come down onto her. She didn’t make it far. As Brie’s heel made contact with the ground, the tremor knocked AJ off her feet. Landing hard on the tile floor, AJ could only look up in shock for a fraction of a second before the cascading cover of Brie’s sole fell upon her.

BOOM!

AJ groaned in pain as she was planted face-first against the bottom of Brie Bella’s bare foot. AJ was going to scream when suddenly Brie…
155222222222222222222222122.title: Two Times the Terror

155222222222222222222222222211.content:
The WWE was a much different place since the Bella Twins had semi retired. New faces had appeared, new stars were made and the worst of it, the Bella Twins were yesterday’s news. The Bella’s represented the forgone divas era and as a result the WWE Universe was more than willing to forget them and move onto actual talented women wrestlers. This was not welcome news to the Twins. See the pair had become accustomed to the finer things in WWE, the fame, the stardom, the attention and most importantly of all the spotlight. Now they were afterthoughts only brought back for nostalgia reasons, sure Nikki had soent the better part of a year injured and Brie had been busy having and raising a child, but they still had still had plenty more on the tank ad could still go with the best of them. But things weren’t all doom and gloom for the Twins as they were about to experience the biggest opportunity of a lifetime.

It was an ordinary day and the twins had just been to a fan signing. Both of them were a little angry as Brie was constantly asked whether or not her husband was going to be there and Nikki was asked if any if the actual wrestler were signing today! Suffice to say the Twins were not in a good mood.

“Man can you believe those people? Having the nerve to ask me if Daniel was going to be there, hello? Don’t they know who i am? I’m Brie Bella aka Brie mode one of the innovators of the women’s revolution”

“I hear you sis. Those idiots actually asked if there were wrestlers there today. How dare they! I’m the longest reigning divas champion in the history of WWE. None of these wannabe divas could lace up my boots. But noooo those jerk fans want Charlotte or Becky. Well screw them!!! God I wish I could teach them all a lesson and show them that we are the biggest stars this world has ever seen!!!!!”

After a short journey the twins arrived back at their luxurious 5 star hotel and went back to their room in order to change for another apperence later that evening. As they sat down upon their king sized bed The twins noticed a mysterious package on their pillows, curiosity getting the better of them the twin opened it and found a letter and a bottle of what looked like tic tacs. Tossing the bottle to Nikki, Bire opened the later and read it aloud.

Dear Brie and Nikki
The power you seek is but a pill away. Watch as your problems shrink away and marvel as you grow into powerful stars you truly are. Be careful though each pill varies so make sure you don’t drop any!

Brie finshed reading out the letter as Nikki opened up the bottle and examined one of the tic-tac like pills. Shrugging she took one and swallowed it. Brie kept reading the letter over and over until she scrunched it up and threw it away.

“Is this some kind of joke? Eww I bet she weirdo overheard us talking and then had this sent to our room. Well I’m gonna go complain to management. You coming Nikki?”

Brie made to leave the room but stopped as Nikki hadn’t moved a muscle. Turning back around Brie began to speak before seeing something incredible happen before her eyes. Nikki’s legs started to stretch outwards towards the end of the bed easilly slipping off the Side and becomin longe than the bed itself. Her body then began expanding as her already well endowed chest becsme even bigger dwarfing any woman’s boobs! Nikki then began groaning as a mysterious feeling overtook her, she shut her eyes and lay down on the bed (as best she could!) as her body expanded further and further whilst Brie stood dumbstruck at the door. After a few minutes Nikki’s growth stopped and she’s opened her eyes only to find herself looking down at her sister. Wait. Down!!!! Nikki started to panic as she notice her newfound size within the cramped confines of the hotel room.

“OH MY GOD WHAT THE FUCK HAPPENED TO ME BRIE!!!!!!”

Brie snapped back into and approached her huge sister who had to be about 20ft tall and could barely fit sitting down in the hotel room. Grabbing the crumpled up note Brie reread it over and over again until she stopped and looked up at her sister with a big smile on her face.

“Nikki do you know what those pills are? They’re our key to becoming the biggest stars in the world! Look what one pill did to you! Now if I’m reading this right each pill is different and will grow us in various ways and sizes, I say we take s bunch of these and go and show everyone that the Bella Twins are back!”

Nikki sat silent for a moment beofre she too smiled and nodded at her sister now handed her a few more growth pills, Bire took out a few too and raised the bottle up to her sister.

“Cheers Nikki!!!!!”

With that said the two women downed the pills as the familiar sound of growth filled the air.

Meanwhile outside

The people of (random US city 17) were going about their daily routines. Some went to work, others hung out and so on. None of them expected what happened next. All of a sudden the hotel (insert fancy name here) burst apart! And from the this explosion came the stunning sight of two gigantic and still growing women!!! Bigger and bigger thee two women got as they stretched towards the heavens passing window after window and outgrowing building after building. Eventually growth stopped and the two women stopped moaning and opened their eyes to the sight of a confused and panicked city.

“Oh my God Brie look how small everything is! We must be super big now!!!!”

“I know Nikki this amazing look how tiny everyone looks from up here!!!!”

The twins growth had topped out at a marvelous 300ft tall making them 60 time bigger than the average person! The divas couldn’t not help but marvel at their sexiness not that they were giantesses. Putting her arm around her sisters shoulder Nikki began flexing to the massive crowd below who were standing in awe of what was in front or more accurately above them. https://americaswhiteboy.com/wp-content/...

“Hey there guys! Have no fewr the Bellas are here. Who wants an autograph?”

Both women began laughing at this as they were certain there was not a one nor paper big enough for the to use. However the crowd below had finally realised that two gigantic women was actually terrifying and began running away form the twins.

Brie and Nikki then stopped laughing and looked as their adoring crowd began running away from them. The twins then decided they had to something so they...
155222222222222222222222222211.title: Twin Takeover

choices: Tried to escape the giant Bella’s!
1552222222222222222222222222112.content:
What seemed like an ordinary day had taken a turn for the worst, out of nowhere an entire building collapsed and from the ruins rose two of the hottest yet terrifying giant women the world had ever seen. To everyone’s surprise and terror the two women were the famous Bella Twins Nikki and Brie from the WWE. Now what nobody had seen coming was that the twins were in fact not out to rule the world or destroy humanity, no they simply wanted attention and by being the biggest human beings in the world thy were sure to attract a lot of attention. Unfortunately it was not the attention they were looking for. Within minutes of them appearing and giving their first proclamation (asking if anyone wanted an autograph) the crowd reacted in the exact opposite way they expected. Instead of cheering and clamoring towards the biggest and sexiest women on the planet, they were instead running and screaming for their lives away from the 300ft tall monsters that could potentially wipe out all of humanity. This didn’t sit well with the Bella Twins who had finally stopped laughing and noticed what the people were doing.

“Oh my God Brie what the hell are those people doing? Are they actually running away from the hottest twins on the planet?”

“What? Oh my God you’re right! Where do they think they’re going? We’re right here!”

The twins watched as the massive crowd of screaming people got bugger and bigger as more and more people saw the gigantic twins and made their way faaaaar away from them. As they did Nikki and Brie looked at each other and both of them knew what the other was thinking. Without saying a word the two started walking towards the fleeing crowd with a look of contempt on their faces as their footsteps caused cars bounce up and down in place, windows shattered and buildings shook slightly as the two titanic women continued their stride towards everyone. https://media1.tenor.com/images/6fefbf2f...

The crowd continued running but it was all for nought as the twins quickly caught up and soon Nikki got ahead of the fleeing crowd and stood at one end of the city whilst Brie blocked the other side. The people had nowhere to go, they were trapped. As Nikki glared down at the people Brie thought it was best if they tease the crowd a little before they decided what to do to them.

“Be careful Nikki I think this city might have a bug problem.”

“Oh my God Brie I think you’re right, oooooh watch out I think I see some now!!!”
