1552222222222222222222222222212.content:
For some time now, A.J. lee has been the center of attention, the Diva's champion whom stands firmly against the "Total Diva's". Of course, this was a feat she accomplished alone, she would have the back up of the daughter of a Hall of Famer, Tamina Snuka. A powerhouse of a woman who since returning has had a bad attitude as she stood firmly at the Champions side, arms crossed as her body guard. Many Championship matches would find themselves in A.J.'s favor, not fully accredited to her own in-ring ability, but also through the helping hand of this woman. Although there were certainly issues with working for someone whom was known to have the mental instability which Ms. Lee was known for, and unfortunately for Tamina, tonight would be a night where it was showcased. Currently sitting in her locker room in the backstage area, Tamina found herself sitting on the bench in front of her locker, head hanging low in defeat and an angry scowl on her face. Tonight was a night where she and A.J. had been booked to compete against the Bella Twins.

A duo which had proven to be a thorn in their sides and always coming back for more, no matter how many times Tamina had put them in their place. A big boot to Brie's face here, and a Superfly Splash from the top rope into Niki there. Nothing seemed to keep them away from her client, and tonight they would actually have lucked into a win on her tonight. It in her mind having been an easy win on paper for her and the champ, however, Tamina found herself tonight in what was basically a handicap match. A.J. ever the nutjob was constantly skipping around the ring as Tamina did all the work, and for a majority of the match, it was enough, however. As big and strong as she was, she couldn't keep up with the constant tags of the Bella's, and when she needed her partner, she wasn't there. This alone would be enough to anger the destined diva, however to add insult to injury, when A.J. would finally get on the apron to accept the tag. She would inevitably lose the match to Brie from her facebuster, securing the Bella yet another title shot which Tamina would have to bail A.J. out on again.

This wouldn't be the first time either that this has happened, A.J.'s lunacy costing them a match, and quite frankly for the hired body guard, it was wearing on her nerves. She was the daughter of a Hall of Famer, she was practically bred for this practice of profession, and she shouldn't be losing such trivial matches to diva's inferior to her. Allowed to sit and steam, still in her ring attire, barely having caught her breath even from the match. The door would swing open and a part of her frustration would come skipping in through it. Tamina's head would merely shift to look at A.J. with a glare as the much smaller woman would skip up to her and come to a jumping halt in front of her. Hand's clasped behind her back, head titled to the side and that innocent smile plastered across her face. Though her eyes would wander off the the side, completing that innocent look as they slowly rolled, a common trait of this woman when awkward scenes were shown, and having Tamina glaring angrily at her was certainly awkward.

"What?" Her voice would call out, low and obviously angry which would only get A.J.'s eyes to settle back on her. She still having her hands behind her, moving from side to side as she kept up this appearance. "Oh, don't be mad Tamina, it's not like it matters that they won. We both know that this whole Total Diva's thing, it's not going to get them far enough to get past me, because lets face it, they have to get through you first." The smaller woman would simply scoff, already dismissing the loss which seemed to still east at the larger woman who silently still fumed. Catching onto this, A.J. would simply mouth the word "okay" to herself as she adverted her attention away from Tamina for but a second before flashing her yet another smile, this one showing excitement in it.

"Besides, I got you a present! Let me tell you, for someone who is already so big and strong, how would you like to increase those qualities." Tamina would cock and eyebrow at this, shifting in her seat a bit as she allowed herself to curiously look on at A.J. who only seemed to become more elated as Tamina's temper somewhat began to subside, if only slightly out of her curiosity. Knowing that she possibly wouldn't hold her attention like this for long, A.J. would use one hand behind her back to dig into her back pocket and produce before her a toy gun with a "Ta-da!". The sight of it would cause Tamina a split second of shock before she would silently sigh to herself, wanting to kill this woman for her antics, and this look on her face would not be lost on A.J. "No no, wait! This isn't just some toy gun." She would begin, a confident nod of her head following it, quelling Tamina's rage for the moment, she curious as to what stupid explanation A.J. had this time. "You see, this is a ray gun, with one major focus, it can change the size of anything it's fired on. It can shrink things super teeny tiny, or make something ginormous."

With that, A.J. had lost her mind, Tamina was sure of it. The larger woman would take this time to stand to her full height, looking down imposingly upon A.J. who had to look up into her eyes. Though this possibly should have frightened the smaller woman, it only made her smile grow, almost as if she expected this response. "I knew you wouldn't believe me, but hey it's no problem, I came prepared!" A.J. would shout with glee as her other hand dug into her other back pocket. Handing the toy gun over to Tamina for the moment, it would allow the larger woman to look it over. She noticing the dials on it and a switch which had two functions, Grow and Shrink, the sight of it only forced her to shake her head. It wouldn't be long before A.J. would grab Tamina's free hand and pull it out, forcing her hand open with the palm facing up. Tamina could only look on as A.j> would hover her hand over hers and soon drop something in it. She ready to just deck A.J. for what she assumed was a bug in her hand, but it wouldn't be long after that she noticed the movement that she stopped immediately and pulled her hand closer to her face in disbelief.

It was a human being, no bigger than half an inch tall, small woman no less and awfully familiar at that. "Natayla?" Tamina would question in a rather flat yet surprised tone. The diva whom was in her wrestling attire, ready to compete by her eyes was now helpless in her palm. Not even able to stand due to the soft and uneven nature of this enormous hand. "Calling her Nat has a whole new meaning right?" A.J. would chime in with a sinister chuckle, stepping upon her toes to cast a look down upon this woman. Only causing Natayla further grief as Tamina looked on rather stunned. So much so that she wouldn't even react as A.J. was quick to snatch Natty out of her palm, she would instead just slowly look at the other woman whom was grinning from ear to ear. "You like?" She would merely ask Tamina whom stared on blankly, though she didn't need to answer, the other woman knew. Hell she herself could feel it, the power of having that much control over another human being, if you could even call her that in this case. She was a bug in her hand, and bugs were just below normal sized people.

Tamina was no different, it would take a moment for that shock to subside, but afterward, the thought of having had Natty in her palm at that size. How big and strong she was in comparison. Even at normal size, Tamina was imposing, though to Natty, she had to of been a monster, a....Goddess. She liked that thought and it was evident as she licked her lips with a grin, only causing A.J. to nod knowingly. Getting on her hands and knees, she would simply set Natayla down on the ground, right in front of Tamina's converse styled wrestling boots, only further pushing the size different into her. This woman was a bug, an insect who could simply be snuffed out by a shift of her foot. As she simply sneered down at Natty with a look of both amusement and disgust, the small blonde couldn't help but try and run. Knowing full well the futility of the action. Quite abruptly, she would find the other set of converse wrestling boots slamming down in front of her path with a resounding boom. The tremor caused by it, as well as running into the side of A.J.'s shoe would be enough to floor her long enough for A.J. to once more snatch her up.

This would allow Tamina enough time to think and reflect on what she held in her hands, the present given to her by A.J. Lee. No doubt the smaller woman assuming that her hired help would continue to follow her lead and do her bidding, allowing her the power to satiate her and keep her on her side. Although, having been fed up with A.J. for some time now, Tamina now had the means of reducing this problem and merely adding to her soon to be collection of playthings. After all, she had been introduced to the power of having control over something as small as Natty, and she wondered how it would feel to have more of them.
1552222222222222222222222222212.title: Hired Help

15522222222222222222222222222121.content:
Tamina couldn’t help but smile as she looked up at A.J. with a sinister gleam. A.J. had given her a great opportunity, but the not-job had already cost them more than enough already. It was not time to follow A.J. blindly anymore; rather, it was time to take control. Clutching the ray in her hand, she took a clandestine look to see that it was currently set to shrink.

“And this ray works on anyone?” Tamina asked as A.J. continued to toy around with Nat on the floor.

“Yep, well don’t shoot a mirror or anything, but yeah, it works on just about everything! Cool isn’t it?” A.J. said as she smacked her hand down next to Nat and watched her shiver.

“Good,” Tamina said as she pulled the trigger and watched as a burst of light struck A.J. square in the back, and began to take effect. The current champion looked up with utter despair painted on her face as she was betrayed by her partner (http://img.bleacherreport.net/img/images...). Soon A.J. was just as big as Nat as the duo looked up at the towering Tamina, who giggled as she lifted her foot over the two of them.

BOOM!

Tamina’s boot slammed down between the two tiny wrestlers as she bent over and plucked Nat from the ground. She smiled as she opened her locker and dropped her in her bag, clearly having plans for later with her. Turning her attention back to her feet, Tamina reached out for A.J. and rested her hand on the ground in front of her.

“Hand over the belt,” Tamina commanded, looking down coldly at her now pathetic partner.

“Take it from me if you can!” A.J. roared, angered by Tamina’s betrayal. It was a poor choice of words as Tamina shifted her boot-clad foot and planted the top of it on top of the tiny woman, slowly pressing down. Tamina could feel A.J. on the other side of her leather sole as she pressed ever so slightly down on the tiny terror before her, giggling as she watched her face turn cherry red (http://images5.fanpop.com/image/photos/2...).

“One,” Tamina said as she pressed down harder, a wide smile spreading over her face as A.J. looked to be screaming silently. As the giant woman began to count, she pressed down harder and harder with each number, until finally she saw A.J. tapping the tip of her boot. She smiled as she lifted her foot off and reached down for her. Carefully, she held her partner in her hand as she slid off the belt. A.J. looked at her, hurt, for a moment before Tamina dropped her to the floor once again.

“Try not to get stepped on Champ, would hate to have to explain that one to your fans,” Tamina said as she walked off, her thunderous steps leaving A.J. speechless on the floor of the locker-room.

BOOM!...BOOM!...BOOM!...BOOM!...

A.J. wasn’t given solace for long as the ground began to rumble underneath her again. She thought for a moment that Tamina was coming back to finish her off, but felt her stomach drop out as the tremendous figure of Paige entered the locker-room in street clothes. A.J. forgot she had a fight tonight, but she really couldn’t have picked a better time to come in. It was really risky going to the Anti-diva for help, but A.J. knew she didn’t have room to be picky as the sneaker-clad feet of the wrestler grew closer (http://media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/e...).

BOOM!

Paige’s massive foot crashed down next to the girl as A.J. tossed herself at the shoelace, clinging on as the giant woman headed for her locker. As Paige’s foot lifted into the air, A.J. felt like she was on a rollercoaster ride! She swung up into the air so quickly she thought she was going to lose her lunch. But as the foot fell back to earth, she noticed something frightening; the lace was positioned underneath the sneaker!

BOOM!

A.J. screamed as the full weight of Paige’s body was bearing down on her, crushing the tiny woman into the dirt filled treads of her unaware mistress’ foot. She struggled as she was practically buried in the wad of dirt that had been trapped under Paige’s treads when she walked through the grass to get to the backdoor of the arena. As the monstrous foot moved, A.J. felt like she was going to pop at any moment! Her head began to throb as blood rushed to it, her bones creaking as Paige’s step carried her full weight over A.J. with crushing force! Just as A.J. thought she was going to become a smear on the bottom of Paige’s foot, the weight lifted off and she was dangling in the air by the string of Paige’s lace.

BAM!

It was short lived as she was suddenly being crushed between Paige’s fingers as the giantess pulled the laces loose on her shoes, getting changed for the fight tonight. As the lace was gripped between her fingers, Paige thought she felt something odd on her lace. Rubbing her fingers together she felt it start to come off into her hand. She dropped the lace and pulled her socked foot out of her shoe as she brought her hand up to her face. Looking between her fingers, she saw _____ between them.
15522222222222222222222222222121.title: A Paige Turner

choices: saw a disgruntled Tamina outside, her bag unattended.
155222222222222222222222222221211.content:
“What the hell?” Paige said as she saw the champion now between her fingers like some kind of insect. She couldn’t believe her eyes until the tiny woman began to get her bearings once again and started to struggle in her hand. The anti-dive couldn’t stop herself from smiling as she saw the tiny champion begin to understand where she was and panic. It was a truly delicious sort of feeling for the English wrestler. She bit her lip as she thought of all the things that she could do with the tiny woman, but she put those thoughts aside for later. For now, she needed to know how A.J. got so small, and how she could make a few more like her. Giving the girl a gentle squeeze, she watched her squirm.

“Paige, I’m not a bug! Don’t squish me!” A.J. yelled, convinced she had been mistaken for an insect. The smile that began to grow on Paige’s lips almost made her wish she had been thought of as a bug (http://www.allwrestlingnews.com/wp-conte...).

“Oh, I know exactly what you are A.J. you’re my newest toy!” Paige said as she giggled, unable to control her excitement as the events transpiring before her.

“I’m the champion you little shit!” A.J. snapped, before quickly recoiling as she remembered her position…which was now being slowly lifted above Paige’s head. A burst of hot wind hit her as Paige opened her mouth slowly, licking her lips as the glistening cavern of her mouth called out to the tiny morsel above.
“You might as well become a snack if you’re going to act like that,” Paige said as she began to lower A.J. down, her tongue slowly reaching up for her. She took a quick lick and watched as the girl panicked, really believing that she was about to be eaten.

“I’ll tell you anything that you want!” A.J. shouted as her leg was now soaking wet from Paige’s tongue.

“Why are you so tiny?” Paige asked, snapping her mouth shut and watching A.J. shiver as her teeth clacked together.

“Tamina! I got a ray and she shrank me with it when I shower her!” A.J. squeaked.

“How do I not get shrunk?” Paige asked as she licked her lips to add incentive.

“You just need something shiny, it can be reflected!” A.J. answered afraid to enter the cavern below her. To her joy, she was slowly being lowered by Paige. The giant lips approached her as she was suddenly covered by the biggest kiss she had ever received. She was a little frazzled, but it looked like she wasn’t going to be eaten.

“What a good pet you are!” Paige said, the words weighing down on A.J. like lead.

“Wait, you’re going to turn me back aren’t you?” she asked, terrified. Paige didn’t give her an answer. Instead, she only saw her own face reflected in Paige’s fingernail as a sharp pain suddenly echoed in her head.

THWACK!

Paige smiled as she saw A.J. slump in her hand. She didn’t have time to deal with her now, but after her match she would take all the time in the world to help re-educate the champion into a proper pet for her. Looking into her locker she spied the sandals she had planned to wear home. She smiled as she dropped A.J. into the imprint made by her toe as she closed the locker.

____________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________

A.J. awoke to a bright light above her. Looking up she saw the florescent lights of the locker-room above her, as well as Paige who was busy getting back into her street clothes. Carefully, she tried to stand up, but found her legs wobble under her as she fell to her knees (http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/uvvEcZXSwfg/0.jpg...). She looked around, not recognizing where she was as Paige finally turned back in her direction, beaming with excitement as a droplet of sweat rolled down her forehead.

“Look who’s up sleeping beauty! Hope you had a good nap, because we have a big night ahead of us!” Paige said as she reached down, grabbing the surface that A.J. was on as the tiny woman fell once again.

“Where the hell am I, Paige?” A.J. yelled up at the titanic woman.

SLAM!

A.J. was speechless as she was suddenly on the ground along with Paige’s bare feet. She saw the massive toes wiggle and glisten in the light as one was slowly lifted over her head (http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/0...). It was in that moment she understood she was laying down in Paige’s sandal, and that the giant woman had no intention of waiting for her to get off. A.J. tried to get to her feet, only to fall down again as Paige’s foot hit the strap, shaking the article of clothing. Soon her massive toes were arching over her, a powerful aroma now choking her.

BOOM!

The toes slammed down in front of her as the rest of her foot pressed down on her, soaking her body in the foul smelling sweat of Paige’s foot as A.J. tried valiantly to struggle. The fight was useless as Paige began to laugh and pressed down on the little woman more.

“Sorry I didn’t shower yet, but you need to behave yourself or else I might squish you!” Paige said as she grabbed her stuff and gave her foot a quick stomp, reminding A.J. of where she was. The giantess was beaming as she left the locker-room feeling the little woman struggle underfoot. Her happiness was only intensified as Paige….
155222222222222222222222222221211.title: Paige's Pungent Punishment

15522222222222222222222222222122.content:
Just as Tamina was about to respond, the door to the locker-room opened as a very distraught Paige entered, oblivious to the trouble she was walking head-on into. Throwing her bag down on the bench next to Tamina and A.J. (who was still on the ground), Paige began getting changed for her big match today. As the Anti-diva changed, A.J. snickered down at Nat. Quickly; she picked the little woman up and held her in her palm…right before giving her a sharp flick! Tamina watched as the girl was sent flying, right next to Paige who was in a frenzy changing into her boots. It took only a moment as Paige’s foot fell down onto the tiny girl, crushing her like a ripe tomato as a red burst shot out from under her boot! A.J. burst out laughing as Paige noticed the mess under her foot. Enraged, she flipped off the duo before getting back into her costume, unaware it was another Diva who had died under her shoe.

“Is that anyway to treat the champion?” A.J. asked, wiping tears of laughter from her eyes as she signaled for Tamina to prep the gun, they had their next target all lined up for the night.

“You won’t be the champion for long, heard you guys fucked up a match,” Paige retorted as she pulled on her shorts and began fumbling around, looking for the rest of her outfit in her bag.

“Ooooh, look at the new girl Tamina. I think she needs to be put in her place,” A.J. said as she pointed to the gun, which Tamina now raised at an unsuspecting Paige.

“And where is that exactly?” Paige asked as she stopped and looked at the duo before getting enveloped in a blast of light. As she slowly began to get her vision back, she saw a massive black wall in front of her. Trying to understand what was happening, she slowly looked up…only to feel like vomiting as she saw a towering Tamina looking down at her! She turned and began to run, only to feel the ground quake under her as something moved very quickly towards her (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/photo_large/...)!

BOOM!

Paige was terrified to see A.J.’s massive hand in front of her like a wall had just been dropped from the sky. Looking at her, Paige nearly wet herself as the crazy champion smiled and brushed her hand back, smacking the tiny girl towards Tamina’s foot. Paige crashed into the wall of boot as A.J. was suddenly perched before her.

“Kiss her boot or else she may crush you like you crushed Nat earlier!” A.J. commanded as she winked playfully.

“No way!” Paige cried, only to get knocked over as Tamina shifted her foot, then pressed it down on her and began to apply pressure.

“I think Tamina’s boot wants a kiss real bad pipsqueak, better do it!” A.J. snickered as the force increased. Paige was a very proud woman, but as the force made her vision begin to go fuzzy, her instinct for survival began to overwhelm her pride. Slowly, she lifted her head and planted her lips on the sole of Tamina’s foot (http://www.diva-dirt.com/wp-content/uplo...). She felt a gust of wind as A.J. gasped, watching with far too much glee. Disgusted, Paige began kissing the boot over and over again, her lips going dry quickly as the rubber sole absorbed what little moisture there was. She could hear a high-pitched squeal as A.J. was loving the show. Paige felt like yacking as her tongue was forced to deal with the stale taste of leather and rubber that was being forced upon it! The little woman felt humiliated as the foot was suddenly lifted away from her, leaving her vulnerable on the floor.

“Did she do it?” Tamina asked, unable to tell what was making the champ so giddy.

“Oh yeah, and she’s only half-way done!” A.J. proclaimed as she placed her own converse-esque foot in front of Paige (http://i716.photobucket.com/albums/ww162...).

“Are you kidding me?!” Paige shouted as the tremendous foot towered over her.

“Tamina, make sure you put her in her proper place. That’s no way to react to the champion now is it?” A.J. said as she extended her foot, knocking Paige over with it.

BOOM!

Paige looked behind as she saw Tamina get to her knees and reach for her! She was quickly snatched up as Tamina wasted no time pressing her against the bottom of A.J.’s shoe. Powerless against Tamina’s fingers, Paige gave in and began kissing the sole of A.J.’s shoe with incredible fervor. Her lips smacked the rubber sole more times than she could count as she did her best to show “devotion” to the gigantic women who held her life quite literally in their hands. As she kept the kissing frenzy up, she could almost feel A.J.’s amusement radiating from her. She knew on the other side of this foot was A.J. giving some kind of crazy grin as she imaging the hell Paige was in.

“Looks like she is really getting off on this,” Tamina said as she observed Paige going at the bottom of A.J.’s foot.

“Maybe she should get a reward then,” A.J. said as she giggled. Paige didn’t like the sound of that as the champion suggested that Paige….
15522222222222222222222222222122.title: Paigeing the Champion! Your Service is Ready!

155222222222222222222222222221221.content:
“I have the perfect reward for you Paige, something I know you want more than anything right now,” A.J. said, smirking, as she slowly began to move her shoe off of Paige’s little body with great joy (http://divas-365.com/wp-content/uploads/...). Paige rolled over, exhausted from the humiliating display she just had to make to the bottom of A.J.’s converse. She didn’t know if she felt dirtier from kissing the sole of the shoe, or for having allowed A.J. to make her do that. But it was worth it, she was going to be returned to normal and then she could maybe even turn the gun back onto A.J. if the chance appeared!

BOOM!

The wave of smell that rolled over Paige told her already that her expectations were falling short of where she placed them. Suddenly before her was the powerful barefoot of A.J. who was now looking down with undeniable joy at little Paige.

“Well? What’s wrong?” A.J. said as she wiggled her toes in anticipation.

“What the hell do you expect me to do here?” Paige shot back, losing her temper at the towering diva’s antics.

“Well, when you were under my shoe it seemed like you wanted to fuck my foot, so now you get to! Isn’t that thoughtful of me?” A.J. said giggling as she began inching her foot closer and closer to Paige…who turned and began running away instantly.

FOOM!

A.J.’s hand slammed down in the way as the long fingers wrapped around Paige and suddenly hoisted her up in the air with no trouble at all.
“Where are you going? You need to be in here!” A.J. said as she dropped Paige into her converse, quickly stuffing her foot in afterwards, giggling as she felt her struggle underneath it (http://divas-365.com/wp-content/uploads/...). She wiggled her toes as she pointed her foot down, feeling Paige slide down till she was resting comfortably under the arch of her foot.

BOOM!

A.J. giggled as she stomped her foot down, feeling an instant reaction from Paige whose frantic fighting tickled her toes.

“See? And you were about to go the wrong way! Now you get to stay with my feet all day, aren’t I just the best?” A.J. said as she continued to grind her foot against Paige, enjoying the sensation of the willful girl pressed flat to her sole. The game was growing old for her quickly though, she needed something new. Thinking, A.J. got a fiendish idea for what to do next as….

155222222222222222222222222222222211.content:
Eva Marie, who was once named in the Top 100 hottest women on Earth, has always been ridiculed for her poor in-ring work and lack of wrestling experience. She always had trouble fitting in with the true wrestling women and would always be-friend the other models of WWE. Eva Marie was definitely one of the hottest women on the roster. However, she hasn't been able to find success based off of her beauty alone. She needed something else to put herself over the top of these other women and to become a BIG star. This time, she decided that she was literally going to be the BIGGEST star in the entire WWE. Therefore, Eva Marie used her beauty, money, and other connections to secure a growth potion that will make her the biggest star the world has ever seen. Eva Marie was ready to take control of the other women and possibly the world.

"Man... these girls are really starting to piss me off recently. I mean, I'm trying my hardest to get better in the ring everyday but they still treat me like garbage and like an ant compared to them. Well, after drinking my little present here, we'll see the real ants are..."

With that statement, Eva took a huuuuge gulp of her growth potion and immediately started to feel the effects of it. She felt the need to caress her body as she felt the growth and power flowing through her.

"Whew! Man this feels great! Hahaha! Although, I'm not really growing all that fast. I'll never reach the level that I want to at this rate!"

Eva focused all of her energy into the feeling of power in her veins and let out this orgasmic moan. By doing this, she activated the true power of the growth potion and she shot up to at least what seemed like 500ft in an instant. However, the growth stopped immediately at that size. Although, upon opening her eyes, Eva was more than pleased with the results of the growth.

Whoa! Hahahaha! I can't believe how huge I am! Are you kidding me? This feels fucking fantastic! I can see for miles at this height. Wow! Look at my arms and legs! They are like just oozing power and strength! I could probably rip skyscrapers out of the ground like they were my little toys.... well, actually, they are my little toys now! Hahahaha!"

As Eva was scanning her body and enjoying herself as the new "all red everything" goddess of the world, she noticed the city of LA off in the distance. Tonight was SD in her hometown and she was running late to the show so that she can become goddessified. Therefore, Eva knew that the other girls from SD were going to be there and she wouldn't being dropping by and showing these girls who the boss really is now. Eva was still getting used to her new size and figure and started to think about all that she could do now. Knowing that she can do anything she want and that no one can stop her, she started to smile and laugh hysterically.

"Hahahahahaha! This might be the greatest idea that I've ever had! I mean, I don't know why I tired so hard to get the respect of my co-workers. Now, I will DEMAND their respect, and if they don't give it to me... well, I guess I can just do this to them!"

Eva Marie then finally displayed her immense power and just moved her foot a couple inches to her and smashed a couple houses that were in her neighborhood without even trying! Seeing just how easily she could destroy houses, she, once again, started to evilly laugh.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! I can destroy entire houses without even thinking about it! Just imagine what I can do to those puny girls at SD! Hahahahaha! I think it's time I waltz all over this little town and get to the arena and show these itty-bitty little women who the true goddess is now."

Eva was set on making this entire world hers. She looked down dominatingly at the little men and women who were gawking at her. This feeling of power and lust has never been felt before. Thus, she started to make her way to the Staples Center, crushing anyone who was in her way.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It was a night like any other on Monday Night RAW, it kicking out with a storyline revolving around the new Corporation and leading into it's first few string of matches. The night playing out and leaving the fans quite satiated with where their money went. Of course if one was to tune in now, they would be treated to a view of the ages in the ring. The Diva's title once again on the line as A.J. Lee was defending her belt against Kaitlyn. Both women giving it their all, and for the moment, it seemed as if A.J. actually had the upper hands. Having Kaitlyn pinned in the corner and a foot pressed firmly against her neck. This would of course be when the first remor was felt and a loud boom was heard. Still distant, yet it rattled the arena, including A.J. who's smaller body, outside of the safety of the corner nearly fell over.

She taking a step away and allowing for the separation, although this would be all that Kaitlyn would seem to need as she would erupt from that corner and plant her shoulder firmly into the Champ's midsection. Hitting a massive spear which dropped A.J. to the mat and seemingly out of the match. Kaitlyn, seeing her opportunity would of course hook the leg of her opponent, looking for the pinfall. One...Two....Boom! Slightly louder and certainly closer, the following tremor would toss Kaitlyn off of A.J. leaving this woman quite puzzled and slightly aggravated at what was happening. She clearly holding her arms out and shouting to the referee, trying to make sense of all this, yet not even the official could make sense of it.

The slight distraction would give A.J. enough time to recover, at least enough to stand for another moment before another earth shattering tremor overtook them. Tossing her to her side and causing Kaitlyn to take a knee. Both woman showing a mix of confusion and even fear as the arena's light flickered and a bit of panic could be heard from the fans. It wouldn't be too much longer before the entire arena seemed to jump. A combination of both steel and the ground tearing apart. Had it not been for the ring ropes, both of these woman would have been tossed out of the ring, both of them being flung into and now hung in them. Arms grasping on for dear life. "What's going on?!" Kaitlyn would shout in all the panic.

Not even A.J. would have much of an answer to this, the crazed diva showing a little less fear to the situation. Perhaps, had it not been for the motion of the arena shifting, her head tilting to the side could be seen. Though as it were, both sets of eye's would be torn skyward as the arena's roof was torn away by what appeared to be a ...massive finger? No one could believe their eyes, a finger, larger than life, and larger than anyone in attendance just tore the roof away. What would be seen next through the hole it made would be absolutely terrifying.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Highlighting the Paige

choices: Orders the rest of the diva's to the ring
Has her fun with A.J. and Kaitlyn solo
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Both women, including the fans, all eyes turned up and most nearly feel over to discover that their eyes were looking up to one giant one. The entire roof ripped away to reveal just this part of the human anatomy. Kaitlyn's lip quivered as she looked up, unsure as what to make of this, it was impossible! She was speechless on top of it, each time her mouth opened, she couldn't seem to formulate words. A.J. on the other hand, merely stared upward with that glare of hers, upset that someone was stealing her spotlight. First the Total Diva's giving what little name the women's division had these days, a stab in the ribcage, and making them about drama as opposed to actual wrestling. After all, she was the Diva's champion, and her title, it would never leave her, and should command her respect. Of course, then secondly, even as she looked up into the dark iris of this being, who literally looked down on them all, commanding all attention. A.J. couldn't help herself from demanding her title.

Waking a lowly stage hand from his stupor and he would hesitantly obey, His attention being turned up every step, making sure that the attention wasn't on him, the eye was not focusing on him. Fearing that some sort of punishment would fall from the heaven's which it seemed to occupy. Still, A.J. would merely rip the title from his hands, causing this already nervous man to yelp and fall back to his ass on the ground and continue his watch of the sky. A.J. on the other hands had completely switched gears, rocking back to a seated position on the mat herself, she would cross her legs and cradle her title much like a baby. Talking to it, and looking up every so often with a nod of her head, almost as if being advised by the title.

A low rumble would feel the arena, it nothing more than a chuckle that would instill fear into those around. "You Diva's are so pathetic, in the palm of my hand with the rest of the specks. It's high time I got what was coming to me, my time." The voice, low and yet powerful, still, it somehow was still feminine at the same time. Obviously the voice of a woman, just magnified several times over. It would be at this time that the eye retreated and those who continued to look up would get treated to a few. Able to see the face of their captor who admitted to having the arena in the palm of her hand. After all, if her entire eyeball was enough to fill the space the roof once took, no one could doubt she was big enough to hold it, especially with the way the arena shifted and seemed to move, her picking it up no doubt.

The view they were treated too was a bit awe-inspiring. First of all, the features on this woman's face were human, unlike the thoughts some of the less desirable fans had in their mind about an alien invasion of some sort. Secondly, many, including A.J. and Kaitlyn recognized this woman's face as Paige, the Anti-Diva from NXT. An up and comer who would rock the Diva's division when she debuted into it, but at the same time, they also remember her being a lot smaller. Paige's face could be seen with a huge smirk on it, she obviously feeling the rush of holding tens of thousands if not hundreds of thousands of lives in the palm of her hand. Not to mention the fact that upon these, two of which were in the ring, the rest in the back, there were the Diva's. It only fitting for the Anti of them to be the one to look down upon them as she was. It was enough to send a small shiver up her spine. Causing her to take a small step back, nothing to her, but below it was absolutely apocalyptic. The heel of her boot, only shifting maybe an inch to her, moved several feet back into traffic.

Those unlucky enough to be caught under it would be cast in the shadow of it, doomed to look up and see the tread of it coming down upon them. Compacting their cars into a bloody combination of broken glass, misshapen steel and of course, broken bodies. Their blood oozing from any crack it could to pain the bottom of her boot. The more lucky ones if you could call them that would merely have the heel of her boot block the entire street. Many of which crashing into the unforgiving and surprisingly without give of the leather. The solid sole of her footwear, merely a black wall to them and their car's would crumble from it. Without it even putting any force into them, it was like crashing into a building. Only her boot didn't chip away, like concrete giving in, no it just stayed as it were. Of course behind them, more cars seemed to follow suit, crashing into others and pushing those in front further and further into the side of the boot.

This was a sign of just how big, how powerful this woman was now, the smallest of movements, one that she herself was not even acknowledging. Had caused not only the death of several motorists under her foot, but a huge pile up in the middle of the highway which her foot now occupied. No doubt had she known, or even felt the slight knock of her foot from these cars. That feeling of empowerment would have been pushed over the edge. Though as it were now, she seemed more focused on her toys in her hand than anything else. Lifting her foot up, it would leave the highway blocked from the pileup. Those in front, their cars totals with the front ends smashed in beyond repair. Though those who didn't die from that would be treated to the underside shot of her boot. Seeing car's which were pancaked into the pavement being lifted up with it, like a wad of chewing gum. It was a truly horrifying and humbling sight to see just how insignificant they were to her now.

Meanwhile in her hand, Paige seemed to have other plans for the ones in the arena. Sinister plans, no doubt for the Diva's which seemed to take the attention off of her down in NXT. It a near sickening thought when she thought of just what woman were on the main roster now, including a few from where she came from, NXT which made her here before her. The thought of annoyance clear to those below as they merely waited for what she would do next. "You are so fucked."
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eye the Paige

choices: obediently left the belt in the middle of the ring.
continued to cling onto it despite being given a chance.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“Hand over the belt A.J., it belongs to the real champion now. Put it in the middle and get the hell off of my ring,” Paige said as she looked down into the arena, smirking at the two insignificant specks in the middle of the ring. The giantess giggled, her voice shaking the arena like a tiny earthquake as the inhabitants were still too stunned to react. Everyone that is, except for a very upset A.J.

“You can take my belt when you fucking earn it from me, you little cunt!” A.J. screamed at the top of her lungs at the Anti-diva holding the building (http://wrestlingtimesx.files.wordpress.c...). Of course, the words didn’t reach Paige, but she could tell all too clearly that the little dot wasn’t doing what she was ordered to. A.J. and Kaitlyn (along with anyone else who was standing) were knocked to the ground as Paige once again brought the arena to her massive, dark eye once again. Gasps and cries could be heard from the crowd as the all-encompassing iris of Paige’s eye consumed the sky. The dark hole shrank as Paige focused on the defiant Diva still in her corner.

“Having trouble getting the belt off or something?” Paige’s voice boomed as the crowd covered their ears.

A.J. looked up at the giant eye and felt a familiar surge of hate bubble up inside of her. She had always hated being looked down on, it was what made her go into fighting in the first place. And now, some cocky bitch from the minor league was telling her to hand over her hard earned belt? A.J. flashed her middle finger up at the giant eye. The arena rumbled as Paige was once again looking down into the building, a very dissatisfied look on her face (http://www.wwe.com/f/widget/itout/2013/0...). There was a moment of silence as she sneered…then darkness enveloped the building again.

SQUELCH!

“Told you not to fuck with me,” Paige said as she removed her nail from the bloody mess that was once A.J. She had meant to press her down, but Paige couldn’t control her strength very well. A wild, shiny streak was painted up Paige’s black nail, crimson covering the tip of her finger.

CRUNCH!

The ring was crushed a bit in the corner as Paige tried to get the belt to stick to it, but was not having any luck.

“Kaitlyn, give me the belt. Don’t even try to fuck with me, I don’t mind crushing another speck,” her voice boomed as the trembling Diva could only look at the carnage in front of her.

Kaitlyn slowly got to her feet, and began talking towards the collapsed portion of stage ahead of her. Looking at her feet, she could see little streaks of crimson blood jutting out from the explosion of A.J.’s body. Her stomach felt queasy as she felt her feet begin to step into the puddles that were left. The stage ahead of her was full of broken planks that jutted up like spires. Looking down, she saw the belt, still intact though there was a sea of red around it. It hung along a broken plank, right under Paige’s finger, which hung over it ominously.

“I’m waiting bitch,” Paige’s voice boomed as she waited for the belt to finally be hers (http://www.diva-dirt.com/wp-content/uplo...).
Carefully, Kaitlyn got on her stomach as she crept towards the belt. As she grabbed hold of it, she noticed Paige’s finger lifting away from her as her massive eye was once again over her. Turning around, she held onto the belt out of fear as the sticky trophy clung to her, its old master left in the red pool all around Kaitlyn.

“You’re too close to my belt, not put it down in the middle of the ring, or else,” Paige said as she narrowed her vision on the tiny, terrified fighter. Waiting, Paige saw as Kaitlyn….
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Turning Over a New Paige

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Paige couldn’t help but smirk and snort as Kaitlyn put the belt down right in the middle of the ring as she was told and slowly began backing away, clearly terrified! She really was obedient Paige noticed, remembering all the lip she had been given by her as an up and coming fighter. It was deeply satisfying to her to see all these loud voices that once shouted down upon her now looking up with nothing but fear in their eyes. The show wasn’t even done yet, this arena would just be the first lesson to everyone else about what it meant when Paige came to the front.

“What a good girl you are,” Paige said, layering her words with so much condescension it seemed like the weight of them alone would crush everyone’s spirit.

Everyone already knew that she was far beyond them at this point; that was an indisputable fact. But to be talked down to like animals was too much for some as people began to collapse in the arena, crying as they felt the true hopelessness of the situation weighing down on them. Silently, the whole arena watched as Paige licked her pointer finger and pressed it into the middle of the ring. They heard the groan of wooden beams as Paige pressed down a little too hard, threatening to puncture a hole through the bottom of the arena. But, slowly the massive digit lifted up, the belt safely stuck to it.

“Thank you for my belt everyone, but now we have a bit of a problem on our hands don’t we?” Paige said as she looked down into the arena coldly (http://cache.diva-dirt.com/wp-content/up...). People were silent as they stared up at her, dreading whatever would come next. The question was on everyone’s mind, but no one could put it into a sentence without feeling like they were about to suffocate from the very words.
“What problem?” an anonymous voice shouted from the crowd. No one moved, they all just cringed. They thought if no one asked the question there would be no answer…it was too late now.

“Well when I showed up, you all tried to run from me. Some of you even defied me, and I can’t just allow that to go unpunished now can I?” Paige cooed as she brought the arena closer and closer to her face. Soon the inside of the arena was full of her hot breath, spinning around the onlookers like a miniature hurricane had been released.

“Can’t you just let us go? We gave you the belt and everything,” Kaitlyn said as she looked up in total fear, the words coming out reflexively.

“Nope! I just took the belt didn’t I? So I owe you all nothing. That means it is punishment time little bitches!” Paige said as she began to smile widely, the entire arena now below her mouth.

From inside, everyone could only stare as Paige pursed her lips above them. It sounded like a dam had broken beyond the pink walls above them. Like an entire ocean was stirring beyond the soft lips that eclipsed the sun. Then, like some kind of biblical punishment, the pink walls parted way and an ocean of spit began to fall. It was an incredible sight from the seats, seeing as water was suspended overhead. There was enough water to easily fill the whole arena and it was just hovering over them, filled with dozens of bubbles, some larger than buses as the swirling mass of spit just hung silently.

SPLASH!

Paige let it loose, watching from above as her wad of spit slowly filled the inside of the arena, filling every room, nook, and cranny till there was nothing left for her to see but the water spilling out the top of the hole she had made in the arena’s roof. She had spat a little too much, but at least she knew she got the job done, no one was alive inside, and if they were, it was only a matter of time till they drowned. This next bit was for the rest of the world to witness.

Paige looked down to the rest of the city at her feet. Already there was a sizable crowd gathering around her, like little bugs crowded around something sweet. She smiled down at them as she waved cutely and began to grow larger and larger. Looking back to her hand, she watched as the arena began to shrink away into the expanse of her palm. Giggling she saw as the ring she once fought in was now not visible to her eyes anymore. She held her hand out in front of her as she prepared for her first official address (http://static.tumblr.com/aa2c412e3e0bbb1...). Little insect-like helicopters buzzed around her, trying to see what she held out.

“Attention everyone, in my hand is the arena where I once fought for a tiny piece of history. The WWE belt is now mine, and as such this arena and everyone in it is useless to me. This is what happens to things that have no use to me,” she said as she closed her fist around the speck sized arena and imagined the building being destroyed and crumbling into the grooves of her hand. Squeezing tight, she then released and brushed her hand clean.

“You all have a job to do now. I want you all to…”

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ever since joining the main roster in July of 2015, Charlotte has been at the top of the women's division in WWE. Charlotte was a former NXT Women's champion and a multiple-time WWE Women's Champion. Charlotte has always used her larger size and strength to gain an advantage in her matches, along with some under-handed tactics. Charlotte has never be shy to the thought of doing whatever it takes to take over and do as she pleases. That will definitely be the theme of Charlotte's journey to becoming a beautiful, powerful, strong, and sexy goddess of WWE.

Charlotte has been battling with Sasha Banks for many months over the WWE Women's championship. At some points Charlotte seems to have the upper hand and at other times Sasha Banks has had the advantage. This fact angers Charlotte immensely. Charlotte is used to being the dominant one in any encounter she is apart of. After coming backstage from losing her Women's title AGAIN to Sasha on RAW, Charlotte was absolutely furious. Charlotte couldn't believe that Sasha had out-done her again. However, that anger started to turn into a slight feeling of happiness and revenge. Charlotte had remembered her secret weapon that she was going to use if she had lost her title again. Ms. Flair had payed for the services of a group of outstanding scientists who have had lots of experience with growth formulas. Charlotte knew that their growth formula was completed AND that they had left her some in her wrestling bag, just in case. The scientists had spent months developing this formula for Charlotte. The scientists and Charlotte agreed that they would supply as much of the formula for the soon-to-be goddess, as long as she doesn't crush them and destroy them when she gets giant and powerful. Charlotte knew that she would have an unlimited supply to this unbelievable power.

The decision was made by Charlotte. Charlotte was ready to get revenge on Sasha Banks and get revenge on anyone who has ever crossed her. She was going to be not only the one in control of the women's division, but the entire world. Charlotte already had a size, strength, and overall beauty advantage over everyone in the division. This growth formula was guaranteed to bolster her strength to unbelievable levels and get her an even bigger size advantage. The only problem for Charlotte was to figure out if she wanted to start small or if she wanted to grow absolutely huge and take over cities in an instant. With this in mind, Charlotte took her first drink from the growth formula and started to feel this power fill her veins immediately. Charlotte couldn't help but sport an evil grin that would make anyone's skin crawl and she couldn't help but laugh evilly knowing that she would soon be the ruler of the world. With this power, Charlotte began flexing her already huge muscles and rubbing her looooooong figure as she felt the power overtake her body. She spread her arms and legs wide as she let the growth consume her.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Oh shit !" Exclaimed Charlotte, within seconds she could feel the growth formula talking effect. She could feel a tingling in her fingers as they stretched, the same with her legs as they stretched on and on, she could see the ground getting further and further away, with each passing second she was getting bigger and bigger, more powerful than she had ever been when she had been normal size, and Charlotte knew she was powerful when she was normal, this was a while knew level.

After a few seconds her head hit the ceiling causing Charlotte to drop to the floor in a sitting position. Grining from ear to ear she watched as her already long legs got even longer and inched their way ever so closer to the door of the locker room. Her head continued going upwards towards the ceiling once again. Charlotte was in pure ecstasy, the feeling of growing was turning her on so much she literally had to bite her hand to stop hefslef from playing with herself. Not that anyone could stop her if she did, and if they happened to see her would they really be complaining?

After several seconds the growth stopped, Charlotte stopped biting down on her hand and looked around whilst still sitting down. She had knocked over so many chairs and tables and actually smashed one of the lockers with her massive feet whilst she was growing. She couldn't help but laugh, this was only one sip of the formula and she wa already bigger than anyone else in the world, at this size alone nobody would be able to stop her.

She estimated herself to be about 20 feet tall, the average female competitor would barely come up to her knee at this size. Anyone that walked in would be astounded at the gigantic beauty among them as her legs stretched towards the door of the locker room.

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-3y-FO...

After taking a few minutes to marvel over her new body Charlotte decided she should make up her mind on what she was to do next. She could easily break down the locker room door and force her way out into the much larger production area where she could stand up to her full height, or she could take another sip of the growth formula and get even bigger.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The growing process was only just beginning for Charlotte, but she could already feel the immense effects that the growth was going to have on her. Charlotte was in a state of absolute euphoria as she felt the growth formula flow through her body and made her cells expand exponentially. She could feel her skin come close to what felt like ripping from her muscles expanding and gaining power, only for the skin itself to grow to ensure no damage was done to Charlotte's form. Charlotte felt her muscles growing and she was very pleased with how they looked and felt. Charlotte had always had a strength advantage over pretty much everyone on the RAW roster, apart from maybe Dana Brooke, but now with the help of this growth potion, she felt like she could punch holes through walls like they were made of plastic. Charlotte's growth had a long way to go but when she reached ~15ft she grabbed a bench press bar and wanted to test out her multiplied strength. (https://www.instagram.com/p/BPx7T7rBd_B/...) She was very pleased when she was able to bend the bar with ease and then was able to throw it across the room like it was a little toy. Growing more and more, Charlotte reached ~25ft. Once again, Charlotte wanted to test her new power. She grabbed another bench press bar and now was able to snap it in two, almost as easy as breaking a toothpick. After seeing this feat of strength, Charlotte let out an power-induced evil laugh and couldn't wait to grow even larger. (http://dailywrestlingnews.com/wp-content...) (https://www.instagram.com/p/BP0igWch1wH/...)

"Hahahahahahahaha! Wow... this is amazing! This growth formula that those nerdy scientists whipped up is fantastic. Not only am I getting huge, but I'm getting fucking strong! I mean, before I was only able to bend that one bench press bar, but after growing a little more, I could break that other one in half like a toothpick! Hahahahaha! Oh man, I don't want this growth to ever stop! I can just feel my arm and leg muscles expanding... I can feel my power growing! I think it's making me a little wet too! Hahaha! I can't wait to see how big I get, then I'm gonna break that brittle, tiny Sasha and show her that you just shouldn't mess with a goddess like myself. Hell, I probably could just go out and find her right and rip her body in half, but I wanna see how big and strong I fully get! I might as well wait for my full power so that I can really fuck her up good! Oh shit! I'm getting real close to the ceiling... hopefully I don't..."

Before Charlotte could even say another word, she burst through the ceiling and seemed to be growing even faster than before. She grew to 50ft, then 100ft, then 200ft. Charlotte couldn't believe what was happening. She had confidence in those scientists to make her grow, but she never expected this! She wasn't complaining, she was just amazed at how big the growth formula could actually make her. With every foot she grew, she felt her power grow just as much, if not more. Charlotte spent these latter parts of her growth process marveling the view she could now get. She felt the need to flex her muscles and rub her ever-elongating form so seductively that any man within 10 miles surely got a hard-on just from watching the amazing display. Charlotte looked down to see herself getting farther and farther from the ground and watched as her legs grew taller and got wider from her thigh and calf muscles gaining strength. Charlotte, who recently seemed to have sprouted an amazing ass from out of nowhere, also was admiring how big her butt looked now. She contemplated sitting down on the lookers below and giving them a little treat that they would surely enjoy, but she wanted to wait until she reached her full goddess form. Charlotte reached 300ft, then 400ft, and finally topping off at 500ft. Charlotte watched entire skyscrapers got from eye level to about knee level in the matter of seconds. The final portions of growth felt like the most immense amount of pleasure had ever felt. The last 100ft felt so much better than the first 400ft to her. She let out the sexiest and most power-induced moans and groans as she finally stopped her growth. Charlotte had never experienced anything like that in her entire life. In between heavy breathing, Charlotte let out more evil and now absolutely bellowing laughs, due to the fact that she knows that her power is absolute and no one can touch her now.

"Haha... ha.. hahaha... hahahahahaha! You... people... are... so... fucked... hahahaha! You people... haha... thought it was funny... ha... calling me a shitty wrestler.... hahaha... saying I looked like a man... haha... well, look at me now! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! You idiots have no idea what you're in for! My power, my strength, my size... it'll all be too much for this puny world. Hahaha! I wanted to get a little bigger to go around and show Sasha who's boss, but I think taking over... no, DESTROYING this fucking world will be waaaaayyyyyy too much fun! Hahahahaha! You idiots did this to yourselves! You all had a great time making fun of me all these years... now, it's my time for fun... Hahahahahaha!" (https://www.instagram.com/p/BM9xkrohMvE/...)

Charlotte didn't waste any time. She found the nearest skyscraper and kicked the living hell out of it, watching it as it exploded as if 1000 tons of TNT went off inside. After watching how easily this first piece of destruction went down, she inspected her body once more and just marveled at its unbelievable power. Charlotte let out some more evil laughs before continuing. Charlotte punched, kicked, and stomped her way through this poor city. She was having the time of her life toying with not only people, but entire buildings as well. She'd pretend to let a huge group of people run away before turning around and stomping them so hard, you'd think they were gonna go all the way through the Earth's core and through the other side, that's how powerful Charlotte was now in her new form. She would only require one arm to be able to rock a building back and forth before playfully waving goodbye and applying enough pressure to cause the building to collapse.

Charlotte wanted to get a closer look at the insects at her mercy and got down on her stomach. 1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
For some, this industry is about hard work, for others about fame. An industry where you have your Beth Phoenix's, A.J. Lee's or even your Bella Twins. Yet where does this leave some of the faces that many don't recall, the shadows of the locker room who's only purpose is to be at the beck and call of these names? Alicia Fox was such a case, at the call of A.J, along with Aksana, and even Layla who just seem to be lackey's. Sitting in the backstage area in, the locker rooms, Alicia couldn't help but ponder this thought over, herself. She seated upon the bench, hands clasped together, elbows resting on her legs, clearly deep in thought as she idly rolled her tongue into her cheek. This woman dressed in her current ring attire she has been seen in recently, a ring attire many should be seeing more often as far as she was concerned. Why wasn't she out there more often, why was she simply being led by that little nut case A.J. Lee? For the moment, she didn't have the answers and this truly irked this woman, putting her in an even more foul mood as it is.

A knock at the door would be enough to break this trance of hers, causing her to snap out of it and look toward the source of the noise. It took a moment to register with her, though when it did, she couldn't help but sigh and push herself to her feet. She already dismissing it as being the before mentioned Aksana and Layla, all three of which had a 6-Diva Tag Match tonight against the Bella's and Natayla tonight, perhaps one of them had a game plan. Although as she opened that door, she would find that no one stood on the other side. Causing this woman to huff in annoyance, already blaming those damned Bella's for such a childish prank. Though before she would close the door, she would look down and find a package at her feet. Bending at the knees, she would take a closer look at it, looking for the sender, but all that she found was that it was addressed to her, no sender name in sight. With a simple shrug of her shoulders, it would become apparently she didn't seem to care that much as she would pick up the package and bring it back inside where she would take her seat again after shutting her door with her foot. Placing the package on the floor between her legs as she would tear into it. As she would open it, she would wipe the bangs from her face to see that what lie inside was...a gun?

It would catch her off guard for a moment, but it was undoubtedly a gun. Although it was almost undoubtedly a toy gun, being colored quite brightly and looking very fake. Was this just more of the Bella's prank? She couldn't help but ponder that possibility, though curiosity would dictate that she would grab this toy either way. Lifting it free of it's container so that she could look it over. For a toy it was quite details, having a few switches which worked. Her thumbs brushing over them, hearing a satisfying click as they switched over. Although perhaps what took her back the most was the words "Grow" and "Shrink" printed on the gun next to another switch. Almost as if being labeled as options for this gun. She would practically scoff at this, a laugh escaping her as she giggled over the thought. Still though, as she had been sitting there this entire time. With this gun in hand, she couldn't help but wonder, "what if". Several minutes would fly by, and each of those minutes would be filled with one of two images. One being a towering Alicia-zilla rampaging through the city, and the other, she holding the entire Women's Locker room, shrunken in the palm of her hand. A Grin forming on her lips at the thought. "That would show them I'm still worth a damn." She couldn't help but mutter rather bitterly under her breath. She looking the gun over, a sadistic grin forming on her lips, could this be her time to be relevant again?
