"Ow! What the fuck Becky! You weren't supposed to fight back! You're supposed to let me win so I can take over the world! It's fine though! I'm just gonna have to try a little harder..."

After Alexa said this, something started to change in Alexa. Alexa stood there almost like she was trying to "power-up" in some way. She clenched her fists and started to visibly shake a little bit. Becky watched on almost terrifyingly as she seemed to be watching some sort of transformation Alexa was going through. Becky was literally stunned and frozen in place as she watched Alexa call upon some higher power. Clearly, Alexa knew a little more about this whole growth thing than Becky did. After about a minute of almost silence, Alexa started to chuckle. Alexa had her eyes shut during this whole "process" and now she finally opened them up to show her new blood-red eyes. Not had her eyes changed color, Alexa's arms, thighs, and core seemed to become more and more toned and powerful. Alexa continued to evilly laugh as this transformation continued. Then, worst of all, Alexa actually started to grow without the growth gun! As the growth started, she let out the loudest laughs of all. She had this planned out the whole time... she didn't even need the growth gun to make this fair fight become unfair. Alexa had somehow unlocked some inner extra power that came with the growing process. Remember, this gun was a gift from the gods... therefore, surely it was going to make those it was used on to not only grow. As Alexa grew, Becky's heart sunk. Alexa finally spoke in between evil laughs and moans of pleasure and power. Also, Alexa voice definitely had more of a low, power-induced, and bellowing tone to it.

"Hahahahahahahaha! Come now little Becky... did you really think I wasn't always two steps ahead of you? As soon as I started growing, I knew that power such as this was possible. Surely you were too stupid to realize the full potential of the growth gun from the gods and goddesses. Just look at me, this is my absolute perfect and most powerful form. My growth won't be as drastic as before, but I'll grow just enough to be able to crush you ease! However, this inner power that I've tapped into has given me immense amounts of strength. You can use that gun to grow to my size, not that I'm going to let you get the chance, but I'll still have the power advantage over you little Becky. I'm sorry Becky, but no one is gonna stop me from beating you, beating those other two giantesses, and then making this world bow down before me without any effort needed. I told you I was gonna have to try a little harder and now I really have become a goddess, not just some woman who grew a few hundred feet. So, where were we? HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Like Alexa's said, her growth was huge. She ended up stopping at around 700ft, which only gave her a 200ft advantage. However, this meant that Becky only came up to around Alexa's belly button. To Alexa, Becky looked like a little child. Becky had no idea how to take advantage of whatever the hell Alexa just did. Now, the situation that Becky feared the most before she even grew and saw that Alexa was 500ft tall now came to life. Alexa had the advantage in every possible way compared to Becky. Becky could no longer rely on a slight strength advantage. If Alexa was being truthful about her earlier decree, it seems like she has the power to literally pick Becky up and then rip her body in two. Alexa was bigger, stronger, faster, and all-around more powerful than Becky. Given that Alexa was guaranteed to be much faster than Becky now, she can't just run away and hope to get a quick shot onto herself to regain some sort of hope in this fight. Becky was all about doing things fair and square, but clearly Alexa wasn't. If Becky has to use the gun on herself again and grow bigger than Alexa, she'd do it now in a heartbeat. Alexa has found a way to grow even without the growth gun. If she could mix that inner power inside her that the growth gun gave her and the growth gun itself, she'll have this world completely destroyed in the blink of an eye. Who knows, Alexa may gain access to more powers if she shoots herself again. Becky needs to find a way to beat Alexa now!

Even though she knew she couldn't outrun Alexa, Becky started to sprint away from her enemy just to see how fast Alexa is compared to her. To Alexa, this seemed like it was Becky's last chance at winning this fight. Alexa couldn't help but laugh at Becky running from her and quickly caught up with her. It only took about 10 seconds for Alexa's fewer steps to equal Becky's steps. Also, Becky was running as fast as she could, while Alexa may have been fast-walking, if not just walking and she caught up to her. After seeing this display of speed, Becky knew that wasn't going to work very well.

Becky also wanted to see what Alexa's pain tolerance was to Becky's hits at her size. With all of her might, Becky turned around and struck Alexa in the stomach with a strike. What Becky found out next made her blood run cold. Alexa wasn't even phased! In fact, Alexa seemed to enjoy Becky's puny and weak strikes.

"Awwwwww.... does someone just now realize how fucked they are? Allow me to show you just how powerful I really am!"

Can Becky use her wits to overcome this goddess or is Alexa's new form just too much for her?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Becky vs Alexa: 500ft Mayhem

choices: The loser shrank back to normal
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As much of a WWE cliche it was, the odds were truly stacked against Becky Lynch. Normally she would hav no problem beating Alexa Bliss in a fair one on one match and even when Alexa used underhanded tactics Becky sometimes managed to overcome them and beat Alexa, but now things were different, Becky may be 500ft tall but Alexa had grown to 700ft tall. The tables had turned, the size advantage that Becky usually had was gone, now she was the smaller one and only measured up to Alexa's belly button, but if that wasn't bad enough Alexa along with additional height had grown in strength, endurance and agility. She truly outclassed Becky at nearly everything right now and as seen moments ago one of Beckys hardest strikes didn't even leave a mark on the perfectly toned midsection of Alexa bliss. Alexa couldn't help but look down at the helpless lass kicker and laugh maniacally at her predicament. http://orig06.deviantart.net/43f6/f/2016...

"Hahaha oh wow Becky was that all you got? Please I've had raspberry schnapp that had more strength than that wimpy punch, tell you what small fry, hihihi God I love being able to call everyone that! I'll give you one more shot, but this time I want you to give it all your all, hell I'll even make it easier for you, I'll come down to your height!" With that last sentence alexa gave one more booming giggle and leaned over so that She was eye level with Becky, with her hands on her knees for support Alexa looked Becky right in the eyes and smiled.

A million things were racing through Beckys head at once. Alexa was too big, too fast and too strong. Alexa was so confident or more likely cocky in her abilities that she was giving Becky a free shot, at her face no less. But what difference would that make? She put 90% of her power into that last punch and all it did was make Alexa more confident, she could throw the hardest punch of her life and still probably wouldn't leave a scratch on her face. Becky was weighing her options, she couldn't run, Alexa had a massive size advantage and would most likely catch her in seconds. She had no choice she would have to fight and most likely lose and likely die at the hands of this maniac, she had grown for nothing, all her hopes of stopping these Evil giant women were gone, she had tried to be a protector for the world but now she wasn't even sure if she could protect herself. As she stared into the evil yet still beautiful blue eyes of Alexa bliss she realised she couldn't win a fair fight with this titanic beauty. That's when it clicked. She couldn't win a fair fight. If she wanted to win she couldn't be the rule abiding clean Irishwoman she always was, she would need to stoop down or in this case up to Alexa's level. It was all or nothing She had to try.

Alexa still taunting the lass kicker started tapping her cheek as if goading Becky into hitting her there. "Come on Becky I don't have all day just hurry up and take your best sh....." Alexa was cut off mid sentence as Becky with all the strength she could muster jabbed her fingers into the big beautiful eyes of Alexa. Alexa screamed in pain, Becky had jabbed her so hard that she was clutching her eyes in pain, she was caught completely by surprise at the unsportsmanlike conduct that Becky just showed. "You fucking bitch!!!! I'm gonna squash you like a bug!!!!" Alexa bellowed, but how could she, she couldn't even see right now that's when Becky made her move. Picking up a partially destroyed skyscraper that Alexa had knocked over earlier she took it and smashed Alexa right over the head with it. Now Beckys punches may not have had that much of an effect but a skyscraper was still a skyscraper and it would still hurt even at 700ft tall. Alexa felt like she was hit by a ton of bricks the building alone would have hurt but with all of Becky Lynch's strength behind it she was knocked silly.

Seeing that Alexa was stumbling and looked almost gone she knew what she had to do, but before she did she noticed that there were still people near Alexa that hadn't gotten away yet and were all still frozen in fear. "EVERYONE!!!!! GET AWAY FROM ALEXA NOW!!!!!!! TAKE COVER!!!!!!!" The Irish beauty boomed as loud as she could and every person within 20 miles heard Becky and all ran away from Alexa and into the basements of the nearest buildings. With the people as safe as they could be Becky took a few steps back and ran as fast ash she could and double drop kicked Alexa. The force of Beckys drop kick caused Alexa to lift off the ground and fly a few hundred feet across the city and land onto hundreds of cars and other vehicles that had been abandoned. She hit the ground with an earth shaking BOOM that caused even the gigantic Emma and Dana Brooke to take notice in the distance.

Becky slowly made her way over to Alexa and checked on her biggest rival, to her shock she was still stirring. Not taking any chances Becky jumped as high as she could and delivered leg drop after leg drop after leg drop after leg drop until Alexa bliss was knocked unconscious. Finally stopping her onslaught of offense Becky fell onto her perfect behind panting out of breathe but proud of what she had managed to do. Sure she had to fight a little dirty but she had defeated Alexa. And if she was able to defeat someone as big and powerful as Alexa then there was nothing stopping her from beating Emma and Dana too. Looking over at Alexa Becky couldn't help but taunt her http://33.media.tumblr.com/429c1cf78ca6e...

Making a gesture with her fingers Becky said " well Lexi even when you're tall you're still a little bitch, you came this close but close ain't good enough hahaha" just as Becky prepare to stand up she noticed a glowing object from her pocket. Reaching into it she pulled out the size gun that had turned them all into goddesses. That's when the gun let out a bright light that temporally blinded Becky. As it turned out when someone who had used the goddess gun was defeated there was a side effect. And that side effect was....
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A Huge Lass Kicking

choices: Stick with Charlotte, Bayley and Alexa
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The gun still glowing let out a bright blue light that shot up, at first Becky couldn't see as the light blinded her but after a moment she regained her composure and opened her eyes to see the bright light hovering above the gun, suddenly the light starts moving and Becky shields her face with arms thinking the light was coming for her however she opened her eyes to see the light engulfing the gigantic prone body of Alexa's bliss. At first nothing happened but after a few moments something happened that shocked Becky, Alexa was shrinking.

Ever so slowly Alexa began to decrease in height, getting smaller and smaller with each passing second. Becky couldn't believe what she was seeing, her biggest rivals who she had just barely beaten was now shrinking by the second. Finally after several minutes Alexa returned back to her normal size of 5ft. Sh had done it, Becky had done exactly what she had set out to do, she had used the gun in hopes of stopping the terror being caused by Alexa, and even with the odds stacked against her she had one and better yet there was a way of returning back to her normal size. She couldn't help and smile.

Becky eventually made her way over to where Alexa was now laying and looked down upon her now tiny adversary and sighed. "Why did you have to try and cause so much pain Alexa? I know deep down you're a good girl, I know it must be hard being short but you never let that get you down, I know you're better than that, even if you can't hear me saying it ok tell you anyway regardless of what happened, and even after everything you've done I can't bring myself to just leave you here" with that said Becky as gently as she could lowered herself onto her knees and using her thumb and finger lucked thentiny alexa as carefully as she could from the ground and placed her in the middle of her palm. Looking at the tiny woman in her palm Becky whispers to her despite her being unconscious. "Don't worry Lexi I'm gonna take you somewhere safe, I doubt anyone will connect you this now that you're small again, anyways I'm gonna go really slow so you'll be safe ok?" With this said Becky made her short (to her) journey to the arena.

Meanwhile at the arena. The remaining divas are all in shock of what they had seen that night, Dana and Emma had destroyed the army with ease before the television feed had cut off. (Meaning they and the rest of the world hadn't seen Alexa and Beckys gigantic showdown) Charlotte, Bayley and Eva Marie were all huddled in the locker room, the same one which Becky, Emma, Dana and Alexa had all grown out of. They had been in here with the roof torn off and the debris spread everywhere, nobody cared they were all in shock and awe of what had happened. Charlotte eventually broke the silence. "Do you think we should get out of here guys? Like before Emma and Dana get back?" "I don't know Charlotte, where would we go? Emma and Dana could destroy the whole city within hours before we've even had the chance to escape" responded Bayley. Before Charlotte or Eva had a chance to retort they were interrupted by the room shaking. BOOM! BOOM! BOOM! With each second the shaking got louder and more violent.One massive BOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!!!!!!! Knocks all three off their seats and onto the floor. Charlotte was the first to recover. Clutching her head Charlotte got to her feet. "What the fuck was that?" "SORRY ABOUT THAT CHAR! DONT KNOW MY OWN STRENGTH!" The women all frees and look up to the hole in room only to see the hole filled with the gigantic beautiful face of Becky lynch. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

Seeing the massive face of Becky was a shock to say the least. Charlotte just stood and gaped at her best friend with her mouth wide open, Bayley collapsed back onto the floor in disbelief at what she was seeing. But being the composed and breve woman she was, Eva Marie started screaming as loud as she could and ran straight from the lockeroom and down the hallway not looking back once. Becky merely looks down at her two friends with a confused look on her face. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736... "WAS IT SOMETHING I SAID?" Charlotte eventually came to her senses and questioned her best friend. "Becky what the hell happened to you? You're huge!!!!!" Bayley also got to her feet and looked at Becky in awe but with a sense of relief that it was Becky who didn't seem like she would hurt them. "ILL EXPLAIN LATER, I NEED TO GO AND STOP EMMA AND DANA, HERE LOOK AFTER LEXI FOR ME AND TELL HER THAT I BROUGHT HER HERE" with that said Becky carefully lowered Alexa who was wrapped in one of Beckys loose ring gear into the locker room and into the waiting arms of Charlotte who lowered her onto the nearest locker room bench, Charlotte couldn't help but notice that alexa was lighter than usual but didn't hinder on it as she looked back up to her huge best friend. "THANKS GUYS, ILL BE BACK AS SOON AS I CAN, TAKE CARE OF YOURSELVES IT MAY GET A LITTLE LOUD" standing back up to her full intimidating height Becky stomped off back towards the city ready to confront Emma and Dana.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Becky: The Protector

choices: Alexa wants to squash Dana and Emma as soon as possible...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"You think you can scare me just because you grew a little and your muscles got bigger? Puh-lease! I didn't make it this far in life by not fighting for everything I've got! No one is unstoppable, not even some knock-off demi-goddess like you Alexa!"

Becky may not have even believed the words she was saying, but she sure didn't express her absolute fear of this gigantic woman. While Becky had her meanest-looking game face on, Alexa just kept this powerful, confident smirk on her face as she looked down upon Becky (https://66.media.tumblr.com/3fee045ee7ba...). On top of this confident look, she couldn't control herself from laughing at Becky's seemingly worthless confidence. Alexa knew she was in complete control of the situation. Like stated before, something more happened to Alexa aside from just growing a little bit. Alexa underwent some sort of literal god-like ascension right before Becky and everyone else's eyes. The power and strength flowing through the body of this formerly petite girl was unimaginable and probably unmatchable. Becky was going to have to do a lot more than just grow to Alexa's size or perhaps even bigger than Alexa to defeat her. Alexa, who seemed to be not at all threatened by this small child at her waist, spoke down to Becky.

"You just don't get it, do you Becky? This person I've become... hell... this GODDESS that I've become is way too much for you, Dana, Emma, or anyone else to handle. Like I said before, I'm more than just some wannabe goddess who used some gun to grow a little bit. I've always known that I was above everyone else and that I had this potential of ultimate power within me, it just took that growth gun to unlock everything for me. I'm just about ready to show-off all that I'm capable of, little Becky. What better way to display my utter dominance over this puny world than easily destroying a woman who is 100x bigger than all of these chumps? Go ahead, take your best shot Becky. Just like before, your little weak punches and kicks feel like nothing! If anything, they feel like a nice massage! Hahahahahahahaha!"

Becky believed everything that came out of Alexa's mouth. This powerful aura radiating off of Alexa seemed like something that was out of this world. It really did look like there was nothing that could hurt her. However, Becky was always one for trying her hardest, even when the situation was massively bleak like this one. With all of her might, Becky charged full-steam-ahead into Alexa. It was almost like it something out of some Japanese cartoon show where Becky used all of her might and the rest of the world's might in this next and perhaps final assault on Alexa. Using the strength that goes along with being 500ft tall and the strength of all of those relying on her to defeat this giantess, Becky looked to topple this gigantic titan of a woman. As Becky made contact with Alexa's torso, it was almost like a bomb went off. Somehow, someway, sounds that resembled explosions went off and smoke filled the air surrounding the two giantesses. The clouds of smoke reached high in the air, even above the 500ft and 700ft women. After what seemed like hours of smoke dominating the air, the dust had settled and the result of seemingly Becky's final attack was revealed...

Despite her strongest efforts, Alexa was left standing, hands-on-hips, looking as powerful as ever, if not even more powerful. Alexa's perfect stomach looked no worse for wear as she stood there in the town center just letting out a bellowing laugh. As the citizens looking on stared at their new goddess and ruler, they saw Becky, who looked like she had just come out of a burning building. Her body was burned and scarred from head-to-toe as she just laid there, defeated and with no energy left to continue. After looking at what Becky's final attack did to herself, she simply evilly laughed and walked over to Becky's almost lifeless body. Becky could only look up to see Alexa's smirking down at her and radiating power as she stood over her. It seemed that Alexa was willing to put on one more show of dominance before finishing Becky off for good and then moving on to play with the world as she pleases.

"Well... well... well! Looks like your last-ditch effort was all-for-nothing Becky! It really is a shame, you could've joined me in my pursuits of taking over this world. Who knows, perhaps I could've have shown you how to unlock this true power and become an actual goddess like myself. But, it seems that you've acted so stupidly once again and now, all I'm left with is a huge, lifeless toy that I get to play with. Guess what Becky? I'm gonna use you as a display of my true power and strength. I need to show this puny people just how powerful I really am. Then, I'll put you out of your misery for good! Sound fun?" (http://t15.deviantart.net/-yPlWXyCYW8Wqy...(100,100):origin()/pre15/a4ec/th/pre/f/2016/281/3/7/mega_giantess_ wwe_diva_alexa_bliss_2_by_wwechyna1-dakcj5w.png)

With that final statement leaving Alexa's lips, she quickly lifted up Becky's entire 500ft body with one arm like she was a baby! Alexa was hell-bent on showing off her strength to all of the mortals watching on. As Alexa was easily hoisted Becky one with only one arm, she appeared to put a hand in front of her face and yawned to show that this was just too easy for her and that she was bored by this "competition." Nevertheless, Alexa started slamming Becky around with her one arm like she was some worthless toy. The crowds gathering around watched in horror as Becky was being trashed around so easily. If Alexa could do this to someone who was 500ft tall, what is she capable of doing to all of them? After Alexa was done having her fun throwing Becky around, she tossed her what seemed like at least a mile. Alexa dusted off her hands, clearly proud of her work. She showcased how quickly she can get from Point A to Point B when she hastily made her way over to Becky's body once again. What would take a normal human 1000 steps took the giantess Alexa just one. With Becky laying flat of her back, Alexa took this time to hit one of her signature moves "Insult to Injury" on Becky (https://66.media.tumblr.com/e612fe09bd94...). Surely by this point Becky had to have been dead. Becky was clearly lifeless and motionless as the powerful Alexa stood over her. Alexa's job was complete... she had defeated her biggest competition, outside of Dana and Emma. However, not only did Alexa have this god-like form, she now has reclaimed the growth gun that made all of this possible. Holding the growth gun in her hands, she had to let out another bellowing evil laugh. Alexa was certain she could beat Dana and Emma at her current size, given the fact that she just wiped the floor with Becky... but, now she has the ultimate power to grow herself whenever she wants...

In between her power-induced laughs, she let out these orgasmic moans that was sure to make any man, or even woman, in attendance get hard as a rock. After definitely making sure Becky was gone for good, she turned to the crowds of people who looked up at this perfect form of Alexa Bliss. These people just witnessed their only hope be defeated by this giant woman so easily that she didn't even seem to break a sweat. Alexa knew that she was in full control. Knowing this, she addressed the mortals at her mercy.

"Did you see what I just did to your 'savior' Becky Lynch? Did you see just how easily that was for me? I beat the shit out off a 500ft woman without even trying! If I can do that to someone who was in better shape than 99% of you losers and gigantic, just imagine what I can do to your puny, mortal bodies. I could probably break you insects in half with my freaking fingernail! Hahahahahaha! You know what? Ever since I grew to be this big, I haven't got the chance to really do any squashing. I mean, I've always enjoyed stepping on bugs at home, what's the difference now? Like before, I'm gigantic and powerful compared to the tiny things at my feet and then I show that power by doing some exterminating! Just like old times as they say! Hahahahahahahaha! Anyway, enough with the playful banter, let's get to stomping! Hahahahahahahaha!

The statements made by the goddess that was Alexa Bliss caused the crowds to attempt to scatter and get away from this giantess. To Alexa, this was equivalent to watching ants dispersing and trying to run away. Alexa, once again, let out a giant laugh and allowed these puny mortals to get some sort of "head start." After a couple seconds of letting these humans think they were getting away, Alexa started to stomp away at the bugs at her feet. She had never enjoyed herself so much in her entire life. All Alexa could see were little dots running around before she put her foot down, and then afterwards, nothing but red paste filled the streets. It only took Alexa to kill what seemed like an entire city's worth of people. Alexa surveyed her work and was very pleased with how easily she wiped thousands of people of the map in quick succession. Alexa took one last look at Becky's dead body and gave it one last little smooch and then stomp to the head for good measure.

Alexa was so proud of the work she had accomplished so far as a goddess of the world, but she knew more work had to be done. However, she had a hard time deciding what to do next. She wanted to find Dana and Emma as quickly as possible, just in case they found out some way to access the power that she did. Also, she wanted to get them out of the picture right away so that there was no one left to challenge her. One last decision was needed however, should she go find Dana and Emma as is, or should she get even bigger, stronger, and more powerful and round out her size to 1000ft?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Alexa's New Form is Too Much

choices: Continue: Alexa announces herself as ruler of the world
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Alexa decided to grow even bigger. She picked up the growth gun, eyeing it for a moment, then crushing it with her first, laughing.

"Awwww, you all thought I forgot about this little gun? Nope! Now NO ONE can grow to my height and even think of challenging me! Now I just gotta find those two puny knock offs."

Alexa then smirks at the people below her, then she begins to grow, without the growth gun.

"HAHAHAHAHA, I CAN GROW FOREVER NOW! I AM NOT JUST A GODDESS, BUT I WILL SOON BE GODDESS OF THE WORLD, THEN THE UNIVERSE!"

Later on....

Dana Brooke and Emma were finishing up yet another city. All of a sudden they feel a deep rumble at their feet. Initially the. Think nothing of it, until they see a huge, curvy show envelope them.

"Hey girls, how's it going?" booms the new giantess.

Dana Brooke and Emma stare in absolute shock and fear, unable to move. They both feel the power and aura emanating off of the formerly small woman.

"You're reign on top side was short wasn't it? Oh well, time to take out the trash."

Alexa then nonchalantly picks up Dana Brooke and Emma with one hand each and throws them miles away, which was just a few steps for her. She then mounts each of them and pummels them like they are nothing. The two former goddesses try and fight back, but they stood no chance against Alexa. Alexa then picks them up again, smirks and laughs at them, and says, "Don't worry girls, the world, no the UNIVERSE is in much better hands now." And with that, Alexa Bliss spikes both of them into the ground, cementing herself as the One True Goddess.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Grow Alexa Grow!

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Alexa Bliss had achieved nothing no other human being had ever done: conquer the entire world. And especially at the speed in which she did it. The humongous woman looked down at the crowds and city blocks below her, thinking that she just wasn't tall enough yet.

"Are you puny mortals ready to be even smaller?"

With that "Little" Miss Bliss began to grow, this time at a much faster pace. She soon left behind 2,000 feet, then 3,000 feet...

"YES, RUN, FLEE FROM ME MORTALS!"

And with that, the former "5 Feet of Fury" became 5,000 Feet of Fury. The tiny people at her feet were relieved that her growth had relented, not realizing it was simply a brief pause.

Alexa then let out a sexy, loud moan, so loud that nearly everyone on the entire planet was turned on by it.

"NOT BIG ENOUGH" she moaned.

Alexa's growth commenced again, once again at a ludicrous rate. Her formally small boobs had become slightly bigger, and her butt...well her butt had gained so much fat and so much size, yet there were no imperfections. Her entire body was perfection. She truly had ascended humanity.

Her growth finally ends at 5 miles tall. She grins down at the world beneath her, and clears her throat...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Alexa Bliss: Goddess of the WORLD

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With her hands on the hips, striking a powerful pose, she begins her speech to the world.

"ATTENTION MORTALS! I am your new ruler, your new Queen, your new...Empress, your new Goddess."

Alexa loved he new potential titles for herself, but Goddess seemed...just right.

" First off, there are no more governments, there is only me, Alexa Bliss, the ruler of the world. Second, not only am I your ruler, I am your new god. Every single being on the planet will worship me as their Supreme Goddess." You will build me a throne, you will build statues in my honor, you will build temples for my worship, and you will obey my will, for it is absolute and infallible. If you fail to, you will pay with your life.."

Goddess Alexa continued.

"And to think, I used to be called "Five Feet of Fury." Now I am FIVE MILES OF FURY!!!!"
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Alexa Bliss' Proclamation

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One Year Later...

Alexa Bliss had ruled the world for one year now. During this time, most of the world's governments had surrendered immediately. The Goddess quickly destroyed those who resisted her almighty will. In less than a week, all the nations of the world had given in to Big Miss Bliss. The final nation to surrender was the US, in which Alexa took great pleasure in sitting her humongous ass down on Washington D.C. destroying it completely.

Five Miles of Fury sat on her throne, thinking back to her conquests, reveling in her absolute power. As she looked around, she could see all the statues built to honor her, though none of them held a candle to her height. Each and every one of the thousands of statues of her accentuated her power, and especially her now world famous (and world destroying) ass. She looked down, and saw the temples her slaves had built in her honor. Again, Goddess Alexa Bliss was amused that they could not even compare to her size, beauty and perfection.

Humanity prayed to Alexa many times a day, hoping to keep her favor. Though of course she would do as she pleased. A couple of times her slaves had taken too long on a statue, or maybe they did not pray enough to their Goddess; but she would then destroy a few cities to teach the lowly mortals a lesson.

While all of the worship, adoration, and praise that was constantly heaped upon her pleased her, she couldn't help but feel something was...lacking. She knew what it was.

The Goddess began to grow again.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Goddess Alexa Bliss: One Year Later...

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:

choices: Carmella Grows to 100ft (She Can Grow More Later)
Carmella Starts Small (10-15ft) and Tortures Alexxa and Eva Marie
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Everyone in NXT loved the Princess of Staten Island. Her quirkiness and spunk got her over in the NXT Universe and her on and off-screen relationship with Bayley made her a fan-favorite with not only the girls, but with the guys as well (obviously; just look at her). When her music hit in Full Sail, the NXT crowd would always leap to their feet in anticipation of Carmella showing up and giving them a great show. Carmella loved the NXT Universe and the NXT Universe loved her.

Carmella had just came back from a match that she had with Alexxa Bliss and she was exhausted. "Wheeeeewwwww! That was a great match; I'm so glad that I get to do this every night." Alexxa Bliss then came backstage, furious with her loss to Carmella, who she thought was a much worse wrestler than her. "You got lucky Carmella! If I wouldn't have got distracted by some of your idiot fans, I would've EASILY won that match."

The Princess of Staten Island was distraught at the comments made by Alexxa Bliss. Just as she was about to give her a piece of her mind, she was blind-sided! Eva Marie came up from behind Carmella and she and Alexxa started beating down on Carmella in the backstage area. No one came to help Carmella and she was beaten to a pulp by these two strong women. Eva Marie and Alexxa Bliss would walk away laughing their asses off after seeing the work that they had done to Carmella and they loved seeing her bleeding on the crowd. Carmella was very, very upset. She couldn't believe that NO ONE would come help her against these two evil demonesses. Angry as ever, Carmella stomped back to her locker and found a note and a large bottle of a mysterious liquid.

On the note it said, "Carmella. The GODDESS of Staten Island. We have been watching you for a long time now. We see all of the hard work you put and we also see that you never get the credit you deserve. We goddesses often feel the same way when our subjects do not praise and worship us on a daily basis. Your looks, body, and overall attitude are the closest thing to a goddess that your puny human life forms can become. We feel, as the goddesses of the universe, that you deserve some of our immense power. With this formula that we have crafted with our divine powers, you too can become a goddess. Now, this formula may not give the actual powers of a true goddess, but it will make you GROW to unbelievable heights so that no man or woman can ever challenge your reign of terror. We expect you to take this power and show your dominance over every other puny human being who deserves it. Use this formula and protect it well, for we were not able to make sure that it only works on you. Any human who drinks this potion will grow, just like you. Don't allow this to happen and don't disappoint us Carmella, we will be watching, like always."

Carmella couldn't believe what she had just read. Moments before, she was just beaten to a bloody pulp by two evil, evil women and she could do nothing about it. She was over-powered by the other two and she couldn't do anything to protect herself. But now, she had all the power in the world. The Princess of Staten Island was always the sweet "Girl Next Door" type of girl. Initially, she couldn't imagine hurting anyone else. However, after being filled with rage after her beating from Eva Marie and Alexxa Bliss she felt a feeling of revenge that she had never felt before. The goddesses were right, she does deserve better. She is just about a goddess in human form and she should be worshiped as so. The lust and the drive for power couldn't be contained any longer. Carmella started to take a sip of the growth formula and the power began to flow through her... https://superluchas.com/wp-content/uploa...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Fab-u-lous Goddess

choices: Carmella finishes the army quickly and moves into the city for some fun!
Carmella takes her time with the military and shows them who's in control!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
*This story is now taking place with Carmella on SD, since she, Alexa, and Eva Marie are all on SD anyways*

Carmella was filled with ecstasy as she grew and grew. With every foot she gained, she gained immense amounts of strength and power, almost like gallons of steroids were poured into her veins. Carmella couldn't help but just stand there and let the growth consume her entire body as she felt herself expanding rapidly. It didn't take long for Carmella to break right through the ceiling. The rubble of the arena just running off her beautifully tan and powerful body. Sadly, Carmella's gear grew with her, but at least she didn't have to find something else to wear as a giantess. As Carmella was reaching 100ft, she felt her growth slow to a halt. Throughout this whole growing process, Carmella had her eyes closed and wanted to surprise herself whenever she was done. She had a pretty good idea of just how massive she was, due to the fact that she felt the arena crumbling around her. As Carmella finally stopped growing at 100ft, she opened her eyes and sported the evilest grin and let out a maniacal, power-induced laugh.

"Hahahahahahahahahahaha! I can't believe my eyes! I'm freaking huge! Carmella's voice boomed when she spoke, almost as loud and deep as someone speaking on a microphone with speakers on 1,000,000 volume. "There's actually no way this is happening right now! I'm the most powerful person in the world! I mean, just look at my muscles!"

Carmella stood there and marveled at her amazingly toned body and muscles, which appeared to get even bigger during the growing process.

"Ohhhh man, I can't wait to find those other women and show them who the most fabulous, strongest, biggest, baddest, and all-around most powerful women in not just WWE, but the entire world! Hahahahahahahahahahahna! No one is going to be able to touch me! Not any of these pathetic men looking up at me right now or not the pathetic U.S. Military that will for sure be coming to "stop me" from doing any damage!"

Carmella was right, surely no one was going to be to stop her now. No one could possibly be able to stop ANY woman that size, let along someone who is as strong, fit, and powerful as Carmella. She was truly going to a goddess of this world if she wanted to, and trust me, it seems like she definitely wants to get right into displaying her power over these mere mortals. However, on cue, the military seemed to respond very quickly to this crisis. Carmella couldn't help but evilly laugh and belittle the futile attempts of the military.

"Now, time for the FUN to begin! Oh wait, what's this? HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! You've got to be kidding me right!? The military has already showed up to "stop" me? Come on boys, just look at me! You think your puny bullets, grenades, tanks, and jets can do anything to me!? I mean, just look up and marvel at your new goddess! It'll be the last thing you see before I beat you all sooooooo easily."

The members of the military on the scene did take a second to look up at such a beautiful sight. Even at normal size, most of these men would be mesmerized by this beauty. Now she's 100ft tall, has an amazing body, huge muscles, and all the confidence in the world that she will be ruling it by the week's end. However, they had a job to do. Thus, they decided to open fire on this titanic woman, who couldn't help but simply giggle at their attempts.

"Ouch, ouch, ouch! That really... hahaha... hurts guys.... hahahahaha! Awwwww, who am I kidding, I didn't really even notice that you were shooting me! To be honest, I don't feel the bullets at all and the tank shots feel like someone tapping my legs and stomach. But, I'll let you guys waste all of your puny ammo."

The army's attacks started to slow down as, like Carmella expected, they ran out of ammo with almost no damage done to this goddess who now seemed to be yawning at their efforts. Their attacks finally did come to an end and Carmella felt the need to respond with a devilish smile and laugh.

"Are you boys done with your toy guns now? I'd start running if I was you guys, because now... it's MY turn! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

With that statement, Carmella looked down at the army as dominatingly as ever, and she moved in for her attack. https://cattieswomenswrestling.files.wor...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella Grows to 100ft (She Can Grow More Later)

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
In a heartbeat Carmella switched from her bubbly and kind personality with a smile on her face to a blood chilling glare that would make even the toughest of men tremble in their shoes. Staring down at the army of men who had just tried to kill her made Carmella red with anger. How dare they try and shoot her, she was 100 feet tall, she was beautiful and she was soon to be their ruler.

Now that the army was out of ammo or anything that would even have a chance of hurting Carmella was gone, they were literally sitting ducks at the gigantic feet of the beautiful Staten Island princess. Several moments passed, the silence was incredibly eerie, the army were frozen stiff and Carmella merely stared down at them with a look that could kill if it were any colder. Finally Carmella spoke. "So you little bugs thought you could hurt me? I am the princess if Staten Island and soon to be goddess of the entire world. You had a chance to be one of my loyal worshippers but no you blew that chance the moment you tried to hurt me, now say goodbye because it's time to exterminate a few bugs"

What was essentially their death sentence the army attempted to flee from the ginormous woman in front of them. However Carmella would not let this happen, with one swift movement she pointed to her feet. "Say goodbye boys my feet are gonna be the last thing you ever see" boomed the enormous woman. Next thing the men knew Carmella raised her foot and stomped down with an earth shattering crunch that killed many soilders. The moment her foot hit the ground a collosssal earthquake shook the ground of the soilders causing many to fall to their deaths in the cracks in the earth Carmella created.

Within minutes the enitre military was defeated, they were either red stains under Carmella's feet or fell to their deaths. With the army defeated Carmella asesnded onto the city before her and stood on top of a bridge and made her first decree as goddess of Staten Island and soon to the the world.

"Puny bugs, I am Carmella. I am now your goddess, the one I protect thing in your lives, the person you obey no matter what. I have destroyed your armies and I'm sure your political leaders would stand no chance either so now you have two choices, bow to me and acknowledge me as your goddess or you can join your military as a red stain on the sole of my shoe"

Immedietly the people of the city bowed down to their new goddess, not wanting to end up dead like ther military. The other women of WWE watched Carmella's decree on tv from the arena and shuddered st what she might do if she wanted to seek revenge on them.

Peering down with a smile on her face Carmella laughed, she had won. She was the goddess now, now one could challenge her and with that she lay down on the bridge to marvel in her success.
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.28...

It was then that Carmella reached into her pocket and pulled out the growth potion. She didn't know whether to stay at this height and go and torment the divas or take another drink and grow even bigger.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella had just finished up laying waste to the army at only 100ft tall and had proclaimed herself as being the Goddess of Staten Island. However, she thought that perhaps she should get even bigger! The fact that the army even thought that they could defeat her pissed her off and she wanted to become even more intimidating and fearful. Carmella opened her beautiful lips and was just about to drink the growth potion and get even bigger and stronger, until a devious thought came into her head. Suddenly, she started to think about the other women in WWE and how they were such bitches towards her. She wanted to get revenge on them... and sure, she could do it at an even bigger size and scare the shit out of the others even more. However, she wanted to at least be able to tell who she was fucking with and wanted to be able to see the terrified looks on their faces. Thus, Carmella's mind was made up. She put the potion back into her pocket and put her hands dominantly back on her hips and felt the need to belittle the tiny people at her feet. (https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.28...)

"Hahahaha! All right little ones... I think you've done enough worshipping for now. I'm gonna go find the other WWE women and show them the power of their new goddess. I could've shown all of you by growing even bigger and stronger, but you'll just have to wait for that show to happen! Until then, see ya!"

Carmella skipped off to the arena where the other women were located. Carmella made sure to stomp, crush, and destroy anything that was in her path at the same time. It didn't take Carmella long to get where she needed to be. After all, she is 100ft tall! Carmella arrived at the arena and the other women knew they were in trouble because they could feel the ground shaking and hear Carmella humming and playfully singing as she got closer and closer to the arena. The rumbling of the ground got more and more intense as she close. Before even showing herself to the other women, they already knew that she had arrived and that they were probably done for. The rumbling stopped and the other women could hear a muffled voice from outside the arena...

"Well, well, well! Looks like I made to the arena pretty fast! I guess I didn't realize how fast I'd be at this new size! Looking back at all of the skipping and jumping I did back there, I sure caused a lot of damage. However, that'll be nothing compared to what I do to these puny women. So, let's see here... do I just stomp a hole in this thing, or just use my new-found mega strength to just sloooooowly tear the roof off? I think I'd make more of a statement showing off my power by slowly ripping the roof off! So..... let's see some little divas! Hahahahahaha!"

Carmella slowly tore the roof off of the arena and playfully sang as she did. She acted like she was struggling with this task, but she knew just how powerful she was. She could rip this roof off in an instant, but she wanted the reveal to be slow and fear-inducing. As she was tearing off the roof, the other WWE women started to see Carmella's huge face and body. Her face, arms, and boobs were all they could see for the moment, but they all looked absolutely massive. Carmella continued to playfully tear off the roof before tearing off the last bit forcefully and quickly. Carmella was filled with joy too see all of her "favorite" women all in one place and all so much smaller and weaker than her. Carmella knew that it was playtime.

"Heeeerrrreeeee's 'Mella! Hahahahaha! Did you guys like that little show? I just wanted to show you guys just how strong I am at this new size! I'd say I'm doing pretty well or myself! Also, did you guys get to see what I did to that puny army? Pretty cool, huh? Anyways, I thought I'd drop by and see how everyone was doing. So, how you doin'? Hahahahahaha! Get it!? God, I crack myself up! Awwwww, don't look so scared guys... I'll be sure to make it all end quick! You see, I'm probably just gonna kill all of you pretty quickly and then move on and get back to conquering the world and making it mine! Sound good guys? The only issue is... I don't know who to start with first! Awwww, who am I kidding? I'm picking you first, Nikki Bella!"

Carmella shot her hand into the opened arena lightning fast and snatched Nikki Bella up with ease. Nikki was terrified at the brute strength of Carmella at her new size. Nikki was used to have a strength advantage over the other women, especially on SmackDown. However, Carmella picked Nikki up like she was a little action figure. Carmella brought Nikki up close to her face and allowed her to see the huge size disadvantage she had now over Carmella. Carmella was in complete control now and she was loving it.

"Ohhhh Nikki... you were such a bitch to me! I was just trying to make a name for myself, but you had to come back and make me look like a fool and look weak. Well... *Carmella starts to squeeze Nikki tightly in her fist* who's weak now, huh? Who's the strong and powerful one now!? You know Nikki, it's a shame you are such a bitch, but you actually so freaking hot. It's a shame our relationship has to end this way, but... I guess I'll be seeing ya! I won't be needing you anymore, especially since I've proven that I'm gonna rule this world!"

Carmella gave a big, fat kiss, which engulfed Nikki entire body. After giving Nikki this kiss, Carmella dropped Nikki from her crouched height, which was still about 50ft off of the ground. Then, Carmella rose powerfully to her full height and stomped down hard and fast onto Nikki's limp body, exploding it into a million pieces. She didn't want to make this slow, she wanted to show her dominance and her ability to end lives in an instant. Even after stepping on her the first time, Carmella still stomped on the remains of Nikki Bella, feeling even better with each stomp. Carmella had just squashed her greatest rival and now she was ready for some more bloodshed.

"Wooooo! Man, that felt great! Hahahahaha! Just like that... Nikki Bella is gone! Hahaha! So.... who's gonna be next guys!? I'm feeling a boob or butt crush may be next! Hahahahaha! Actually, perhaps one of you could be useful to me. It does get lonely ruling the world by myself... so, maybe I could give some of this potion to one of you guys! Or, I could just finish the job I started and squash the rest of you puny punks! Hmmmm... decisions, decisions..."

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella stared down at the terrified WWE divas below. Mere moments ago she had taken Nikki Bella and stomped her out of existence. The other women didn't know what to do, if they ran they'd be caught, if they stayed they risked ending up like Nikki Bella, a stain under Carmella's shoe. They were truly in a lose/lose situation. The entire women's roster from every divison, Smackdown, raw and NXT alike as there was a cross branded PPV and an NXT special on the same weekend. There was nothing the women could do. Each woman had a different reaction, Charlotte the normally cocly and confident women's champion was cowering behind Summer Rae who was frozen in fear. Alicia fox was in tears as Becky lynch put her arm around her in comfort despite the fact she herself was terrified. Billie Kay and Peyton Royce were just crouched in the corner holding onto each other for dear life. The rest of the women just stood where they were, as if time literally was standing still.

After much deliberation Carmella decided that it was no fun being a goddess if she had no one to be a goddess with. She had come to the conclusion that she would select a lucky diva from below that would join her as her fellow goddess. "Well little ones it's someone's lucky day! I your Fab-U-Lus goddess has decided to that it's a little but Lonley up her, hahaha get it? Little? I'm on fire today! So one of you lucky tinies will get a taste of this growth potion and join me in ruling this puny world".

Hearing that one of them would be guaranteed to be spared the women's locker room perked up, everyone who was crying stopped, anyone who was cowering perked up, those that were hiding stood up. Friendships, partnerships and alliances meant nothing, survival was all that mattered. After several minutes of suspense which included Carmella humming and tapping her chin as if she was solving an impossible puzzle broke the silence and started the divas by suddenly clapping her massive hands together. "Ok little ones time to make a decision, lets see who we have, Hmmm Charlotte and Alicia I was always jealous of your height so it's nice seeing you so tiny. Hmmm Alexa I never liked you or those NXT rejects Billie and Peyton. Hmmmm Becky, you were always nice to me so your definitely a candidate,....hmmmmm OH!"

Carmella startled everyone agian by clapping when hands. What scared them more was that Carmella was smiling and looking at one of them. "Oh my god I didn't even see you there! Well that's made my decision a lot easier, well little ones I've made a decision. My fellow goddess will be......my best friend Bayley!!!!!" With this statement the rest of the divas spun round and faced Bayley who was frozen in place, she didn't know what to think as her thoughts were interrupted by the screams of the other woman as a monstrous manicured hand of Carmella reached down into the arena and picked her up.

"Hey bestie! Don't worry I'm not gonna hurt you, I'd never hurt my best friend! Anyways her take this growth potion, but just a swig a swig is enough to make you my height, or at least close to it hihihi" taking out a bottle which had actually grown with Carmella to which she had pant relasied. "Oooopsie hold on besty just open your mouth and I'll do the rest" Bayley who tried shouting up to Carmella almost in protest was silenced by a green liquid being poured into her mouth. Without warning Carmella lowered her to the ground and took a step back to admire her handywork. At first Bayley didn't feel anything but then it happened. An overwhelming feeling of pleasure over took her as her body started to stretch upwards in growth, the feeling so immense that she let out several moans in pleasure. Eventually she stopped growing at the convinient height of 100ft, the same as Carmella.

Walking over Carmella put her arm around her best friend. "So how does it feel to be a goddess besty? Or should I say Vice-goddess, I'm still in charge haha" Bayley turned to her friend and said....
