choices: Bayley and Carmella fight over the growth potion...
Bayley finally gives in to the evil and joins Carmella...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella looked towards her friend with lust and power, hoping that Bayley would be ready and willing to take over the world by her side. Carmella asked Bayley what it felt like to be a goddess now and how it felt to be bigger and better than those at her feet. However, Bayley responded to Carmella in the complete opposite way than what Carmella had hoped. Bayley seemed totally unwilling to join Carmella in her conquest to rule the world.

"Are you kidding me 'Mella!? This is horrible! Do you have any idea what you're doing or what you're talking about!? You do realize that you killed thousands of people, including most of the U.S. army! What the hell is wrong with you!? Have you lost your mind? This is not the Carmella I know and love! You've gone crazy!"

Carmella was absolutely shocked. Not only was Bayley turning down her request to take over the world, she was telling her that she was crazy and that she'd lost her mind. Carmella was filled with many different emotions at this point. Was Bayley right? Has this new size turned Carmella into a monster? Has her new-found power gone to her head and made her become someone that she'd never become? Carmella didn't know what to say to Bayley. Carmella's mind was all over the place. Carmella looked into the eyes of her now giant best friend and was at a loss for words. Carmella considered finding some way to shrink back down to normal size and apologize for what she had done and facing the punishments that would be incoming.

Carmella took a step towards Bayley to give her a hug... when she stepped on another small group of people. Carmella felt the crunch of body parts underneath her weight and knew what she had just done. Carmella had just got done feeling horrible for the crimes she had committed in her gigantic rage, when she felt that familiar surge of power again. Carmella was coming back into the realization that she was bigger, stronger, and more powerful than the bugs at her feet. Carmella looked at the ground, then at Bayley, then at her perfect, gigantic body, then back at Bayley with an evil smile. All of the regret and guilt that Carmella felt all went away in that moment. Carmella remembered that she was in control of this little world. Who cares what Bayley or anyone else thinks of her? She wanted to share her power and dominance of this world with her supposed best friend, but it seems to Carmella that she just has one giantess adversary to deal with.

"You know what Bayley... you're right. This is not the 'Mella you know and love. You know why? That Carmella is dead and gone! That version of myself was weak and powerless and let people boss her around! But, this Carmella... this Carmella is strong and powerful. This Carmella is destined to rule the world! Hahahaha! I was given this growth potion *Carmella pulls out the growth potion that made her and Bayley into sexy goddesses* because I was deemed worthy of being the ruler of the world. I was seen as someone who could make this world bend at my pleasure. Sure, I wanted to share this power with you, my best friend... but, it's clear that you're too stupid to realize your full potential! You could be ruling the world alongside me and we could be the sexiest goddesses this world has ever and will ever see! The world could be your little plaything, just like it will be mine! You could use that absolutely enormous ass of yours to destroy entire cities in one go! I could use my powerful legs and my fiery attitude to stomp and crush little ones until the end of time! So, you know what? I think I may just need to beat some sense into you... then I'll give you one more chance to join me! Hahahaha!"

Carmella leaped towards and tackled her huge best friend, crushing multiple smaller buildings and probably killing about a hundred people. Carmella and Bayley rolled around for a few moments, killing several others in the process. Carmella then got on top of Bayley and started laying in some punches on Bayley's face. Bayley did her best to defend herself and block some punches from the powerful Carmella. Bayley never remembered Carmella being able to hit this hard before. Perhaps the growth potion did more than just made Carmella bigger. Bayley eventually fought out of the position that Carmella had her in and got back to her feet. Bayley, whose face was already showing the effects of the early punches from Carmella, looked around and noticed the damage that had already been done from their brawl. Carmella saw Bayley's concern on her face and started to evilly laugh once again.

"Hahaha! You see Bayley! No matter how hard you try, your new size makes you very destructive! Hahaha! Don't worry... you get used to all of the destruction and the killings after a while! It's ok Bayley... I know you want to give in to the powerful urges. Let the hate that the growth potion instills in you flow through your veins and give you strength and power, like myself! I'm open to the hate and the potion is making me stronger by the second because of it! Even if you wanted to defeat me... you couldn't! This growth potion has made me far too powerful at this point! Sure, I may have weakened myself when I was thinking about giving in to the light side again, but I'll have that lost power back in no time! I mean, how do you think I managed to defeat a huge portion of the army in minutes and with such little effort? My power is growing with every passing second and I can feel it strengthening me! Hahahaha! Give it up Bayley... join me... and we can rule this world for years to come! Hahahaha!"

To Carmella's glee, Bayley seemed to believe everything that Carmella was saying. Carmella did seem much stronger than before. If they were both 100ft tall, then Carmella's punches and kicks should pack the same punch as they would when they were both normal-sized. However, Carmella seemed to have the advantage in every way in the early going. Bayley wondered if she should give into the hate and allow herself to be consumed by the true power of the growth potion. What would happen if Bayley were to become evil as well? The world could barely handle one giantess, how would it manage having two that could get even stronger whenever they want? Bayley always viewed herself as a hero, not a villain. When she looked across at Carmella, she saw a super villain, not the same lovable Carmella that was the other half of Baymella. Bayley re-focused her thoughts towards defeating Carmella. However, Bayley was still super worried about stepping on and destroying anything else. Carmella, once again, took advantage of this hesitation from Bayley and gave her a huge super kick, which sent Bayley flying backwards and hitting the ground hard. Bayley felt her back and huge ass killing multiple other people, which made Bayley cringe even more. Carmella stood over Bayley's downed body and spoke to her once again. (https://www.instagram.com/p/BDb81aLuB7E/...)

"Hahahaha! You're weak Bayley... weaker than what you can be. Can't you see? This growth potion has made me into an unstoppable goddess. With every second that you fail to stop me, I get stronger and stronger. You just laying down there isn't gonna help you or anyone else at all! I told you already Bayley, if you join me... I can help you unlock your true potential in this world! You are meant to be ruling... not being ruled! Just imagine the damage your ass alone could do to this fragile little world! Just think... you and me... Baymella ruling the world! What could be more fun? Hahahaha!"

Bayley was trumped once again. Bayley looked up at Carmella and just watched her radiate power. Carmella knew and Bayley knew that Carmella was much stronger than before. Carmella just looked so dominant standing over her and Bayley felt like finally giving up. What could she do to stop Carmella at this point? Bayley was too afraid to do anything because she may step on someone or destroy something. Not only that, but Carmella was getting stronger and more powerful by the second. Even if Bayley decides to let the casualties that come from fighting Carmella be justified in her mind, could she even defeat Carmella anyway? Carmella has probably become too strong by this point for Bayley to defeat her in this state. If Bayley wanted to stop Carmella and not join up with her, she was going to need some more of that growth potion. Although it would go against everything Bayley believed in because it would give her a huge advantage over her former friend, she knew it had to be done.

Bayley waited for Carmella to be distracted enough for her to grab the growth potion. Bayley was going to use Carmella's over-confidence against her. Bayley waited for the perfect moment... where she quickly sprung up from her downed state and was able to wrestle the growth potion out from the pocket of Carmella. Carmella was stunned and couldn't believe that she allowed Bayley to gain control of the almighty growth potion. Carmella knew that she had to act fast because if Bayley drank some more of that potion, that could be the end for her and her conquest to rule the world.

"BAYLEY! Listen! You don't have to do this! You realize what will happen when you drink more of that growth potion right!? You will no longer be the innocent, noble Bayley! You do realize that you will be the one who is in control and striking fear into these insects beneath us! Look around you! Look at all of the destruction that YOU'VE caused! All of those deaths and the destruction of those buildings... that's all your fault! Can't you see, you are an evil person Bayley! You deserve to be ruling alongside me! You know you want to be worshipped by these mortals! However... I need you to put that growth potion down. You drinking that will do neither of us any good!"

Carmella was hoping that she could either get the potion back and regain control of the situation or get Bayley to finally join her... what happens next?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Trouble in Paradise?

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Bayley was finally in the driver's seat in this fight with Carmella. Bayley was in possession of the one thing that could turn the tide in this colossal conflict, the growth potion that was responsible for her and Carmella being in this huge predicament in the first place. Even though it would give Bayley an unfair advantage, she was willing to do whatever it takes to defeat her best friend Carmella and bring peace back to the world. Bayley knew what had to be done. She already worried about her huge size, but she knew that she needed to get even bigger to stop Carmella from taking over the world. Knowing this, Bayley went to take another drink from the growth potion. It was at this time that Carmella knew that she had to ask fast. Carmella couldn't risk Bayley getting any bigger, knowing that it would probably result in the end of her reign of terror.

Bayley started to open the vial that contained the growth potion and leaned her head back, hoping to quickly drink even the smallest amount to give herself the edge she needed to beat Carmella. When Bayley leaned her head backwards, Carmella once again leaped and tackled Bayley to the ground, nearby the arena containing the other WWE women. When Carmella tackled Bayley, since she had slightly opened the growth potion vial, she actually spilled some of it into the open ceiling of the arena, right on top of the other WWE women (remember this for later!).

Bayley was once again taken down by Carmella, who used her strength advantage to regain control of Bayley. However, Bayley was more ready this time and threw Carmella off much more quickly and alertly this time. Bayley, who was now ready to fight back this time, tucked the growth potion vial away for the moment. Bayley realized that she wasn't going to be given the time to drink the potion right in front of Carmella. She needed to somehow create some separation from her, which would give her time to drink the growth potion and then grow bigger and put an end to Carmella. Bayley squared up to Carmella, who still had the strength advantage over Bayley, as described in the last chapter. Bayley knew that Carmella's strength was growing by the second, so she was acting very cautiously in her attack. If Carmella was able to get the growth potion back, who knows what she'd be able to do with it. Bayley planned on attacking Carmella by luring her in and then quickly striking and stunning her over and over again.

"Come on Carmella! You know you want this growth potion back right? Well, come and get it!"

Bayley taunted Carmella by waving the growth potion around in front of her face. This taunting enraged Carmella, which caused her to charge in. Bayley dodged Carmella's attempt at another tackle and then kicked her right in the ass as she went by.

"Awwww, come on bestie! You can do much better than that right!? I thought you were meant to be super strong and powerful! I didn't realize this growth potion made stupid as well! Haha!"

Carmella was not nearly as amused as Bayley was by her remarks. Bayley has to be careful by making Carmella even more angry. The added strength and power that Carmella has is being driven by the evil and hatred inside of her. If Carmella gets too upset, that could spell the end for Bayley and the world as we know it. However, Bayley was still coaxing Carmella into attacking her by taunting her. Bayley was actually having fun at this point, while Carmella was being filled with rage and anger. Bayley continued to taunt Carmella and flaunt the growth potion in front of Carmella's face.

Eventually, Carmella was so enraged by Bayley's taunting that she felt the need to channel her anger into her power supply. Carmella wanted so badly to get that growth potion back to grow bigger and stronger, so that she could show the world that no one should fuck with her. Carmella closed her eyes and concentrated all of her anger into the core of her evil being. Carmella opened her eyes and her irises were beat red. The evil had completely overtaken Carmella. Not only did Carmella look different, she felt different too... she felt more powerful than just seconds before. It felt like her strength multiplied ten-fold and she went from being angry and breathing heavily to laughing at Bayley. It was the first time since Carmella was standing over Bayley that she was laughing. Bayley's heart sank into her stomach. Did she over-do it with the taunting? Did she get too caught up in the fun of out-smarting Carmella? Bayley was supposed to be trying to get some space from Carmella so she could drink the growth potion and stop her. However, it seems that she has made the situation even worse. (https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...)

"Hahahaha! Ohhhhhh.... Bayley... how stupid could you possibly be? You've wasted my time long enough. I think it's about time we ended this little game of ours and I get back what's rightfully mine! I hope you enjoyed your fun Bayley. Because of all your time wasting and taunting, you've made me even MORE powerful! When will you learn that evil always wins! Hahahaha!"

Bayley couldn't believe what she was hearing. Did she really mess up this badly and make Carmella even stronger than before? Was Bayley responsible for Carmella unlocking some untapped rage inside of her... which is fueling the growth potion flowing through her veins even more?

Bayley and Carmella were staring each other down, looking as if they were going to finally settle this... when they heard something that troubled Bayley, Carmella, and the rest of the world in general. They heard the sounds of someone else growing! The moans of pleasure and the stretching of body parts in the giantess form. No one knew what was going on... all they could hear was someone clearly enjoying the process.

"OHHHHHH FUCK YEAH! Woooooooo! This feels fucking amazing you guys! Hahahahahahaha! Now this... THIS IS POWER! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Bayley and Carmella turned around to see the terrifyingly huge and growing body of...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bayley vs Carmella vs Another Giantess...?

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Do Bayley and Carmella turn around to find a raven-haired goddess before them? Is Paige the newest giantess on the block?

(The next couple chapters are going to be low effort because I'll just be adding options...)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bayley vs Carmella vs Paige

choices: Giantess Tag Team Turmoil? Count me in...!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Do Bayley and Carmella find TWO growing goddesses behind them? Is the Iconic Duo, Billie Kay and Peyton Royce becoming powerful giantesses?

(http://68.media.tumblr.com/187de094928c7...)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bayley vs Carmella vs The Iconic Duo?

choices: The duo grabs the growth formula!
Carmella tries to take down the Iconic Duo.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella was ready to use her new powers to teach Bayley a lesson but was quickly stopped by loud moans coming from the building below their feet. She listened closely as the moans grew louder and louder. They growing figure sounded like they had an accent.

"Ohhhhh maaaaaaan. This feels great!"

"I feel sooooooooo gooooooood!"

Wait, was that two different voices?

Bayley had also stopped in her tracks and began to become very concerned to see the rising figures of the Iconic Duo, Peyton Royce and Billie Kay.

What Bayley hadn't realized was that when Carmella tackled her a small amount of the growth potion fell into the open hole in the locker room and splashed on the hiding Aussies. The two were very concerned when their bodies started to become very hot, but evil grins formed on their faces as they began to rise. The two had been trying to take over the NXT Women's Division, but at their new size they could take over the world!

"Ohhhh, thank you sooooo much, Bayley!", Peyton mocked.

"Soooo much!", Billie repeated, "at this size we'll show the world who the real iconic duo is!"

"Shit! Two more bitches I have to take down", Carmella thought. She was still confident that her power would be enough to take them all down. Then SHE would take over.

Billie and Peyton soon reached the size of Carmella and Bayley and prepared to attack when they realized something that excited them... they were still growing! The two belted out in laughter as Carmella and Bayley started looking much smaller to them. Their expanding bodies dominated the surrounding skyline. They finally stopped, a whole five feet taller than the now much small looking giantesses below them.

Bayley had fear in her eyes and Carmella stepped back a bit to think about her next move.

"Awww, look at the little girls, Peyton! Not feeling so powerful now are you?", Billie said looking down at Carmella and Bayley.

"What's wrong Bayley? Feeling a little down?", Peyton said with a laugh, "Now we're going to show you little girls what real women are capable of!"
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Iconic Growth

choices: Bayley is able to get bigger!
Peyton gets the formula and she gets bigger!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
When Billie Kay and Peyton Royce's growth finally stopped, they were a bit larger than the former lone giantesses, Bayley and Carmella. The Iconic Duo didn't tower over the other two gigantic WWE women, but Bayley and Carmella came up to about boob level, maybe even a bit smaller than that. Billie and Peyton were loving the fact that they were in complete control of this situation. Not too long ago, they were terrified of the gigantic Carmella and then the gigantic Bayley. I don't think they foresaw themselves getting a piece of the immense power that Carmella was feeling when she towered over and dominated the army about an hour earlier. Billie and Peyton looked into each others' eyes with complete lust and power... they knew that they were gonna rule this world, right after taking care of the smaller giantesses at chest level. (https://68.media.tumblr.com/2009a11822d7...)

"Oooooooo man Peyton! That growth felt grrreat! Wouldn't you say my love? Hahaha!"

"Ohhhh definitely Billie! I could just feel my legs expanding and my arms widening and gaining strength! Strength that I'm sure we plan to use on our new toys Bayley and Carmella! Hahahahaha!"

"You took the words right out of my mouth Peyton! Let's have some fun... hahahahaha!" (http://pa1.narvii.com/6358/779ea9d6d53c9...)

Billie went over to handle Carmella, taking a little bit longer strides than what Carmella was capable of. Billie Kay already had super long legs, but the growth potion obviously made them much, much longer. Billie looked down upon the tad smaller Carmella with just starting to laugh. "Don't worry Carmella... I'll be sure to make this quick, but not so painless! Hahahahaha!"Carmella was absolutely furious that this happened. Carmella was getting ready to tear Bayley into pieces due to her new strength. Now she has to deal with two inflated aussies, presumably all by herself because Bayley probably wasn't going to do anything. Carmella's eyes were still blood red as she felt the power of having the growth potion in her system the longest burning inside of her. Carmella wasn't afraid of The Iconic Duo, but she definitely was annoyed by the fact that she has to kill 3 giantess women now and not just one. Carmella was ready to take on the tad bigger but probably not stronger Billie Kay.

Peyton Royce made her way over to Bayley, walking with immense confidence about her. Peyton knew that she got the easier giantess of the two, given the fact that Bayley seems to be completely averse to wanting to fight anyone at her new size. "Awwww, what's the matter Bayley? Don't you like your new size? Don't you like MY new size!? Hahahahaha! It'll all be done soon Bayley. Billie and I are gonna wipe the floor with you and that giant Staten Island slut and then we'll show everyone what real women are capable of! Although, do me a favor what don't ya? Try to fight back a little, it makes me feel even more powerful when I beat someone who's trying to beat me... hahahahaha!"Peyton was on top of the world. The power that came from the growth potion was now pulsating through her veins at this point. She had never felt something like this before. Peyton always saw herself as a dominatrix, but now she had the true size and power to prove it.

Out of nowhere, the fight raged on. Carmella and Billie Kay started to brawl on one end of town, while Peyton took advantage of Bayley's inaction and hit her with a brutal head kick. Due to underestimating Billie's strength, Carmella was on the losing end early on. Billie and Carmella got into a test of strength battle. Carmella thought for sure that she'd be able to throw Billie across town with no effort at all. However, Billie welcomed this test and began smirking and laughing when she started to pin Carmella down to the ground. Billie was in full control of Carmella, getting into a full mount position on Carmella. Billie was going to start dishing out huge punches on Carmella, when she was able to use her enhanced strength to throw Billie off of her. Billie was impressed that the smaller woman had so much power about her.

Meanwhile, Peyton was starting to stomp and kick the downed Bayley, who was feeling the effects of Peyton's head kick. Peyton sauntered around her new toy and was having fun playing with Bayley. "Come on Bayley... don't you want to help all these little insects? Fight me so that I can embarrass you one last time! Hahaha!"Peyton was right... what happens if Bayley lets Billie and Peyton win? Will what become of the world if they are successful? Bayley had the outlet to save the world from titantic goddesses destroying them. Bayley shouldn't keep dwelling over her new size and see it as a negative. She is huge now and nothing can change that. Bayley needs to use her new size to stand up for the little people who can't do it themselves anymore. With all of this coming to mind, Bayley exploded up off the ground and hit a thunderous dropkick on Peyton. Peyton hit the ground with a huge THUD that even made Carmella and Billie look over. Carmella was amazed to see what Bayley had just done. Bayley finally decided to fight back for a change. Seeing what her friend was capable of... a huge, teethy smile grew upon Carmella's face.

Carmella used this new motivation and confidence to gain the upper hand over Billie. Carmella kicked Billie in the gut and then followed up with a vicious knee to the face of the gigantic aussie. This huge knee strike angered Billie, which we know tends to help the person who is angry gain more power from the growth potion. Billie felt somewhat of a "power boost" and looked at her arms body with a confused look. Billie felt even more powerful than before somehow. Billie evilly smirked and charged in and speared Carmella to the ground very hard. Billie then quickly stood up and viciously stomped on Carmella's body, feeling very empowered.

As for Peyton and Bayley, their fight was just getting started. Peyton got up, stunned by Bayley's willingness to fight back, and looked down upon Bayley. "How dare you... you little twerp! I was just having fun with you before, now I think it's time I really start trying..."Peyton, like her aussie companion, started to get angry with Bayley. Like her aussie companion, Peyton felt power starting to surge through her body even more than before. Peyton was caught off-guard by this increased feeling of strength and looked down on Bayley with a wicked smile. "Now... where was I? Hahaha!"Within a second of Peyton saying this, she kicked the smaller Bayley in the stomach and crushed her with a hard elbow strike, sending Bayley to the ground hard. Peyton saw how hard Bayley hit the ground and, like Billie, inspected her body with interest. Billie and Peyton may have also found out the secret of the growth potion, like Carmella did.

Carmella was starting to realize that the evil inside of Billie and Peyton may be too much for her to handle on her own. To Carmella's dismay, perhaps Billie and Peyton were able to unlock the secret of the growth potion and are getting more and more powerful by the second. Carmella wasn't afraid of Billie and Peyton's size advantage before because she thought they'd be too stupid to figure out the true power of the growth formula. She was going to have to pull something crazy to beat the Iconic Duo. Then, she remembered that Bayley was in possession of the growth potion. Although it'd make beating Bayley harder in the long run, to make it there, she was going to have to suggest something to Bayley that she and Bayley probably wouldn't like...

"BAYLEY!!! You have to drink the growth potion! It's our only hope of beating these two giant aussie freaks! Do it! NOW!!!"

Bayley heard the cries of Carmella and was shocked. Was Carmella really suggesting that Bayley get even bigger? Carmella had just told her before that she shouldn't get bigger. Bayley also knew that this meant that Carmella would have a harder time beating her later on... so why would she ask for Bayley to get bigger and stronger? However, at the end of the day, Bayley was thinking that Carmella was looking out for her friend. Bayley knew that she was at a disadvantage to all 3 of the other giantesses. Therefore, if she really wanted to save the world she had to get bigger.

Peyton, who heard Carmella's proposal to Bayley, couldn't allow this to happen. So, when she saw Bayley get some separation and start to open the growth potion, she knew she had to stop her for her and Billie's sake. An even bigger and stronger Bayley would be the end for the Iconic Duo's attempt at ruling the world.

*Hey guys... sorry for not updating this lately. My college schedule has been packed these past couple months. I was hoping that some other people would be adding in my absence to keep this story going because it was being added to almost daily before. Anyways, this may be my last chapter until at least the end of April. However, I wanted to get something out since today is Wrestlemania! For those reading this, please add to this story! I'd love for this story to get active again! Anyways, have a good one!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Baymella vs The Iconic Duo

choices: Bayley reluctantly takes down both of them
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Bayley knowing that there was no other choice decided to listen to her friend, she was right there was no way they could stop the iconic duo when they had such a size advantage over them. Taking the growth potion from her pocket Bayley knew what she had to do, however before she had a chance to take even a sip of the potion that would make her even bigger she heard some loud booming footsteps approaching from the left. Peyton Royce was charging in. "I'm not gonna let you drink that potion Bayley!!! I'm the one who's gonna be growing!!!!!" Running as fast as she could Peyton tied to tackle Bayley but she had once again underestimated her smaller opponent using her superior speed Bayley ducked the charging Peyton and using her own momentum against her executed the BIGGEST belly to Bayley suplex in the history of the world. Peyton's huge body came crashing down onto the streets of the city causing several buildings to collapse under the pressure of her body. http://www.dailywrestlingnews.com/wp-con...

Bayley looked down at her enemy with a look of regret on her face, she was worried that many innocent people had met their end at the hands, or body of the evil aussies. Knowing she was the only one who could protect the innocent smaller people Bayley too the growth potion, unscrewing the lid Bayley took one last look at th city she already towered over, knowing that in a few minutes it would seem even smaller to her. " Sorry guys this is the only way I can protect you all, I can't let these two continue their reign of terror and I'm not sure I can completely trust Mella to be nice to you all either, this is the only way I can ensure your safety, so everyone get as far away as you can, things are gonna get a little bumpy" Finishing up yer address to the people in the city Bayley put the potion to her lips and finally drank some of it, making sure to only drink a little so not grow to big. Several seconds passed and nothing had happened, Bayley was worried it hadn't worked and that she would have to try and deal with the other giantesses at this size, however just as she was giving up hope she felt it, deep from the pit of her stomach she felt the unforgettable feeling of growth over taking her body.

Meanwhile on the other side of the city Billie Kay was continuing her assault on the smaller Carmella, despite Carmella being 500ft and Kay along with Peyton being 600ft the size and strength advantage was enough for Billie Kay to take control, using her extremely long legs she stomped on the downed Carmella trying to take her out permanently so that she and Peyton could play with the helpless weaker Bayley for a while. "Come on Carmella just face it, you can't beat me, I'm bigger, stronger and sexier than you could ever be, so I think it's time to say goodbye bitch hihihi" The austrialian bombshell was about to stomp a finishing blow onto Carmella when she was suddenly interrupted. "EXCUSE ME WOULD YOU MIND STEPPING AWAY FROM MY FRIEND?" A booming voice startled Billie who spun around and punched the first thing she saw but when she connected she felt searing pain course through her hand, clutching her hand in pain Billie saw what had hurt her so much, she had punched a knee. Sweet started to pour down billies face as she looked up, and up higher and higher til she saw the face of Bayley looking disappointedly down at her. http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/wwe_16_9_s/p...

"YOU SEE WHAT YOU DID BILLIE? YOU AND THAT OTHER IDIOT. YOU MADE ME DO THIS. YOU MADE ME BECOME THIS. YOU MADE ME EVEN MORE OF A FREAK THAN I ALREADY WAS. BUT IF IT MEANS SAVING ALL THESE POOR INNOCENT PEOPLE ILL STAY THIS SIZE. CAUSE IM NOT EVIL LIKE YOU GUYS" Bayley almost with tears in her eyes bellowed down. This was killing her being so different from everyone else now, but being the genuinely good and unselfish person she was she grew even bigger than everyone else to become a protector to those who couldn't save themselves from these giantesses.

Billie stared in awe at the titanic woman in front of her, if she was 600ft and only came up to just above Bayleys knee then that would make Bayley 1500ft tall, 3 times the size of Carmella. How the hell could she beat someone this big? There was no way woithout growing bigger herself. But Bayley had the growth potion in her hand and there was no way Billie could wrestle it for her grip. That's when she noticed someone behind Bayley. Peyton Royce had recovered from her fall and was slowly and quietly sneaking up behind Bayley, Billie silently looked at the potion and then to Peyton who nodded and smiled at her partner. Closer and closer she got whilst Billie kept Bayleys attention on her until Peyton jabbed Bayley in the leg with a broken building, Bayley yelled in pain as the growth potion slipped from her hand and landed on the ground in front of Billie Kay. That's when....
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bigger Bayley!?

choices: Peyton and Billie finish off Baymella for good...
Baymella somehow begins to fight back into this...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Baymella were in a tough spot in their titanic struggle against the Iconic Duo. Although Bayley and Carmella aren't on the best of terms right now, they know that they must work together to defeat them. In Bayley's mind, her and Carmella must work together to ensure that Billie and Peyton don't take over the world. In Carmella's mind, she wants to use Bayley's size, that she granted her, to help her take down the only threat left to Carmella's own potential reign over the world. Nonetheless, the Iconic Duo used their size advantage to gain the upper hand. Not only are they larger than Baymella, but Billie and Peyton seem to have tapped into the excess bit of power that the growth potion gives you, just like Carmella had against Bayley. Now knowing that rage and anger fuels the potion and makes them stronger, the Iconic Duo planned on using those emotions to dominate the world with ease.

In an attempt to get out of this tough spot, Carmella thought of a plan on her feet. In the long run, it would mean that she would have a much harder time in taking the world over herself. However, without this plan, she may not even make it to that point. Therefore, Carmella demanded that Bayley drink more of the growth potion that she had retrieved from her and get bigger and stronger than their two Aussie foes. Carmella was still confident in her ability to manipulate Bayley and thus either rule the world with her or at least get her to let Carmella herself get bigger. However, things have gone from bad to worse for Baymella and one half of the Iconic Duo was going to gain a little bit of a helping hand from Bayley.

"Bayley you've got to drink the growth potion now! If you don't grow, the fate of the world is in the evil hands of these two Aussie bitches! We have to stop them from destroying everything!"

Carmella, who wanted the same thing that the Iconic Duo wanted, did her best to convince Bayley that growing bigger was a necessity. However, Billie and Peyton heard Carmella's plea and had to act fast.

"Peyton! You have to stop her! Get over there and squash that bug for good! If she gets bigger, it'll all be over for us!"

After hearing Carmella's demand, Bayley once again hesitated. A massive internal conflict raged in her mind. On one hand, she didn't want anymore damage to be done to the world and she wanted to find a way to stop these two, despite being smaller and weaker. On the other hand, if she doesn't get bigger, she could be defeated, along with Carmella, and thus Billie and Peyton will be allowed to play with the world like their own personal sandbox. This slight hesitation gave Peyton the time she needed to close the gap between her and Bayley.

Bayley was just beginning to open the cap on the growth potion when she noticed the larger Peyton rushing towards her. Bayley on her feet and used Peyton's momentum against her and gave her a swift dropkick to the legs, causing her to crash down onto the ground, killing thousands of people with her boobs and/or her lovely, toned body. Peyton was annoyed that Bayley outsmarted her, but cracked a slight smirk as she saw the damage she had done by just falling down. Peyton's smirk quickly faded when she saw Bayley continuing to run away, so that she could quickly drink the growth potion. Peyton sprung up to her feet and charged Bayley once again. As she got closer, she side-stepped Bayley's dropkick this time and tried to stomp Bayley's head as she was on the ground. Bayley rolled out of the way and began her run again. However, being roughly 100ft taller allows Peyton to make up the ground with some ease, although still needing to move at a brisk pace.

After many repeated attempts at drinking the formula, Bayley knew that she had to stand up and fight Peyton straight up if she was going to keep her down long enough to drink the potion for real. Putting the potion in her pocket, Bayley turned and saw the larger Peyton cracking another evil smirk. Perhaps Bayley didn't think this strategy through very well. After all, not only is Peyton bigger, and thus stronger by default, she has surely got an excess amount of rage and annoyance flowing through her, thus empowering her even more over the smaller Bayley. Bayley let out a huge gulp and begin to square-up and get herself into a fighting stance. Peyton, now seeing that Bayley was done running and was now gonna try to fight her, let out some deafening, and spine-chilling evil laughs.

"HAHAHAHAHA! Well, well, well. Looks like the little hugger and grown some balls out of nowhere, huh? You think you can defeat... ME!? Hahahaha! Allow me to let you in on a little secret Bayley... this is the most powerful I've ever felt in my entire life. I feel even more powerful and unstoppable than our little spat earlier. I could run circles around you Bayley without even trying. Once I humiliate you, I'll drink that potion and get even bigger, stronger, and more powerful than even now! Look over at your little bestie, Carmella. And yes, I mean "little" literally. She is on the verge of getting crushed by Billie. Then, once she's done beating her down, it'll be little ol' you against a bigger Billie and an even BIGGER me! Hahahaha! So, without further ado Bayley... let's dance! Hahaha!"

Peyton started the fight by lifting her knee ever so slightly and catching the breast-leveled Bayley right in the chin, dazing her already. Just that one knee strike allowed Bayley to see the immense power that Peyton was packing. Bayley was holding her chin and started to form some tears in her eyes and looked up at Peyton who was already evilly laughing. Peyton had Bayley right where she wanted her. Bayley tried to rush in and hit Peyton in the stomach, but Peyton was quick to dodge and then land a super kick on the face of Bayley. Whilst being on her back, Peyton stomped over to Bayley and just looked down at her with such lust in her eyes. (http://pa1.narvii.com/5962/01c139e385df1...)

"Oh... poor Bayley. Just two hits to the face and you're already looking to give up? Don't you see how powerful I am? You should've kept trying to run from me Bayley. Now, I'm gonna get that potion from you, get bigger, and use this amazing power of mine to make the world my little plaything. Billie and I will rule this world and look fucking amazing while doing it. I think it's time we end this little game of ours, shall we?"

Peyton bent down and grabbed Bayley's head and repeatedly slammed it into the ground over and over again. Slam after slam and stomp after stomp to Bayley left her almost unconscious. The last thing Bayley would hear and see before fading out for a little while was Peyton grabbing the potion from her and letting out some more evil laughs.

"Mmmmhahahahaha! Yes... this is exactly what I needed. This amazing body... this fucking power... I'm in love with it. However, I want more of it! I NEED more of it! *Peyton shoots a look over towards Billie and Carmella continuing to fight* Don't you worry my sexy Billie, Peyton's about to being moving up in the world a little bit. Now, magic growth potion, make me grow... HAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Peyton opened the vial containing the growth potion and leaned her head back and prepared to fill her already incredible body with the very elixir that allowed her to get this large in the first place. Peyton was ready to further her ascension into goddess-hood.

Meanwhile, Carmella and Billie were continuing their fight a little bit away. With Bayley running around so much, the two different disputes weren't taking place as close together as before. Unlike Bayley and Peyton's fight, this one was a bit more even. Carmella, despite being ~100ft smaller than Billie, was more than holding her own against her. Carmella had bought in to the evil energies that fuel the growth potion long before the Iconic Duo were exposed to it themselves. Although she was only 500ft tall, she had more than enough power to go 50/50 with someone larger than her. During her fight with Billie, she noticed that Bayley and Peyton were nowhere to be seen, which is very odd because all four of them are much larger than anything else. Nonetheless, Carmella and Billie continued to fight it out.

On the other side of the city, Peyton was beginning her growth. Due to how engrained the growth potion had become in Peyton's body, she felt her power growing immediately. Peyton began increasing from her 600ft tall stature and was loving every second of it.

"Ohhhhh fuck yeah! Hahahahaha! THIS IS FUCKING FANTASTIC! HAHAHAHA! Yes... yes... make me stronger... make me more powerful... make me a GODDESS! I can just feel my power growing inside me! I feel like I could rip this entire city in two with my bare hands... nothing is going to stop me. Nothing will stop Billie and I from making this world our bitch. I can't wait to see the look on that Staten Island bitch's face when she sees my new height once I'm done. Now... GROW! GROW! GROW! HAHAHA!"

Carmella and Billie were finishing up the first phase of their fight. Carmella was able to dodge a potentially huge punch from Billie and landed an immense counter-punch of her own. Carmella felt like she had put all she had behind this punch and Billie was knocked down for what seemed to be the count. Billie, who was sprawled-out on the ground, looked up at Carmella, who seemed to think that she had won this battle. However, both Carmella and Billie began to feel huge tremors in the pattern of footsteps coming their way. Carmella looked down at Billie, who was wearing a devilish smirk on her face. Carmella, who feared the worst, heard some bellowing evil laughter and turned around to see what she had feared the most... a 1500ft foot tall Peyton Royce.(https://68.media.tumblr.com/68b497fc14de...)

"Mmmmmhahahaha! Hahahahahaha! Let's see you try to do that to me... Hahahahahaha!"

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Bayley vs Carmella vs The Golden Goddess?

choices: Carmella goes with the growing plan. (Reserved)
Carmella resorts to the shrinking plan.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
*I'm changing the story a little bit and also fast forwarding to current events. Instead of creating a whole separate Carmella section (which would be confusing), the story will just be shifted a bit. At this point, Carmella wasn't granted a growth potion from the "gods" or whatever, she has a new plan. Also, for this portion I'm thinking about doing shorter chapters, but adding more frequently. If you like the new style of shorter, but more often, let me know... or if you don't like the new format and want me to go back to long chapters that all reach the 10,000 character limit. It gets draining having to add those super long chapters, especially when others aren't nearly as long. I'll still add to the other sections from time to time, but it's hard sometimes b/c I feel like I'm just adding to random sections without a purpose. Feel free to email my account with your feedback and which style you like more. I'll be looking to make this portion more story-driven and more drawn out, which I've definitely not done in the past. Also, can we get some more additions please :( (lol). Anyways, hopefully you'll enjoy.*

Carmella was absolutely furious with what had just happened to her. Over the past 48 hours, she was on top of the world. Despite being controversial, she had won the first ever Women's Money in the Bank ladder match and was the first Ms. Money in the Bank (https://www.instagram.com/p/BVgZiDRFMKj/...). This was, by far, the highest point of her career and she was basically guaranteed to be a future SD Women's Champion. However, she had just been stripped of her briefcase minutes before and learned that she has to compete in another ladder match in order to win back what was her's. Not only that, she was just embarrassed by Becky Lynch and Charlotte who double-teamed her and left her tapping in the middle of the ring. Not only that, but later on in the night, she also learned that her manager, James Ellsworth, would be banned from ring-side. Things weren't looking too good for Carmella.

Being left to stew over all of the unfortunate circumstances being thrusted upon her, she was forced to come up with a plan. A plan that, if it worked, would not only make her Ms. Money in the Bank, but would allow her to have a lot more fun in the process afterwards. In order to ensure her victory in the upcoming ladder match, something had to happen to either her or her competitors. Carmella had been doing a ton of research in the lead-up to the first ladder match. In her research, she had almost found a way to pull off one of two master plans that she seemingly concocted. Unfortunately, difficulties in her testing disallowed either of these two plans to come into effect. However, now Carmella has another entire week to finish either of these two plans.

What might these two master plans be? One plan involves finding a way to enlarge herself during the match, thus making herself much bigger and stronger than the other women in the match. Not only would she have those advantages, but if she could make herself big enough, she wouldn't even need a ladder to get the briefcase. While the other competitors are amazed at Carmella's new stature, she could just walk to the center of the ring and grab the briefcase without even trying! The pros to this plan would be that she could stay that size and be unstoppable and perhaps make herself even bigger later on! The cons to this plan however could be that she wouldn't want to stay huge forever. Carmella may just want to get huge for the match and then shrink back down to original size, or, just use this method of getting bigger only when she has matches and use her size and strength boosts to always win.

The other plan she came up with is finding a way to shrink the other competitors in the match. If she could get the other women to be small enough, they won't be any way for any of them to climb up the ladder anyways, on top of, once again, being bigger and stronger than all of them. This way, she could maintain her normal size and easily win the match again. The pros to this plan would be, as already stated, that she wouldn't have to worry about finding a way to shrink back down to normal size (even though she may want to stay huge). The cons to this plan, similar to the growing plan, would be that she might have to find a way to get some of the women back to grow back. Carmella had grown to like Natalya and Tamina from their time in The Welcoming Committee and she wouldn't want them to get hurt, being so small (although not caring about Becky and Charlotte).

The main premise behind both of these plans is ensuring that the growing or shrinking doesn't occur until the match has already begun. If Carmella just shows up to the arena looking twice to three times her size, she definitely wouldn't be sanctioned to be in the match b/c she clearly would have tried to gain an advantage (not to mention she would probably attract some unwanted military attention). On the contrary, if all of the other women seemingly go missing b/c they've been shrunken so small, the match won't go on there won't be anyone to compete in it. Also, if the other women shrink down only a little bit, the match still may not go on b/c there would be a major risk of them getting severely hurt.

Whichever plan Carmella decides to use, she must be calculated and precise with her tactics. Although this will take many sleepless nights of planning and testing, Carmella couldn't help but dawn and evil smirk and chuckle at the possibility of easily winning the MITB ladder match once again. (https://www.instagram.com/p/BUvAOVaFkYc/...)

*Another quick update after writing this... there are going to be chapters throughout the story that I'll reserve for myself to come back to. If there is anyone out there who is willing to add to this portion of the interactive, please refrain from doing the chapters that have "reserved" next to them. However, once again, I'd love to see more additions to this interactive as a whole. Please, let's see some additions rolling! Myself and Green94 can't do it all ourselves! Also, I know this was a shorter and tamer chapter than most of mine, but bear with me as I try something new! I'll be looking to add to this much more.*
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella's Humble Beginnings

choices: Carmella wants to drink her way to the top.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella was bouncing around both ideas in her head. After hours of deliberation, she decided that it would be much more fun to grow bigger than the others in the match. Why should she stop at just the other four women who are in the match when she could potentially have an entire world of "toys" if she decides to stay huge. Not only would growing be more fun for Carmella, but trying to prove her innocence after the shrinking plan would be a tough task. If all the women in the match all shrink down to half their size (or perhaps even smaller) besides her, it's going to raise a lot of eyebrows in the locker room and Carmella will surely be caught in the act.

Although growing bigger than everyone else would also blow her cover, would it really matter at that point? By the time everyone finds Carmella out, she'll potentially be at least 10-15ft tall and unstoppable. And who's to say that she'll want to stop there? Once Carmella feels the rushes of power that are sure to come with looking down upon everyone will definitely make her want to get even bigger and stronger. So, Carmella's mind was made up... she's going to show the other women that they're going to have a bigger fish to fry come the next MITB ladder match.

All Carmella had to work out now was how to go about this plan. Will she inject herself with some liquid steroid-like material? Carmella isn't the biggest fan of needles, but if that is what it takes, then so be it. Another option would be to disguise her concoction as a drink. This option may be much safer, due to the fact that she could just drink her growing potion right before going out to the ring to ensure that the process doesn't occur until the match starts. If the other women catch a glimpse of Carmella injecting herself with a weird-looking substance, that may raise some eyebrows. Once again, Carmella was met with a decision. After stewing over the grow/shrink decision for so long, she decided to make things easy on herself and just make both.

Carmella, with the help of some scientists that she met through her time as a cheerleader for various sports teams, was able to concoct both an injectable growth serum and a Gatorade look-a-like growth potion. Of course, Carmella had her doubts with these experiments. "What do you nerds think? Should I become a goddess through some injection or through a drink? The drink is probably the safer option, but could take some more time to kick-in. I don't want to go out there and potentially have the match end before the growing take place! The injection is a little riskier, but is bound to work fast because it'll be going directly into the blood stream. Plus, from what you nerds tell me, it seems that the injection is more powerful than the drink. If worse comes to worse, I guess I can try my best to sneak the needle out there and hope for the best. Once I get huge, no one will be able to stop me anyway. Hahaha!"

The scientists and Carmella conversed for hours and finally came up with a decision. Carmella was absolutely giddy at the fact that her master plan was finally materializing (https://68.media.tumblr.com/7735c8f96f0f...). It was Monday night, the day before her BIG match (pun fully intended) and she was ready to show the world that you don't mess with a princess, especially not one from Staten Island.

Before sending the scientists home and heading off to bed (although there's no way she's gonna sleep tonight), Carmella gave the pesky scientists who will help her ascend to goddess-hood a somewhat sincere thank you. "Don't worry guys, this small boost in size is only the beginning. Once I show those other bitches in the WWE who they should be bending to, I'll be sure to remember you little twerps. Just know that if I come back asking for more, you better get some more of this shit... or else you'll become a stain beneath me. Hahahahaha!"

The scientists weren't sure if they should feel relieved, scared, or even aroused by Carmella's decree. Regardless, the scientists went on their way and back to their homes. Some considered pitching the idea of making some extra in advance before Carmella comes stomping along for some more. They all felt the seriousness in Carmella's voice when she stated that she'd crush whoever didn't obey her. Alas, the scientists went home and Carmella was off to bed as she stared at her new growing device.

Will Carmella go for the riskier to pull off, but sure to work plan? Or, will Carmella go for the safer plan, but run the risk of not growing in time?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Figuring Out A Growth Device...

choices: ...the growth serum is there and ready to be used! The plan is ready!
...the growth serum is gone! What happened!? The plan failed!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After barely sleeping the night before, the day had finally come. After what seemed to be the longest week of Carmella's life, the wait was over. Not only was Carmella going to re-capture what shouldn't have been taken away from her, she's going to prove that she is a goddess of this world. Due to the help of her scientist allies, she was able to produce an injectable growth serum AND a growth potion. Although Carmella had already made up her mind on the method of growth she plans to use, she decided to bring the growth potion along with her also. Seconds felt like hours to Carmella as she waited to head to the arena later on in the evening. All day, all she could think about was ruling and dominating the other women in the MITB ladder match and potentially whoever else she wanted to. The feeling of power was almost orgasmic and she knew she was about to take her rightful place in this world.

Being over-joyed and filled with excitement, Carmella decided to head to the arena earlier than usual. She wanted to ensure that she found a decent hiding place for the growth serum somewhere on her person, while also concealing the growth potion from anyone else. If Carmella isn't careful, someone else could drink the growth potion without evening meaning to drink a growth potion. Therefore, Carmella knew she had to be extra cautious and getting there early would aid her in doing so. On the drive over to the arena, Carmella would glance down at her two growth devices and crack a devilish, evil smirk each time (https://heavyeditorial.files.wordpress.c...). Carmella was so entranced by her growth serum and growth potion that people driving behind her would always honk at her for sitting at a red light or stop sign for too long. Each time prompting Carmella to think something alone the lines of, "That's no way to treat your goddess." or "I'll be sure to come back for you and squat you like the bug you are, twerp." Regardless, no amount of road rage would deter her from feeling excited about what's to come later on in the night.

Carmella finally arrived at the arena after a decently long drive. Whilst she was still very excited, she was sure to keep thinking to herself, "Once I'm freaking huge, I'll make it an effort to go around crushing every car I can find. Hell, I won't be needing mine anymore! Hahaha!" Carmella parked her car and began to briskly walk into the women's locker room. Thankfully, none of the other women on the roster were in there yet, especially not the other four competitors in the match. Carmella then plopped her amazing ass down next to one of the locker room cubbies and began getting ready for her BIG night.

After hours of anticipation, SD Live had finally started. Superstars, male and female, were all rustling and bustling around backstage. Things were chaotic, per usual, but Carmella was totally focused and running through things in her head. Once again, seconds felt like hours as the match grew closer and closer. The women who were to be involved in the match had no other obligations other than a quick 30 second to 1 minute interview with the lovely Renee Young. After each of their interviews, all they had left was competing in the match. Unluckily for Carmella, her interview was the last one to be held before about a quick commercial break and then the match starting. As the night went on, the match was almost here. Carmella watched with an evil smirk as the each of the other four women, who were soon going to be puny to her, all came and gone whilst doing their interviews.

Finally, it was time for Carmella's interview. Carmella had stashed the growth serum needle deep in her zipped-up jacket pocket. She had been heavily and somewhat suspiciously guarding her jacket all night long. However, Carmella was going to have to leave her jacket unattended for at least 30 seconds while she did her interview. Now that this realization was forming in her head, she did remember getting some weird looks from the other competitors b/c of how protective she was of her jacket. Carmella really started to worry if her plan had been figured out. The other women may not know what the plan is, but they may know that Carmella has a plan in general, which is bad news. Nonetheless, Carmella was off to do her interview. Obviously, she was going to be as brief and concise as possible. Renee Young asked her a fairly generic question about the match to which Carmella responded, "Renee, I have a feeling that, by the end of the night, those other women will be looking up at me while I stand their victorious. After tonight, I'll prove that no one can touch me and that I'll be making a HUGE impact for years to come."

After her interview, Carmella moved as fast as she could back to the locker room, although still trying to not draw any unwanted attention to herself. However, there also wasn't much time left before the match began and her entrance was first. Therefore, there wasn't much time for her to check her deep jacket pockets for the needle before going out there. Carmella stormed back into the locker room and threw her jacket over her back as quick as possible. Just as she picked up her jacket, she could hear her music play and knew that time was up. It's now or never for the BIGGEST moment of her life. Although she couldn't help but notice a suspicious-looking Becky Lynch and Charlotte off in the corner, right before leaving. However, the thought of being a goddess took those two off of her mind and she conducted her entrance.

One by one, the women entered the match. Each of the five women looked confident, especially Carmella (https://www.gannett-cdn.com/-mm-/3f691c4...). The moment that Carmella had been waiting for had finally arrived. The bell was about to be rung when the other women noticed that Carmella wouldn't take her jacket off for some reason. Normally, right after her entrance is done, she throws it right off and gets ready to fight. The other women were once again suspicious of why Carmella won't take her jacket off.

Finally, the referee rings the bell and Carmella is ready to show the world who their true goddess is. With the widest smile, she sticks her hand in her jacket pocket and finds...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Preparing for the Lethal Injection

choices: Carmella wants to have some fun with the other women. What's the rush?
Carmella wants to win fast and grow more. Perhaps she'll come back later?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With the widest smile, Carmella sticks her hand in her jacket pocket and pulls out the growth serum. The other women are worried of what she plans on doing with the needle in her hand. Did she bring some sort of poison with her to the ring? Was she going to sedate everyone else in the match? The other four women all went into a separate corner, fearing that Carmella would stick them with the needle in her hand. Carmella simply laughed at the other women and stated, "Oh, don't worry... I won't be injecting any of you with the stuff in this precious needle. I'm going to be injecting the stuff into... ME! Hahahaha!" Carmella then jabs the needle right into her arm, injecting herself with the powerful growth serum. The other women stood aghast while they weren't sure what was about to happen. All they could see and hear was Carmella evil smirk and laughing. Carmella then allowed the other women to be clued in after a few seconds of uncertainty.

"Hahaha! Hahahahaha! I guess I might as well tell you all what's about to happen in a few seconds. You see, I just injected myself with a powerful growth serum. A growth serum that will not only make me stronger than all you, but much, MUCH bigger! When I got stripped of my briefcase last week, I was absolutely furious. I knew that I had to get back what was rightfully mine. So, I came up with a plan to ensure that I not only get back my briefcase, but I'll get to have a LOT of fun in the process with you little mites." Carmella then feels a sudden jolt of immense power flow through her body. "Ooooo! Hahaha! Get ready girls b/c I think the show's about to begin! If I were you, I'd be thinking of ways to bow before you new goddess!"

Carmella was right... the show that she had been waiting for was finally commencing. All along, Carmella viewed herself as royalty. She called herself the Staten Island Princess for a reason. However, now she wants to be the Staten Island GODDESS. Why should she sell her potential short and just call herself a princess? Carmella believes that she is worth so much more and should be treated as such. The other women and the WWE Universe around the world could only watch as Carmella started to slowly gain inches in height. Carmella close her eyes at this point and allowed the near-orgasmic feeling consume her entire being (https://i.redd.it/81q59x5k7p5z.jpg). The other women in the match probably could've done something to Carmella before she gets too big, but they were all amazed and perhaps somewhat aroused by what was happening before them.

Slowly, but surely, Carmella was climbing and climbing in height. Soon she became 6ft, then 7ft, then 8ft, and so on and so forth. With each passing second, she grew bigger and most certainly stronger than her foes. In between moans and groans of pleasure, the other women could hear short bits of laughter and chuckling come from Carmella. Carmella was in heaven during this feeling of growth and the others can tell that she knew they were all hers now. Higher and higher Carmella grew and she approached the MITB briefcase by just standing up. Carmella's muscles were rippling and her clothes were partially tearing as a result. By the time the growth is finished, Carmella will no doubt be the most powerful person in the world.

Speaking of which, Carmella's growth seemed to be slowing down. The feelings of pleasure were fading from Carmella's body and she began to open her eyes. She was upset that the growth was over, but was over-the-moon happy when she saw the result. Carmella looked around the arena from her new perspective and couldn't wait to look down at the minuscule women beneath her. When she did, she let out some more belittling evil laughs. "HAHAHAHA! I can't believe it! The plan actually worked! Haha! I'm freaking giant! And look at all you little, itty bitty, women down there! Hahahaha! What? Why all of the scared faces girls? You've never seen a giant, sexy, powerful women like this before? Oh... would you look at that? The briefcase comes up to right about face level. How convenient! Hahaha! I'll be sure to grab that in a sec', but for now, I just want ALL of you, even you little bugs at home to witness your new GODDESS! What do you say gals? Time for me to have some fun... hahahaha!"

Carmella's voice boomed with power as she spoke down to essentially everyone else in the world. The only ones who weren't 100% terrified by Carmella's new form were the scientists who made the growth serum for her. They were definitely still a little scared, but they knew that Carmella was going to need them if she wanted to get even bigger than her current height right now. They, along with the other women in the match, estimated Carmella to be about 15-20ft of immense power. That size would be more than enough to win the match.

However, Carmella seems to be in no rush to win the match. No, she wanted to enjoy herself out there. Why rush into the victory when she can have a HUGE amount of fun with the shin to knee-level women in the ring? There's no way any of them could hurt her now. Therefore, she wants to make her victory nice and slow. Carmella would love to mess around these little bugs in her presence and then grab the toy-sized briefcase (which could probably fit in her pocket at this point). Although, if she wins the match quickly and just leaves, she can get back to those scientists and grow some more. Then, instead of having fun with the other women, she can have fun with the entire world! Either way, Carmella is left to sexily stand there feeling as powerful and confident as ever (http://pa1.narvii.com/6223/fc50818fea863...).
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella's HUGE Advantage

choices: Carmella ends their misery, wins the match, and moves on to BIGGER goals.
Carmella can hear the sounds of someone else growing!? How!?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After giving the decision some thought, Carmella went with her gut. Why would she waste such an amazing opportunity to get back at the other four women for even thinking they could compare to her. They all caused her tons of pain during the original MITB match, but now she had the ability to give all of it and then some more back. Carmella couldn't get over the sight of looking down upon the less-than-infant sized women in the ring with her. She also loved looking around at all of the ladders thinking, " I sure as hell won't be needing those anymore! Hahahah!" Carmella also spent some time looking around the arena at the crowd all gawking up at her beautiful, gigantic form. Last, but not least, she loved the fact that the MITB briefcase was just about face-level. So, if she really wanted to, she could just reach out and grab it with absolutely no competition, but where is the fun in that?

Carmella, who was reveling in her power, belittled the other four women in the match. "Ha! Ha! Ha! Well now... you girls might be thinking that I'm gonna want to just grab the briefcase and get it over with. Buuuuuuttttttt, I kinda had some other things in mind! You see... I wanna show the world just how dominant I am now. Therefore, I'm gonna have a LOT of fun messing with you guys and displaying to the world that NO ONE will be able to stop me! And if they can... hell, I'll just get bigger and stronger! Hahahaha!" Soooooooooo, it's time for some fun! What better way to kick-off the fun than with a moonwalk? Look out below girls! I don't wanna squash ya too soon!"

Carmella then proceeded to do her signature moonwalk from one side of the ring to the other and had the biggest smile whilst doing it (http://imgur.com/1HrQ8ev). As expected, it took Carmella all of 3 seconds to go across the ring. The other women who were in this giantess' path were forced to dive away from the building coming their way. Carmella kept going back and forth doing her moonwalk and was already having a blast teasing the other women. "What's the matter guys? Scared of these huge feet coming for ya!? If you're scared by that, wait 'til you see what else I got planned for ya! Hahahaha!"

Carmella was standing there, looking hot as ever in her tore up gear and large stature, was contemplating all sorts of ideas to mess with the other women. She was always a fan of movies like Godzilla and other Japanese films of that genre and planned on using inspirations from those in her fun. She also planned on look sexy as hell in doing them. In traditional giant fashion, Carmella resorted to a classic phrase spoken by most of the large beings in the films she loved watching.

"Fe!" Carmella stomped hard once with her right foot, making sure she always missed on of the girls, even though she could easily have squashed them. "Fi!" Carmella stomped harder with her left foot. "Fo!" Carmella leaned down to get a closer look at her victims and started to put a devilish smile on her face. "FUM!" Carmella then used her gigantic ass and plopped down in the middle of ring, somehow not making it collapse under her giant weight. The other women were still sprawled out in the four corners, but were seemingly trapped by Carmella's gigantic body. Looking around at the fear in everyone's eyes and laughed and spoke once more. "Man, this giant ass can sure be troublesome! Hahahaha! You guys like my rhyme! Sitting down that hard with this huge ass, I had to be extra careful that no one get squished just yet! Hahaha!"

Carmella then quickly stood back up to her full intimidating height and then got down on her hands and knees, almost like a cat. She was also a huge fan of Tom and Jerry, although she was always upset that the larger Tom was always outsmarted by the smaller Jerry. She wasn't going to allow this to happen to herself. Still on her hands and knees, Carmella spoke to the other women. "You guys know in Tom and Jerry where the small mouse always wins? Well, let's just say... I won't be letting that happen! Hahaha!" Carmella then proceeded to crawl around the ring, not having much space as it is. She would get real close to a corner that contained another competitor and pretend that she was going to bite them and eat them up like a cat with a mouse. However, each time she would get closer and closer to the women before she gave up on her cat and mouse game.

"Just to show how tiny you little girls are, watch this!" Carmella then took a step to the outside and took a seat on the ground surrounding the ring. Although she was sitting on her ass on the outside, she was still taller than all the others. "Look at this! I'm bigger than you guys when I'm sitting down! Isn't that embarrassing!? Haha!"

Carmella then decided to maneuver herself so that she could kick her legs up and look like she was relaxing a little. She was so chilled out in this match that is supposed to be one of the dangerous contests in pro wrestling, she began to close her eyes a little. Carmella was having way too much fun to be tired, but she was trying to bait the other women intro thinking she was distracted from them. To Carmella's joy, that's exactly what the others did. As soon as Carmella's eyes shut, the other four sprung out from their corners and began running for ladders.

The other four women fought it out for a few minutes and finally one was actually climbing the ladder. This woman who was climbing the ladder turned out to be Becky Lynch, the woman who came so close to winning the original match a week earlier until Carmella thwarted her. The crowd was starting to stir and Carmella figured it was time to play some more. Becky was hastily climbing the ladder when she heard some more laughter. Becky turned to her left to see Carmella's two gigantic eyes staring her in the face.

"Hahahaha! And what exactly do you think you're doing Becky? You think I'd just roll over and let someone else win this match, especially you? Hahaha! You realize I'm just gonna stick out a finger and push you off right? That's all it takes for me! Watch!"

Carmella, like she promised, was pressing her finger up against Becky's body. Carmella wanted to show how strong she was compared to the other women. Becky was fighting Carmella's finger with all of her might, while Carmella was chuckling at her display of power. "Come on Becky! I thought you had some boulder shoulders or something? All it takes is one giant finger to defeat the Lass Kicker!? Haha! You're pathetic! Just accept that I'm your goddess!" Carmella then applied slightly more pressure, causing Becky to go barreling off the ladder and to the mat, which caused more chuckles from Carmella. "Hahaha! Who's next!"

Suddenly, Carmella felt some small discomfort on her left arm. Wondering what this feeling was, she looked to her left to see Natalya and Tamina punching and kicking her. Carmella register these feelings are more annoying than painful and belittled them. "Really? You guys are gonna have to hit harder than that. You gals are hitting me with all you got and it feels like nothing! Hahahaha! Let me show you gals how a real woman fights." Carmella then used her one arm to grab both of them and throw them forcefully into the barricade. She laughed at the immense amounts of pain in Nattie and Tamina's faces. Carmella figured she was done with her fun on the outside and decided maybe it was time to finish this.

Carmella then took a step into the ring when she felt a pretty sharp sting on her ass. Carmella furiously turned around to see Charlotte wielding a ladder. Seeing Carmella turn around, Charlotte then swung the ladder again at Carmella's backside, causing another sharp sting. This second strike angered her even more than the first. Charlotte has the audacity to hit her new goddess while she is looking at her? Carmella would not stand for this. However, Carmella didn't want to just punch, kick, or throw Charlotte out of the ring. She felt that if Charlotte wants to hit her ass, then she might as well hit back with it.

"How dare you hit me like that! You do realize what you've done, right? Not only did you piss me off... but you pissed a GIGANTIC me off! You think a ladder is gonna save you from my wrath!? Hahahaha! Yeah, those ladder shots stung my ass a little bit... but that's all it did! You're so interested in hitting my ass? How about my ass hits you! Hahaha!"

Carmella then swung her ass backwards into Charlotte, knocking her into the corner. Seeing how fast Charlotte was flung into the corner, Carmella laughed once more. "Some ass I got on me, huh? Hahaha! What'd you say you get another close look?" Carmella then proceeded to throw her ass into Charlotte time and time again, each time hitting her harder than the last. Carmella made sure to not hit her hard enough to kill her, just to embarrass her a lot. Finally, Carmella one last swift knock of her huge ass to the outside of the ring.

After disposing of Charlotte with her huge ass, Carmella had finally had her long awaited fun. Even at this point, Carmella couldn't believe how powerful she was. All it took was some swooning over some nerdy scientists and she is the most powerful person the world has ever seen... to this point. Carmella loved the idea of being the most powerful person in the world, but wanted even more of this power. The fact that Charlotte could cause such a sting with such a "puny" ladder made her slightly angry. No one should be able to contest her power and she wanted to prove that later.

Although, amidst all of the thoughts of increasing her power, Carmella remembered she had a job to do. The whole reason for getting this big and strong was to win back the MITB briefcase. Carmella thought she heard some weird sounds but, she turned towards the briefcase, wore a huge smile and was ready to claim her place in WWE and the world.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella's Time for Fun!

choices: Carmella's reign as ruler of the world begins!
Carmella's reign begins with some unexpected competition...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The events that had just transpired over the past few minutes left everyone around the world shocked. Somehow, someway, Carmella was able to grow herself 4x her normal size right in front of everyone only by using some injectable substance. This woman... this goddess... was one of the most beautiful woman in the world and her increased size has only made her look even more like a goddess. Now, Carmella is left to stand in the middle of the ring and prepare to grab what she believes is rightfully hers. However, before grabbing the MITB briefcase and becoming known as Ms. MITB, she wanted to look around at all of the carnage she caused.

"Hahaha! My oh my! Look at all of the fun I had! You've got a Lass Kicker whose been splatted by me pushing her off the top of a ladder with just ONE finger. You've got two of my former allies sprawled out by the barricade b/c it only took one hand a little bit of my immense strength to throw them against the wall. And finally, you've got a 'Queen...'" *Carmella rolled her eyes and stated sarcastically.* "...flattened by this lovely round and huge ass of mine! Hahaha! I'm sure plenty of you boys out there would've loved to get the fate she received! Alas, I think it's time I finally get what's rightfully mine. Although, this thing looks like a little toy for an action figure now! Haha!"

Carmella finally reached out and grabbed the briefcase, winning the match. The timekeeper frantically rang the bell and quickly ran out of there, not knowing what other carnage Carmella was going to cause. The ring announcer then stated, "The winner and Ms. Money in the Bank, Carm..." The ring announcer was than interrupted by a near death glare from the gigantic victor (http://www.wwe.com/f//2016/12/20161204_t...). Carmella than angrily stomped over to the ring announcer and grabbed the mic out of his hand with a couple fingers, which sent him running away as well. Carmella felt she was disrespected by the ring announcer and wanted to give herself a proper victory announcement.

"Ladies and gentlemen... the winner, Ms. Money in the Bank, your goddess, and the NEW ruler of the worrrrrld... CARMELLA! Hahahaha!" The last part of the statement left everyone in the arena and watching at home terrified for what was to come next. What did she mean by "ruler of the world"?
