Surely she was going to shrink back down to normal size, where she can be apprehended by authorities and taken to prison for nearly clearly 4 women. Just as quickly as these questions were asked, Carmella somewhat knowingly got back on the mic and decided to answer some of these questions.

"Did y'all not get that? I said that I was going to be the ruler of the world. And when I say I'm gonna rule the world, I'm gonna be ruling with an iron fist people. I could easily kill anyone I want to at this size, bbbuuuttttttt I kinda feel like getting even bigger and stronger than I am now! Won't that be lovely to see! You new goddess gaining even more power over her tiny mortal servants! Just wait to you see what I'm capable of when I'm 5x or 10x this size! Soooooooo, I guess that means... RUN! Hahahaha!"

With that last bit, the questions of everyone were answered. This wasn't some one-off that Carmella had planned to obtain the MITB briefcase. No, she not only wanted to stay bigger than everyone, she planned on getting even bigger! There may not be anyone that could stop her at this size... what'll happen if she's even more gigantic!?

Carmella was pleased to see everyone scattering around after her first decree as a goddess. The only thing left for her to do now was deliver on her promise and get even bigger... and that meant finding the scientists responsible for all of this.

Carmella was on her way to the designated meeting place that she had set with the scientists the night they came to her hotel room. She didn't have a care in the world and was having fun with her new size. She wasn't quite big enough to be terrorizing entire towns, but she planned on being that big very soon.

The aforementioned scientists were huddled in their secret hideout preparing more of the growth serum for Carmella. They were doing their best to work as fast as possible b/c they knew that if the serum wasn't prepared for her when she arrived, that'll be the end for all of them. Just as they were finishing up they started to hear muffled calls from their test subject.

"Ohhhhh boys! Goddess 'Mella wants more power! I'm coming in through this wall in 3 seconds and if the serum isn't done... I'm gonna kill all of ya! Hahaha! Ok... ready! One... two... three! Who's ready to watch their sexy goddess grow some more! Haha!"

Carmella bursted through one of the walls of the building they were hiding in and was wearing a huge smile whilst she did it (https://www.instagram.com/p/BRGaaGgl34W/...). She would've loved to rip the roof off the of their hiding place like one of her favorite giant monster movies, but unfortunately, she wasn't big enough for that... yet! Carmella stood in the hideout, her gear all ripped-up, but still intact enough for her to wear. The scientists had to admit that Carmella looked 10x as hot as she did when they met with her previously. Noticing that the scientists were all gawking at her, she had to snap them back to reality.

*Carmella began to perform some bellowing claps* "Helloooo! Let's get a move on here! I got police coming after me already and I need a little boost so that I can have some fun with them! You can salivate over me when I huge!"

The scientists paused their staring and imminent erections for a moment to give Carmella more of the growth serum. Like before, the serum was in a needle, but it was much smaller to Carmella than before. Therefore, Carmella had to be much more careful that she injected it correctly. The scientists handed the needle over to Carmella and she was ready to get huge. However, beforehand, the scientists had one more thing for Carmella.

"Uhhhh.... Carmella..." *Carmella once again shot an angry glare* "...sorry. Goddess 'Mella... we, uh, have one more surprise for you!" *Carmella then turned her angry glare into a cheerful smile, whether it be genuine or not.*

"Why yes boys, what is it!? Does it have something to do what those HUGE clothes you have over there!" Carmella looked over towards the back of the hideout to see a set of gigantic clothes laid out on the ground.

"Why... yes, actually! You see, uh, you're clearly not gonna last in those clothes much longer. As much as we'd all love to see you in your naked, gigantic glory, perhaps you'll need something to wear whenever you get... however big you'll get."

Carmella did her best to make the scientists feel appreciated when she spoke to them about her new gift. "Awwww! Thanks boys! You're right! I'm gonna need some new gear when I'm taking over this puny world and that gear looks amazing!"

Carmella then went over and attempted to put the new gear on, with some difficulty. The scientists saw her struggling with the huge gear and offered some guidance.

"So, uh, we weren't sure how big you were gonna get... so, uh, we just kinda guessed! Don't worry, once you get bigger, I'm sure it's gonna look great! Just put your arms and legs through the appropriate holes and you'll probably GROW into it!"

Carmella than put her arms and legs where they would be expected to go if the clothes were normal-sized and prepared the injection. Carmella was, once again, ready to inject herself with the growth serum when the scientists interjected again.

"Alright boys, you've been very helpful..." *The lead scientist interrupted Carmella, which may not have been a good idea, but it worked out anyway.*

"A couple more things actually... they're really quick! We've got you this huge box of syringes with the growth serum inside, just in case you wanna get bigger and we 'disappear' for a while. Also..."

Carmella, who was tired of their interruptions, was ready to continue her rampage and become the true ruler of the world. "Yeah, yeah, yeah... whatever you say boys. I think I can hear the sirens getting closer, so I believe it's time to show them that they are gonna have a BIGGER fish to fry! Hahaha! Thanks for everything boys, but this world is mine for the taking! Hahahaha!"

Without further ado, Carmella stuck the needle in her arm, like she had done before. Carmella felt the familiar rush of power in her veins as she was ready to grow higher and higher. Fuckkkk yes! Hahahahahaha! This is AMAZING! You people have no idea what you're messing with now! HAHAHAHA! You thought I was an issue before? Just wait until I reach my full potential! My muscles will gain in strength and my limbs will stretch towards the sky! Now... grow grow grow! Make me the GODDESS I truly am! Hahahaha!"

Carmella's body shot into the sky as she was surpassing every height marker she thought she'd stop at. She reached 30ft, then 40ft, then 50ft, and so on until she finally topped off at 100ft tall! Carmella was impressed by the improved performance of the growth serum this time around.

"Whew! Hell yeah boys! That shit felt fantastic! Haha! I feel sooooo fucking powerful now! Oh, and would you look at that! These clothes fit me like a glove now!" (https://www.instagram.com/p/BVhiv0nlULa/...).

The lead scientist was glad to see his creation work so well but was also frustrated with Carmella b/c she wouldn't hear him out. He wanted to tell her that she needed to get the growth potion from the arena! She had left her bag there and Carmella surely wouldn't want anyone to get their hands on that and contest her power! However, Carmella was admiring her new size, once again.

"Awwwwwwww yeah! Hahahaha! That's right little police officers, look up at your new goddess! Hahaha!"
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ms. MITB Wants Even More!

choices: The army arrives to save the day!
Another person(s) from the MITB match has arrived! (Becky and/or Charlotte)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
*PLEASE CAN OTHER PEOPLE ADD TO THIS INTERACTIVE! IT SUCKS WHEN NO ONE ADDS BUT ME! I'm trying my best to add more frequently, despite taking a couple week break. Sadly, no one really seems to be adding in my absence anyways. :(*

Perhaps it was too late for the world now as the seemingly new ruler of the world, Carmella, had just multiplied her size by five (5x) and is now 100ft tall. Those watching SD Live saw what Carmella had done to the other women wrestlers when she was only 20ft tall. Now, she has grown much larger and is predictably much stronger and more powerful as well. With the world still unaware of how Carmella has grown to massive proportions, they are seemingly left with only one option. Carmella must be stopped at all costs if the world is to continue the way it is now. However, Carmella will certainly not go down without a fight. Feeling even more powerful than before, Carmella is ready to show the world why she is their new goddess. She plans on displaying her immense power for the whole world to see and this display of power is sure to begin with the small police force that has been following her since the arena.

In Carmella's eyes, her reign as the goddess and new ruler of this world was only about to begin. The tiny people who were only 1/20th of her size stood no chance against her. Some puny police officers weren't going to deter her from doing whatever she wanted. She had graduated from a princess to a goddess and her subjects were going to treat her as such. With her new size, she was ready to rule the world.

"Hahaha! That's right little police officers, look up at your new goddess! Hahaha! You should've tried to stop me when you had the chance! Now look at me! I'm 100 feet tall you little fuckers! What can you possibly do to me now!? All it takes for me is a little...." *Carmella stomps her foot down hard, knocking some police officers off their feet* "STOMP! HAHAHA! What? You think your pistols can do anything to me? You boys might as well wait for the army to arrive... I'm sure they'll give me an actual challenge! Hahaha!"

Carmella was really enjoying belittling the men and women of law enforcement. As much as they would hate to admit it, Carmella was pretty accurate with her statements. Carmella surely isn't invincible at this size, but it is hard to believe that generic pistols will do much to her. It may register as an annoyance to her and potentially cause her to kill the police officers even more savagely. However, if they don't even try to take her down, that could look even worse on them. Alas, the police officers knew that they had to do their best to stop or just stall Carmella until reinforcements arrive in the form of the army. With that idea in mine, the police officers opened fire.

As the 9mm and 10mm bullets exited their respective pistols and made contact with Goddess Carmella's skin, they didn't seem to be dealing much damage, as expected. Not only were the bullets barely penetrating the beautifully-toned skin of the gigantic Carmella, most of the small pistol bullets were simply bouncing off of Carmella. To Carmella, she could certainly feel the bullets hitting her skin. In fact, they actually hurt a bit more than she had expected. The pain wasn't anything unbearable, but it she definitely felt it. The feeling was comparable to Charlotte's ladder shots from before, but with a little less punch to them.

Due to the unexpected force of even these small bullets, Carmella was very upset with the police officers for firing upon her. Therefore, she was ready for her first true display of power.

"Ow! Ow! Ow! Hey! How dare you little ants shoot at me like that! Don't you realize that isn't how you treat a goddess!? You know why you don't treat a goddess this way, especially a goddess as big and strong as me...?" *Carmella begins to lift her leg up high in the air, casting a huge shadow over some of the police officers* "It's because this goddess can do A LOT more to you than you can to me! Hahahaha!" *Carmella then brought her gigantic foot down on a small portion of the police force, crushing them instantly.*

The other men and women on the scene just watched their friends and colleagues be brutally stomped on by a large Carmella foot. Carmella left her foot on the ground for a few seconds and stared at the other police officers to further show her power over them. Carmella shot them an evil smirk and she slowly lifted her foot up to show the bloody remains of their fellow officers. Half of the officers were enraged or scared and the other half were about to sick at the bloody sight. After seeing the varying reactions of those beneath her, Carmella taunted them once more.

"Awwwwww, what's the matter? You guys don't like the fact that I can squish you like little bugs? You don't like what I did to your friends? Well too bad! Hahaha! There's PLENTY more where that came from! In fact, those of you who seem to really be admiring my work by puking all over my playground... you can join them! Buh-bye!"

Carmella brought her foot down once again on the half of the police force that were disgusted by Carmella's first vicious stomp. However, this second stomp was a bit more playful than the first one. Carmella knew she had an easier target this time around, due to the fact that they were all pre-occupied with being sick. Therefore, as opposed to stomping her whole foot down with massive force... Carmella decided to only use the tip of her foot, like she was standing on her toes. Carmella then wiped the blood and guts of those she just crushed all over the surrounding ground. Carmella then lifted her shoe up, rubbed her hand on the bloody parts of it, and licked it with her large tongue, laughing evilly as she did it. (https://em.wattpad.com/2c828f32ccafda591...)

The remaining police officers were horrified by the sight and it fueled their passion to take Carmella down even more. With this added anger, they began shooting once more, hoping that this attempt would do more damage than before. However, like last time, the bullets seemed to sting the gigantic Carmella a tad, but not much more than that. Carmella, was once again infuriated at the police officers attempts and was tired of being shot at b/c of the pain it brought her.

"Ouch! Hey! Ok... that's it! You puny police officers have had enough fun. If you seriously think you can shoot at your goddess without any consequences, you're sadly mistaken. I'd love to just put you all out of your misery and stomp all of you THROUGH the Earth, but I have a better idea! This worked out well for me last time and it was a lot of fun during the match and now I'm a lot bigger! So.... let's moonwalk! Hahahaha!"

Carmella set up her moonwalk by stomping craters in the ground on either side of the bunched-up police force to keep from them from running away. Carmella then turned her body around, winked at the small police officers, and began the larges moonwalk anyone had ever seen (http://www.prowrestling.cool/webhook-upl...). Carmella laughed bellowing evil laughs as she proceeded to crush the last of the police officers that opposed her.

Once Carmella was done with her gigantic moonwalk, she looked down to admire her handiwork. All she could see was the mangled bodies of police officers, men and women. Seeing the blood and guts of those who opposed her made her very happy and she felt very powerful as a result. Carmella felt the need to address the civilians who witnessed what she was capable of.

"You see this you fucking peasants? I can do whatever I want to whoever I want. You police forces were like little action figures that I destroyed with just my feet alone! And guess what? I was barely even trying! Sure, those puny bullets may have hurt a little bit, but once I decided it was time for those puny mortals to die... well, they died! Hahaha! You see, nothing can stop me now. I'm way to big, strong, and powerful for ANY of you! Just look at my magnificent, gigantic body!"

Carmella then stretched out her legs and placed her hands on her hips very powerfully. She then moved from that pose to a dominant flexing pose to display her strength to her new playthings.

"You really think any of you have a chance against me? Why don't you come and try? As a matter of fact, I hope that puny army shows up so that I can REALLY show you all how powerful I am. I mean, any woman who happens to be my size would be powerful, especially ME! I'm a freaking WWE women's superstar for crying out loud! I could probably kick all of your asses at your puny size, let alone when I'm 20 times as big as you all! Hahahaha! Good ahead... call 911 again... call the army to come and stop the big ol' sexy giantess. I'll be waiting here and I'll be ready for them! Hahahaha! NOTHING CAN STOP YOUR GODDESS! HAHAHAHAHA!" (https://www.instagram.com/p/BUVA2V5FNO3/...)

Carmella stood there with her powerful hands-on-hips pose and awaited her next challenge. She was ready for the army to try their best to stop her. Almost on cue, Carmella heard rumblings and screams from behind her. Carmella turned her giant, sexy body around and was ready for her next challenge.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella's Reign Begins!

choices: Carmella finishes the army off and begins her reign as goddess.
Carmella hears a voice/voices... "You gonna take all that for yourself?"
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella was having the time of her life. She never knew how much she wanted to be a gigantic goddess until it all happened. She was 100 feet of sexual power and dominance and she never wanted that fact to change. To her, there was no one who could contest her power and strength. After all, the average human being was only 1/20th of her size. Also, Carmella was probably in better shape than 95% of the puny population when she was normal-sized, so her power, in comparison to the people beneath her, seemed endless.

In her first true display of her power, Carmella had wiped the floor with the police force that was tasked with responding to the threat of a giant woman running about. Despite the fact that the policemen's bullets did do some damage to Carmella, she still felt that she easily defeated her first challenge. In her mind, with the police force out of the way, there was no one who had any chance of stopping her for the near future. However, unbeknownst to Carmella, the response of the army to the impending doom that was to come from a gigantic, powerful woman, like Carmella was swift. (https://www.instagram.com/p/BJf9lK6hnu6/...)

"Well, well, well... look what we have here! Hahaha! I thought I was gonna get to pick on all of the small and worthless bugs on the ground, but this just got real interesting! Lemme guess... you guys saw what I did to that pesky police force and now YOU wanna crack at your new goddess? HA! Please... with this new power, NO ONE will be able to stop me! Hahahaha! Hahahahahaha!"

Carmella began to laugh hysterically at the military approaching her. Men, women, tanks, and jets all charged in as she awaited their attack. Of course, Carmella wasn't afraid to taunt the military who thought they had a chance of beating her.

"Jeez, more little guys and gals thinking they can stop me? Hahaha! Just because you had to work a little harder to become a part of the army doesn't make you any stronger than those pathetic bugs I crushed a couple minutes ago! Your bones will be crushed just as easily beneath my powerful legs and feet! You think your tanks, which don't look THAT small to be fair, and your dragonfly-sized jets can stop me!? Why don't ya come and try me? Hahahah! Go ahead mites! You get the first move! Hahahaha!"

Given her success against the police, Carmella was expecting the same victorious outcome. Sure, the firepower that the army was going to have may be better than what the police had to offer, but Carmella had no doubt in her mind of what was to come next. Police or military... they were all just tiny bugs to the gigantic goddess. However, Carmella may have bit off more than she can chew. The army may just have some real fight in them.

As expected, the army men and women were armed with full on assault rifles and sniper rifles. Gone were the days of pistols, which did cause more pain than expected for Carmella. Also, the army were much smarter in their tactics against Carmella. They didn't make the mistake of all grouping-up and standing still, making themselves an easy target for the large feet of Carmella. Therefore, they were able to attack Carmella from multiple sides, instead of just from the front, like the police did before them.

Not only were their tactics better than the police, but the army had tanks and jets to add that little extra punch to Carmella. Tanks had their large shells, while the jets had their quick machine guns, along with a small amount of rockets for potentially fatal blows. Also, the jets were able to move very quickly through the air and could actually reach the face and upper chest of the gargantuan Carmella, while the other forms of attack could not. Although, Carmella was still not impressed as she awaited their assault.

"What are you waiting for, little ones? You spent all this time coming to fight me and 'stop me'... are ya gonna do something or what? Oh, wait, I got it... you all are just that terrified of the sheer size of your goddess, huh? Hahahaha! I don't blame ya! I'd be scared too! I'd be VERY, VERY scared! Hahahaha! Now, hurry this up, it's been way too long since I crushed something! HAHA!"

Almost on queue, the army started to fire their weapons upon the gigantic beauty in front of them. Rifle fire and tank shells rained-in from all sides, while the jets buzzed about around Carmella's face. Much to the chagrin of Carmella and much to the delight of the army and the regular-sized people, Carmella seemed to be getting hurt! Carmella started to grunt and gasp after feeling the impact of the varying ordinance being fired at her.

Carmella was not ready for this much pain to come from the military. In her agony, she started to stomp the ground in front of her. Carmella was successful in crushing some of the army men and women, but the remaining soldiers, along with the tanks and jets, continued to pelt her with bullets and explosions. As the pain grew, so did the amount of force that was behind each of Carmella's stomps. The only way for her to deal with this pain was to try and stomp the soldiers firing at her.

After about 10 minutes of firing, Carmella was actually dropped to one knee, which caused a loud cheer from the people watching this fight. The gigantic woman who had just destroyed their local police force was actually close to being defeated! Since Carmella went down to one knee, she was no longer able to stomp the soldiers shooting at her, so she restarted to crushing some with her hands, picking them up and throwing them miles away, and even using cars to crush them. However, with each soldier she killed, it seemed that another came in their place.

Carmella was beginning to think this was the end. Did she get too greedy? Why did she think she could destroy the army so easily that she allowed them to get so close and to have the first shot? Did she really need to become a giantess? Sure, it was fun while it lasted, but now she is close to being dead! Carmella stared to cry out in pain an agony (https://img.bleacherreport.net/img/image...). Carmella was forced to fall down onto her stomach because of the pain from the military.

As she fell, people were forced to try and get away in time to avoid being crushed by the giantess that was crashing down towards them. Unfortunately, a bunch of people were crushed, along with some cars, but it seemed that the battle was won. Carmella, although not dead, lied down on the ground motionless. The military stopped their fire to avoid wasting ammo. At this moment, while laying face down in the middle of the city, Carmella traveled to a quiet, calm place in her mind.

In this calm state, she began to think about everyone who meant something to her in life. All of her family, past friends, current friends, boyfriends, and all others who were important to her went into and then out of Carmella's mind. After all of these people were flowing through her brain, the last people she saw... were the scientists who helped her become this huge in the first place. Carmella was angry at first in her own mind, but then wasn't. Just before leaving the hideout designated for her scientists, they gave her more of the growth serum that made her this powerful in the first place. This thought then stayed in Carmella's mind much longer than the others. Carmella's mind went from a happy, calm place... to a evil, sadistic place.

Carmella had remembered what she needed to no only defeat the military, but to be able to rule over this world. In her pocket, she had more of the growth serum... much, much more. As Carmella removed herself from her deep thinking state and back to consciousness, she started to form a evil smile on her face. She lifted-up her head to show the military her sadistic look. Then, to the angst of all those around, Carmella very slowly began to stand back up. Then, causing everyone to be even more stressed, Carmella began to slowly laugh, like she had done many times before. In between coughs and spitting-up blood, Carmella gave out more and more bellowing evil laughs. The military was stunned... stunned to the point where they didn't even resume firing.

"Haha... hahaha.... hahahahaha. You... *cough* idiots. *cough* *cough* Did you... really think that I... *cough* wouldn't have a back-up plan? You see... I'm not stuck at this size. *cough* *cough* No, no, no... I can get bigger... a LOT bigger. *cough* Hahaha... haha... hahaha."

Carmella then reached into her back pocket and pulled out another of the growth-serum-filled needles that she used before. However, unlike before, this one was larger and seemingly contained a lot more of the serum.

"Watch your goddess grow... *cough* *cough* Hahaha... hahaha!"

Carmella then stuck the needle into her arm like before and injected herself with the vary serum that made her as big as she is now. Carmella then chucked the needle miles away and instantly felt the effects. Carmella began to rub her body in absolute pleasure and ecstasy as she grew bigger and bigger and stronger and stronger. Carmella, although still feeling the pain of the attacks, began to laugh even more, still in between coughs and blood-spitting. Carmella looked absolutely deranged and insane while laughing madly as she grew.

The military was horrified at the sight. All of their hard work could be for nothing. As Carmella's growth seemed to stop, she stood over twice as tall at 250ft. Her muscles look even bigger and more terrifying than before. Her body, although marked with many scratches and cuts, still looked magnificent. Carmella would look down upon and address the military once more. (https://www.instagram.com/p/BYCVCbYlixy/...)

"Haha... hahaha! *cough* *cough* Look at me... *cough* I'm even bigger *cough* and stronger than before. *cough* Now... it's my turn."
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The End of Goddess Carmella?

choices: A broken needle (uh oh another diva has taken the growth serum)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella looked down at the tiny mortals below her. Mere minutes ago she was on the verge of death, the army had almost managed to successfully defeat her and end her reign as Goddess before it had even truly began. But now the tables had turned, she wasn't motivated by lust, greed or power. No. Right now she was motivated by 100% hate. How dare these bugs hurt her, she was bigger, stronger and more powerful than they could ever be, this didn't stop them from trying to beat her, sure from their point of view all they saw was a Godzilla like monster woman crushing and destroying everything she could get her hands on. But they weren't Carmella, they weren't in control, they didn't have the power and they didn't have the growth serum. Before her latest growth spurt she was measly 100ft tall, now she was a mighty 250ft tall and even more angry and evil than she was before. At 100ft Carmella simply wanted to have fun and was making everything up as she went along, hell at first all she wanted was to win the Money in the bank ladder match, but now all that was on her mind was sadistic thoughts. She wanted to make these bugs pay for hurting her, for making her cry and worst of all, for making her feel small. Never again would Carmella allow herself to feel small, she was the giantess, she was the ruler, no, she was the Goddess of this world and now she had to make the world's army pay and boyyyy would they pay. http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_... Carmella with a look of pure evil on her face gave the army below her a terrifying warning.

You bugs should've finished me off when you had the chance, I am going to enjoy every last second of what I'm about to do to you. The rest of you insects take notice, I will show no mercy to anyone who crosses me and there will be no second chances. So for those of you not in the army you better pay attention because if you don't worship me then you will meet the same fate. So sit back and relax and enjoy the show hihi"

Ending her warning with a maniacal laugh Carmella made her move, the poor army didn't even have a chance to respond the last thing one of the ground units saw was the gigantic sneaker of Carmella coming down. CRASH. The earth rattling boom shook the foundations of every building within a 5 mile radius. Carmella had managed to take out all thirty men and women of the first ground unit with one step. Standing up to her full intimidating height Carmella looked at the sole of her shoe and saw the mangled remains of the army.

"HAHAHA. Oh my God! Look at the mess on my shoe! What was that like 20 or 30 of you little bugs? That was wayyy to easy but trust me they were the lucky ones, they got a swift death. The rest of you will not get the same courtesy."

With that said Carmella continued her assault on the army. However not backing down the tanks all aimed at once and fired at Carmella, and hit her square in the chest. Carmella began to tip over, she appeared to have lost her footing and began tipping over like a chopped tree, the army began cheering having apparently finally toppled the murderous giantess. But that would be too easy. At the last second Carmella regained her footing and stood back up tall again, with a big smile plastered over her face that turns into thunderous laughter. https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/image...

"HAHAHAH I guess you little mites never learn, shoulda ran when you could. Now. My Turn."

Carmella instantly kicked half of the tanks with her foot and sends them flying into the buildings next to them, with the buildings collapsing as a result and burying the tanks underneath them. That wouldn't be the end though, for good measure Carmella ran full force and double stomped onto the collapsed building causing 6 more next to it to collapse and crush many civilians who were still in the area. Grinding her foot into the debris Carmella laughed once more, this had become almost her trademark at this point, attack the army, laugh and repeat. Turning her attention to the rest of the tanks she would pick them up one by one and break the cannon off. bringing each one to her face for a closer look she would gaze into the tank (she couldn't see the tiny people inside that well, but the image of herself staring daggers at scared soldiers was enough for her to enjoy) and finally she would slowly start to squeeze the tank until each the metal started to pop and contract under weight and power until she saw blood start to spill out, once that was done she would nonchalantly chuck the bloody remains of the tanks over her shoulder and move onto the next one until she ran out of tanks.

"Awwww did the big mean giantess break all your toys? What's that I couldn't hear you? Oh wait of course I can't hear you, you're all dead! Not that I would be able to hear you at my size anyway hahahahaha!!!!"

Just as Carmella had prepared to deliver another proclamation to the bugs of the world she was interrupted by the country's last chance. The remnants of the army had managed to join forces and launch a rag tag attack in the form of a flock of airplanes. Each one shot Carmella as she raised her arm to protect herself. This barrage of bullets continued for sometime until they heard a crash. Assuming thus was the collapse of Carmella they ceased fire. This would be their last mistake. The dust settled and from it stood an undamaged Carmella with a small building in hand, with another destroyed one riddled with bullet holes lying next to her. Carmella then took the other building and swung it at the airplanes hitting plane after plane and causing explosion after explosion. There were occasionally a few soldiers who jumped out of the planes and tried to parachute to safety, but this would result in a worse fate. They landed not on the ground but onto a tan plain that smelled of peach body lotion. They would then find themselves face to face with the terrifyingly beautiful face of Carmella https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.28... Who would smile and wink at the soldiers before dangling them over her mouth, the soldiers screamed but it was no good, Carmella dropped each one in chewed them up before sticking her tongue out at the remaining soldiers in her hands showing them the splattered remains of their comrades. After an hour there was only one plane left which landed instead if fighting and from it came what appeared to be the man in charge waving a white flag. The Giantess Carmella noticed this and bent down so she could get a better look at the general. https://www.thewrap.com/wp-content/uploa...

"What's this? Oh so now you understand? Now you get that I'm in charge in now. Well that's good, I hope you told the rest of your superiors because you wont be around long enough to give them the message hihi. And don't worry little bug I'm not gonna eat you, you bugs tasted terrible, I've got something better in mind for you!"

With that said Carmella lowered her finger and trapped the general, slowly lowering her finger so she could feel every bone in the mans body break as his screams filled the air before they stopped as the general exploded over the finger nail of Carmella who promptly sucked it to emphasise her dominance. And thus it was over. Carmella had defeated the army and was now the Goddess of the country, but it was way closer than it should have been.

"Ok all of you little bugs that are still alive listen up and listen well. My name is Carmella! And I am the most fabulous giantess the world has every seen. But being a giantess isn't enough, I am now your Goddess I am your ruler, so I'm gonna give you all 2 minutes to get out here and bow down to me before I grow again. Because 250ft isn't a height fitting of a Goddess, no a Goddess should be much. Much. Bigger."

Carmella reached into her pocket and prepared to pull out another growth needle, she found
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Goddess Carmella's revenge

choices: Carmella fends these two off in the early goings...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
*Small modification being made to the story at this point. Instead of the woman/women who grow to oppose Carmella being b/c of a growth needle, it'll be due to something else. I alluded to this being a possibility many chapters ago. Anyways, on with the story!*

Carmella was well on her way to becoming a goddess. She had the strength, the power, the body, the beauty, and the dominant attitude that all goddesses require. Not only that, but she held the key to getting even bigger, if she ever saw it to be fit. She had already utilized her growth serum to get out of that sticky army situation, where she was almost killed. However, she was able to get bigger and stronger and was victorious over the army, once and for all. With seemingly no one left to stop her, Carmella was finally ready to begin her reign as a goddess of the world. However, she may end up getting much more than what she asked for. In fact, she may have a BIG problem/problems coming very soon.

Regardless, after defeating the army, Carmella felt it was time to grow even more. She had just shown that 250ft was more than enough to defeat an army, so, surely it should be enough to rule over normal people. Alas, Carmella felt that she needs to be bigger to further display her power over here new servants. Much like before, Carmella addressed her mortals beneath her.

"Alright little ones... I think it's time your goddess kicked things up a notch, wouldn't ya say!? Like I said before, a goddess with this much power should be much bigger. So, since I can grow whenever I want, I think I AM gonna be much bigger! I'm gonna grow... and grow... and I'll be big enough to grab entire cities in my hands. No one will be able to touch me... just the way it should be and should've always been. Oh well, better late than never right guys!? Anyways, let's get big! Haha!"

Carmella began to pull out another needle with the growth serum that had done wonders for her so far. Thanks to it, Carmella was the biggest, strongest, and hottest woman the world had ever laid eyes on. And if anyone thought otherwise, she could just crush and kill whoever that may be. Carmella eyed-up another one of her magic needles... when she felt the ground start to tremble.

Carmella was thrown way off of her game when she felt this. No one should be making the ground shake under their power except for her! Then, she started to hear the screams of her subjects. Once again, no one should be making them scream except for her! What is going on!? It was only once Carmella turned around, slightly scared, when she saw the origin of these trembles and screams.

Coming in from the horizon, Carmella saw what she thought she'd never see. Not one, but TWO gigantic women are approaching her! She began to make-out who these two beautiful, gargantuan women were. When they got close enough, Carmella was horrified.

Coming into view were the gigantic Charlotte and Becky Lynch (or CharLynch as they've been dubbed). They looked stunning, on top of looking huge. Their proportions definitely didn't slack-off during their growths. Their boobs, asses, and muscles all seemed to equally get huge during the process. They were looking very powerful, which worried Carmella. Not only were they her height of 250ft and looking strong as ever, there were two of them! Given their history and what people have said about them, they are surely going to be working together to take down Carmella.

"Well, well, well... look at this Char'! It's been a long time since we've seen Carmella!"

Why... yes Becky! It has been a long time! However, she doesn't have that much of a size advantage over us as she did before, right?"

"It doesn't look that way does it ! In fact, it looks like we are about the same size of our little Staten Island Princess! A ripe 250ft, just like us! Haha!"

"That's right Becky... but, she looks a little confused and perhaps even frightened! Perhaps we should fill her in on what happened AND the amount of fun we had because of her!"

"I guess we could do that Char'! The least we could do is let Carmella in on the secret! After all, it is HER fault that we are this big! Hahahaha!"

Carmella was stunned. How could this happen? What were these two gigantic women talking about? It was Carmella's fault that they are this huge? Her mind was racing as she looked over at CharLynch and saw them smirking at her, almost taunting her. It seemed that they wanted Carmella to figure what had happened as they were whispering to one another, probably making fun of Carmella for taking so long to understand the events. Finally, after about a minute of Carmella racking her brain of what could've happened, it finally hit her.

Way back before Carmella got huge, she remembered seeing CharLynch giving some weird looks towards Carmella when she was so protective of her bag before the MITB match. Carmella also remembered that she never saw her bag for the rest of night after she had to leave for her interview. All she had was her gear and her growth needle. However, she also remembered that the scientists she hired created another form of growth. Those idiotic scientists also made a growth potion, which wouldn't work as fast as the growth needles, but would work just as well. The scientists even tried to warn Carmella before she got to 100ft tall that she needed to go to the arena and get her bag. However, she never listened to what they had said.

"You bitches! I should've known! You both drank the growth formula didn't you! God, those stupid scientists! Why would they make another way to get huge when they knew that I wanted just the serum and needles! Ahhhhhhhh!" (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_...)

Charlotte and Becky were both very amused by Carmella's anger. They both laughed in unison and began taunting Carmella once again.

"That's right you idiot! You thought you were so much smarter than everyone else. You thought you could go in there, look all suspicious, grow big and huge, and then walk away without anyone knowing or questioning it? Me and Charlotte could see that you had something up your sleeve from the beginning? Right Charlotte?"

"Indeed we did, my lovable Lass-Kicker! You see, you sat there in the locker room and guarded your bag with your LIFE! But, once you had to leave, me and Becky thought we'd have a little look in your bag. Turns out, we saw a vial with some weird looking liquid inside. We knew you had something planned, so we said, why not!? Hahaha!"

"Yup! So, I drank half and The Queen over here drank the other half and viola! Unfortunately, we weren't able to grow as quickly as you! We went into the match saying that we were gonna use whatever the hell was in that vial to win the match and we were gonna do it together. With our compared power, no one can stop us! No one has before and DEFINITELY no one will now! Hahaha!"

"So, we start on our way home... when we both start to feel a little strange! Becky and I look at each other and we both knew that the growth potion was kicking-in. We looked at each other, began to smile with lust in our eyes, and we began to grow! We grew like it was nobody's business too! We grew and grew, got stronger and stronger... and eventually, we got stuck at this size, 250ft! Or, about that much, we were never really sure! Haha!"

"And with this new size and power, Charlotte and I went on to test out our new bodies! We heard rumblings of you having trouble with the army, which made you get even bigger, thanks to the minions we had in the neighboring towns. Those little guys were so helpful... well, until me and Char' squashed all of them! Hahaha!"

"That's right! With our combined strength, we were to bend some small towns with ease! And come to think of it, it was really fun! Being so much bigger and stronger than the little people running around at your feet makes them get real scared and they do whatever you want them to! So, some of them were our foot slaves, some of them got us food... if we just didn't eat them... and some of them told us what was going on with you! Once we heard that you were done with the army, we came jetting over here! Right Becks?"

"We sure did! Thanks for keeping the army occupied for us as well! Without them, those little mites were just too easy to control! You never know how much you can get done when you got two sexy, giant women destroying things without breaking a sweat!" *Becky shot Charlotte a lustful look and gave a nice little rub on her gigantic ass* "And come to think of it... we both only drank half of that little potion of yours! If either of us drank that whole thing, we'd probably be ruling this whole state by now! But, don't worry! There's still time for that later! Hahaha!"

"Exactly Becks! Once we take care of our little Staten Island problem, no one will be able to stop us! With you and the army out of the way, we can start to have some REAL fun! Hahaha! So, what do ya say Becky? Let's show this wannabe goddess the power of TWO giantesses? Hahahaha!"

"With pleasure my queen! With pleasure! Hahahaha!" (http://imgur.com/a/3VMkk)

Carmella couldn't believe what just happened. She went from being the lone goddess who was just about to begin her reign, when this bombshell hit her. She was infuriated with her carelessness, as well as with the scientists for making that growth formula in the first place. If she got out of this mess, she was sure to find them and pay them a painful visit. However, she was now forced to fight CharLynch two on one!

Charlotte and Becky finally took their arms off of one another and Becky began to circle around Carmella. These two were ready to launch a two-pronged attack on the Staten Island Goddess. What will happen next!?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: New Goddesses in Town?

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Becky Lynch and Charlotte had Carmella surrounded, having managed to grow to her height of 250ft she was in a lot of trouble, it was actually extremely lucky she had injected herself earlier otherwise she would be less than half of the size of these two titanic beauties. Before she had a second to think about it she was blind-sighted by Becky as the battle of the Goddesses began. Carmella hit the ground with a thunderous boom, causing major earthquakes for all the unfortunate people who were within 10miles of this deadly yet sexy brawl. Becky couldn't help but laugh at the so called Goddess who was now at her and Charlotte's mercy.

"Hahaha I can't believe how easy that was! Even if I had been fair and hit you to your face you still would've went down, just another Tuesday Night for you then!"

"Don't take your eyes off her Becky, she may be down but I doubt she's out yet" warned Charlotte.

Almost on cue Carmella swiped Becky's leg out from under her, causing the enormous Lass Kicker to come crashing down to the ground below, crushing and killing many people upon landing. Taking full advantage of her momentary dominance Carmella locks Becky in a headlock and taunts her. http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_...

"You shouldn't take your eyes of me sweetheart, I am Goddess Carmella, I cannot and will not be taken down by the likes of you, you little Irish bitch!"

Smiling down at a few people stupid enough to be gawking at two beautiful gigantic women fighting each other (ok there's worse ways to go) Carmella tightens her grip and stamps down in the gawking crowd splattering them all over the bottom of her shoe as she screamed in delight.

"Oh my God!!!! This feels so fucking good! I'm beating up a giantess and crushing some little bugs at the same time, I truly am a Goddess!! Nobody can stop me!"

The second those words left her mouth Carmella paid for it. Forgetting that there was two other giantesses not one Carmella was taken down by the biggest natural selection Charlotte had ever hit, grabbing Carmella by her hair she flips over Becky and pulls Carmella's head with her causing it to crash into the ground almost knocking her out cold. Standing up and wiping some debris and the bloody remains of some unlucky people off her knees Charlotte walks over and helps her beloved Lass Kicker up before embracing her. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/ori...

"You ok Becky? That bitch didn't hurt you did she?"

"No I'm ok Char, you were right I shouldn't have let my guard down, little miss Staten island is smarter than she looks, thanks though I appreciate you looking out for me"

Becky then plants a big sloppy kiss on Charlotte who happily reciprocates, this lasts 30 seconds until they are interrupted by the sound of Carmella starting to stand up.

"We'll finish this later Beck, we have some unfinished business to attend to. You wanna have a go at her?"

"Nah I had my fun, you saved me so you can go and beat her up for a while, ill go and have some fun with these little mites"

Slapping Charlottes ass on her way Becky turned and walked over to a still inhabited part of the city as Charlotte prepared to lay another beating onto Carmella. Carmella struggles to her feet and just as she stands up Charlotte runs up and delivers a big (HUGE) boot to her face, knocking her onto her perfectly shaped ass. Reeling from such a tremendous hit Carmella starts to panic, luckily she regains her composure and plays possum waiting for Charlotte to get close enough for her to make her move.

"Awwww is the little princess hurt? Well get used to it cause its about to get much, much worse haha!"

Grabbing Carmella by her hair again Charlotte prepares to attack once more, but Carmella being the sneaky heel she is grabs a double decker bus and whacks Charlotte right in the face with her, stunning her for the moment.

"Ahh!! What the fuck! What do you think you're doing you little..."

Before she can finish her sentence Carmella leaps onto Charlotte and locks her in a choke hold to Charlottes disbelief. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

"Wow. How stupid can you bimbos be? Twice you've had me beat and twice I've gotten out of it, now once I choke your little ass out I'm gonna grow and take out your little girlfriend, slowly I might add haha"

Charlotte was struggling to stand up, Carmella was choking the life out of her, her only hope was for Becky to save her if she noticed in time!

Meanwhile

About 30 feet away. (A few miles in reality) Becky was having fun torturing some little people, she would pick them up and throw them up in air and catching them a few times before eventually "missing" and letting the people drop to their deaths. Eventually getting bored of this Becky decided to do something she had wanted to try since the moment she became a giantess. Hovering her foot over the tiny people she would command them to run for their lives as she taunted them, with a classic few lines.

"You little mites better run! Or else my big Ol foot will crush you! Fe! Becky stomps a crowd of people "Fi!" She kicks a building causing it to collapse and crush everyone inside "Fo!" She steps on another crowd "Fum!!!" Becky jumps and crushes the biggest crowd of people so far.

"Hahaha, I have wanted to do that for ages! Look out little mites or the big bad giantess will step on you! Hey Char you're missing out on a load of f..."

Becky stops dead and sees that Carmella is choking out her beloved Charlotte and immediately makes a bee line for Carmella. Making it there in a few short seconds she jumps and tackles Carmella off of Charlotte as she gasps for air. Becky and Carmella start rolling over the debris of the city as several onlookers are crushed under the two women's massive forms. After a few minutes of ground and pound on one another Carmella pulls out her emergency growth needle and prepares to inject herself but just as she goes to do it Becky slaps it out of her hand and sends it flying a few feet away. Staring each other out the two women hesitate before diving for the needle. Causing a massive boom as the two women hit the ground a massive cloud of dust covers the area. Charlotte meanwhile has recovered and looks over to the two women and the dust settles as we see someone standing up with the needle in hand ready for an injection. It was firmly in the hand of
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Two Goddesses are better than one

choices: CharLynch trick Carmella into having some BIG problems...
Carmella has some REAL fun with Becky...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The battle of the colossals was only just beginning. Carmella was in a 2-on-1 disadvantage, but was doing well to fend-off the gigantic Charlotte and Becky Lynch. When the fights were one-on-one, Carmella seemed to be coming out on top. However, when you have to giantesses against one, there's always going to be those instances where the two gets the better of the one. Time and time again, it seemed that just when Carmella was establishing control over her opponent, the other would come along and shift the balance towards their side. Carmella knew that if she was going to survive this fight and become the goddess of this world, she was going to need to pull-out all of the stops. Carmella had one last trump card... her growth needles.

The growth needles, along with the growth serum inside, got Carmella out of a sticky situation before, why wouldn't it work again now? It looked as if Carmella was going to inject herself once more, when Becky was quick on her feet and knocked the needle out of Carmella's hands. The two would then dive onto the downed needle, which probably looked like a skyscraper to the people below. After the long scuffle, only one was going to retain the needle in their grasp. And, as before, it was Carmella who came out on top.

Carmella knew she couldn't waste any time playing around or belittling her opponents or the tinies at her feet, like before. As soon as she retrieved the growth needle, she found a good spot to inject herself and just stuck herself with it. Once the syringe penetrated her skin, she pressed down on the needle and watched with glee as the magical growing serum moved into her body and, more specifically, straight into her bloodstream. Carmella awaited the effects of her serum and began to look back towards the direction of Becky and the partially-downed Charlotte (http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_...).

Carmella was ready to take back control of her playground that we call Earth. Knowing they didn't have much time, Charlotte and Becky pounced onto Carmella. Perhaps if they kill her fast enough, she won't be able to get the benefits of growing bigger and stronger. Charlotte tackled Carmella to the ground and Becky began punching and stomping on her body. This short fury of offense was the most intense that we had seen CharLynch. However, it was soon going to be apparent that it was too late.

Carmella was able to get back up, but CharLynch were just beating on her. However, in the process of punching and kicking Carmella, they noticed the horrible change that was occurring... Carmella was getting bigger. The beating continued, but Carmella was able to power-out of it. She was able to throw Charlotte and Becky to the side, each with only one arm, and started to laugh as she knew she was getting bigger and stronger once again.

"Hahaha! You FOOLS! Did you really think two giantesses could defeat a GODDESS!? Puh-lease! Haha! I've always been destined to rule this puny little world, gals. I can't believe that two girls who luckily got huge could beat someone like me! As you can see girls... I have always and will always have the upper hand. You think I couldn't get any bigger!? Hahahaha! Trust me, I can get as big and as strong and as powerful as I want! Haha! Don't worry I won't get too big now! I wanna be able to see your faces when I dominate and squash ya! Hahahaha!"

Carmella was right, she was getting bigger, stronger, and more powerful by the second. CharLynch stopped their attacks and just watched as Carmella slowly ascended into the sky, as they once had. They couldn't lie, they were a little intimidated and began to think about how the people below them must've felt when they got huge. Carmella seemed to be having the time of her life, even though this was her 4th time growing. However, knowing that she overcame TWO gigantic women to allow herself to grow made this experience feel so much better.

As CharLynch watched Carmella's body transform into being bigger and somehow even more strong and toned than before, they began to get worried about their chances. It seemed that Carmella was forming muscles that weren't even possible of forming and she planned on using all of her power and might to destroy the two of them. Carmella grew to 300ft, then 350ft, then 400ft, then 450ft. Just when it seemed like her growth would never end, Carmella finished her growth at about 500ft tall, 100x the size of a normal person and twice the size of Charlotte and Becky. Carmella surveyed her body and the situation and was very pleased with her newest growth. Her voice boomed at she began talking to Charlotte and Becky, but she could be heard for miles. (https://i.pinimg.com/236x/74/2f/2d/742f2...)

"Ohhh yeahhhh bitches! Hahahaha! This feels fucking AMAZING! I can see for miles now! Hahaha! Who the fuck can stop me now!? Oh! That's right! You two little ones are going to right!? Haha! Look at ya... you two only come up to about my waist now! Awwwwww! Aren't you two so cute!? Hahaha! I love it when I get some new toys! Although, be careful girls... I've always had a problem with BREAKING my toys! Hahahahaha! Let's have some fun girls, shall we?"

Charlotte and Becky were horrified at what they've just witnessed. The girl with the biggest ego they've every met just got a whole lot bigger... twice as big as them in fact! They both inspected Carmella's even more improved body, which seemed to radiate with power. They looked up at Carmella who was grinning ear-to-ear down at them. Charlotte and Becky both looked at each other with the intent to run, when Carmella began walking towards them.

Just by walking, Carmella was causing huge booms and quakes to the ground she walked upon. Her legs and feet were so powerful at this size that buildings seemed to be barely hanging on from her footsteps. She playfully strutted over to where CharLynch were standing and bent down to get a better look. Carmella began to pinch the cheeks of Charlotte and Becky like they were little kids and, to be fair, that's what they looked like to Carmella now.

Charlotte didn't take too kindly to this treatment and swiftly punched Carmella in the face. Although it wasn't as forceful as Charlotte's punches from before, it still hurt, which caused Carmella to take her car-sized hand and smack Charlotte across the face, sending her a few feet.
