Before she got up however she moved Becky carefully to the edge of the city and also accidentally dropped her growth needle near to her as she set off to confront Carmella.

Carmella began to stir as she sat up and began massaging her jaw. Unlike Becky Carmella had been lucky enough to have a softer landing mainly due to being twice Becky’s height and having not fallen head first onto a destroyed skyscraper, but she did land ass first onto a small building and had along with debris the bloody reamains of some dimwitted survivors who thought they had found shelter. Brushing the mess off of her ass Carmella rose to her intimidating 1000ft height and angrily began giving out about Charlotte’s cheap shot.

“AHHHHHH I’m gonna kill that bitch!!!!! How dare she strike the Goddess of Staten Island like that!? Oh I am gonna make her pay just wait until I grow, she won’t know what hit he...”

Carmella was unable to finish her threat as out of nowhere Charlotte ran up and speared her sending both women crashing through or more accurately on a couple of skyscrapers, demolishing the buildings instantly and killing many more idiotic people who still thought that hiding in a city in the middle of a giantess battle royal was a good idea. Charlotte then started to ground and pound on Carmella as the smaller woman desperately covered her face in a poor attempt to protect herself. Charlotte wasn’t even smiling as she struck her enemy, she was full of so much anger at what she had done to both her and her lover Becky that she couldn’t even enjoy the punishment she was inflicting on her, and that would be her undoing.

Out of desperation Carmella did the only thing she could think of, not even looking she stuck her hand up and clawed right at Charlotte’s face and with incredible luck she manages to poke Charlotte right in the eye. Charlotte cry’s in pain as she clutches her face but seeing her opening Carmella elbows her right on the nose knocking Charlotte off of her and allowing Carmella to finally get back to her feet, Carmella has a look of pure rage on her face and begins sticking and stomping the shit out of the downed Charlotte as she yelled in anger.

“Yeah you like that bitch! You think you can hit me an get away with it? Well looks like you fucked yo big time you giant bimbo! I’m gonna enjoy squashing you like the bug you are Charlotte so say good bye to Becky because you’re never gonna see her again”

With that Carmella reached into her back pocket and took out the remaining growth needles. Taking all of them in here hand Carmella smiled devilishly as she prepared to give herself the biggest growth spurt of all time. But just as she was about to inject herself Charlotte kicks out form the ground and managed to perfectly strike the hand with all the growth needles in them and as a result sent them flying in all directions as Carmella looked on stunned. The needles went everywhere, some landed and damaged some nearby buildings (they conveniently grew with Carmella, who would have known?) and some were scattered on the outskirts of town. One of them however managed to go even further and land directly above the arena where the other woman wrestlers where and the needle began leaking somewhat as the growth serum slowly dripped onto the arena (remember that for later).

Carmella still stunned at what just happened screamed as her failsafe literally slipped out of her grip and flew away from her. Charlotte username is distraction as the perfect opportunity to get back on her feet. As she did so Carmella somewhat regained her composure and stood face to face with her rival. Even though Carmella was about a head shorter than Charlotte making her roughly Alexa Bliss sized compared to a normal sized Charlotte, it didn’t matter. Carmella could still keep up with the larger woman something that both angered and impressed Charlotte who almost wished she had taken Carmella up on her offer to join forces. But alas it was not meant to be, so this was it Carmella and Charlotte prepared to square off and finish their titanic battle.

“I have to admit Carmella you’re tough for a small fry, but make no mistake at the end of the day your are gonna bow down to the queen.”

“Haha it’s too late to win my favour now Charlotte, you’ve already sealed your fate. So now I think it’s time for the Princess to succeed the Queen.”

Carmella and Charlotte then charge at each other causing the earth to shake back and forth and resulting in several buildings collapsing under the force that these two titanic women were emanating. What happens in their fight?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Charlotte vs Carmella: Giantess Rumble

choices: A new giantess emerges (in a BIG way)...
Carmella or Charlotte finish the fight once and for all...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
*Wanted to add a different option for someone to add to for this story... sorry that neither woman grows just yet in this chapter*

The battle lines were drawn. Stood in the middle of a ruined city were two beautiful gigantic women who both wanted the same thing... world domination. These two women (with another slightly smaller, yet still gigantic woman on the outskirts of the city) were sizes that no one on planet Earth had ever seen before or ever thought they would see before.

One of these women was Carmella, the Staten Island Princess turned Staten Island Goddess due to her 1000ft stature. She handled the army with absolute ease when she was only 250ft tall... a 1/4th of the size that she is now! If she could destroy an entire army at 250ft, she could certainly cause ungodly amounts of destruction at 1000ft. Her spunky and merciless attitude would leave the mortals below to believe that she would rule with an iron fist and would thoroughly enjoy killing and destroying whatever opposed her.

The other woman was Charlotte Flair, the Nature Girl turn Nature Goddess due to her 1250ft stature. Alongside her longtime friend, Becky Lynch (who was also a giantess), they were able to force many smaller towns to submit to their will before just destroying them anyway just for fun and pleasure. Charlotte was the naturally bigger and stronger woman than Carmella and being 250ft taller than her was definitely going to exaggerate that difference, or so she thought. After a small scuffle at each other's current sizes, it was clear that Carmella was still very dangerous to Charlotte's reign despite her smaller size. Therefore, Charlotte knew that she needed to be calculated in her attack.

Carmella was on the verge of fulfilling her promise to the world, which was using her growth needles to grow miles tall. If she would've been able to do this, she would obviously be the one in control and her battle with Charlotte was long be over by now. However, Charlotte's craftiness allowed her knock the growth needles to various parts of the city, including one breaking over the arena where this thing all started. With one of these needles breaking and the powerful growth serum dripping into the open arena was sure to cause problems later on (and they certainly will). The plan for both of these women was surely very similar. Despite the size difference, they were pretty evenly matched.

For Carmella, she definitely wanted to get bigger. Not only did it make her feel powerful, but it would surely shift the power in her favor. She proved to Charlotte and herself that she can evenly battle Charlotte, even though she's smaller. If she was able to grow just a little bit more, she would have enough power to take her down for good and it would love every second of it.

For Charlotte, it seemed that she needed even more of a size advantage to put Carmella away. Who cares if Carmella can put up a decent fight right now... at some point, size would matter and her size and strength advantage would allow her to prevail. Being the bigger woman, surely this would allow her to get to the growth needles before Carmella.

Charlotte and Carmella began to charge at one another to finally get their colossal showdown underway. Both women knew that they couldn't just go for the growth needles at the start. You would be running a major risk in trying to choose the best growth needle to inject yourself with. As far as these women know, all of the growth needles possess the same of growth serum, but that would prove to not be the case in the future (especially if a new giantess comes along). Therefore, they both tried their best to incapacitate the other long enough to collect maybe two or three of these needles.

The battle started with Carmella ducking a big boot from Charlotte and getting behind her. This was one of the very few advantages of being smaller than Charlotte is that she has an easier time dodging her attacks. Once she was behind Charlotte, she jumped on her back and began trying to choke her out. Carmella was able to get Charlotte down to one knee before her power took over and Charlotte was able to flip Carmella over her head and off of her back.

As Carmella was rolling through to get to her feet again, Charlotte was able to connect with her big boot, sending Carmella flying to the ground. The massive impact of Carmella hitting the ground caused shockwaves that could be felt for miles. Charlotte then quickly hopped on Carmella and began furiously punching her in the face. Carmella was getting pummeled and is bleeding quite badly before she was able to through rubble in the eyes of Charlotte. After throwing the rubble in her eyes, she punched Charlotte in the nose, causing it to bleed a little. Once again both women made it to their feet.

"Face it Charlotte... you can't beat me even though your bigger and stronger than me! I'm too quick and too smart for you and I deserve to be ruling this playground called Earth. If you want any chance of living, you'll let me grow huge right now. Don't worry you can be my executive slave once I'm miles tall! Hahaha!" (https://www.instagram.com/p/BdLFlDpFd4H/...)

Hahaha! You wish Carmella. You don't think I can see what you're trying here? You're getting way too tired trying to deal with me and I'm just getting warmed up and having fun! You know my size and power is too much for you and you're trying to weasel your way out of losing again. You look much worse for wear than me and I'm not even breaking a sweat! Hahahaha!" (https://www.instagram.com/p/BZPVtr2Axgs/...)

Both women felt as if they had the upper hand, but they both knew to finally end this, they needed to get bigger and stronger. If either of these women were able to get their hands on a growth needle or two, not only would they surely win this battle, but the world would be theirs to play with. With this idea in mind, both women were ready to end this battle once and for all, although they thought they could hear moans of pleasure in the background.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella and/or Charlotte get that Growing feeling

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
For what seemed like an enternity the battle for essentially world domination waged onwards. In one corner (or demolished ruins of a once proud city) stood the self proclaimed princess of Staten Island who had actually outgrown Staten Island is more than way, the mighty Carmella who was an impressive 1000ft tall. And in the other corner was the self proclaimed “Queen” of WWE, the even mightier Charlotte who was an even more impressive 1250ft tall. The two giantesses hadn’t been battling for some time now, each one wanted to rule the world and each one wanted the other to either submit to them or be crushed under their foot. There was also another interesting factor to the equation, one that both women had gotten to know very...veeeeerrrrry personally, the red headed Irish Lass kicker herself Becky Lynch who stood at a modest yet still gigantic 500ft. But for the time being she was a non factor as she currently laid unconscious on the outskirts of the city with a growth needle not to far from her. But back to the main story which was the giantess showdown, which was about to get a lot BIGGER.

Charlotte decided to make the first move, with her superior height and strength she thought her victory was a sure thing. However being the smaller woman Carmella had access to a lot more speed and ability and was easilly able to dodge her opponents oncoming attack, as she did so she managed to sweep Charlotte’s leg out from under her and send her crashing into the ground creating an earth shaking boom that was so powerful it sent a shockwave right to the arena where a growth needle just so happened to be precariously resting on top of...Anyways while she was down Carmella mounted Charlotte and began to give her a good old fashioned ground and pound (take that as you will).

“You like that Charlotte? Huh? Sorry I can’t hear you, your mouth seems to be full up with my fist haha!!!!”

As Carmella taunted her foe further she made the classic mistake of mouthing off, something which Charlotte was morenthns happy to take advantage of. Moving her head slightly to the side, Camella’s last punch missed and hit the cold, hard and unforgiving ground that was covered with the debris of several buildings, recoiling in agony Carmella then found herself flat on her back with another person pounding on her (just another Friday night) Charlotte then took her turn laying into Carmella with a flurry of punches as she vented her anger with the smaller woman.

“What was that? Sorry can’t hear you!!!! It’s funny even when you’re tall you’re still a little bitch!!!!”

Charlotte kept on hitting her foe with such force that nearby (barely still standing) buildings began shaking. But eventually Carmella was able swipe at Charlotte’s eyes causing the titanic woman to stumble bakxmoff of her and crushing a few hundred people along the way (they had it coming ,still-being in the area like idiots) as Carmella rose to her feet slightly out of breath and with a look of pure hate on her face. Charlotte meanwhile managed to regain her composure and looked over at a woman she absolutely hated, her eyes bloodshot both from the anger and from the shit to her eyes. This was it they needed to end things now.

As Charlotte and Carmella charged at each other it happened. Out of nowhere the ground began shaking, buildings started to collapse and the tremors only got louder, worse and closer! Charlotte and Carmella stopped dead in their tracks. Both of their expressions had changed to stunned, gulping both women turned and looked over to where Becky laid praying that it was her that was causing this tremor. To their horror she was still laying unconscious. No the cause of the tremor would soon make itself known.

“Hiya ladies! Looks like you’re all having a great time, do you mind adding one more to the party hahaha!!!!”

The woman’s laugh sent shivers down the spines of both Charlotte and Carmella who felt the fs,ilair sensation of sweat dripping down their foreheads and across their scared faces. Both woman turned o face their new foe, slowly the saw the towering and gigantic 2000ft tall figure of...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: New Giantess In Town

choices: Charlotte and Carmella (and Becky?) work together to try and overcome the odds!
It's Lana time for some fun!
Lana said "a few women" were at the arena, oh no... (More giantesses!?)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Just when Charlotte and Carmella thought they had enough to deal with in fighting each other, they've now received a new problem. A 2000ft tall problem! A problem that was literally double the size of the already gigantic and 1000ft Carmella. Carmella only came up to about just lower than crotch area and a bit taller than knee level of this gargantuan goddess. Charlotte, who was a head taller than Carmella, only came up to this woman's belly button and almost at her crotch level.

These two gigantic goddesses in their own right could not believe what they were seeing. If anyone were to grow this big, it may have been Becky due to the fact that she was flying under the radar and could've picked up a lot of growth needles during Carmella and Charlotte's fight. However, this 2000ft goddess was someone much, much worse. Becky probably would have some remorse for Carmella and Charlotte due to their personal ties. However, Carmella and Charlotte were forced to scan the powerful body of this woman, only to see the sadistic grin of... Lana!

The 2000ft problem that Carmella, Charlotte, Becky, and the rest of the world has to deal with is manifested in the form of the incredibly sexy Lana. Lana was the dream woman of many of the male, and perhaps some female, fans of the WWE. She was smoking hot and knew that she was good looking, which added to her appeal. She was always telling people to "CRUSH!" others. However, it's safe to say that she'll be doing some crushing on her own now.

"Hahahaha! Ahhh! This feels fantastic ladies! Who would've thought this would happen, huh? Just a little bit ago, I was sitting back and watching you two little kids and the even smaller kid, Becky, fight it out over who was gonna rule the world. I was terrified at first because I thought for sure one of you were going to come back to the arena and finish the job before something like THIS would happen! Hahaha! Once, I saw the fun you were having, I had to find a way to get involved! And what do you know? One of your growth needles burst open into the arena and I was one of the few women left at the arena when the growth serum dripped in through the roof. I don't know if I was the only one that was hit by the growth serum but I'm sure glad I was! Hahaha!"

Charlotte and Carmella were horrified to hear this. How could they allow this to happen? Was this Charlotte's fault for smacking the growth needles out of Carmella's hand so forcefully, causing one to break open? Or, was this Carmella's fault for trying to grow incredibly large and bringing the extra growth needles into this fight in the first place? Whether it was one reason or both... it didn't matter now because Lana was here and bigger than ever and it sounds like she wants to have some fun with her new toys.

"Listen Lana... I don't know what you think you're doing here. Me and Charlotte were trying to figure this out, one-on-one. A true battle between two deserving goddesses to see who will rule the world. Hear me out Lana... why don't you just go and try to find my scientists so that they can tell you how to shrink back down, ok? You are wayyyy too big to rule the world anyway! Ha..haha?"

Carmella was trying her best to persuade Lana into not crushing herself and maybe even Charlotte on the spot. Carmella's nervous laugh at the end of her plea showed her lack of confidence that this plan would work out. The size advantage that Lana possessed at this time was unlike anything she had faced before. Sure, she was giving 250ft to Charlotte and was doing just fine, but this is a whole different story. Lana was twice her size and was surely many times stronger than her. Lana could defeat and crush her without even thinking about it. Therefore, she and Charlotte were in a terrible spot.

Lana wasn't too impressed by Carmella's obvious ploy to try and stop Lana's reign before it even begins. Lana looked at the small child around her crotch and couldn't help but laugh some bellowing, evil laughs in Carmella's direction.

"Hahahahaha! Oh, what was that you Staten Island pipsqueak? You think I should go and find some scientists and shrink down for you! Hahaha! That's got to be the funniest thing I've heard all year! Let me tell you, Charlotte, Becky, and whoever else can hear my bellowing voice what's gonna happen here. I'm gonna have fun beating you two to a pulp and showing the world that I'm so powerful that I can easily squash and beat up two giantesses who are 200x their microscopic size. Then, I'm gonna go around and pick up all of your little growth needles and then I'll decide if I wanna grow even bigger or if I wanna put them somewhere for same keeping! Either way, I win! Hahahaha!"

On the outskirts of the city, Becky Lynch was finally starting to stir after all that she had been through. As she began to wake up, her vision was getting less hazy. While there was still some haziness left, she looked towards the heart of the city where she saw an absolutely massive 2000ft tall woman. She was trying to make out if either Charlotte or Carmella had won their showdown and grown to these massive heights.

However, as Becky's vision became more clear... she saw not two gigantic blondes, but three gigantic blondes! She could also notice that one of these three blondes were much larger than the other two, surely giving herself the clear advantage. As it was displayed earlier, Becky didn't really mind if Charlotte or Carmella were the victor, she just wanted to love and worship whichever hot blonde won. Once Becky fully regained consciousness, she realized that neither option was the case. Instead, she realized that the even more titanic woman standing in the middle of the city was Lana, who was posing and loving every second of her size (https://www.instagram.com/p/Bd1NA9HF18Y/...).

"Holy shit! What happened!? All I remember is that Charlotte came over to me and kissed me before I got knocked out and she was going over to fight Carmella to see who was gonna rule the world! Now, I wake up to see that not only are Charlotte and Carmella still alive, but now there is an even BIGGER Lana!?"

Becky's disbelief mirrored the disbelief that still ran through the minds of Charlotte and Carmella, who may now be starting to fully realize their dire situation. Before they could begin to react any further, Lana felt the need to display her newfound power over these two smaller, yet still immensely gigantic and powerful women.

To do this, Lana felt the need to stomp the ground very hard, yet still not even exerting her full potential and strength. Despite holding back of force, any buildings that still remained standing in this city, as well as Charlotte and Carmella began to shake and collapse. Yes, these two huge women even were knocked off by the sheer force of one of Lana's gigantic stomps. Seeing the amount of damage she caused to the surrounding and area AND the other two giantesses lead to Lana to be surprised and evilly laugh with joy and malice, while even pulling out a little dance that she performed over her downed foes (https://www.instagram.com/p/Bb2i7TTldHQ/...).

"Hahahaha! Wow... I really am the most powerful thing this world has ever seen! All it takes for me is just one stomp and I can cause buildings AND gigantic women to bend to my will! I don't know how much longer I can contain myself... I think it's some for me to have some fun with you little toys."

Becky looked on as this scenario played out in front of her. Thankfully for her, Lana had no idea where she was at, so this bought her some time to think. Obviously, she didn't have much time to think or act because it shouldn't take long for Lana to wipe the floor with Charlotte and Carmella (especially after seeing what she was capable of with just one stomp). She spotted a few of the growth needles scattered around the outskirts of the city.

If Becky were somehow able to get these needles into herself or the other two, they may have a shot of defeating Lana. Who knows...? Maybe, Carmella had a good idea with the whole scientist thing. Perhaps they'd be able to create a serum that reverses the effects of the growth? Whatever plan she decides to go with, she had to decide fast!

As for Charlotte and Carmella, they didn't have the luxury that Becky has at the moment. Lana is honed in on these two and she seems hornier than ever over the thought of easily crushing them. Therefore, it seems like they have only a couple options. They could try to go their separate ways and fight the colossal Lana on their own (and surely be defeated). Or, they could put their differences aside and work together to find a way to bring Lana back down to size! The latter was obviously the plan that these two women almost telepathically communicated to one another.

Therefore, the battle lines were redrawn. When it looked like Charlotte and Carmella were going to be fighting over the who would rule the world once and for all, they now found themselves as allies (like Charlotte considered earlier) against Lana. They couldn't help but also hone in on the fact that Lana did say that she was "one of the few women left" in the arena when the needle burst open. Who knows how much of the serum Lana got... but if one needle was able to make her this large, who knows if the same happened to others, if it happened at all!

Either way, Charlotte and Carmella dug their heels into the ground and looked to be ready for a fight. Once looked down upon these two women and couldn't help but laugh once again at their spunky attitudes (https://www.instagram.com/p/BfJd-MSFn0e/...).

"Hahahaha! Oh... this should be fun! Lana... CRUSH! Hahahaha!"
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The World's New COLOSSAL Problem

choices: One of them grabbed the growth needle!
They were interrupted by the arrival of...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Just when things couldn’t look any worse for the citizens of (undisclosed US city 1), The future of the people just got a hell of a lot bleaker. It was bad enough that there was a smokin hot red headed Irish giantess in the form of the 500ft tall Becky Lynch, it was even worse that there was a sassy blond bombshell in the form of the 1000ft tall Carmella, it was even worse still that there was a physically fit and overall gorgeous 1250ft tall giantess known as Charlotte, but to top it all off here comes the biggest, baddest, sexy and beautiful mega giantess this world has ever (and may ever) see, the tremendously huge 2000ft tall Lana. This was certainly humanities bleakest moment right now. But right now the regular sized people of the city were the least of the smaller giantesses problems, they had literal bigger fish to fry. Charlotte was the first to vent her frustrations.

“Well Carmella are you happy? Thanks to your stupidity we know have this giant bitch to deal with! Why the hell did you have to throw your stupid growth needles at the freakin arena? Was the demolished city not good enough for ya?”

“My fault!!! If it wasn’t for you and your big clumsy feet kicking them out of my hands they would never have ended up over there! But now we have mega thot to deal with over there and no possible way to grow any bigger, so excuse me if I don’t take the blame for this HUGE god damn problem!!!!!!”

Both women began panting as they had successfully vented their frustrations at each other and were now at the point where they could regain their composure and formulate a plan. Meanwhile a fair distance away (and out of Lana’s sight) Becky looked both confused and lovingly over at the two women she had shared intimate time with.

“Geez just kiss already...” at this thought Becky felt herself start to get a little excited downstairs “No Becky nows not the time for that! I need to think of a solution to this problem beofre both my goddesses kick the bucket!”

That’s when Becky noticed the one thing that might turn the situation in their favour. A growth needle. With her face lit up Becky gleefully picked up the growth needle and prepared to inject herself, it had been a LOOOOOOOOOOONG time since she had felt the sensational feeling of growth flow through her body, but beofre she could pierce her skin Becky stopped. She looked over to where the main action was happening, there was Carmella who was twice her height, Charlotte who was even bigger than her, and of course there was Lana who was double Carmella’s height and nearly double Charlotte’s height. If they wanted to stand any chance of takin down this collossal woman it might be better if one of those two took the growth needle. Sighing Becky made her mind up, though she wanted to grow herself she knew there was a chance that she wouldn’t grow anywhere near big enough to even challenge Lana yet alone defeat her, so with he mind made up Becky waited for her chance to grow one of her to lovers.

Meanwhile Lana was still ecstatic about her tremendous size advantage and continued gloating about it whether anyone wanted to hear it or not.

“Haha oh I can’t belive this happened! I was certain that me and those other divas were goners, there were two giant women causing destruction and mayhem with every step they took, and we were waiting for the moment when one of those footsteps found their way over to us and wiped us off the face of this planet. But look at me now! I’m the biggest woman around! You are all nothing to me! I am the ruler of this puny world and I can crush anyone and anything whenever I want! And don’t think I’m gonna be stupid like you two, I’m gona take you out long beofre you even have a chance to try and take out me, not that you could either way! So prepare yourselves little ones it’s time for Lana to CRUSH!!!!!!!”

With that said Lana charged forward, each of her gigantic steps shaking the very foundations of the earth as the tremors got louder and stronger. Just as she was within a hairs reach if her targets, it happened. Charlotte hit a picture perfect dropkick on Lana’s incoming leg whilst at the same time Carmella leaped in the air and grabbed Lana by her hair and nailed her with the biggest DDT of all time!!!! The titanic figure of Lana fell to the ground with such an incredible impact that it cases tsunamis to form in the ocean some several thousand miles away. As she hit the ground her opponents didn’t take any chances. Carmella wrapped her incredibly sexy legs around Lana’s huge head (with some difficulty) and locked on her “code of silence” submission whilst at the same time Charlotte wrapped her magnificently long and toned legs around Lana’s equally gorgeous and long legs in a modified figure eight submission hold. Lana screamed in pain as she was half concious from the impact of then DDT, but she could feel every last inch of pain coursing through her body as the two blonde titanesses continued their methodical torture. In ten seconds Carmella and Charlotte had taken down the biggest giantess in the world and were making her scream and beg like the little bitch she was. All Lana’s could think was how these two women who were at each others throats a few minutes ago, had managed to coordinate such a successful and well managed attack.

Literally 100 seconds ago whilst Lana was bragging

Charlotte and Carmella watched as Lana began monologuing. Within a second both women rolled their eyes and looked at each other.

“Oh my God!!!! Charlotte please tell me that’s not what we looked like when we were in control.”

“I’m not gonna lie Carmella we must’ve looked pretty damn ridiculous. Well at least this’ll give us a minute to come up with a plan.”

Carmella looked at Charlotte curiously, but not discouraged as she decided to hesr Charlotte out.

“Ok I’m listening. What did you have in mind jumbo?”

“Well short stack, Lana may be bigger than us but here’s one thing Lana’s will always be regardless of her size.”

“Oh yeah and what’s that?”

Charlotte smiled for the first time in what seeme like hours.

“She’s a terrible wrestler”

Carmella smirked as she heard this, how could she forget how incredibly green Lana was as an in ring performer, she had skipped NXT and most groaning sessions and jumped right to the main roster, the downside she had no wrestling skills and this was something that the two giantesses were more than happy to exploit.

“So what I’m thinking Carmella and hear me out on this. For the sake of wiping out the biggest threat to either of our reigns as rulers, we should put aside out differences and work together.

Carmella stood for a moment almost like she hated what she was hearing. But after a few seconds she walked over to Charlotte and looked her in the eyes. Charlotte kindly crouched down so she was only a bit taller than the smaller giantess and looked her in the eyes as well as the two rivals stared into the others soul. https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vJJd9OAVriU/maxre... After a few seconds the two women smiled and shook hands signifying their arrangement.

“Right Carmella lets do this!”

Back to the present

Lana was still locked in her submission hold of hell and was quickly losing energy and consciousness. Meanwhile a fair distance away Becky saw that somehow Lana was down and decided to make her move, grabbing the growth needle Becky ran over ready to grow one of her blond lovers.

Back to the fight and Lana started to fade, the pain in her legs want she wouldn’t be able to walk for a little while and the choke hold She was in was cutting off her oxygen, after what seemed like and eternity Lana finally passed out from the pain as Charlotte and Carmella finally let go of the submission, both out of breath and panting from the struggle of taking out the mega giantess, but against all odds they had prevailed. Sitting up slightly the two stared eachother down still panting and wheezing but then they smiled and high fived each other, their mission had been completed.

But beofre the could get all soppy or even start trying to kill eachother again the two were interrupted by the thunderous footsteps of Becky approaching form the distance, sprinting as fast as she could Becky dramatically dived and commando rolled over to the blond duo.

“Ok guys have no fear Becky is here!!! Now let’s tsle out this giant bit.......what the hell happened????”

Becky stopped mid sentence and marveled at the sight that was an unconscious 2000ft tall woman lying unconscious at the feet of two smaller yet still gigantic women, both of looked incredibly sexy, with heir hair all bushy and the sweat drissling beautifully off their tanned skin as they both looked...”SNAP OUT OF IT BECKY!!!!” Becky thought to herself as she looked to the two women for answers. However neither woman was paying much attention to what the 500ft tall redhead was saying, they were more interested in what was in her hand, the growth needle. That’s when...

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The world truly had no luck. Just when it looked as if there would only be one Giantess ruling over them the unexpected happened, the 2000ft tall ravishing Russian Lana was swiftly taken out by the combined efforts of the 1250ft tall Charlotte and the 1000ft tall Carmella. Even though the ordinary sized people were scared beyond all belief they were still capable of basic mathematics. One giantess was Better than three. Now that Lana was down for the count (seemingly) the world was back to square one, there were three giant women that were set to take over, there were hopes that if only Lana remained that she would have mercy on the worlds population and be a fair ruler, and everyone knew that one overall ruler was better than a three way battle royal for supremacy, after all the world could only take so much. Maybe they’d get lucky and the other giant women would take each other out. Fat chance of that happening.

Meanwhile in the aftermath of the battle against Lana, Charlotte and Carmella were somewhat celebrating a job well done. They had put aside their massive differences and united against a common enemy, but now that it was over their power struggle was set to continue. However a factor to they hadn’t considered had just arrived in the form of the 500ft tall Irish redhead Becky Lynch, but she didn’t come alone. In her hand was one of the keys to the rise of all the giant women. A growth needle. Now both women knew what the other was thinking, that the other needed that growth needle in order to gain the power to defeat the other, so they needed to play it cool if they wanted to take the needle from Becky. Lucky for the pair of them Becky was prepared to worship and be with either of them. Becky noticed the pair eyeing her lustfully and felt both awkward and turned on at the same time.

“Erm guys...why are you looking at me like that? Do I have soemthing in my teeth?”

Carmella was the first to take advantage of what Becky said and quickly got to her feet. She then seductively began swinging her hips from side to side as she approached the woman half her size.

“Oh my sweet little Becky, no of course you don’t have something in your teeth. But you’re about to have something on your lips hihi.”

Carmella then stood towering over Becky who only came up to Carmella’s crotch, something Becky had no problem with, but her thoughts were soon interrupted as Carmella used her huge finger to tilt Becky’s head up so that she was looking at her Staten Island Goddess. Carmella licked her lips as she slowly bent over so that she was almost eye level with Becky who had began sweating in anticipation of what was coming next. Closing her eyes she felt the world seoundner fade away as Carmella locked lips with her, even though they were much bigger than hers Becky enjoyed every second of it. Carmella meanwhile had soemthing else in mind, as Becky was distracted with her kiss Carmella tried reaching for the growth needle in her hand, but every time she got close Becky would comically move her hand away from her causing Carmella to miss each time. That’s when she began getting frustrated but her chance would soon slip away.

“Excuse me Becky why are you kissing that little shrimp?”

In an instant the two broke apart and Carmella acted as if she wasn’t trying to taken the needle from her. Charlotte had risen to her full terrifying height and had strutted over to where the two others were standing, she too walked seductively shaking her much bigger hips and ass from side to side as both women marveled as she got closer.

“Now Becky. Becky, Becky. What am I to do with you? Here I was to lead to believe that you liked tall women? If that’s the case then why are you making out with the Staten Island shrimp? When you could be making out with the Queen of the world hihi”

Charlotte smiled as she got right next to Carmella and Becky and immedietly pushed Carmella out of the way and sent her crashing several feet away. Becky didn’t even flinch when this happened as she was mesmerized by the much more superior height of her best friend and original lover Charlotte. Compared to Carmella, Becky only came up to her crotch, but compared to Charlotte she was a good head shorter than her crotch, and if she was wearing a skirt right now Becky would have a perfect view. But her view would soon switch from her crotch to her face as the towering woman crouched down so that she was level with Becky’s face. Becky’s face lit up as the humongous woman grabbed her by the back of the head and pulled her in for another gigantic kiss. Becky had hit the jackpot once more as she got to make out with another blond giantess. However just like Carmella, Charlotte was using this opportunity to grab the growth needle and secure her place as the ruler of the world. But just like before Charlotte couldn’t take the needle as each time Becky moved it out of her reach. Knowing that she needed to get the needle before Carmella, Charlotte went for broke. She stopped kissing Becky and using her hand she shoved Becky’s face Inbetween her tits. Becky nearly passed out. She was almost in heaven as she felt the warm sweet embrace of Charlotte’s gisntic boobs pressed against her face. That’s when she finally let the needle slip put of her grip and fall to the ground. Charlotte watched as it and smiled As she would pick it up the Moment it hit the ground. However it never hit the ground.

Just before it could reach the ground Becky lifted her leg up in a swoon like pose and as she did she hit the needle causing it to fly over Charlotte’s head and land several feet away, but it landed in one of the worse places possible. In the hands of another giantess.

“Oh my God you guys thanks! This is just what i wanted! I didn’t even need to ask!”

Charlotte’s heart dropped. Just when things were finally looking like they were going her way this happens. Turning around she saw the face of her newest opponent. Standing at what Charlotte estimated to be about 1750ft was one of the biggest divas on all of wwe. Nikki Bella. https://www.ewrestling.news/wp-content/u...

“Awww what’s the matter Charlotte? Cat got your tongue? Bet you’re wondering how I got so big right? Well let’s just say that needle that smashed over the arena didn’t hit just one woman haha”

Nikki began to laugh as she saw the utter shock on Charlotte’s face. Becky meanwhile had onally been released from her boobtacular experience and was eyeing the newest titanic woman on the scene, and like all the others Becky began to feel flustered and hot at the sight of the giant woman. Meanwhile a few feet away Carmella saw the new opponent and slapped her forehead out of frustration.

“You know, I’m really starting to think those scientists made waaaaay to many growth needles”

That’s when it hit Carmella. If those scientists managed to make her big the needle they definitely had to have come up with some way to make her smaller if need be. That’s when a devious smile formed on Carmella’s face as she slowly slipped away from the scene of the battle and to where she knew the scientists were hiding.

Meanwhile Nikki had made her way ever so closer to Charlotte and Becky. Nikki was amazed at the height difference between the three women. Charlotte managed to barely come up to Nikki’s cleavage, but then there was poor little Becky. The smallest giantess (who was still 100 Times bigger than every normal sized person on the planet) only came up just over Nikki Bella’s knee. Nikki founthis absolutely hilarious and taunted the two smaller women.

“Hahaha!!!! Awww whats That next to you Charlotte? Looks like a wittle doll haha! Well if you put Becky on top of your shoulders I’m sure you’d be the same size as me haha. Not that it would help I’d still wipe the floor with you little bitches”

Becky cowered Behind her lover Charlotte, even though she herself was smaller than Nikki Charlotte had taken over as the protector of Becky, and would do anything to make sure this new giant bitch went down beofre she took them out. That’s when Nikki interuppted them once more as she continued to gloat.

“Oh and one more thing ladies i wouldn’t be just worried about me. I’d be more worried about what’s behind you!”

Charlotte and Becky spun round immedietly to the sight of...

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
At this point, the normal-sized people of Earth had to be absolutely terrified. It seemed like gigantic women were coming out of nowhere, left and right, with no end in sight. It all started with Carmella making her claim to rule the world, only to be confronted by two equally sexy and powerful giantess lovers in Charlotte and Becky Lynch.

The amount of destruction these giantesses caused seemed unsurmountable and they seemed to be continually growing even bigger and stronger, which meant even more destruction and terror for the people below. Now, to make things even worse, a new giantesses emerged AND was much bigger than the other giantesses! This new giantess, Lana, stood at an immense 2000ft tall and towered over the other giantesses.

The carnage that Lana brought about with just one stomp was just a sign of things to come from her power. These giantesses looked geared-up to fight once again, which meant even more casualties and millions of dollars in damage for their city and surely the surrounding towns and suburbs. However, things were about to get even worse for the other giantesses and, of course, for the mortals below. All while this was going on, Becky was trying her best to find a solution for all of these gigantic problems.

Lana began her battle with the smaller Charlotte and Carmella by stomping the ground viscously, as she had done before. Lana had already proved to herself and the other two giantesses that her stomps were enough to take them off of their feet. This battle was certainly going to be easy for her, but if she could get them both on the ground at will, the fight will be even quicker and easier.

Lana slowly, yet powerfully, made her way to Charlotte and Carmella, grinning evilly the entire time. Lana let out some bellowing evil laughs and she watched Charlotte and Carmella try to keep their balance after her stomps, but to no avail. Like before, Charlotte and Carmella fell over and left prone as they looked up and saw Lana staring down at them, laughing once more (https://www.instagram.com/p/BHA1he7hK-c/...).

"Hahaha! Awwww. Are you little girls realizing that your fun is over and mine is just about to begin? Look at you two weaklings. You two are left groveling at my feet, begging for mercy just from me walking! Hahaha! If my steps take you off of your feet... imagine what I can do when I start trying! Enough talk though... I think its time we end our little game and I finally takeover the world! So, say goodbye! Hahaha!"

Charlotte and Carmella looked over at one another, both feeling a mix of fear, anger, and a bit of sorrow. They were obviously afraid of the sheer power that Lana was displaying over them. They were both angry at each other and Lana for taking their world away from them. They were feeling sad because they are now beginning to accept that, yes, their reign over the world and their lives were about to end. Neither were going to give Becky a proper goodbye and she would be left on her own at 500ft tall to try and match up against the titanic, 2000ft tall Lana who was wiping the floor with them.

Just as Lana was lifting up her gigantic foot to surely begin stomping these two into a bloody pulp, a new set of bellowing voices began to be heard. These voices were somewhat foreign to all of the women involved due to the fact that they were all from Smackdown. Lana was distracted from her task of finishing Charlotte and Carmella off to turn around and look at the source of these new voices.

"Hey! What don't ya pick on someone your own size! Or... at least someone a little closer to your size!" When she turned around she saw not one, but two new giantesses ready to bring the fight to her. These two giantesses were Mandy Rose and Sonya Deville (https://www.instagram.com/p/Be8JUybAi_l/...). These two new and beautiful giantesses stood at a very respectable 1500ft tall, making them about a head taller than Charlotte, a decent amount bigger than Carmella, and just about lower than breast level to Lana.

Seeing how big these two new women were than the original giantesses, Charlotte and Carmella, made them wonder just what was in that one needle that broke over the arena. That one needle was able to make all of these different women larger than them, which made them begin to wonder what would've happened if either of them would have got their hands on it. Either way, they looked on at their and Lana's new challengers and knew it was a way to buy time for themselves and Becky, who hopefully was close to finding a solution.

Meanwhile, elsewhere in the surrounding areas of the city...

Becky knew she didn't have much time. The last thing she saw was Charlotte and Carmella trying to stand up to the titanic Lana on their own, In a normal fight, she could probably trust Carmella to win and surely could trust Charlotte to win a fight against Lana. However, the size advantage that Lana had over them surely made it a fight they could not win, even if they worked together. Becky didn't even know about the gigantic Mandy and Sonya, who also joined the fray as well.

Even though she couldn't really stack up against the other giantesses at her current size, she was still 500ft tall and was the scariest human being anywhere she went. Therefore, Becky was determined to use that fear and the volume of her bellowing voice to seek out the scientists that Carmella talked so much about. If they can create needles to make people huge, they could surely make one that shrinks them back down. Or, perhaps she could get them to create her a super-needle that would give Becky the control over the other giantesses, leaving her as the ruler of the world.

Whatever the plan ends up being, Becky was hell-bent on finding the scientists. To do this, she began shouting at the top of her lungs, knowing that the scientists that helped Carmella out could not have gone that far.

"Alright, listen up! I'm looking for some scientists that were responsible for making me and a bunch of other women into gigantic goddesses, like you see before you!" It had been a while since Becky was the biggest person around, so she wanted to have some fun with it. "I know that Carmella's scientists are out there somewhere and if you are those scientists, you know exactly what I'm talking about. The fate of the world and Carmella depends on your help! If you don't help me out now... I will go around crushing and killing everyone, including all of you scientists, because I'll have no use for you! Either way, I'm gonna have some fun with my size!"

Becky's suspicion that the scientists hadn't gone far was right. Becky stood over a smaller suburb outside of the city which housed the HQ for these rogue scientists. Knowing that they should help Becky, the scientists shot a flare into the sky, hoping to get Becky's attention, which they had.

Becky saw this flare and began walking towards the source, only to see a bunch of tiny men in lab coats, which brought a smile to Becky's face (https://www.instagram.com/p/Bb_v2m_ndCO/...). Becky, wasting little time, gave her request to the tiny men.

"Alright, you guys are gonna do what I say and you are gonna do it as fast. If not, I'll have no problem squashing you all like bugs because its been a while since I had some fun. You're gonna make me some new needles. Instead of making needles that girls huge, you're gonna make some that make girls shrink... whether it's all the way or just a little bit, I don't care. I'm gonna need those needles to help deal with some big problems back in the city. Do this and maybe I won't stomp you all into dust... maybe. Haha!"

Becky request was heeded by the scientists and they began working right away. Becky was ready to fix all of this nonsense and was ready to take back control for herself and whoever she chose. If she can get the other women to shrink down, they she will be the only big one left with whoever she wants. Instead of making this a size war, she was taking a more reasonable approach.

Although, Becky did miss the feelings of pleasure that went along with growing and gaining power and strength. Therefore, Becky put in another request for the scientists.

"Oh! Another thing boys... I want you to make something else as well. I need you to make a couple of growth needles too. But, I want whatever you put in one of those needles to be duplicated again. Just one of those needles made a normal sized girl become 2000ft tall! If one of those "super needles" did that to a normal sized woman, then I could only imagine how big it would make me and whoever else I give it too! So, chop-chop boys! I got some shrinking and growing to do! Hahaha!"

Back in the city center with Charlotte, Carmella, Lana, and 2/3 of Absolution

The blonde bombshell of Absolution began speaking to Lana once more. "What's the matter Lana? Are you afraid to fight someone who has a chance of beating you? Look at our new and improved bodies. I used to be able to throw weights around like they were made of plastic... now I can throw entire buildings around like they weighed nothing! Imagine what my and Sonya's power will do to you! Not only that... but also, don't forget that there's a third member of Absolution, who I think you'll be ready to meet very soon! Hahaha! She's the leader after all and deserves the newfound power that was granted to her! I think you'll be impressed to see HER transformation!"

Lana responded to the two smaller giantesses. "Haha! Am I supposed to be scared of YOU!? It's gonna be fun squashing you girls like its nothing!Did you forget who the biggest one here is?"

Sonya perked up to respond to Lana's last question. "Oh, you're right Lana... you're definitely the biggest one here! Or, so you think! But, like Many said, you'll find out the truth when you're ready for it! Hahaha! Now, put your hair up and square up!"

And once again the normal sized people of the world drew the short straw...literally. Lana then took a fight pose just like the one Sonya always makes and invited her and Mandy to step up. Meanwhile behind and out of Lana’s view Charlotte and Carmella evaluated their situation.

About 2 minutes ago

In the suburbs outside the city Becky Lynch impatiently waited for the scientists to finish her needles. While she was waiting she took out her boredom by crushing several hundred people that were nearby. After being aroun two constantly growing women Becky was ecstatic about being the biggest person around and was enjoying every seocnd of it. After about 29 minutes the scientists were done and had presented Becky with her needles (they had actually grew the needles so Becky could actually pick them up. And to top it all off they were clearly labeled. Happy with the results Becky took her needles and began to set off, thstsbwhen she remembered that the scientists were still there. With her testing done Becky stood back up to her full height with her newly acquired needles in hand and set off back towards the battle.

And back to the present

“Oh come on! Where the hell are all these giants coming from? Ah well I’ll be bigger than all of them soon enough, now who do I want to grow with?”

Lana stumbled backwards cruising a few buildings herself as Mandy helped Sonya up.

“Yeah take that jumbo, it doesn’t matter how big you are we’ve got numbers on our side and we’re gonnna take you out and rule this puny world.”

Mandy however gloated a Little too long as Lana rose back to her feet and stomped the ground with such might it caused both Mandy and Sony’s to land flat on their asses! Satisfied with her personal victory (making the two fall from one stomp) Lana laughed as she prepared to take out the two. Things were only just getting started. That’s when...

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The battle lines had been drawn, it was a three way showdown for the right to rule the world. Although the normal sized people of the world would rather it not to have come to this, they also would have preferred if there wasn’t an influx of seemingly never ending gigantic female wrestlers but hey what are you gonna do? In once corner you had the biggest of all the world giantesses (so far) Lana who was an outstanding 2000ft tall. Then in another corner you had 2/3rds of Absolution, Mandy Rose and Sonya Deville who were each a magnificent 1500ft tall. And finally in a corner that wasn’t being paid much attention to younhad the makeshift duo of Carmella and Charlotte who stood at a wonderful 1250ft tall and a marvelous 1000ft tall respectively. But now was not the time to recap heights (surely people wouldn’t forget?) now was the time for action and Lana was the first to do so, she had successfully used her surperior height and strength to stomp the earth so hard it caused two 1500ft giantesses to fall straight to the ground. Lana loved thst she had finally managed to cause these two women to fall before her that she couldn’t help but gloat somewhat.

“Hahaha oh my! Well I must admit that it’s nice to see you girls right where you belong. On the ground groveling at my feet! Well it’s to be expected of course. I mean look at me, I am the ravishingly Russian, I am the blond bombshell, I am the crusher of everything! So do not think for one second that you little girls can take on a real woman like me!”

Lana continued laughing as she belittled the duo further, all while this was happening Mandy and Sonya were regaining their composure and becoming more and more angry at Lana’s taunts. On and on the taunting went until Mandy and Sonya saw their chance, Lana had made the mistake of closing her eyes whilst laughing and as a result Absolution sprung into action and both dived at her taking the larger woman off of her feet. The impact of hitting the ground surprised Lana as Mandy and Sonya began laying the boots to the fallen Russian. As this was happening they decided to get in a little bit of trash talking of their own.

“Yeah how do you like that huh Jumbo? Not is big when you’re fast on your ass right? Well you better get used to it cause me and Sonya are gonna kick the crap out of you! Ain’t that right partner?”

“You got that right Sister! She may be bigger but she certainly isn’t better than the hottest new giantesses on the scene. Now let’s see how she likes being talked down to!”
