She too was noticing the fight that was happening between Absolution and Lana as was curious as to who would come out victorious, not that it would matter as the winner was most definitely getting shrunk. However as Becky got closer to the action she as the smallest giantess around could feel the earth shaking at a much greater rate than the bigger women, and something BIG was coming on the horizon.

“What the hell...”

Back to the fight where Mandy and Sonya where still beating on Lana. Although it appeared thst they were winning thyenfsiled to realise that the bigger you were the more resilient you were. As they were kicking Lana the ravishing Russian had finally had enough, with one swift motion she used her leg to sweep both the legs of Mandy and Sonya out from under them causing the two to crash down hard into the earth. Lana then got back up to her feet with a look of anger so frightening it would make even Stephanie McMahon wince! Sonya and Mandy soon got to their feet but were quickly met by a double clothesline that knocked the both for a loop, Lana then brought up her massive foot and dropped it right down narrowly missing both of them by inches as the two one smaller women scuttled away as fast as they could.

“Oh whats the matter girls? You were so cocky before when you were kicking me around, what you don’t like that I got up ready to kick your scrawny little asses? Well let me tell you this, I am the biggest and most dangerous giantess around and you should be very afraid of what I’m gonna do to you little bugs hahaha”

“Oh I wouldn’t do that if I were you blondy”

Lana stopped dead in her tracks, she had just been interrupted by an incredibly loud and booming voice from some distance behind her. That’s when the sound of tremor inducing footsteps began to shake the very earth they were standing on, as Lana began to sweat in anticipation Mandy and Sonya smiled as they knew what was coming. Closer and closer the sound got until eventually the tremors stopped but in their place was a looming shadow cast over all three women. But only two of the were happy to see it. Lana gulped as she slowly turned her head around found herself face to face with a pale white belly button. Slowly craning her neck up she saw the cause of her sudden fear, it was the terrifying smiling face of Absolution’s Leader Paige except there was a slight problem. She was 3000ft tall. http://www.wwe.com/f/styles/gallery_img_...

“Well hello ladies fancy meeting you all here! Mandy, Sonya my darlings it’s so good to see you. Oh an little Lana you’re here too! What a nice surprise. I bet right now your wondering why I’m so such bigger than the rest of you? Well you remember that little needle that spilled over the entire arena and made you big? Well surprise surprise it also made all of us big too. But I wasn’t satisfied with being just 1500ft tall, no whilst my darling protégées kept you busy I used thst time to gather up all the liquid that the needle had spilled and then some and used it to keep growing into the beautiful Goddess you see before you! So now we don’t have to worry about any more divas joining in on our fun, but just in case I made sure to crush the puny thing under my foot! Maybe some of them escaped? Who knows, all I know is that I am now the biggest giantess in the entire world and ther is no one left to even come close to stopping me after I’m through with you. Oh and don’t think I didn’t notice you two blond bimbos over there. Once were done with Lana we’ll be right over to take care of you. Now let’s get started shall we”

The mighty Paige with her protégés in tow began to walk towards Lana as the Ravishing Russian stood frozen in fear at the looming woman that was about to end her. Meanwhile a fair distance away Carmella and Charlotte stood stunned looking at what had just transpired.

“Oh come on! What the actual hell Camrella! Your scientists are the most worthless pieces of crap in all existence!”

“Yeah I know! Jeez why couldn’t they have given me that one first the bunch of idiots. Well I better go find them before the shit hits the fan...”

“Oh you’re not leaving me here alone I’m coming with you!”

“Oh that won’t be necessary ladies”

Carmella and Charlotte spun round expecting to see the person that had said that, but there was no one there.

“Down here! God how blond are you two?”

The two women looked down to see Becky Lynch smiling up at them, she came up to Carmella’s crotch and about a head shorter than Charlotte’s crotch. Both women were estatic to see her and immediately got down on their knees and gave Becky a huge hug thst almost squeezed the life out of her.

“Guys...smaller red head suffocating here...”

Carmella and Charlotte released her from their grip and began questioning her on where she had been. Becky explained that she had found Carmella’s scientists and had them make her some shrinking needles that they could use on their opposition, she did however leave out the part about the growth needle. She was still undecided about that. Charlotte and Carmella were over the moon upon hearing this and discussed when the best time to act was. They...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The HUGE Leader of Absolution

choices: Mandy and Sonya destroy Charlotte and Carmella, just as she asks...
Charlotte and Carmella defeat Mandy and Sonya, surely with the help of Becky...
Lana's body still had growth serum inside of it when Paige ate her (oh god...)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Lana was absolutely terrified by her current situation. Mere minutes ago, she was the biggest and baddest giantess around and it looked like no one was going to be able to stop her. The two rookies of Absolution were going to try their best to stop her, but her superior height and strength were going to prevail. That is... until the true biggest and baddest giantess showed, the leader of Absolution, Paige. Paige's 3000ft stature is going to prove to be too much for "little" Lana, as she put it.

Paige stomped her ways over towards Lana and her two protégées, ensuring that she caused the most damage she could from just her steps, not that she had to try very hard to do so. Her feet probably took up entire city blocks and that meant that anything or anyone that wasn't already previously destroyed or killed was sure to be now. Not to mention all of the people and things she destroyed on her way to the battlefield. Knowing Paige's attitude and the fact that she was about 600x the size of an average person, she was sure to enjoy herself.

As Paige got closer and closer, Lana stared at Paige's magnificent body in terror. As she turned to run away, Mandy and Sonya went to get in her way. Even though she was 1000ft shorter than Paige, she was still the dominant one when compared to Mandy and Sonya, so she was able to shove those two to the ground in what was surely going to be her last mistake and last move as a giantess. Mandy and Sonya were furious when Lana shoved them over and wanted to get up and give Lana some more punishment when their gigantic leader loomed over them.

"Don't worry about her, girls. She'll be a stain in no time. Once I'm through with her, no one will remember her 15 seconds of fame as the 'biggest and baddest' around. I know just the way to end this little bitch and I've got a great idea of what to do with her once she dead and gone. Hahaha!"

Paige turned her attention back towards Lana and decided that she was done playing around with her. Therefore, she thought that she'd pick up the pace a little bit and she increased her walking speed towards Lana. Lana thought she was starting to get away when she looked back and saw Paige quickly gaining ground on her, smiling and giggling the entire time. The devious look on Paige's face caused Lana to try and sprint away, only for her to trip over her own feet (she was never the most coordinated, huh?). Lana began to cry as she saw Paige's shadow slowly engulf her own huge body.

"Paige! Listen! I'm sorry for what I did to your protégées! I really am! What do ya say WE team up and take over this puny world, huh!? I mean, we are obviously the two biggest giantess... I mean, goddesses around! Why would you want to settle for those two little twerps of yours? You said yourself that no one else can get bigger, right? So, why not align yourself with the second biggest goddess? I'll be sure to cater to your every want and need, I swear!"

Paige powerfully stood over Lana with a blank look on her face. Paige watched Lana pour out all of her emotions in an attempt to get Paige to not only let her live, but allow her to rule alongside her as her smaller sidekick. Once Lana's sob story was over, Paige stood silently for a moment, before breaking out in such an evil and bellowing bit of laughter that cities from miles away could hear it.

"HAHAHAHAHA! Wow, Lana! I never knew that you could be so pathetic! You know, you're really funny when your begging for mercy. Just so I don't keep my reign of terror waiting, I'll let you know that... no, you're not surviving this and those two 'twerps' are gonna be ruling the world for years to come, while you become an afterthought and the first display of my power. Say goodbye Lana, and try not to stain my outfit too much with your blood, I need to look great when I'm taking over this world."

With that last statement, Lana closed her eyes and prepared for the worst. Paige couldn't believe how easy Lana was making it for her, but she wasn't going to complain. Without wasting another moment, Paige viscously kicked Lana in the stomach, causing her to recoil her head forward. After doing this, Paige used this recoil and began to furiously stomp Lana's into the ground.

After only a couple stomps, Lana looked to be out cold. Paige was pleased to see how quickly she was able to either knock-out or kill a gigantic woman, like Lana, but she felt the need to make sure. So, Paige stomped and stomped and kicked and kicked Lana until she was sure that Lana was done for good. Paige seemed to get carried away with her destruction of Lana and looked like an absolute crazy woman, to the point where even Mandy and Sonya were afraid of what Paige was capable of. Alas, Paige finally let up on her assault of Lana and Lana laid motionless on the ground, surely dead.

Paige stood silently and slowly breathed in and out to let the moment sink in. She had never experienced so much raw power in her life before and the fact that she was able to absolutely destroy a 2000ft tall person was orgasmic to her. After catching her breath, she turned back towards her protégées and started to walk back, when something weird was happening to Lana.

Due to the fact that she had been killed, the growth serum had an adverse effect on her body. It almost seems as if the serum needs a living body to function and since Lana did not provide that anymore, her body began to shrink. Paige turned to look back at Lana when she saw that her body was getting smaller (https://www.instagram.com/p/BfBtZCGlJXf/...). Paige was aghast to see this reaction occurring and got a splendid idea.

It had been a while since Paige had anything to eat. What a better way to satisfy her appetite that to eat a woman who she had just killed and was shrinking because of it. Not only would she satisfy her hunger, but she would use it as another opportunity to show off her newfound power. So, Paige walked back over to Lana, picked up her ever-shrinking body and lifted it high in the air above her mouth. Without giving it even a second of thought, Paige plopped the now tiny Lana into her mouth and swallowed her whole. To further show her pleasure, she rubbed her stomach that was now filled with the former 2000ft tall Lana.

Paige finally made it back over to her protégées and they had some things to say about what Paige had just shown them. "Damn Paige... we are glad to have you on our side, that's for sure. I never knew you had such an evil streak, but I gotta admit that it was pretty hot to see the power you have now."

Paige was happy to hear that her protégées somewhat approved of her newfound power and knew that there were only two (or so she thought) blonde giantesses left to take care of before their reign can truly begin. "Ahhhh, thanks girls. Now, what do ya say you two girls go over there and show momma Paige just how powerful you are? I want you two to destroy Charlotte and Carmella and I want you to look sexy while doing it. Don't disappoint me girls, I don't wanna have to make you join Lana inside of your goddess."

Mandy and Sonya were terrified to hear Paige's last statement. Would she really consider killing them too? I mean, they wouldn't really be able to do much to stop her from doing it. Therefore, they knew they had to get the job and get it done in style, just as Paige did to Lana. With that thought in their minds, they began to stomp towards Charlotte and Carmella, who could only look on and hope that Becky had something BIG (or small) planned to get them out of this one.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Ravishing End of Lana's Short Reign

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
In a matter of mere minutes the entire landscape of the battle of the giantesses had changed. Out of nowhere the biggest giantess Lana (2000ft) found herself being dwarfed by the new biggest giantess in the form of the terrifying 3000ft tall Paige. If that wasnt bad enough she had managed to defeat and kill Lana in less than 90 seconds further cementing herself as the Giantess Goddess of the world. To show her dominance Paige had even picked up and devoured Lana as her powers left her body and left her shrinking and the perfect size for Paige to eat! Now all she had to do was contend with the only other giantesses in town, the 1000ft tall Carmella and the 1250ft tall Charlotte. But this task was beneath her so she instructed her protégés Mandy and Sonya who were 1500ft tall apiece to take care of the tiny giantess threat, with the added incentive that if they were to fail they could very well join Lana inside the mighty Paige. With that in mind Sonya and Mandy made their way over to the two blonds prepared to do whatever it took to wipe them out. Little did they know however that there wasn’t two giantesses left to deal with, their were two.

Charlotte and Carmella stood awaiting the approaching duo of Absolution, they wrest going to lie they were afraid of what these two could do yet alone what the titanic Paige could do if she were to get involved. But that was a problem for later, right now they needed to focus on beating the lackeys thst were half Paige’s size and what they didn’t know was that they had a little surprise in store for them. Carmella and Charlotte making sure Becky was hid from view behind them got ready to put there pkan into action.

“Are you sure you’re gonna be ok taking on these two guys?” Becky asked with a loving tone in her voice.

“Don’t worry about us Becks we might be smaller but we’re more than capable of holding our own against these rookies.”

“Yeah don’t sweat it baby me and Charlotte will wipe the floor with those two wannabes. You just make sure you’re ready to do your thing Ok?”

Both winking at Becky the two turned and prepared for the biggest challenge of their lives. Mandy and Sonya finally made their way over to the blonds and looked down at them with confidence essentially dripping from them. They were ready for a fight and ready to end this. Taking a step forward the two were nearly eye to eye with Carmella and Charlotte who were stood shoulder to shoulder (or more accurately shoulder to elbow given their size difference) in order to hide Becky, that’s when Absolution decided to was time to trash talk.

“Oh will you looked what we have here Sonya? A couple of Wittle Giantesses trying to hang with the big girls. Well I’m sorry to say ladies but the group is full, we have no use for any more members so I guess me and Sonya will have to do a little exterminating. Oh and guess what you’re the bugs hihi”

“That’s right Mandy these two are about to end up the same as Lana. A beaten bloody mess at the hands of Absolution! Now make it easy girls and just let us take you out, we don’t wanna waste energy where we don’t have to hihi”

Just as Mandy and Sonya were getting ready to pounce they were interrupted by the booming voice of their leader. Turning around they looked over to their titanic leader who had taken a seat on top of a few dozen destroyed skyscrapers with her legs resting confortably on a few more destroyed buildings.

“One more things my darlings, once you’re done with those blond bimbos I want you to bring their tiny bodies over to me because I’m feeling a little bit peckish and Momma Paige needs to keep up her strength, so make it snappy girls because your don’t want to end up like Lana”

Playfully tapping on her belly the message Paige sent was loud and clear as Mandy and Sonya turned their attention back to their smaller opponents. However they made a mistake turning their backs on their much more experienced adversaries. Almost out of nowhere Charlotte speared Sonya whilst Carmella drop kicked Mandy’s legs, both of them went down like a sack of Potatoes as the to smaller giantesses began unloading on them with a barrage of punches. Mandy and Sonya could only cover up the best the could as they were being continually pummeled by the blond duo who weren’t letting up for a moment, they then switched up their techniques and began stomping the two with kicks and boots that would normally be the end of anyone their own size but due to their superior height advantage it wasn’t enough yet.

Charlotte and Camellea were loving every second of their assault, finally they felt like giantesses again s they stomped away at their opponents, they even shared a look with one another and smiled a smiling of both realised how much they could accomplish together instead of fighting each other, however that brief moment of levity was all it took for Absolution to turn the tables. Sonya and Mandy each grabbed the leg of their opponent and flipped them upwards sending Charlotte and Carmella tumbling away and knocking over some still standing buildings as they did so. Getting to their feet Mandy and Sonya were furious and made their way over to exact some revenge. Sonya went after Charlotte and delivered a stiff right hand to the Queen that almost knocked her for a loop it was that hard, Mandy meanwhile ran uo and kicked Carmella who was on her hands and knees right in the stomach sending her flying through some more skyscrapers (how many does this city have?!) Knowing that victory was well within their grasps Mandy stood over Carnella and began to gloat as she’s slowly raised her foot preparing to deliver the first of many finishing blows.

“Nice try Shorty, I’ll admit you caught us by surprise but face it we’re Absolution, we’re Bigger, Badder and straight up better than you bitches. So say goodnight because you’re not gonna wake up hihi”

With that Mandy started to bring her foot down but just as she was inches from striking Carmella’s head she stopped. She had felt what seemed like a small prick in the back of her leg and started to feel funny inside and closed her eyes. Then it happened. She then started to shrink rapidly! She began dwindling down in size from her mighty 1500ft to 1000ft, then 900ft then 800ft! Smaller and smaller she got until eventually she stopped shrinking. When Mandy opened her eyes she realised that she was only a measly 100ft tall now! Panicking she turned round ready to run over to Sonya or Page hoping on eofnthem could help her when she found herself face to face with face with a knee, slowly craning her neck up she found herself staring at the smiling face of Becky Lynch.

Becky had sneakily snuck up and injected Mandy with a shrinking needle and tonhwr delight she was now small enough for Becky who was 500ft tall to take out other ease. But Becky had a job to do so she simply winked at Mandy and walked off getting ready to do the same to Sonya. Mandy was then knocked off her feet as a gigantic foot crashe down next to her. Looking upnshe saw the gigantic terrifying face of Carmella standing high above her. https://pm1.narvii.com/6476/b79fa470609d...

Meanwhile Sonya had noticed that Mandy had straight up disappeared and looked over concerned, that would be her last mistake. Ever the opportunist Charlotte with all her strength ran and jumped delivering a massive big boot to Sonya’s face and sending her crashing to the ground right in front of Becky conveniently enough, Becky smiled as she took out another shrink needle and injected Sonya with it before walking away to hide once more and observe her handiwork. Sonya slowly came to and stood up but when she’s tueene around to look for Charlotte she found herself looking into the belly button of a much taller woman. She had lost more than half her height and was now a mere 700ft tall. Charlotte smiled down menacingly at her shrunken prey as she knew that she had the advantage now and she was certainly not gonna waste it.

Charlotte unloaded on Sonya and blasted her with all her signature moves including a knee to the face, an extremely big boot and to top it all off the biggest natural selection the world had seen. Sonya’s face hit the ground with such force it caused mild earthquakes for those stupid enough to still be around. In an instant Sonya was knocked out cold. Charlotte was then interrupted by her arrival of Carmella who had an unconscious Mandy Rose in her hands and merely threw her to the ground next to Sonya like the trash they were were. Neither had delivered the killing blow just yet.

“Hey Charlotte I see you took out your little problem hihi”

“Yeah now all thats left is for us to take them out permanently. How about we do it together?”

Carmella smiled and nodded confirming her desire to work with her former rival and take care of these smaller giantesses. However the were interrupted by the sound of some colossal footsteps heading their way. Paige had stood up to her full intimidating height and was making her way over to Charlotte and Carmella, she had missed most of the fight but had seen enough to know that Mandy and Sonya had failed her and even more had lost some or in Mandy’s case almost all of their size. Paige had made up her mind as to what to do then she got to Charlotte and Carmella. She was going to...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Cutting Absolution Down to Size!

choices: The smaller trio come up with a plan to defeat Paige...
Paige is looking for some new protégés...
The effects of others' growth serum in her body gives Paige a little boost...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Miraculously, thanks to the help from Becky and her shrink needles, Charlotte and Carmella were able to defeat the bigger and stronger newcomer duo of Absolution. The smaller trio that started this whole destructive fiasco proved to themselves that they could beat women who were larger than them (and to Becky, MUCH larger than them). However, now they faced an even BIGGER test, literally. The gigantic, 3000ft tall leader of Absolution was making her way over to the scene and did not look happy at all.

As Paige stomped her way over, the foundation of the Earth shook with such ferocity that the trio were barely able to continue standing (https://media1.tenor.com/images/07671729...). As expected, Paige was easily able to make up the ground between her and the fight scene and when she did make it to where Charlotte, Carmella, and Becky were standing, she sneered down upon them with such disgust. Then, her disgust turned to anger. "It seems I've got a bit of a problem here. No worries though, with my size, resolving this issue won't take very long..."

With that statement, Paige bent down and looked like she was going to pick up Charlotte, Carmella, Becky, or all three! However, she diverted her fingers to her fallen and shrunken members of Absolution. Paige only need a finger and a thumb to pick up the speck-like Mandy Rose and only needed an extra couple fingers to pick up the slightly larger, but still insignificant Sonya Deville. She had both of her shrunken protégés in her hands and she held them in front of her face, once again looking disgusted and angry (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/bf/71/04/bf710...).

"Just look at how pathetic you two are now. All this time, I thought I made the right decision by taking you two under my wing, but clearly I was so woefully wrong. I thought I could trust you two to take care of those three small bitches with no problems at all, but once again, I was wrong. Now, you're even smaller than those microscopic twerps. What chance would you have now if you couldn't beat them when you were bigger and stronger than them?"

As she was talking, Paige opened her palm and placed both Mandy and Sonya on it. "I was wrong twice with you two idiots... I won't be wrong a third time. I told you two that if you failed me, you'd end up just like Lana. And well, I'm feeling a little hungry and I can't think of a sweeter snack to have before crushing those little bugs and taking over this world. Say goodbye my little ones."

With that, Paige sarcastically blew them a kiss as they sat helplessly on her opened palm (https://i.pinimg.com/736x/64/2a/73/642a7...). She picked them both up with her other hand and she dangled the two above her opened mouth. Paige, of course, was playing around and dragging it out for the two poor souls who were about to be eaten. These playful gestures only made Paige feel even more powerful, which is why she planned on continuing to do so.

After playing with her food a little more, she coldly dropped the two into her mouth and didn't even give them the courtesy of chewing them up to prevent them from slowly burning in her stomach acids. After she felt her two former protégés falling down her throat into her stomach, Paige let out some bellowing and maniacal evil laughter as she had just vanquished two more giantesses.

Paige was clearly proving to be the most sadistic of the giantesses that this world had seen yet. Sure, the others had killed thousands of people already with their feet, boobs, and asses, but they were all usually quick and painless. Paige, however, wanted to enjoy the killings and savor them as much as possible. Displaying her power felt orgasmic to her and showed no signs of wanting to stop anytime soon.

The smaller trio of Charlotte, Carmella, and Becky all looked on with looks of absolute horror. Paige just radiated with this sense of raw power that left all three of them just awestruck of what she is and can be capable of once she is unleashed. So far, all they have seen is Paige barely trying and having fun with herself. If she were to really kick it into high gear, who knows what she could do. It may be quicker to think of the things she couldn't do with her new size and strength.

Being the smallest giantesses around, Becky voiced her displeasure to Charlotte and Carmella, making sure that Paige could not hear her. "I'm having a hard time thinking of a plan where we can actually beat her girls. In hindsight, I guess I could have snuck up on her during her moment with Mandy and Sonya, but I couldn't risk her seeing me and squishing me like an ant! I'm even smaller than Sonya was before she went down, so I would look like nothing next to Paige at this height!"

It was when Becky said "at this height" when she remembered about the super needle that she got from Carmella's scientists before she shrunk them down too. No one else knew about this needle and that was exactly how she wanted to keep it. With this needle alone, Becky (or whoever would grab possession of it) would grow to immense heights and would surely have no competition anymore.

However, Becky didn't want to bust out this needle just yet. If they can find a way to beat Paige and then she decides to rule by herself or with another giantesses, they'll surely be no one who could come close to her/their height and power. So, Becky decided to wait and see what the other two had in mind to defeat Paige.

As the others tried to formulate a plan to defeat her, Paige couldn't help but think that maybe she was wrong about the smaller trio of giantesses. If they were capable of beating two giantesses bigger than them, maybe they could be useful in helping her rule the world. If she decided to do so, Paige probably wouldn't enlist all of them... maybe just one or two (which could give her some real fun entertainment as she could watch the others fight it out for survival).

On top of all of these thoughts, Paige couldn't help but feel a strange sensation moving throughout her body. A sensation that felt very familiar to what she felt when she originally grew back at the arena. The thought of growing even bigger made Paige get very, very excited. (http://i.imgur.com/CeEjAu5.gif)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Paige Disposes of The Weak

choices: Share it between the three of them
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The landscape had changed almost instantly. Less than an hour ago there were no less than seven giantesses terrorizing the world and things looked bleak for everyone. Now there were only four giantesses left, now one would think this was a good thing but one of those giantesses was 3000ft tall and was hell bent on causing as much destruction and misery to anyone and anything that she could, and to make matters worse she had a cruel sadistic side that spelt doom for all of mankind. Paige was the biggest giantess and she used that size advantage well, in mere minutes she had taken out the 2000ft tall Lana who was the second biggest and had even consumed her shrinking body once she was dead. Then to the shock and horror of everyone she had just eaten her so called protégés Mandy Rose and Sonya Deville as if they were nothing. And just like that we were down to the original giantess trio of Carmella, Charlotte and Becky and their terrifyingly gigantic foe Paige. But unfortunately for our giantess trio things were about to go from bad to worse...

Having just seen Paige eat her own protégés it was safe to say that the smaller trio were intimidated of what Paige’s could do. However what Paige had failed to realise was that they were in possession of a few shrinking needles and Becky unbeknownst to her lovers was in possession of a super growth needle that could definitely shift the tide of the battle at any given time.

“So...this may sound redundant but what’s our plan here? Sure we managed to shrink and beat the two wannabes but now they’re gone and mega bitch over there is still here...”

Carmella and Charlotte understood Becky’s concern as she was easily the smallest giantess out of the four at only 500ft. Whereas you had Carmella who was double that height at 1000ft and then Charlotte who was even bigger still at 1250ft, at this point the three longed for the time where they were the only giantesses, but that fantasy would have to wait til after they took on Paige. Either way there was sure to be at least once less giant woman when this was all said and done.

“Well I guess our best course of action is to try and shrink her, I mean at her size she could literally crush and eat us just like she has with everyone else!”

“Well duh! But how exactly are we supposed to do that? It’s not like we can all just walk up to her and stick her with a needle Charlotte. God and I thought I was the blond one”

Carmella and Charlotte then began arguing which Becky found annoying and worrying considering how great the two were getting along recently but more importantly if they didn’t stop arguing Paige would just squash them like bugs and be done with it. Speaking of Paige...

Paige was oddly quiet. Moments ago she had consumed three giantesses and was hell bent on adding three more to her stomach. But all of a sudden she felt strange, not sick but not well either, almost as if there was some kind of chemical chain of events happening deep inside of her stomach that would result in something happening to her body. As she stood clutching her stomach she let out a small groan that the smaller trio immedietly took note of.

“Woah guys stop fighting and look! Looks like Paige has a tummy ache haha!”

“Oh my God you’re right Becks! This could be our chance to cut that bitch down to size!”

“You might be right Carmella so let’s get to it and not waste this opportunity”

Just as the three were getting ready to charge at Paige and inject her with as many needles as they could, they were interrupted by...laughter? All of a sudden Paige’s groans and moans had turned into thunderous laughter that was raining down corn eveyone within a few thousand mile radius to hear.

“HAHAHAHA! OH FUCK YES!!!! I CAN’T BELIEVE THIS IS ACTUALLY HAPPENING! GET READY GIRLS YOU'RE IN FOR A BIG SURPRISE!!!!!!!”

Paige’s booming voice sent chills down the other girls spines and for goodness reason because they were about to see something that would make them all tremble in fear. Paige was growing.

Paige’s laughter echoed as she began to stretch further and further towards the sky, she was becoming bigger and bigger by the second as her growth overwhelmed her and caused her to lose herself in the pure ecstasy that cake worth growing. Her whole body expanded in ways that the others couldn’t imagine, her boobs got bigger, her ass and things got thicker and her arms and abdomen got incredibly toned. Becky, Carmella and Charlotte stood frozen as they watched this giantess become and even bigger giantess. After a few minutes of pleasure Paige’s growth haulted to a stop and she opened her eyes to inspect her new size.

She’s couldn't believe it she had actually managed to grow an extra 1000ft making her an almighty and terrifying 4000ft tall!!! No one had ever been this size beofre and it seemed impossible that Paige had once again broken the size barrier and shot right through it. As it turns out the reason for this was that the remaining growth formula within each of the women she had consumed had attached itself to the first living thing that also possessed the formula that it came in contact with and that happened to be Paige. Funilly enough she had gained the combined height of the women when she had consumed them. 100ft for Mandy, 200ft for Lana and 700ft for Sonya. All of this added to a 1000ft boost for the towering terror known as Paige.

Becky, Carmella and Charlotte couldn’t belive what they were seeing. Their biggest problem had just become an even bigger problem and this was major trouble for the three smaller giantesses who had a slim chance before of defeating her but now...there was next to no chance of toppling this mega giantess. Hell if you think about it Paige had just grown by the entire height of Carmella! So there seemed like there was nothing they could. Or so two of them thought...

Paige meanwhile was marveling at her new size and was loving every second of it.

“Hahaha!!!! Oh man guys I can’t belive I actually grew even bigger! Guess it’s true what they say you are what you eat! But you know what girls? I’m still hungry and I think I’ll help myself to a snack or two right now!!!!”

https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uplo...

Paige looked down menacingly at her prey that she towered over with ease. Carmella was only a quarter of her height, Charlotte was only slightly taller than that and then poor little Becky was only 1/8th the size of the almighty Paige who could crush and or eat her with such ease now. Just as Paige readied to strike Becky decided that it was time to use their trump card. She had no idea though whether she should use it on just herself or try to split it between the three of them. Either way she only had a few seconds to make up her mind and in the end she decided to...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: You are what you eat Paige...

choices: Becky and Charlotte grow to massive heights together and try to have their way
Carmella takes the needle and tries to finally become the Staten Island Goddess
Paige thwarts their plan, takes the super needle for herself, and ends this game
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The time has come for Becky to put her super growth needle to good use. The obvious first choice would be to just use the entire thing on herself, which would probably make her the undisputed biggest giantess on the planet. However, if she were to grow to these massive heights without telling Carmella and Charlotte, they would certainly be upset with her, especially Charlotte. They could just team up with Paige and maybe even use the shrinking needles to get her back down to size in a hurry. Therefore, Becky knew that she was going to share this needle with one or both of her blonde allies. The question was, who would be growing alongside her. Regardless, Becky quickly grabbed Carmella and Charlotte's attention as it looked like Paige was admiring her new size and power enough so that they could all very briefly talk.

"Girls, I've got something I need to tell you!" Both blondes spun around to listen to Becky speak and saw her holding a needle that looked much different than the needles that had seen previously. "While you were dealing with Lana, I went and paid Carmella's scientists a little visit and had them whip up this super needle for me. They told me that it was much stronger than all of the needles and would let me grow to insane heights..."

As Becky was going on about this needle, both Carmella and Charlotte were certainly intrigued. The thought of growing bigger and stronger made her feel a certain type of way that no amount of love or sex could possibly ever bring. She wanted to be the biggest and baddest again and wanted this world for her own. She was only teaming up with these other two for the short term as they take down all of these bigger giantesses. Once it is down to just them three again, she wants the world for her own.

At the same time, the thought of growing huge alongside her lover, Becky, made her feel especially turned on as well. She had seen the amount of damage they could cause together back when they were only 250ft tall and if they were both to take this growth needle, they would laugh at and mock things that were that size. The familiar feeling of power began flowing through her body once again as she thought about ascending higher with her incredibly hot red-headed companion.

"...and I think we all need to take some of this so that we can either match or hopefully surpass Paige's height! So, if we all three take this super needle..." As Becky said that all three of them should take it, both Carmella and Charlotte broke out of their trances and became alert once again. Becky always seemed to be the team player, but neither of the blondes seemed to be too interested in sharing their future power with the other. Each blonde knowing they didn't have much time to act, both began making their cases for how the needle should be used.

"Whoa there Becky! Why should we all use that super needle? Wouldn't it make more sense if one of us just used the entirety of the needle's power to beat Paige? My scientists weren't always the smartest and who knows if that needle can really make you grow as big as you think you can. I think you should give that needle to me! I've proven to Charlotte that I'm a great fighter, despite being smaller than her! If we wanna beat Paige, I need to be the one that grows! I can shrink myself down afterwards too!"

Charlotte could see right through Carmella's plan and began pleading with Becky as well. "Becky! Don't listen to what she says! Isn't it obvious what she's trying to do? All this time she was just waiting for her shot to be the biggest one again. We don't need Carmella anymore if we have that super needle! Come on! Me and you are supposed to be the ones who are ruling together! You not taking that super needle for yourself tells me that you believe that too!"

Becky couldn't believe what she was hearing. She thought she was doing the right thing by disclosing the info about her super needle to the group. However, she is now seeing Charlotte, and especially Carmella's, true colors. All this time that she was holding onto this super needle has lead to this moment.

Could she really trust Carmella to shrink back down after beating Paige and ridding the world of the most sadistic giantess yet or would she just use her immense size and power to take over and rule in her Staten Island image?

On the other hand, she did feel like she could trust Charlotte. Despite Becky's bubbly and genuine personality, all of this growing has gone to her head. The feelings of power has made her want to take over the world and Charlotte is pitching that they can still do that. Whilst it seems that Carmella is only looking out for herself, Charlotte seems to always have CharLynch in the forefront of her mind. They could rule together and be the biggest and sexist rulers of all time. The thought of having lesbian sex while being potentially thousands of feet tall made Becky incredibly wet. It was clear what outcome Becky was looking towards.

"You know what Carmella? Charlotte is right... you always seem to be looking out for yourself! Why on Earth would I believe that you would shrink back down after you grow insanely huge? No... it's been far too long since I was the biggest and strongest and I have no problems with sharing this power with Charlotte. So, what do ya say Charlotte? I think its time we show the world what real goddesses are capable of..." (https://media1.tenor.com/images/494d205b...)

After hearing this, Carmella knew that she didn't have much time left. In a last ditch effort, Carmella, with ease (due to being twice her size), shoved Becky to the ground, which knocked the needle out of Becky's hands. Charlotte saw this and immediately socked Carmella with a strong right hand, knocking her down to the ground. Charlotte then used her superior size and strength to pin Carmella's arms down to the ground.

"Becky! Quickly make us bigger and stronger then ever! I don't know how much time we have before Paige..." Almost on queue, Paige snapped out of her own little trance and noticed all of the fighting going on. Paige saw the needle that was beside Becky's body and began questioning what was going on. Paige knew nothing about any shrinking needles, so, any needles she saw were surely growth needles (which this one certainly was).

"Oh! What's this... another present for me? You girls shouldn't have! I guess you girls didn't get enough of watching me grow before! Don't worry, I can definitely grow even bigger if you girls want me to... hahahaha!"

Carmella was able to use this distraction of Paige talking to slip one of her arms out of Charlotte's clutches and she slapped her with all of her might. At the same time, Paige wanted to display her new power and stomped the ground quite hard. Both of these actions caused Charlotte to be knocked off of Carmella and she was freed.

The race for the needle was on. Becky was probably the closest to the needle but is the smallest.

Charlotte and Carmella were an equal distance away and were both on the ground. Charlotte is bigger, but is slightly stunned by Carmella's slap.

All Paige really had to do was reach down, grab the needle and maybe even all of the other giantesses, and finally end this game once and for all. Paige certainly wasn't over the orgasmic feeling of growth and she was ready to do it once again. Who knows what eating some giantesses and injecting herself with a needle could do to her? She was certainly willing to find out!

Who wins the race and tries to stake their claim as the ruler/rulers of the world?
