In comparison to Carmella, Charlotte is really only around ankle height, with Becky being slightly over toe height! How could they contend with such power? They knew that their shrinking plan HAD to work if they were to survive.

"So, uh.... we're still doing the shrinking thing, right...?" Becky looked up towards Charlotte as she asked this question, which didn't instill much confidence in her at all. If someone who was more than twice her size was THIS scared of Carmella now, what was she supposed to feel?

"Uh... yeah. We just... gotta figure out how to do it. That's all!" Becky, just like Charlotte, said this very worryingly. After seeing how brutal Carmella was towards Paige, there's no doubt she'll be just as brutal, if not more, with them given all that they've been through.

Back in the city center with Carmella...

"Ahhhh... now that felt good. One down... two to go! Hahahahaha! Oh Charlotteeeeeee! Beckyyyyyyy! Where are you!!!!???? Hahahaha! Don't make me look to hard for you or else I'll get very maaaaaddddd!" After saying this, Carmella stomped the ground with such force that buildings in the next state over seemed to fall down under the sheer pressure.

With Carmella in hot pursuit of them and not much time to waste, what plan will CharLynch employ? Will they try to inject Carmella with as many shrinking needles as possible and run the risk of getting caught or will they roll the dice and put their faith in one or two of the shrinking needles?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Carmella Finishes the Paige

choices: Carmella shrinks to a manageable size (2000-2500ft)
Carmella shrinks to VERY manageable size (500-1500ft)
Some of the needles were NOT shrink needles... (oh no)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
CharLynch were horrified to see the sheer size and power that Carmella now possessed. She easily dominated a woman that was 4x their size and she seemingly had a blast doing it. Carmella was as powerful as ever and now was on the prowl looking for CharLynch to remove any doubt to her reign over the world. To their dismay, Carmella was no longer focused on ending Paige (who before a few minutes ago, was surely the favorite to take over) and was now focused on ending the lives of the CharLynch duo.

Due to this, CharLynch now had to work fast. Sure, they could just try one or two of needles and just hope that they would be enough to get the job done. However, why risk it? If they can stick Carmella's with many needles in a short period of time, why wouldn't they try that option? After all, they don't just want Carmella to shrink a couple thousand feet... they want her to get REAL small. In an ideal world, Carmella would shrink to a size that is even smaller than them!

"Alright Becks... I think it's about time. It's now or never. If we wait any longer or don't pull this off, it'll be the end of us and our fantasy of destroying this world by each other's side will never be realized." Charlotte then shot a look over towards the slightly smaller Becky, knowing that their time could be running out.

Becky then looked back up at the bigger and stronger Charlotte, feeling like her life was somehow in the hands of another human being, despite being 500ft tall. "I couldn't' agree anymore with you Charlotte. No wonder they call you the Queen... you always seem to have the best plan. Let's cut this bitch down to size and then make this world ours."

CharLynch both looked away from one another and now towards the gargantuan body of Carmella, who was taking the time to smash dozens of buildings with just one stomp (which she was able to do now with her gigantic size). It took both of them several seconds for their eyes to make their way from Carmella's size 100 feet all the way up her unbelievably sexy body to her face and mouth which looked like it could consume an entire county. They looked back at one another, gulped, and took themselves and the needles towards Carmella.

CharLynch had to be careful in their approach because Carmella was looking for them. Although it is nearly impossible to hide from someone who is over 10x your size, they did a decent job of doing so. CharLynch had to avoid being knocked over by the 9.0 magnitude earthquakes that came from Carmella simply tapping her foot on the ground. On top of this, Carmella was simply destroying all of their cover by stomping out entire city blocks with just the tips of her feet. CharLynch had to make their move towards the blonde behemoth at a much quicker pace.

In between her earth-shattering stomps, Carmella made sure to belittle CharLynch and continue to let them know that she can and WILL find them. "Charrrrrlotte! Beckyyyyyy! You better hope I don't find you! Hahahaha! You don't want up like THIS do you!?" As Carmella said her last statement, he thrusted her foot down with such force that CharLynch was knocked without question, almost blowing their cover.

CharLynch was able to regain their footing and were close to being within injecting-distance from the Staten Island goddess. As they got closer, Carmella's colossal body became more and more terrifying as the power that she possessed radiated off of her. Without even thinking about, Carmella could end either of their lives. Once they felt that they were close enough, CharLynch looked at one another again to formulate this final push towards the gigantic blonde bombshell.

"Alright Becks... here's what's gonna happen. You give me about half of those and keep the other half. When I say so, we are both gonna just fly in there and inject Carmella as fast as possible. There's a good possibility that she feels these needles and gets VERY pissed off. She may start stomping, so we have to be careful. The more needles we can get in the better, but don't get yourself killed, ok?" Charlotte pleaded with Becky over this last point. If nothing else, Charlotte wanted Becky to be safe.

"You got it, my queen. We got this. I'm confident in our abilities to shrink this bitch to a size where we can have some fun with her. Let's make this Staten Island goddess into a Staten Island mite."

With that last statement, Charlotte and Becky split from one another and began rushing towards Carmella. With each step, their heart rates increased as the risk of being caught or stepped on was sky high. However, they were able to make it to Carmella with no problems and both reached for their first needles.

Carmella, who was about to become enraged, was so absorbed in her power that she didn't notice CharLynch right next to her. "Ahhhhh! I can't wait to show those two cockroaches what a real woman is capable of. Look at me... my little servants can see me for hundreds of miles and NONE of them will dare to try and stop me. I've destroyed the army once already and that was only when I was a puny 250ft tall. Just imagine what I could... hey! What the fuck was that!?"

Carmella felt a couple small pricks, one in each leg, as her eyes darted down towards the earth. To her agitation and CharLynch's dismay, Carmella spotted the smaller duo and started to make some connections. Those two stuck her with some needles! Because of CharLynch's act, Carmella was furious.

"WHAT THE HELL YOU LITTLE BITCHES! ARE YOU TRYING TO GET KILLED!? I DOUBT IT WAS A SMART IDEA TO MAKE SOMETHING THIS BIG AND POWERFUL SUPER PISSED OFF!" LET'S SEE HOW MUCH YOU LIKE THIS BECAUSE I KNOW I'M GONNA ENJOY SQUISHING A COUPLE MORE BUGS!!!"

In her fury, Carmella attempted to stomp CharLynch many times. Thankfully for them, they were able to duck and roll out of the way each time. And with each successive dodging attempt, they were able to get Carmella with another needle. Needle after needle was injected into Carmella's perfect body until there were only a few left. CharLynch wanted to ensure that there were still some needles to spare just in case.

Carmella couldn't believe she had been had to this extent. How could she lose track of those two crafty women for so long? For all she knows, her reign was about to be cut short again! Killing Paige would all be for nothing if it means that she'll be defeated by CharLynch anyways. CharLynch made sure to voice their happiness towards the gigantic Carmella.

"Take that you colossal bitch! You thought you were so clever using that super needle and now you're about to be knocked down a couple pegs! Haha!"

"That's right Charlotte! Let's see how you like it when you're looking up at us and begging us for mercy! Hahaha!"

The effects of the needles seemed to take a little longer than usual, which was worrying to CharLynch. Normally, the growing or shrinking would have taken place by now. They had just revealed themselves to a woman who was much bigger than them and was furious.

Also taking note of how long the effects were taking, Carmella belittled the two once again. "You know... you two talk a lot of smack for bugs who can still be crushed like its nothing right? I could be getting smaller here, but I'm still 10000ft tall right now. And you know what... it doesn't matter how small I get if you two are out of the picture! You two idiots think you're the baddest around, but you just provoked the biggest and baddest bitch this world has ever seen. So, say bye-bye! Hahahahahaha!"

Just as Carmella was about to lift her gigantic feet again, she did begin to feel something. She wasn't sure what this feeling was, but it was a feeling nonetheless. An audible groan came from the mouth of the Staten Island goddess and CharLynch took notice. Seeing Carmella's discomfort allowed them to speak once more.

"Awwww look Becks! Look at the big, bad Carmella now! Looks like our plan is about to work. Let's sit back and watch how small the blonde bitch gets. What do you think? Think she'll be about waist height on me?"

"Oh definitely my queen! I can't wait to have my way with that bitch once she's back to being a fair size for us two! Haha!"

What transformation would Carmella undergo next? Would she shrink a decent bit, but still be the biggest one? Would she shrink to a size that would make it easy for CharLynch to win? Or... perhaps some of those "shrink needles" weren't really shrink needles after all? Some of the needles may have been filled with a shrinking solution, but not all of them...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Throwing Caution to the Wind

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella was on top of the world...literally! She was the biggest, baddest and most beautiful woman, No, Goddess in the world. She was 10’000 feet tall and stood high above the puny insects and mites that were the human race. Sure she had had her run ins with other so called goddesses like Lana (remember her?) Aboution and most recently Paige. But though it all Carmella stood tall and persevered and managed to outsmart, outmatch and finally out grow all these wannabes. But just when everything seemed to be going her way the worst thing happened.

Waaay below her at her feet and shins were the two women she had the most history with on this historic day. The 500ft Becky Lynch and the 1250ft Charlotte were doing everything they could just to avoid being crushed titanic beauty, but little did Carmella know was that they had an ingenious plan to cut her down to size. So when she wasn’t expecting it Charlynch injected her with the remaining shrink needles and waited to see what they would do to a 10000ft tall Staten Island goddess.

A sickening feeling overcame Carmella as the affects of the shrinking needles took effect. She could feel something happening to her body and no matter how hard she wanted to think otherwise it was obvious what was happening. She was shrinking. Letting out a massive groan Carmella revealed to CharLynch that she was feeling something from the numerous shrink needles they’d stuck in her.

“Lookey her Becks. I’d say those wonderful shrinking needles of yours are finally taking their toll on jumbo! I can’t wait till she smaller, hopefully waist height...or even smaller hahaha!!!”

“Oh that would be amazing my queen! I’d love to see Carmella smaller than you, it would be even better if she was smaller than me! Then we’d really have fun with her!”

Whilst CharLynch fantasied about her getting Smaller, Carmella was panicking. She wanted nothing more right now than to stomp and crush those little bitches like the bugs that they were, unfortunately due to the needles she was frozen in place as the needles finally took thier toll. Ever so slowly Carmella started to shrink...it started with only a few dozen feet, but after a moment she had already lost a 100ft in height and was showing now signs of slowing down. In fact it seemed to speed up!

“Look my Queen! The needles are working, Carmella is starting to get smaller!!!”

“I can see my little lass kicker. Soon she’s gonna now what’s it like to be the small one. God I’ve changed my mind I hope she shrinks back to her normal size, then we can squish her like a little ant. Ooooohnthats gonna feel so good!”

Carmella continued shrinking as CharLynch kept berating her. She shrank even more as she dwindled to 9000ft...then 8000ft...7000,6000....5000! The rate of her shrinking terrified Carmella who could do nothing except moan as she got smaller and smaller, and closer and closer to her enemies. Whilst watching the Staten Island bitch shrink Charlotte decided to have a Little fun. Looming over her little lover Becky she smiled. Becky only came uo to just below her crotch, giving the lass kicker a wonderful view of her enormous sexy body. But Charlotte decided to be playful and got down on her knees.

This took Becky by complete surprise as she watched her Queen descend to her height...well as close as she could be on her knees, which when got down Becky was just below her gigantic round tits. Becky blushed at the sight of them, if she sad to pick her favorite part of her Queen it would definitely be her beautiful humongous tits.

“Ch-ch-Charlotte what are you doing?”

Charlotte simply silenced her lovingly by placing a huge finger on Beckys lips.

“Shhhhhhh”

This was all Charlotte had to say as she embraced Becky, pulling her face right into her cleavage inadvertently turning Becky extremely on. She then kissed her on the forehead as she kept a tight embrace on her.

“Don’t think I’ve forgotten about you my little lasskicker. Once we’ve taken care of this Staten Island bitch, we can go back to just spending time together. Just me and you. We can do whatever you want. And maybe we can even find a way to make ourselves even bigger! What do you think of that?”

Becky was almost speechless and she struggled to break free of Charlotte’s hold on her, finally dislodging her head from Charlotte’s cleavage and her own little heaven, Becky answered.

“Oh I would love that so much Charlotte! Any time I spend with you is a blessing. I know we’ve had our ups and downs today but there’s no one I’d rather spend my life destroying and growing with than you!”

With that Charlotte leaned down and passionately kissed Becky. Retuning the gesture Becky stood up and kissed Charlotte with all her might. After a few seconds they broken apart and held each other in their arms.

“Oh my Queen I can’t wait to finish Carmella so that we can focus on eachother! Maybe we can do what Paige did and eat Carmella for a little extra growth spurt hihi!”

Charlotte approved this idea as she wanted her lasskicker to be a bit bigger, but as she said this she glanced over to Paige’s body, strangely she was still 4000ft tall, normally after a giantess had been killed they would start to shrink as the growth power left their bodies. But Paige was still the same size. Had Carmella even killed her? Before Charlotte could expand on this she was interrupted by an excited outburst from Becky.

“Look Charlotte she’sstill shrinking! Soon she’ll be smaller than you!”

Charlotte snapped out of her stupor and looked over at Carmella. Becky was right she was still shrinking and was getting smaller by the second. She was now only 3000ft tall and was still shrinking. She was still panicked as worried that any minute she would be smaller than Charlotte or god forbid Becky. But as luck would have it neither of those things would happen.

“Erm Charlotte is it me or is her shrinking slowing down?

Charlotte quickly stood back up to her full height and stepped on front of Becky, giving her a view of her whopper ass at the same time. Becky was right, Carmella’s Shrinking has slowed almost to a halt, which could only mean that the needles were wearing off...fuck!

After a few more minutes the shrinking came to a complete stop, Becky and Charlotte could only look up in slight fear as Carmella had been reduced from 10000ft to only a quarter of that at 2500ft! And she was still far bigger than CharLynch being twice the size of Charlotte and 5 times bigger than Becky. The needles had indeed did their job as Carmella had shrunk and was now a much more manageable size...but she was still the biggest giantess around...something the Staten Island goddess was just discovering.

“Phew! Wow I’ll be honest there girls, for a moment there I actually thought I’d wind up smaller than You bugs. Guess some of those neeedles were really weak. Thank god my scientists were incompetent! But even though I still the biggest baddest bitch around...you bugs took away my goddess stature! And I am gonna make you little bugs pay!”

Charlotte and Becky gulped as Carmella slowly started making her way towards them. Things had certainly not gone their way. Sure they had shrunk Carmella down to a much...much more manageable size but she was still the biggest and only Charlotte had a realistic chance of stopping Carmella. The fight was once again truly on but who would win? Would someone else interfere? Would a forgotten giantess reamerge? Weren’t there a few more growth needed just waiting for someone to find them? Well all of this and more will be answered next time on WWE Divas GTS!!!!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A Fair Fight?

choices: Plan B: Inject on of them
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After seeming unstoppable at an all time record height of 10000ft tall, it would seem that the Staten Island Princess was about to be cut down to size. Just when she thought she was on top of the world after defeating the former biggest giantess around in Paige (who’s seemingly dead body wasn’t shrinking like the others...), she had let her power and size get to her head and had neglected her two most craftiest and loathed enemies in CharLynch. And now here she was with no less than 16 needles stuck to her long tanned legs and a discomforting feeling taking over her entire body. Things were not looking good for the Staten Island goddess.

Becky and Charlotte meanwhile who were still giants at 500ft and 1250ft respectively (man feels like they’ve been these sizes forever) looked up at the gigantic Carmella clutch her stomach in discomfort, this brought a smile to the ladies faces who had thought they were done for once Carmella had used the super needle, but for the time being they had dodged a bullet.

“Ahhahah look at the big bad Carmella! Must suck knowing that soon you’re gonna be a perfect size for me and becks to squish! Isn’t that right sweetie?”

“You’re absolutely right my Queen. I can’t wait until she’s smaller than us. I’m gonna teach that bitch not to mess with me or my lover!”

The two then shared a loving look as Charlotte stoked Becky’s face with her much bigger hand, it was easy to forget that Charlotte was over two time she Becky’s size. After a few seconds they heard Carmella groan once more as the titanic blond crashed down to one knee causing severe tremors and destruction for the few buildings and people still standing. Whatever was happening in this giantesses body was definitely good for CharLynch because it seemed to be causing her pain. It would be a little over a minute later before the effects started taking place.

“No...no...NOOOOO!!!!!!”

This was all Carmella could muster as the Staten island Princess realised What was happening. Little by little she started to dwindle in height, it was only a few feet at a time but she was shrinking all the same, and the worst thing was that whilst she was shrinking she couldn’t move her body at all. No only what her body did naturally was all she could muster. Hell she could barely speak yet alone scream any more. Shedding a metaphorical tear Carmella began to cry on the inside as she felt her reign as a 10000ft giantess goddess ending. Down on the...Er...well closer to ground but still standing tall above it, Becky and Charlotte watched the shrinking process and were loving every second of it.

“Oh my god it’s happening! Char it’s happening!!!”

“Holy shit you’re right Becks! Oh it’s only gonna be a matter of minutes before we can squish this bitch!”

CharLynch were absolutely right as Carmella confused to shrink smaller and smaller with every passing second. And as time went on the effects of having so many different varying shrinking needles seemed to cause Carmella to shrink at an unusual pace. One moment she was shrinking by 5ft and the next she was shrinking by 500ft! She had to be down to 7500ft by now and was still shrinking.

“Say Charlotte why’s this taking so long?”

“I dunno for sure Becky, but I think it has something to do with the amount of shrinking needles we stuck her with. It’s gotta be causing some kind of unstable chemical reaction within her gigantic body, hell for all we know she could explode from it any second now...or not I’m not a scientist haha. Just sit back and enjoy the show babe.”

Charlotte resumes stroking her head as Becky cuddled up close to her tree trunk like legs unable to fully wrap her arms all the way around them. She loved that the two of them had this rare time together to just relax and be with eachother, they had been so busy fighting bigger giantesses that they had forgotten thst they were more important than anyone else. They stood and watched the shrinking spectacle of Carmella who’s growth had hit its fastest acceleration rate yet as she shrank down. 7000ft...6000ft...5000ft...5500ft...wait what?!

No this was no illusion. Out of nowhere Carmella had stopped shrinking and was actually slowly starting to grow again! This didn’t go unnoticed as Carmella immedietly recognized the familiar feeling of growth enveloping her entire body and looked around in disbelief. No this wasn’t a dream she was really growing! She was already back to 7000ft tall and was showing no signs of stopping! The feelings for too much for Carmella who let out a sexual moan as the pleasurable feeling of growth consumed her. It was at this point CharLynch noticed their mistake.

“Erm Char...what the Fuck is happening!!!! She’s growing again!”

“Well no fucking duh Becky! I can’t believe this...wait please tell me that those needles were just shrinking ones?”

Becky’s face dropped, it had never occurred to her that the scientists that she had coerced into making the needles for her had made a few growth ones amongst all those shrinking needles! In fact it was much more than that...

Meanwhile

In a somewhat intact portion of the city in a lab with a caved in roof, there happened to be a group of shrunken 1 inch scientists who were trying their best to reach the top of a desk where there happened to be an emergency stack of growth needles!

“I can’t believe that bitch Becky shrunk us!

“Calm down Mitch! Once jerry reaches the top of the desk he’s gonna drop down one of those needles and we’re gonna grow back to normal!”

They were right as jerry was near the top of the desk and was mere feet away from the needles. There problems would soon be over and they could return to figuring out a cure to theee gigantic women stomping the city to dust. Panting from exhaustion jerry reached the box of growth needles and was preparing to extract them...when he was enveloped in a Shadow...or shadows from above...the last thing him or these poor men ever saw was the soles of two pairs of women’s wrestling boots.

Back at giantess central

Carmella continued to expand bigger and bigger. She was growing at an alarming rate and was showing no signs of slowing down. She kept on stretching higher and higher towards the sky with her very growth destroying buildings and the very ground below her. Becky and Charlotte meanwhile were doing their best to try and figure out a solution to their Carmella problem.

“Ok, ok becks we still have about 6 needles between us. Now the way I see it we can either try and stick Carmella with all of these...or we could try a riskier move...one of us could take all these needles and try to Match her size...or however close we can get...”

“I don’t know Char. What if those needles are shrinking ones? I mean we could end up smaller and thst wouldn’t do either of us any good?”

Before Charlotte could have a chance to retort they were interrupted by the loud ear shattering moans of Carmella who had just reached her previous height of 10000ft! But she wasn’t done there. Carmella continued to grow and grow and surpassed heights that no one thought possible! After a few more minutes of growing Carmella’s growth grounded to a halt. Opening her eyes the Staten Island goddess was delighted to see her view much higher than it was before. She had grown to an unprecedented 12000ft tall!!!

“Hahahahaha! Oh my god I can’t believe this has happened. Wow how can you two be such idiots! First you leave growth needles lying around, then you let me have a super growth needle and now you griwnke yourselves! Well i appreciate the boost ladies but I think it’s just about time to end this little game and begin my reign as Staten Island Goddess!!!!”

The booming declaration from Carmella sent shivers down CharLynchs backs as the two women spun around to face each other.

“Ok were out of time Becks it’s time to decide. Plan A or Plan B?”

Becky thought for a moment before deciding they would try...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Char-Lynch’s MASSIVE mistake

choices: Carmella grows even larger and stronger, to CharLynch's dismay
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Charlotte and Becky had really screwed things up this time. Not only have they caused their biggest (literally) rival to get even more of an advantage over them, but they are also running out of needles that could be used to defeat their foe. Now, their seemingly last hope rests on the potential idea that the remaining few needles that they have are all shrinking needles... shrinking needles that will be used to get Carmella to a size where they can finally get rid of her. In the mean time however, they must be with an absolutely titanic 12000ft Staten Island Goddess.

"Hahaha! Imagine this right... you idiots actually thought you could get rid of me! And to try and do it... you go ahead and make me even bigger!? I have to say, not some of your best work. Haha! Don't worry though... you two idiots have given me the power the finally end this little war and finally take over the world! Say goodbye! Hahahaha!"

Carmella loomed over the other two titans who, given their size, should be the ones in control of the world. However, they are now faced with defeating the biggest problem the world has ever seen. The citizens of the world surely would be cheering for CharLynch in this situation, due to the sheer size of Carmella. At her size, she could destroy entire cities with seemingly one stomp! Knowing this, Charlotte and Becky have made their minds up.

"Alright Becky... I think you're right. If one of us takes all of those needles and they aren't all growth needles, then Carmella will only have one slightly bigger problem to deal with, while the other is still super tiny. And if we both split the needles up, even if they are all growth needles, we may not even match her size, or even get close! The best way is to stick her with the needles and hope that they are actually all shrinking ones!" Charlotte looked to Becky, who held most of the needles, hoping she would make the right decision.

"Of couse. We may have been unlucky with that previous batch, but I have a good feeling about these! All we have to do now is..." Becky was interrupted by a distressed Charlotte.

"Becky! Watch out!" Charlotte bellowed to Becky as she noticed a planet-sized foot heading towards her best friend.

Becky, as well as Charlotte, were able to evade the initial attack from Carmella. Carmella wasn't going to waste anymore time with these two. Carmella has seen how quickly things can change in this world and isn't ready to leave anything to chance.

"Awww, come on girls! Don't you just want to get this over with? There's no sense in running or fighting me! I'm just waaaayyyyy tooo big, strong, and powerful now! I bet one of my steps is like 100 of your little puny steps! You can't get away! Sooooo....." Carmella begins to lift her gigantic, sneakered-foot up once again. "... just stand still! Hahahahaha!"

Carmella propelled her foot down towards the Earth once again, this time with even more force. Charlotte and Becky were forced to use all of their might to dodge Carmella's shoe once again, which annoyed the 12000ft woman.

"Ok then! I guess we can all have some more fun for a little longer. I like being the big giant! Hehehehe! Just watch! Fe!" *Carmella stomps to one side of them* "Fi!" *Carmella stomps to the other side of them* "Fooooooooo!" Carmella lifts her foot once again and makes sure to aim precisely, looking to finally end this little game. "FUM! Hahahahaha!" Carmella slams her foot down as hard as she could... which seemed to cause earthquakes that could be felt in Canada and Mexico, alike.

When Carmella stomped this last time, she immediately closed her eyes as she reared back in a maniacal laughter. As she opened her eyes, she hoped to find to squashed women and some more stains of blood on her sneakers. "Ohhhhh! THAT was a good one! There's no way that survived that one! Hahaha!"

Unknown to Carmella, CharLynch had taken this time to quickly to move behind Carmella, out of her sight. It was now or never at this point. Charlotte and Becky knew what they had to do. They each reached for their needles and sprinted over to Carmella's gigantic legs. They both used all of their strength to jump as high as they could, so that they could stick the needles into Carmella's skin and not into the giant shoes.

"Alright! Let's see my great handiwork.... hey! Where are those little twerps!? OW!" Carmella felt multiple pricks on the back of her legs once again. A feeling that actually made her blood run cold. Did she actually allow this to happen again? "You little bitches! Why can't you just die already!"

Carmella was furious when she turned around to see the smiling faces of Charlotte and Becky once again. She was beat red with anger and fury and was ready to end this once and for all.

"You two little bitches are DONE! Ohhhh......." The needles seemed to already be taking an effect on the titanic Carmella. However, which effect would it be? Will Carmella FINALLY be defeated again by the two besties or will all hope be lost for CharLynch as Carmella grows even more powerful due to the needles? Or will something else entirely happen in this story?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Hoping For Some Shrinking...

choices: Carmella interrupts (she has a backup plan?)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Charlotte stood still, just when she thought that things were finally going her way the absolute worst happened. Yes Charlotte had just had an amazing growth spurt raising her already impressive height of 750ft to an immense 1250ft tall! And she had even managed to acquire one of Carmella’s many growth needles to add to her height if need be, but as if divine intervention itself rained down from the heavens Carmella had once again found a way to thwart her plans. In a move that both terrified and enraged Charlotte, Carmella had grabbed her beloved Becky who was still just a mere 500ft, which compared to Carmella meant she was half the height of this titanic woman who stood at 1000ft, and she had her by her throat in her hands, on top of this she had threatened to snap dear Becky’s neck if she took another step and even went further by saying she intended to grow to a proposteruous size either way. Charlotte was truly in a now win situation...or so she thought.

Carmella didn’t have a full proper grip on Becky and as a result Becky was slowly catching her breath and strength as Carmella began to speak once more.

“So Charlotte you wannabe Queen, what will it be? Will you really trade the life of your pretty little Becky just for a slight chance of beating me...or are you gonna swallow your pride and give me back my needle so I may grow to even greater heights. Hell im in a generous mood so if you give it to me in the next 60 seconds I shall allow the two of you to be my little slaves, sound good? Well not like it matters, either way I’m gonna get bigger and stronger and you’ll be nothing but a bug to me. So choose wisely bitch.”

Camella ended her threat by giving Charlotte a half angry half lustful look https://i.redd.it/5ch0oeffefhz.jpg the message was loud and clear though, if she wanted her beloved Becky to live she would have to let this huge bitch get even bigger. Just as Charlotte was getting ready to hand over the growth needle she saw that Becky had just winked at her. Surprised but happy that she was Ok Charlotte understood immediately what they needed to do, still feigning defeat Charlotte looked down at the ground Dejected which was something that pleased Carmella greatly. Letting her guard down she loosened her grip some more on Becky and reached out for her precious needle but at the last second Charlotte threw it at her! Becky had only a second to react but that was all she needed, taking the needle she stuck it into her leg and injected herself with the growth formula. Carmella was almost speechless she had not seen this coming.

“What the hell!!!! Charlotte you bitch I’ll make you pay for this place I’m gonna break your little red hoe in half and then I’m gonna crush you!!!” Carmella then began to squeeze the life out of Becky with her grip becoming vice like. But this would only be temporary because no sooner had her grip gotten tighter it also started getting looser. Carmella turned away from Charlotte and looked at Becky who was already enjoying the benefits of the needle, she had already began growing and with each second her body stretched and became heavier causing Carmella to drop her.

Meanwhile Becky was absolutely ecstatic about growing. She was moaning in pleasure as the surge of growth raged throughout her entire body. She gre and grew going from 500ft tall to 750ft tall already, but she wasn’t stopping! To everyone’s surprise Becky kept growing and growing and growing. 900ft, 1000ft, 1100ft she had managed to surpass Carmella. 1200ft she was now eye level with Charlotte, 1300ft Charlotte and Carmella started to look real small to her, 1400ft the rest of the city looked even more minuscule. Finally at a whopping 1500ft tall Becky’s growth had stopped and the red head finally opened her eyes and inspected her newly grown form. Becky couldn’t help but run her hands though her gorgeous hair as she started to feel her entire body. http://www.gotceleb.com/wp-content/uploa...

“Whoa Baby!!! Look at me!!! I can’t believe one needle made me this huge! At this size my feet alone could while out entire armies lie they were nothing! My arms and legs feel so strong! I can feel my huge muscles all over my body, this is amazing! Hihi sorry Char but I guess I’m the big one now, I think we’ll have to talk about a little role reversal sweetie hihi. Oh my God I love it! I feel so powerful, who knew those little whimsy needles packed this much of a punch!”

Carmella was beside herself, she had gone from having total control over two other giantesses to know facing both giantesses who were now bigger than her! She had truly fucked up.

“What the actual hell! How did one needle make her this big?! I swear those fucking idiot scientists must have made a few needles with a double or triple dose, and of course they just had to get it. Well it’ll be the last time those two will ever be bigger than me, time to grow.”

Carmella then reached into her back pocket and pulled out all of her growth needles as She prepared to gi e herself the biggest boost of all time, however she didn’t notice the massive hand that reached down and pulled her up by her hair. Carmella screamed as Becky lifted her up in the air and eyed the now smaller Staten Island Goddess. Without saying a word she shook the woman and held her hand out as all of Carmella’s needles dropped onto Becky’s waiting hand.

“Oh thanks cutie just what I wanted! Haha thanks Carmella because of your stupidity I am now the biggest giantess around and now with these me and Charlotte can get as big as we want. So sit back and watch as your problems get so much bigger.” With that said Becky flung Carmella into a few nearby skyscrapers and laughed beofre waking over to her flabbergasted lover Charlotte.

Becky loved the height difference bwteen her and Charlotte who was now an entire head shorter than Becky. Charlotte was stunned by what had just occurred, within a heartbeat their problems had vanished and now they were on the verge of becoming true Giantess goddesses. But Becky had other ideas, crouching down she grabbed Charlotte and kissed her with all her might, Charlotte was surprised but happily reciprocated. The kiss lasted several minutes until the two titanesses sepersted and smiled at each other. Unbeknownst to them however Carmella was beginning to stir and had soemthing on her mind.

Becky then Helen out her hand and offered Charlotte a growth needle as the two decided what to do.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Becky’s BIG Boost

choices: Carmella shrinks the women at the start of the match
Carmella shrinks the women during the match
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Carmella had come to a decision, as much fun as it would be to grow bigger than everyone and take over the WWE, she thought to herself that there would be far too much attention on herself if she were to suddenly grow to tremendous heights, the last thing Carmella needed was unwanted attention if she wanted to be the Smackdown Women's champion.

With her decision made Carmella decided she would need to meet up with her scientists in order to commandeer a shrinking formula. The next day in an undisclosed location Carmella arrived at her scientists lab. Strutting in making sure to flip her hair she knew she had every mans attention (good thing for her that all her scientists were men) and then seductively sat down on a chair and adjusted herself so her legs were swinging off the side which made her look even more sexier than she already was. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

With all eyes on her Carmella smiled to herself and proceeded to explain her needs, after several minutes she had finished and sat smiling waiting for a response from her scientists. After a few minutes of whispered discussion the head of the team cleared his throat and spoke "Miss Carmella, am I to understand that you wish for us to create some sort of shrinking potion for you in order to gain an advantage over your opponents and win the money in the bank ladder match?" Carmella in a instant dropped her smile and replaced it with a scowl and a soul piercing look and said "yes that is literally what I just got through explaining to you" an awkward silence ensued before the scientist answered "ok then, we'll begin work immediately and it should be done within a few days". With that said Carmella left with a big smile on her face and left her scientists to it.

"A FEW DAYS LATER"

Carmella arrives at the undisclosed location ready to get her shrinking formula. After entering the building she meets her scientists once more, after a few minutes of mandatory greetings and so forth they get down to business, the scientists give Carmella a perfume bottle. Carmella nearly had a fit looking at the bottle "Is this a joke! I ask for a shrinking formula and you give me perfume?!?!" To her surprise though the head scientist smiles and tells her to spray the plant next to her, Carmella looks befuddled but obliges with the scientists request and sprays the plant, within seconds the plant starts to rapidly shrink until it stops at an inch in height. "As you can see the formula will shrink and organic or unorganic object to an inch in height. No worries listen carefully, 1 spray will only last for an hour, however two sprays will last for a day but if you spray someone or something three times with the formula they will be permanently shrunken unless given the antidote which we have also produced" Carmella was ecstatic with the success of the shrink spray but was worried that one perfume bottle wasn't enough if there were any unforeseen problems. But not her delight the scientist showed her an entire locker full of the shrinking formula. Carmella's eyes widened with lust and a huge smile lit up her face. However her thoughts were interrupted by the scientist asking for their payment. Before she payed them she told them she wanted to take a group picture with them, as all the scientists gathered Carmella told them to say cheese!!!! And with that she turned around and sprayed all the scientists with the shrinking formula.

Immediately the entire team of 12 scientists dwindled in height until they reached an inch in height. Carmella loomed over th sicnetists and crouched down so that she could see them better. "Hahahahaha you idiots actaullly thought I was going to pay you? As if you guys made me a shrinking formula and basically signed your own fate, oh and thanks for telling me all the effects of it and how to properly use it. Speaking of which" Carmella then tales the bottle and sprays the scientists two more times. "Hahaha get used to your new height boys I'm sure it's gonna be fun" with that said Carmella rises to leave but before she does she sprays the locker full of the shrinking formula and the antidote and watches as I shrinks down before picking it up and placing it in her pocket for an easier way of moving it.

Meanwhile on the floor the scientists are panicking, they are permanently an inch tall and have no antidote to ever make the, normal size again, However the head scientist reassures them, being the genius her was he was sure that Carmella may double cross them and had hidden a shrunken antidote a few feet way (a mile to them) under his desk, with this in mind they began walking towards the desk but to their horror the ground started shaking. BOOM all looked up and saw the towering beauty known as Carmella smiling menacingly down at them. "Did you really think I would know you had an antidote stashed somewhere, luckily for you I'm one step ahead of you". Carmella then proceeded to pull out a squirt bottle. "Now you might be wondering what this is, well I'll let you in on a secret, you're not my only group of scientists. I had another group come up with formula that makes anyone who comes in contact with it believe that whatever size they are the size they've always been" With that said she sprayed all of the scientists with the formula who within seconds started to look confused until they saw Carmella who said "So guys were cool right?" And stood back up to her full intimidating height and blew a kiss down to the shrunken scientists. "what were we doing again?" "I have no idea" they were interrupted by the big booming voice of Carmella. "O LEFT YOUR PAYMENT ON THE TOP OF THE LOCKER BOYS, BYEEEE!!!!!"

And with that Carmella left the lab and proceeded to the arena.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Shrinking away her problems

choices: Carmella enters the ring and "wrestles" the other divas
Carmella sits at the commentary desk and gives the other divas a chance
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Smackdown Live was on and there was a buzz within the entirety of the WWE, the main event of this evening's edition of SDL was a rematch from the Money in the Bank PPV, due to the controversy surrounding the women's match at the event the briefcase has been held up and is once again on the line as the women of SD compete to be crowned the first ever Ms MitB. The crowd had been buzzing for this the whole night and were in a frenzy waiting for this WWE version of car crash television, the ladders were set up all along the entrance ramp and around the ring, the commentators were in place and the ring announcer was ready to announce the participants. Out first was the woman who was inches away from winning the inaugural women's MitB match until James Ellsworth cost her the match, out next was Natalya followed by Tamina and Charlotte Flair and finally Carmella. Unbeknownst to them though whilst they were busy announcing the participants Carmella was backstage using her Shrink spray and memory spray on everyone backstage who all acted as if them being reduced to an inch tall was the norm and paid little to no attention to the (to them) gigantic Carmella stomping around. Finally Carmella's music hit and the princess of Staten island struts out microphone in hand and cuts her usual promo before smiling and adding a twist at the end.

"Well ladies, gentleman and everyone who works for the WWE. I hope you enjoy being able to look me at me eye to eye, because that is about to change very, very soon, now excuse me for a moment and enjoy the show hihi"

With that said Carmella turned and left through the entrance curtain to the confusion of everyone, however little did they know they were about to become a lot more confused. Without warning from the top of the arena the smoke machines activated but instead of smoke a weird spray liquid emptied out and enveloped the entire arena minus the backstage area. Within seconds the entire arena noticed something wrong, they were all getting smaller! Everyone was panicking, before they had a chance to react the entire crowd was sprayed another two times! (For some reason the ring was exempt). After a few moments the entire arena was reduced to an inch tall and they were scared beyond all belief, one moment they were waiting for a MitB ladder match, and now they were all shrank to an incredibly small size and stranded on their chairs! That wasn't the end of it though, without warning a fourth liquid was sprayed over the entire arena (minus the ring again for some reason) but this time upon being sprayed the people stopped panicking and started acting as if nothing happened began cheering and shouting for the match to begin. Meanwhile in the ring the female competitors were not taking being shrunken well. They were running around and shouting at each other having no idea what the hell was going on. However they were interrupted by the familiar booming sound of "F-A-B-U-L-O-U-S" and out came Carmella once again with a big smile on her face. The crowd were ecstatic and as she walked by the tiny crowd Carmella would wave and blow kisses at the crowd which actually managed to blow a few people off their chairs (luckily physics meant they would be unharmed from the fall but good luck seeing the match now!)

Carmella enters the ring and slowly walks over to the collection of miniscule women in the middle on the ring. All four women stand frozen in place as Carmella starts taking some booming footsteps that get louder and more powerful the closer Carmella gets, eventually reaching the centre of the ring where the divas were still standing scared out of their wits. Carmella noticing this smiles and crouches down so to get a better look at her "opponents". Charlotte finally snapping screams profanity up to the enormous Carmella whilst also shouting that she wants to know what happened to everyone. Carmella then shot a death stare at the tiny woman http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/prow...
and without saying a word flicked her with her finger sending Charlotte flying and landing several feet away almost knocked out. Carmella then turned her attention to the rest of the terrified women.

"Now listen here you little insects, I am in complete control here and if I wanted to I could step on you all right now and take that briefcase like it was nothing. But I am a fair woman so I'll give you bugs a chance to get bigger, if any of you are able to reach that briefcase I'll un-shrink you. I'll even make it easy for you (Carmella steps out of the ring and grabs a ladder before placing it in the centre of the ring, she had also lowered the briefcase so that they could touch it if they reach the top) Now I'm gonna go ring the bell so don't even think about running away, all the cameras are off so no one else can see what I've done to you all and the arena's exits are all sealed off. So best of luck little bugs and let the match begin!"

With that Carmella exited the ring and made her way over to the time keepers area, making sure to step on and crush a few unfortunate members of the ring crew along the way she rand the bell. What does Carmella do first?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Shrinking in the Bank

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
(I know I'm no Green94 or HunterrV, but I tried my best. I hope someone continues this on and puts in as much effort as I did.)

Asuka, the NXT Women's Champion, walked confidently into the locker room, having made short work of some random jobber moments before. The Japanese wrestler didn't even break a sweat in the match, making her opponent submit to the feared Asuka Lock in around a minute. She smirked and removed her famous mask, looking at herself in a nearby mirror, championship draped over her shoulder (http://www.wwenetworknews.com/wp-content...). Asuka was the most dominant wrestler in not just NXT, but arguably all of the WWE, she had earned the title, she had earned every single win in her undefeated streak, she had earned every single opportunity she had received...

But she still felt like she deserved more, and she didn't just mean a bump to one of the main rosters, she meant something beyond winning a title, something beyond wrestling. Sure, she could be the first woman to win a Royal Rumble or main event Wrestlemania, but so could Sasha Banks or Charlotte and really any other woman. No, she wanted to do something special. Something that only she could do. Something more than just a wrestling achievement.

Asuka thought about her nickname: "The Empress of Tomorrow". She loved it, the title of empress held so much power, it made her feel unstoppable, which to an extent she was. But she wasn't unstoppable enough, not even close. The champion stood in silence for a little bit, staring at herself in the mirror. "An empress..." She whispered, her Japanese accent still strong as she somewhat struggled to say the rest of her sentence. "... is a ruler." The words brought a smile to her face, she realised exactly what she needed to do. Asuka was going to be a ruler, of what she wasn't sure, but she would rule something... and she'd do it with an iron fist.

After she heard footsteps approaching the locker room, the Women's Champion hurried over to collect her things and get changed, reaching into her bag and reaching around for her clothes. However, she didn't feel any fabric in there, instead all she could feel was something cold and metal, it was empty otherwise. Cautiously, Asuka pulled it out, revealing a weird device which somewhat resembled a gun. She looked it over, flipping it around and seeing a switch on it, one side marked "shrink" and the other "grow".

This caught her curiosity, it would definitely be a lot easier to rule something if you were a giant. She flicked the switch to "grow" and pointed it at the mask she wore for her entrance, firing a bolt of some kind of energy at it. A couple seconds passed and nothing had happened, leading to a very disappointed champion. "Junk!" She exclaimed, but just as she was about to toss the device to the floor, she saw her mask begin to expand, soon big enough to fit the face of a someone four or five times Asuka's size.

Finally, she turned the device to herself, pointing the barrel at her face, pulling the trigger. When she finally opened her eyes, she ______
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Empress Asuka

choices: miraculously, it was still on her person, and usable by her.
it was missing! Another diva must've somehow gotten their hands on it.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Empress of Tomorrow opened her eyes and was met with a beautiful view of the night sky, stars shimmering around her. Initially, this confused Asuka, who lifted her foot to try and move forward, when she felt something get pulled from the ground below. That's when she realised exactly what had just happened. Below her, she saw an entire city, dwarfed completely by the now giant woman. She had to have been upwards of 3000ft tall, already!

The champ was tall enough to squish Godzilla under her toe, and all she could do was laugh. Now, there truly wasn't anyone ready for Asuka. "Insects of... world, I am Asuka. Your new... goddess." Her voice was noticeably deeper, and it was so loud, because of her height, that it shattered basically every window near her.

Of course, the armed forces were called in. But, it was too little too late, there's nothing they could do to stop her, short of raining down nukes, and even then there's no guarantee that it'd even put a dent into the self-proclaimed goddess. As the rows and rows of troops and tanks stormed down the highways towards the giantess, Asuka didn't even notice them. Not even the jets crashing into her giant midsection. Instead, she was busy soaking in the pure power she now had, unmatched by anyone or anything in the universe, there wasn't anything that could stop her. (http://cdn.pastemagazine.com/www/article...)

Finally, the goddess lifted her foot once more, walking forward and killing thousands beneath her gigantic foot, just one of her toes causing millions in property damage. And this was just the first step of many to come. At this rate, the world would be nothing but rubble in a week, not that Asuka seemed to care, as her slow walk slowly began quick, deliberate stomps. Her steps caused intense earthquakes, like never seen before.

Then, finally, after her little walk was finished, she spotted the small remnants of the US Military, which she smirked at, they looked more like ants than proud soldiers. Still smiling like a madwoman, she turned her back to the army, who had accepted their incoming death, and taunted them. (http://i.imgur.com/vArwyNH.mp4) "Say buh-bye."

With zero remorse, Asuka stuck her ass out and fell back onto it, smashing down onto the military and thousands more innocent civilians below. But this was just the beginning. Anyone who followed her in Japan knows exactly the kind of damage that Asuka can do with her rear end. (http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Cla90Q9yY-s/Tv...) and that was at 5ft3, image what she could do at 3000+ft! As the images of destruction ran through Asuka's head, she was pleased with it but... it wasn't enough. She still wasn't big enough! Asuka needed to be bigger! She reached for the growth gun and...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: had the whole arena around her foot like a shoe.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Does Ruby grow or do others shrink?
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Let's Start A Riot

choices: Ruby is panicking, angry at the Duo (Gentle)
Ruby simply steps on the arena, but not before stealing the gun herself (Cruel)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Ruby Riot sighed as she finished changing into her wrestling attire in the locker room, she had ANOTHER match with the Iconic Duo coming up, and she could go without their annoying faces today. Unfortunately, she would see both of them much earlier than anticipated, as she turned to leave the room, she saw the two Australians standing in the doorway.

"Out of the way, you two." Ruby ordered, crossing her arms as the duo laughed at her.

"Yeah, nah, not gonna happen Rubz, sorry. You're coming a bit too close to beating us in the ring so, we'll have to dispose of you." Peyton laughed, stepping forward and grabbing a bag from Billie's hands, opening it. "You'll wanna see this, Billie says a relative of hers gave it to her." One half of the Iconic Duo pulled out a weird looking sci-fi gun, showing Ruby for a moment before aiming it at her. In her short glimpse of it, she noticed a switch with two options; Grow and Shrink, and it was set on Grow. She was curious to see how this would go, so she went along with Peyton's game.

"They said it like, shrinks people, and that's totally iconic, so I stole it as soon as he turned his back on me." Billie explained, walking with her tag partner. "And now, we're gonna shrink you into nothing."

Ruby faked fear in her voice as she put her hands up. "No, please, oh great Iconic Duo, don't shoot me!"

"Too late!" Peyton exclaimed, firing a blast at the punk girl, expecting to see a little ant on the floor that could easily be crushed, but instead, all they saw was a gigantic foot. "W-Wait! What happened?" She asked, before the foot lifted up, destroying the roof of the room. And through the hole in the roof, they could see clearly, the gigantic face of Ruby Riot.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ruby's Growth

choices: Peyton grew even bigger than Ruby
Oh no the gun was set to shrink!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The beautiful Aussie bombshells Billie Kay and Peyton Royce collectively known as the iconic duo stood gaping at an unbelievable sight, mere moments ago they had attempted to reduce their NXT rival Ruby Riot to the size of a bug, hoping they could get a leg up on the comeptetiton by literally crushing their rivals. But not being the most observant duo in the world they had neglected to check the settings on their size gun and in the wake of their ignorance had managed to not shrink but grow Ruby to a preposterous size! Meanwhile high above them and the arena Ruby Riot was adjusting to her new surroundings.

“Woah what the hell was...(Ruby realises she’s towering above the arena)...WHAT THE FUCK JUST HAPPENED WHY IS EVERYTHING SO SMALL!!!!!!”

Ruby was panicking she looked at the arena, then to the distance where she could see the whole city and then to the tiny (to her) Iconic duo staring at her from the room she had just grown out of. After a few seconds of doing double takes on every sigh she could see, she eventually came to her senses and realised that everything wasn’t smaller she was just bigger! Still slightly panicked she lowered herself towards the arena and the hole she had grown out of. Billie and Peyton meanwhile started screaming and held onto each other for support as the gargantuan face of Ruby Riot came closer and closer to them as before reaching, the two eventually stopped screaming and opened their eyes to the terrifying sight of Ruby’s face looking right at them, but they noticed that she wasn’t looking like she was going to kill them for what they did, if anything she looked like she was about to cry.

“What did you guys do to me?! Listen I don’t even care why or now you did it but you have to undo it, like right now! I’m not even mad just make me normal size again!”

Billie and Peyton looked at each other and smiled because the ball was entirely in their court, their literal biggest rival was essentially grovelling on her hands and knees and they were definitely the kind to take advantage of this. Putting on her best nice girl voice Billie spoke.

“Yeah no problem Ruby, we’d be more than happy to help you with your...little problem hihi”

Billie laughed at her joke but this went unnoticed by the gigantic Ruby as she was relieved that she would soon be normal size, but in the midst of their happiness Peyton whispered something to Billie.

“So the way it we have two choices, we could either shrink her like we originally wanted to or we could grow as well and have some real fun”

Billie liked what she was hearing but decided that shrinking Ruby would be redundant if they were to evruslly grow huge themselves and take over the world. Taking the gun she aimed it at Peyton.

“Get ready bestie because you’re growing places hihi”

Pulling the trigger she shot her iconic partner Peyton and watched the results.
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Growing? Shrinking? What a riot!

choices: Bille sees a bug and flicks it off her toe!
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Billie pulled the trigger and in an instant Peyton disappeared. Billie looked triumphantly towards the ceiling expecting to see her iconic partner in crime towering above her, the arena and most importantly Ruby Riot. But all she saw when she looked up was the puzzled face of Ruby Riot.

“Erm....what just happened? Where did Peyton go?”

As the booming voice of Ruby rained down on her Billie could do nothing but gape at her in stunned silence as she had no idea what hadn’t happened to her best friend.

Meanwhile

Peyton Royce looked around, her surroundings seemed different, there were huge mountains, a long field that stretches towards them and giant rocks for in the distance. However she soon heard the earth shattering rumble that was the booming unbearably loud voice of Ruby Riot, Peyton was nearly deafened by her voice and looked skyward to see the source, however when she saw it she almost fainted, Ruby Riot’s face had replaced the sun and was towering hundreds of miles above her. Fallout backwards she fell against something hard, turning towards that she screamed, she had fell against the shoe of her now gigantic partner Billie Kay.

Now it became clear, the mountain were actually the locker room benches, the rocks were actually discarded wrestling gear and the the field was actually the carpet of the floor. Billie had fucked up massively, instead of making her huge she had made her tiny! Reducing her to a mere half an inch tall at best! Peyton almost burst out in tears, she was only about a 14 the size of Billies platform shoe, it then extended upwards towards boulder size toes that could easily crush her with the slightest of ease. From there a pair of tanned tress stretched for miles until they reached a pair simply immense orbs otherwise known as Billies beautiful breasts which obstructed her gorgeous face from Peyton’s view. Peyton had to act quick, she had no time to stand gawking and panicking she needed to get Billies attention before she accidentally stepped on her! Looking at the shoe in front of her she started to climb hoping that if she reached her toes she could get her friends attention somehow.

Meanwhile thousands of feet above (to Peyton) Ruby Riot began to get impatient.

“Hey are you gonna make me normal size or what? You think I like being some gigantic freak? Make me normal again otherwise I’ll come down there and make you ya little twerp”

Ruby made sure to make her last word sound threatening or at least as threatening as she could possibly sound calling someone a twerp. Billie however was intimidated and took a step backwards which was insignificant to her but a massive continental shift to Peyton on her foot. Luckily for her though Peyton was resilient and clinged to her shoe like her life depended on it, which it did! Finally reahching Billies foot Peyton grabbed onto one of her toes and bit down as hard as could on it Silently preying to herself that Bille felt it. As luck wouldn’t have it Bille did feel it and looked down at her foot and her gaze rested upon her half inch partner in crime who was jumping up and down in joy that her bestie had noticed her. However would when recognise her Teeny tiny friend?

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Alexa Bliss had definitely had it, she just competed in her first champion vs champion match at Survivor series and through sheer luck she had lost to Charlotte Flair. She couldn’t believe it, even though Charlotte had an unfair height advantage Alexa still thought she was better in every other aspect. But still she ha lost and this made her extremely Blissed off! Storming into her locker room she kicked over chairs, threw bags against the lockers and even smashed several mirrors out of unrelenting anger. The only thing that could calm her down was a nice hot shower, so taking off her sweaty wrestling gear she headed into the shower. As the water washed away the shame from her beautiful curvaceous figure she couldn’t help but think about herself, she never used to be like this with the constant mood swings and the temper tantrums. No. Before she was the self professed Goddess of wwe and (in her own words) a sassy bliss she was the glitter princess, she was so happy and used to smile even if she lost . She didn’t care about wins, losses or even titles, no as long as she was out there living her dream she was happy.

“ sigh Yano I kinda miss the way I used to be, sure now I win a lot more and am a lot more sexier than I was back then I have to admit I was happy. Sometimes I wish I could go back to being that way.”

As she said this the lights in she shower flickered on and off suddenly. Brushing it off as a simple minor power cut Bliss ended her shower and went back to get changed. After she got changed she was almost ready to leave when she noticed a strange bottle and a note by her bag. Picking up the letter she read what it said.

Dear Miss Bliss

You seek to have what you once had
But fear not you haven’t gotten too bad
Your wish will be granted but at a price
Do you really want to go back to being nice?


Alexa read the letter several times before rolling her eyes, thought she didn’t care for the letter she was curious as to what was in the bottle. Picking it up she quickly examined it. On the bottle it said “Open me if you want to be nice” Alexa began to ponder, did she really want to be nice again? In her heart she knew she did, but she doubted a bottle of nothing would do that for her. Shrugging she opened the bottle, as soon as she did a spray of glitter shot right out of the bottle and sprinkled all over her as a familiar phrase echoed in the room.

Glitter, Glitz, Sparkle, Bliss.

Then it happened. A bright light enveloped Alexa and began swirling around her, in mere seconds Alexa felt her bad thoughts melt away, her heart thawed out from its frozen prison and became hot with the power of Love. Within minutes Alexa was transformed. No longer was she the Goddess of WWE, now she was the Glitter princess. Taking a moment to soak in what had happened Alexa ran over to the last mirror she hadn’t broken and looked at herself, it was true she not only felt like her old herself but she even looked like her too!

“Oh wow this is great! I’m back to my old self! I feel happy, I feel joyful, I feel like pure bliss! Oh I can’t wait to share this with everyone else!”

However that’s when it happened. As she took one step towards the door she suddenly felt her insides rumble , without warning she suddenly shot up in size and hit the ceiling, oh no she was growing! There was nothing she could do as her body stretched towards the door of the locker room as Alexa found herself pinned down inside the ever decreasing room, she had no idea when She would stop growing! Luckily she did at..

The crowd stood in silence but soon found their world shaking as Alexa lowered herself down to her knees and sat down inviting the people to come closer. As the fans lined up to take pictures with the Gigantic Bliss, Alexa got the cleverness idea to give the people a closer more personal picture, she’s lowered her enormous hand down towards the people an invited them one or two at a time to climb up and get a selfie right next to her beautiful gargantuan face. One by one this continue until she got to one particularly happy fan, when he was raised up he was so lovestruck and instead of taking s picture the man looked at what lay below. Right under her hand was the gigantic crevice of her gorgeous breasts. Not even taking a second to think the man took advantage of his once in a life time situation and dived headfirst off her hand and into the depths of her cleavage.

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Stephanie McMahon Shrink story?

1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It hadn’t been the best of weeks for the chief brand officer of WWE Stephanie McMahon. She had been routinely embarrassed two nights in a row by the WWE’s newest singing Ronda Rousey, and as a result she felt that she had lost some of the fear and respect she had managed to hold over the women’s division since its inception. In her mind she was the sole reason that any of these women had a job, she was the innovator of the women’s revolution, she provided the women with each new ground breaking historical moment week after week, would there have been a women’s royal rumble match without her? Hell No! But despite all of this she was still treated with disrespect. Just hours after her embarrassing apology to Ronda Rousey, Stephanie had overheard many of the women’s locker room talking trash about her, about how she had lost her bite, how she wasn’t as intimidating any more, that she was simply a billion dollar coward instead of a princess. That was the final straw. Little did the women know that as a billionaire Steph had access to resources and materials that these women could only dream of, and one of these items was the key to Stephanie McMahon regaining the power she had over the women’s division,

Over the next few days using her abundance of wealth Stephanie was able to get a hold of something that would teach her women’s division a lesson. She had come up with a way to not only to make her wrestlers fear her, but also something that could entertain her for the next few days. Stephanie had used her many connections to obtain a shrink ray, yes with this piece of technology Steph was sure to intimidate her roster of women and show them thstbshe still the biggest and baddest bitch around.

A few days later

At an undisclosed location, Stephanie had called a talent meeting between every woman on the wwe pay role, wrestlers from Raw, Smackdown and even NXT had arrived as had any female commentators or correspondents. With her planning going smoothly Stephanie watched as more and more women poured into the building, these women had no idea what was about to happen to them but they would soon enough. All Stephanie had to decide was whether she was going to punish them individually or do a group of women at a time?

After a few minutes of debate Stephanie took out her shrink ray and made her decision, she targeted...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Stephanie Back In Charge

choices: They were all the same (shrunken) size
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Smiling devilishly Stephanie decided that she wanted to punish multiple women at the same time, after all what dies misery love?...Company. Misery loves company. With that in mind Stephanie got down to business. Walking into the communications room Stephanie took the microphone and made an announcement over the intercom.

“Attention all female personnel, will Bayley, Paige and Sasha Banks please report to room A immediately. I repeat will Bayley, Paige and Sasha Banks please report to room A immediately.”

The announcement echoed throughout the arena Andy within minutes the three designated women made their way towards room A. Little did they know it would be the biggest mistake they would ever make.

Stephanie sat in the room with excited anticipation as she awaited the arrival of her first three victims. She hadn’t made up her mind on what size she wanted to shrink everyone, she could simply shrink them all to the same tiny size or she could be a little sadistic and make them all different sizes, either way there was gonna be three very small women and one huge billion dollar princess. After a few minutes there was a knock on the door and in came the three wrestlers. First there was the the innconet and bubbly Bayley who was pure at heart but had a bangin body. Then there was the Boss Sasha Banks who was devious and noble with a very fit figure. Finally there was Paige who was English and would sleep with anyone for a packet of Space raiders and a Vanilla Coke. That being said the women had arrived and would instantly regret it.

“Good afternoon ladies I’m so glad you decided to join me. Now I’m sure you’re all wondering what you’re doing here.”

“Yeah I hope it’s important, today was meant to be our day off” Sasha said with a hint of attitude, something which Stephanie didn’t care for at all. Luckily for Sasha she had a best friend who was quick on her feet.

“Not that we have a problem with coming in one our day off. We’re all happy to help anyway we can ma’am”

Bayley quickly covered for her best friend and was relieved when Stephanie simply shrugged it off. However there was more than one mouthy woman in the room.

“Well I’m not. You have any idea how annoying it is being called in to nothing? I mean you won’t let me wrestle and now I have to waste what precious time I have off with these losers? Godddd”.

Stephanie was none to pleased with how her employees (Well most of them) had spoke to her and she was sure gonna make them pay. So instead of lashing out Stephanie simply smiled an atood up from her chair.

“Well ladies today we are here to take some promotional photos for wrestlemania. Which you will all have a place wrestling on this year. (At this Paige lit up) so what I need for you to do is stand facing that wall and turn around when I tell you to Ok?”

With that’s said the excited woman all rushed over to the wall and stood aaaiting their que. Stephanie meanwhile took her position an aimed her shrink ray carefully at the three. After adjusting a few knobs she was ready to go.

“Ok ladies action!”

All three turned around and at that moment Stephanie pulled the trigger. A bright light blinded the three women as Stephanie’s laughter began filling the air. After a few seconds the women opened their eyes and found...
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Downsizing The Women’s Division

choices: Take you with me (in the purse they go)
1552222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The bright light that had engulfed the three women soon dispersed and the three soon opened their eyes and took in their new surroundings. Sasha was the first to regain her composure, the light had made her extremely dizzy and as a result she was a little light headed, she then stumbled and knocked into someone behind her.

“Woah sorry, bright lifts are not my thing”

“It’s cool bestie I feel the same, in fact I feel really dizzy I mean how else would you explain younbeing so small haha.”

Sasha laughed along with her best friend Bayley until she realised that Bayley laughs we’re coming from above her. Turning around Sasha’s fears were confirmed, she was staring right at her best friends belly button. Breathing in and out rapidly Sasha was in total shock at what she was seeing, that’s when Bayley looked down and noticed that Sasha was not a mirage.

“OH MY GOD SASHA WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO YOU!!!!!! WHY ARE YOU SO SMALL?!”

“I don’t know Bayley! Maybe you’re just big? Why are you so big!!!”

“Geez you two keep it down, that light gave me such a headache”

Bayley and Sasha spun round as fast as they could and saw and even more frightening sight. There stood Paige but she was much much bigger, in fact she was the same size Bayley was to Sasha compared to Bayley! This was intimidating for Bayley but even more terrifying to Sasha who was now barely taller than Paige’s knees. Paige soon realised their differences in height and became overjoyed at their predicament.

“Oh, My, God! Hahaha look at you two! Bayley you’re so short, if you’re not careful my ass may knock you out haha. And...ooops I didn’t even see you there Sasha, wow you’re so tiny I could step on you and not even notice haha. I don’t know what happened but I don’t care if it means I’m bigger than you shrimps!”

“Well I’m so glad you feel that way Paige cause you’re gonna be stuck at that size for a long time haha!”

The three women were rocked by the big booming sound of someone talking from high above. Slowly craning their necks up they were greeted to the sight of a titanic Stephanie McMahon grinning down at them. That’s when it all clicked for the three wrestlers. They hadn’t grown at all, not they hadn’t all been shrank to different very small sizes. Stephanie estimated that Paige was 3 inches tall, Bayley was 2 inches tall and worst of all Sasha was now a measly 1 inch tall. Sasha immedietly found herself backing up into Bayley, almost as if she was seeking protection from the larger woman even though it was futile, Bayley out of fear held onto her friend for support. Paige meanwhile just stood there trying to comprehend what was happening, until she lost it.

“WHAT THE HELL DID YOU DO TO US YOU BITCH!!!!!!! TURN ME BACK RIGHT NOW!!!!!!!”

Stephanie didn’t get angry, she isn’t even change her expression, she simply took her fingersnand flicked Paige right on the chest. Paige felt like she was hit by a car as the force of the finger caused her to fly several feet (inches to Steph) in the opposite direction. Bayley and Sasha continued to hold each other for support as they saw their bigger co-worker get taken out witnout so much as a second thought. Stephanie meanwhile smiled as she saw how easy it was to knock Someone around at that size, she had full control and power now thanks to the shrink ray! And she was ready to let the fun continue.

One had to wonder just what had happened to these tiny women.

Paige

Paige’ had managed to escape her prison which featured her trapped Inbetween Alexa’s trunks and her incredibly toned sexy ass. Thinking on her feet Paige had stayed high and hidden amongst the lockers cubbie holes as Alexa had previously searched the floor for her. This quick thinking is what saved Paige from the wrath of miss Bliss, but now there was a much bigger problem as Paige had to escape the room that contained a maniacal Gigantic Stephanie McMahon. So Paige decided to carefully avoid detection and stay high as she navigated through the giant locker room towards the door. Meanwhile

Sasha

What seemed like a lifetime ago Sasha had been on the floor when Alexa came in and kidnapped her best friend Bayley and Paige. Now Sasha had found her way out of the room and found herself in another room after hitching a ride on a pair of really expensive heels, one might even say we’re befitting of a princess...

Bayley

Meanwhile the shrunken woman in the most precarious situation was the WWE’s resident hugger Bayley who after a futile attempt at escape found herself trapped Inbetween the beautiful fleshy mounds known as Alexa Bliss’s tits. Bayley was so close thst she even attempted a second escape and had reached the bottom of Alexa’s top and was seconds away from squeezing out when a bright light blinded her just as she began falling out bewtween her boob prison. Luckily she managed to slide down Alexa’s leg unhurt but managed to get tangled in her boot laces. That’s when she heard some absolutely booming laughter from above. Bayley heart sank, there in what seemed like thousands of feet away was a being nearly a hundred times the size of Alexa. Bayley then realised that Alexa had been Shrunk too! So now here she was 2 inches tall compared to a woman who herself was now an inch tall! Before Bayley even had a chance to cry something collossal was making its way over to Alexa and it was getting closer! Stephanie’s titanic fingers plucked the tiny Alexa from the groun and with it Bayley! The moment she was dropped down onto the bench Bayley came loose from the bootlace and with that she didn’t even hesitiste and began running. However now thst she was essentially the size of a speck to the almighty Stephanie McMahon she went unnoticed by the colossal woman. She made her way thought the gigantic trees thst were Charlotte and Becky’s legs and mad her way over to the lockers in an attempt to hide from all the bigger women.

Present

Now that the werabouts of all three women were confirmed the scene was set. Stephanie had three tiny slaves in the form of Becky Lynch, Charlotte and Alexa Bliss. Meanwhile the 1 inch tall Sasha was on the floor of a room somewhere, the 3 inch tall Paige was making her way across the lockers and finally the speck sized Bayley was adjusting to her new size by hiding terrified in the lockers.
